description: 품사가 한글로 변환된 완전한 3267개 단어 데이터베이스

meanings.english: used before a singular noun to refer to any member of a group

examples.en: I need a pencil.
examples.ko: 나는 연필이 필요해.

meanings.english: to leave something behind or stop caring for it

examples.en: He abandoned his car on the side of the road.
examples.ko: 그는 도로변에 자동차를 버렸다.

meanings.english: having the power, skill, means, or opportunity to do something

examples.en: She is able to speak three languages.
examples.ko: 그녀는 세 가지 언어를 구사할 수 있다.

meanings.english: on or into a ship, aircraft, or other vehicle

examples.en: We went aboard the cruise ship for our vacation.
examples.ko: 휴가를 위해 크루즈선에 탑승했다.

meanings.english: to stop or fail before completion

examples.en: The mission had to abort due to bad weather.
examples.ko: 악천으로 미션을 중단해야 했다.

meanings.english: to exist in large numbers or amounts

examples.en: The garden abounds with beautiful flowers.
examples.ko: 정원은 아름다운 꽃으로 가득하다.

meanings.english: approximately; around

examples.en: There were about 50 people at the party.
examples.ko: 파티에는 대략 50명의 사람이 있었다.

meanings.english: at a higher level or position than something

examples.en: The sun is above the clouds.
examples.ko: 해는 구름 위에 있다.

meanings.english: in or to a foreign country

examples.en: She studied abroad in the United States.
examples.ko: 그녀는 미국에서 해외 연수를 했다.

meanings.english: not present in a place

examples.en: He was absent from school yesterday.
examples.ko: 그는 어제 학교를 결석했다.

meanings.english: complete; total

examples.en: The teacher has absolute authority in the classroom.
examples.ko: 선생님은 교실에서 절대적 권한을 가지고 있다.

meanings.english: to take in or soak up

examples.en: Plants absorb water through their roots.
examples.ko: 식물은 뿌리를 통해 물을 흡수한다.

meanings.english: existing in thought or as an idea but not having a physical or concrete existence

examples.en: The concept of love is abstract and difficult to define.
examples.ko: 사랑이라는 개념은 추상적이고 정의하기 어렵다.

meanings.english: ridiculously unreasonable, unsound, or incongruous

examples.en: It's absurd to think that pigs can fly.
examples.ko: 돼지가 날 수 있다고 생각하는 것은 터무니없다.

meanings.english: to use something for the wrong purpose in a way that is harmful or morally wrong

examples.en: Animal abuse is a serious issue that needs to be addressed.
examples.ko: 동물 학대는 해결해야 할 심각한 문제이다.

meanings.english: a place of study or training in a special field

examples.en: She attends an art academy to improve her painting skills.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그림 실력을 향상시키기 위해 미술 학원에 다닌다.

meanings.english: To increase in speed

examples.en: Pressing the gas pedal will accelerate the car.
examples.ko: 가속기를 밟으면 차가 빨라집니다.

meanings.english: The way in which people in a particular area pronounce words

examples.en: She has a British accent.
examples.ko: 그녀는 영국 사투리를 사용합니다.

meanings.english: To agree to take something that is offered

examples.en: I accept your apology.
examples.ko: 당신의 사과를 받아들입니다.

meanings.english: The ability or right to use or enter something

examples.en: Employees have access to the company's database.
examples.ko: 직원들은 회사의 데이터베이스에 접근할 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: An unfortunate event that happens unexpectedly and unintentionally

examples.en: He had an accident while riding his bike.
examples.ko: 자전거를 타다가 사고가 났어요.

meanings.english: To provide lodging or sufficient space for

examples.en: The hotel can accommodate up to 200 guests.
examples.ko: 그 호텔은 최대 200명의 손님을 수용할 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: To go somewhere with someone as a companion

examples.en: She will accompany me to the concert.
examples.ko: 그녀가 나와 함께 콘서트에 갈 거에요.

meanings.english: To achieve or complete successfully

examples.en: She worked hard to accomplish her goals.
examples.ko: 그녀는 목표를 달성하기 위해 열심히 일했어요.

meanings.english: agreement or harmony

examples.en: They reached an accord on the terms of the contract.
examples.ko: 그들은 계약 조건에 대해 합의했다.

meanings.english: a record or statement of financial expenditure or receipts

examples.en: She keeps track of her expenses by maintaining a detailed account.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자세한 내역을 유지함으로써 지출을 추적한다.

meanings.english: to gather or collect over time

examples.en: Over the years, he managed to accumulate a vast collection of rare books.
examples.ko: 여러 해 동안 그는 희귀 서적의 거대한 컬렉션을 축적하는 데 성공했다.

meanings.english: correct in all details; exact

examples.en: The scientist made accurate measurements to ensure the experiment's success.
examples.ko: 과학자는 실험의 성공을 보장하기 위해 정확한 측정을 했다.

meanings.english: to charge someone with an offense or crime

examples.en: The police will accuse the suspect of theft based on the evidence.
examples.ko: 경찰은 증거를 근거로 용의자를 절도 혐의로 고발할 것이다.

meanings.english: a continuous or prolonged dull pain; to feel persistent pain

examples.en: She had an ache in her back after lifting heavy boxes all day.
examples.ko: 하루 종일 무거운 상자를 옮기다 보니 그녀는 등에 통증을 느꼈다.

meanings.english: to successfully bring about or reach a goal

examples.en: With hard work and dedication, she was able to achieve her dream of becoming a doctor.
examples.ko: 열심히 노력하고 헌신함으로써 그녀는 의사가 되는 꿈을 이룰 수 있었다.

meanings.english: a chemical substance with a sour taste; having a pH of less than 7

examples.en: Citrus fruits like lemons contain citric acid, which gives them their sour taste.
examples.ko: 레몬과 같은 과일에는 신맛을 주는 구연산이 함유되어 있다.

meanings.english: to accept or admit the existence or truth of something

examples.en: She acknowledged her mistake and apologized.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신의 실수를 인정하고 사과했다.

meanings.english: to obtain or get something

examples.en: He acquired a new skill through practice.
examples.ko: 그는 연습을 통해 새로운 기술을 획득했다.

meanings.english: the act of acquiring or gaining possession of something

examples.en: The company announced the acquisition of a new business.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 새로운 사업의 획득을 발표했다.

meanings.english: from one side to the other side

examples.en: She saw her friend across the street.
examples.ko: 그녀는 거리 건너편에 친구를 보았다.

meanings.english: to take action; to behave in a certain way

examples.en: He decided to act on his plan immediately.
examples.ko: 그는 즉시 계획에 따라 행동하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: to adjust to new conditions or environment

examples.en: She had to adapt to the new school environment.
examples.ko: 그녀는 새로운 학교 환경에 적응해야 했다.

meanings.english: to put something together with something else

examples.en: Please add sugar to the coffee.
examples.ko: 커피에 설탕을 넣어주세요.

meanings.english: a person who is addicted to a particular substance or activity

examples.en: He is an addict and needs help to overcome his addiction.
examples.ko: 그는 중독자이며 중독을 극복하기 위해 도움이 필요하다.

meanings.english: The details of the place where someone lives or an organization is situated.

examples.en: I need your address to send you a letter.
examples.ko: 편지를 보낼 주소가 필요해.

meanings.english: Sufficient, enough, or suitable.

examples.en: Studying for two hours a day should be adequate to pass the exam.
examples.ko: 하루에 두 시간씩 공부하는 것이 시험을 통과하기에 충분할 것이다.

meanings.english: Alter or move something slightly in order to achieve the desired fit, appearance, or result.

examples.en: You can adjust the volume of the TV by using the remote control.
examples.ko: 리모컨을 사용해서 TV 볼륨을 조절할 수 있어.

meanings.english: Manage and be responsible for the running of (a business, organization, etc.).

examples.en: The teacher will administer the exam tomorrow.
examples.ko: 선생님이 내일 시험을 볼 것이다.

meanings.english: Regard with respect or warm approval.

examples.en: I admire my parents for their hard work and dedication.
examples.ko: 부모님의 노고와 헌신을 칭찬합니다.

meanings.english: Confess to be true or to be the case, typically with reluctance.

examples.en: She had to admit that she was wrong.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신이 틀렸다고 인정해야 했다.

meanings.english: A young person who is developing into an adult.

examples.en: Adolescents often experience changes in their emotions and behaviors.
examples.ko: 청소년들은 종종 감정과 행동에 변화를 경험합니다.

meanings.english: Take up or start to use or follow (an idea, method, or course of action).

examples.en: The company decided to adopt a new marketing strategy.
examples.ko: 회사는 새로운 마케팅 전략을 채택하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: A person who is fully grown or developed

examples.en: She became an adult when she turned 18.
examples.ko: 그녀는 18살이 되었을 때 성인이 되었습니다.

meanings.english: To move forward or make progress

examples.en: He advanced to the next level in his career.
examples.ko: 그는 직업에서 다음 단계로 진보했습니다.

meanings.english: A condition or circumstance that puts one in a favorable or superior position

examples.en: Having a good education is an advantage in finding a job.
examples.ko: 좋은 교육을 받는 것은 취직할 때 이점이 됩니다.

meanings.english: An exciting or unusual experience

examples.en: They went on an adventure to explore the jungle.
examples.ko: 그들은 정글을 탐험하기 위해 모험을 떠났습니다.

meanings.english: Unfavorable or harmful

examples.en: The adverse weather conditions forced the event to be canceled.
examples.ko: 불리한 날씨 조건으로 인해 행사가 취소되어야 했습니다.

meanings.english: To promote or publicize a product or service

examples.en: They advertize their new product on social media.
examples.ko: 그들은 새 제품을 소셜 미디어에서 광고합니다.

meanings.english: Recommendation or guidance offered to help someone make a decision or take action

examples.en: She gave me good advice on how to study effectively.
examples.ko: 그녀는 어떻게 효과적으로 공부할지에 대해 좋은 충고를 해 주었습니다.

meanings.english: To offer suggestions or recommendations

examples.en: I advise you to take a break and relax.
examples.ko: 너에게 휴식을 취하고 쉬는 것을 추천합니다.

meanings.english: to publicly support or recommend a particular cause or policy

examples.en: She advocates for animal rights.
examples.ko: 그녀는 동물 권리를 옹호합니다.

meanings.english: concerned with beauty or the appreciation of beauty

examples.en: The artwork has a unique aesthetic appeal.
examples.ko: 이 작품은 독특한 미적 매력을 가지고 있습니다.

meanings.english: an event or sequence of events of a specified kind or that has previously been referred to

examples.en: The political affair caused a lot of controversy.
examples.ko: 그 정치 사건은 많은 논란을 일으켰다.

meanings.english: have an effect on; make a difference to

examples.en: The weather can affect your mood.
examples.ko: 날씨가 당신의 기분에 영향을 줄 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: have enough money or time to be able to buy or do something

examples.en: I can't afford to buy a new car right now.
examples.ko: 지금은 새 차를 살 여유가 없어요.

meanings.english: feeling fear or anxiety; frightened

examples.en: She is afraid of spiders.
examples.ko: 그녀는 거미를 무서워해요.

meanings.english: following in time; subsequent to

examples.en: We will have dessert after dinner.
examples.ko: 저녁 식사 후에 디저트를 먹을 거예요.

meanings.english: the time from noon or lunchtime to evening

examples.en: Let's meet in the afternoon to discuss the project.
examples.ko: 프로젝트를 논의하기 위해 오후에 만나요.

meanings.english: once more; another time

examples.en: I will try again tomorrow.
examples.ko: 내일 다시 시도해 볼게.

meanings.english: in opposition to; contrary to

examples.en: She voted against the proposal.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그 제안에 반대표를 던졌다.

meanings.english: the length of time that a person has lived or a thing has existed

examples.en: What is your age?
examples.ko: 당신의 나이는 어떻게 되세요?

meanings.english: a business or organization established to provide a particular service

examples.en: The travel agency helped us book our flights.
examples.ko: 여행사가 우리에게 항공편을 예약하는 데 도움을 주었다.

meanings.english: a list of items to be discussed at a meeting

examples.en: The agenda for today's meeting includes budget planning.
examples.ko: 오늘 회의 안건에 예산 계획이 포함되어 있습니다.

meanings.english: a person who acts on behalf of another, especially in a legal or business context

examples.en: The real estate agent helped us find our new home.
examples.ko: 부동산 중개인이 우리에게 새 집을 찾는 데 도움을 주었습니다.

meanings.english: to initiate hostilities or attack

examples.en: The country vowed not to aggress against its neighbors.
examples.ko: 그 나라는 이웃에 대해 침략하지 않겠다고 맹세했다.

meanings.english: before the present time; in the past

examples.en: She left the company a year ago.
examples.ko: 그녀는 1년 전에 그 회사를 떠났다.

meanings.english: to have the same opinion as someone else

examples.en: I agree with your idea.
examples.ko: 나는 당신의 생각에 동의합니다.

meanings.english: the science or practice of farming

examples.en: Agriculture is an important industry in many countries.
examples.ko: 농업은 많은 나라에서 중요한 산업입니다.

meanings.english: in or toward the front

examples.en: Keep walking ahead until you see the sign.
examples.ko: 앞으로 가면 표지판을 볼 때까지 계속 걸어 가세요.

meanings.english: help or support

examples.en: The Red Cross provides aid to disaster victims.
examples.ko: 적십자는 재난 피해자들에게 도움을 제공합니다.

meanings.english: a goal or purpose

examples.en: Her aim is to become a doctor.
examples.ko: 그녀의 목적은 의사가 되는 것입니다.

meanings.english: the invisible gaseous substance surrounding the earth

examples.en: Plants need air to survive.
examples.ko: 식물은 생존하기 위해 공기가 필요합니다.

meanings.english: a company that provides regular flights to transport passengers and goods

examples.en: I booked a ticket with a popular airline.
examples.ko: 인기 있는 항공사로 표를 예약했습니다.

meanings.english: a powered flying vehicle with fixed wings and a weight greater than that of the air it displaces

examples.en: We traveled to Europe by airplane.
examples.ko: 우리는 비행기로 유럽에 여행했습니다.

meanings.english: A place where airplanes take off and land, and where passengers can get on or off the planes.

examples.en: We arrived at the airport two hours before our flight.
examples.ko: 우리는 비행기 탑승 2시간 전에 공항에 도착했다.

meanings.english: A signal that warns of danger or an emergency, often a loud noise or flashing light.

examples.en: The fire alarm went off, and everyone evacuated the building.
examples.ko: 화재 경보가 울리자 모두 건물을 대피했다.

meanings.english: A collection of songs or photographs that are stored together, often in a book or on a CD.

examples.en: I bought the new album of my favorite band.
examples.ko: 내가 좋아하는 밴드의 새 앨범을 샀다.

meanings.english: A type of liquid that can make people drunk, such as beer, wine, or spirits.

examples.en: It's important not to drink alcohol if you're driving.
examples.ko: 운전 중에는 주류를 마시지 않는 것이 중요하다.

meanings.english: A warning signal that indicates a need for immediate attention or action.

examples.en: The lifeguard was on high alert for any signs of danger in the water.
examples.ko: 라이프가드는 물 속의 위험 징후에 대해 주의를 기울였다.

meanings.english: A creature from outer space; a person from another country or culture.

examples.en: The movie depicted an alien invasion of Earth.
examples.ko: 그 영화는 지구에 대한 외계인의 침공을 묘사했다.

meanings.english: Similar in appearance, nature, or form.

examples.en: The twins looked so alike that it was hard to tell them apart.
examples.ko: 쌍둥이들은 너무 닮아서 구별하기 어려웠다.

meanings.english: Living; not dead.

examples.en: The hiker was relieved to find the lost dog alive and well.
examples.ko: 하이커는 길을 잃은 개를 살아서 발견해서 안심했다.

meanings.english: the whole quantity or extent of

examples.en: She ate all the cookies.
examples.ko: 그녀는 모든 쿠키를 먹었다.

meanings.english: to distribute for a specific purpose

examples.en: The government will allocate funds for education.
examples.ko: 정부는 교육을 위해 자금을 할당할 것이다.

meanings.english: to permit or let

examples.en: Please allow me to explain.
examples.ko: 제게 설명할 기회를 주세요.

meanings.english: a country, group, or person that is united with another for a common purpose

examples.en: The two nations became allies in the war.
examples.ko: 두 나라가 전쟁에서 동맹이 되었다.

meanings.english: nearly all

examples.en: She almost missed the bus.
examples.ko: 그녀는 버스를 거의 놓칠 뻔했다.

meanings.english: by oneself; without others

examples.en: I prefer to be alone sometimes.
examples.ko: 가끔 혼자 있는 것을 선호해.

meanings.english: in a line next to something long

examples.en: We walked along the river.
examples.ko: 우리는 강가를 따라 걸었다.

meanings.english: by the side of; next to

examples.en: The new building was built alongside the old one.
examples.ko: 새 건물이 옛 건물 옆에 지어졌다.

meanings.english: in a voice that can be clearly heard

examples.en: He read the story aloud to the class.
examples.ko: 그는 이야기를 반 소리로 반 학급에 읽었다.

meanings.english: before or by now

examples.en: I have already finished my homework.
examples.ko: 나는 이미 숙제를 끝냈다.

meanings.english: satisfactory; acceptable

examples.en: It's alright to ask for help when you need it.
examples.ko: 필요할 때 도움을 요청해도 좋아.

meanings.english: in addition; too

examples.en: She is good at singing and also plays the piano.
examples.ko: 그녀는 노래하는 것도 잘하고 피아노도 친다.

meanings.english: to change or make different

examples.en: She decided to alter her hairstyle for a new look.
examples.ko: 그녀는 새로운 모습을 위해 헤어스타일을 바꾸기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: to take turns; every other

examples.en: In the play, the characters alternate singing and dancing.
examples.ko: 연극에서 캐릭터들은 노래와 춤을 번갈아 가며 한다.

meanings.english: despite the fact that; even though

examples.en: Although it was raining, they still went for a walk.
examples.ko: 비록 비가 오고 있었지만, 그들은 여전히 산책을 갔다.

meanings.english: completely; entirely

examples.en: Altogether, there were ten people at the party.
examples.ko: 모두 합쳐서 파티에는 열 명이 있었다.

meanings.english: at all times; on all occasions

examples.en: She always arrives early for work.
examples.ko: 그녀는 항상 일찍 출근합니다.

meanings.english: to fill with wonder or astonishment

examples.en: The magic show amazed the audience.
examples.ko: 그 마술쇼는 관객들을 놀라게 했다.

meanings.english: a diplomatic official of the highest rank sent by a government to represent it

examples.en: The ambassador attended the international conference.
examples.ko: 대사는 국제 회의에 참석했다.

meanings.english: a strong desire to achieve something or succeed

examples.en: Her ambition is to become a successful businesswoman.
examples.ko: 그녀의 야망은 성공한 여성 사업가가 되는 것이다.

meanings.english: a vehicle equipped for taking sick or injured people to the hospital

examples.en: The ambulance rushed to the scene of the accident.
examples.ko: 앰뷸런스가 사고 현장으로 급히 출동했다.

meanings.english: in the midst of; surrounded by

examples.en: She found her lost ring among the books on the shelf.
examples.ko: 그녀는 책장 위의 책들 가운데서 잃어버린 반지를 찾았다.

meanings.english: a quantity of something, typically large

examples.en: The amount of homework she had to do was overwhelming.
examples.ko: 그녀가 해야 했던 숙제 양은 압도적이었다.

meanings.english: to entertain or make someone laugh or smile

examples.en: The comedian's jokes never fail to amuse the audience.
examples.ko: 코미디언의 농담은 항상 관객들을 즐겁게 한다.

meanings.english: The process of examining something in detail to understand it better.

examples.en: Scientists conducted an analysis of the data to draw conclusions.
examples.ko: 과학자들은 결론을 도출하기 위해 데이터를 분석했다.

meanings.english: To examine something in detail to understand it better.

examples.en: The detective will analyze the evidence to solve the case.
examples.ko: 형사는 사건을 해결하기 위해 증거를 분석할 것이다.

meanings.english: To secure something firmly in place.

examples.en: The ship dropped anchor to stay in one place during the storm.
examples.ko: 배는 폭풍 중 한 곳에 머물기 위해 닻을 내렸다.

meanings.english: Belonging to a time long past, especially before the end of the Western Roman Empire.

examples.en: The archaeologists discovered ancient artifacts buried in the ruins.
examples.ko: 고고학자들은 폐허 속에 묻힌 고대 유물을 발견했다.

meanings.english: Used to connect words or phrases.

examples.en: I like apples and oranges.
examples.ko: 나는 사과와 오렌지를 좋아한다.

meanings.english: A spiritual being believed to act as a messenger of God.

examples.en: The painting depicted an angel with wings, surrounded by light.
examples.ko: 이 그림은 빛에 둘러싸인 날개 달린 천사를 그렸다.

meanings.english: A strong feeling of displeasure or hostility.

examples.en: His face turned red with anger when he heard the news.
examples.ko: 그가 소식을 듣고 분노로 얼굴이 붉어졌다.

meanings.english: The space between two intersecting lines or surfaces at or close to the point where they meet.

examples.en: She adjusted the angle of the mirror to get a better view.
examples.ko: 그녀는 거울의 각도를 조절하여 더 나은 시야를 얻었다.

meanings.english: A living organism that feeds on organic matter, typically having specialized sense organs and nervous system

examples.en: My favorite animal is a dog.
examples.ko: 내가 가장 좋아하는 동물은 개입니다.

meanings.english: The date on which an event took place in a previous year

examples.en: We celebrated our 10th anniversary last week.
examples.ko: 지난 주에 우리는 10주년을 축하했습니다.

meanings.english: To make a public and typically formal declaration about a fact, occurrence, or intention

examples.en: The company will announce the winner tomorrow.
examples.ko: 회사는 내일 우승자를 발표할 것입니다.

meanings.english: To irritate or disturb, especially by continued or repeated acts

examples.en: His constant tapping on the desk annoys me.
examples.ko: 그의 계속된 책상 두드림이 나를 짜증나게 합니다.

meanings.english: Occurring once every year

examples.en: The school holds an annual sports day in May.
examples.ko: 학교는 매년 5월에 연례적으로 체육대회를 개최합니다.

meanings.english: Used to refer to an additional person or thing of the same type as one already mentioned

examples.en: I finished one book, now I'm going to start another.
examples.ko: 한 권의 책을 끝냈으니, 이제 다른 책을 시작할 것입니다.

meanings.english: To respond to a question, statement, or situation by providing the required information or action

examples.en: Can you answer this question for me?
examples.ko: 이 질문에 대답해 줄 수 있나요?

meanings.english: A small insect typically having a sting and living in a complex social colony with one or more breeding queens

examples.en: I saw an ant crawling on the kitchen floor.
examples.ko: 부엌 바닥을 기어다니는 개미를 봤어.

meanings.english: to expect or predict something will happen

examples.en: I anticipate a great time at the party tonight.
examples.ko: 나는 오늘 밤 파티에서 즐거운 시간을 기대하고 있다.

meanings.english: a feeling of worry, nervousness, or unease about something with an uncertain outcome

examples.en: She felt a sense of anxiety before taking the exam.
examples.ko: 시험을 보기 전에 그녀는 불안감을 느꼈다.

meanings.english: feeling or showing worry or nervousness

examples.en: He was anxious about the upcoming job interview.
examples.ko: 그는 다가오는 취직 면접에 대해 걱정했다.

meanings.english: used to refer to one or some of a thing or number of things, no matter how much or many

examples.en: Do you have any questions?
examples.ko: 질문이 있으신가요?

meanings.english: separated by a distance in space or time

examples.en: The two friends live apart from each other now.
examples.ko: 지금 두 친구는 서로 떨어져 살고 있다.

meanings.english: a set of rooms for living in, usually on one floor of a building

examples.en: She lives in a cozy apartment in the city.
examples.ko: 그녀는 도시의 아늑한 아파트에 살고 있다.

meanings.english: a regretful acknowledgment of an offense or failure

examples.en: He offered a sincere apology for his mistake.
examples.ko: 그는 자신의 실수에 대해 진심으로 사과했다.

meanings.english: clearly seen or understood; obvious

examples.en: The apparent reason for his absence was illness.
examples.ko: 그의 결석의 명백한 이유는 병이었다.

meanings.english: the quality of being attractive or interesting

examples.en: The movie's appeal lies in its captivating storyline.
examples.ko: 이 영화의 매력은 매혹적인 스토리에 있다.

meanings.english: to come into sight; to become visible

examples.en: The sun will appear in the morning.
examples.ko: 해가 아침에 나타날 것이다.

meanings.english: a round fruit with red or green skin and a whitish interior

examples.en: She enjoys eating a crisp apple for a snack.
examples.ko: 그녀는 간식으로 바삭한 사과를 즐긴다.

meanings.english: to put to use for a specific purpose

examples.en: You need to apply sunscreen before going out in the sun.
examples.ko: 해에 나가기 전에 선크림을 바르셔야 합니다.

meanings.english: to assign a job or role to someone

examples.en: The company will appoint a new manager next month.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 다음 달에 새로운 매니저를 지명할 것이다.

meanings.english: to recognize the value or significance of something

examples.en: I appreciate your help with my homework.
examples.ko: 숙제를 도와줘서 감사합니다.

meanings.english: to come near or nearer to something or someone

examples.en: He decided to approach the problem from a different angle.
examples.ko: 그는 문제를 다른 각도에서 접근하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: suitable or proper in the circumstances

examples.en: Wearing formal attire is appropriate for the wedding.
examples.ko: 결혼식에는 격식을 차린 복장이 적절하다.

meanings.english: to officially agree to or accept something

examples.en: The committee will approve the budget for the new project.
examples.ko: 위원회는 새 프로젝트를 위한 예산을 승인할 것이다.

meanings.english: close to the actual, but not completely accurate or exact

examples.en: Can you give me an approximate time of when you'll arrive?
examples.ko: 도착 시간을 대략적으로 알려줄 수 있나요?

meanings.english: a person who designs buildings and oversees their construction

examples.en: The architect created a beautiful and functional design for the new library.
examples.ko: 건축가는 새 도서관을 위해 아름다우면서 기능적인 디자인을 만들었다.

meanings.english: a particular part of a place, town, or country

examples.en: The park is a popular area for families to have picnics.
examples.ko: 공원은 가족들이 소풍을 즐기는 인기 있는 지역이다.

meanings.english: to disagree with someone in words, often in an angry way

examples.en: They always argue about which movie to watch.
examples.ko: 그들은 항상 어떤 영화를 볼지에 대해 논쟁한다.

meanings.english: to happen or appear, especially in a way that is unexpected or difficult to control

examples.en: A problem arose when they discovered the missing documents.
examples.ko: 문서가 누락되었다는 사실을 발견하자 문제가 발생했다.

meanings.english: the part of the body between the shoulder and the hand

examples.en: She broke her arm while playing soccer.
examples.ko: 그녀는 축구를 하다가 팔을 부러뜨렸다.

meanings.english: a large organized group of soldiers trained to fight on land

examples.en: The army was deployed to assist in the disaster relief efforts.
examples.ko: 군대가 재난 구호 노력을 지원하기 위해 파견되었다.

meanings.english: in a circle or a curve

examples.en: She looked around the room.
examples.ko: 그녀는 방을 둘러봤다.

meanings.english: to put things in a neat, attractive, or required order

examples.en: She arranged the books on the shelf.
examples.ko: 그녀는 책들을 선반에 정리했다.

meanings.english: to take someone into custody, typically for a crime

examples.en: The police arrested the suspect.
examples.ko: 경찰은 용의자를 체포했다.

meanings.english: to reach a place, especially at the end of a journey

examples.en: The train arrived at the station on time.
examples.ko: 기차가 정시에 역에 도착했다.

meanings.english: a thin, straight stick with a sharp point at one end, shot from a bow

examples.en: The archer aimed the arrow at the target.
examples.ko: 궁수가 목표물을 향해 화살을 조준했다.

meanings.english: the expression or application of human creative skill and imagination

examples.en: She studied art at the university.
examples.ko: 그녀는 대학에서 미술을 공부했다.

meanings.english: a piece of writing included with others in a newspaper, magazine, or other publication

examples.en: She wrote an article for the school newspaper.
examples.ko: 그녀는 학교 신문을 위해 기사를 썼다.

meanings.english: clever or cunning devices or expedients, especially as used to trick or deceive others

examples.en: The magician used artifice to perform the trick.
examples.ko: 마술사는 마술을 하기 위해 책략을 사용했다.

meanings.english: Used to indicate similarity or equality

examples.en: She sings as beautifully as a bird.
examples.ko: 그녀는 새처럼 아름답게 노래를 부른다.

meanings.english: To or toward the side

examples.en: He pushed the books aside to make space.
examples.ko: 그는 공간을 만들기 위해 책들을 한쪽으로 밀었다.

meanings.english: To inquire or request

examples.en: She asked him for help with her homework.
examples.ko: 그녀는 숙제를 돕기 위해 그에게 도움을 요청했다.

meanings.english: In a state of sleep

examples.en: The baby is fast asleep in the crib.
examples.ko: 아기는 요란히 잠들어 있다.

meanings.english: A particular part or feature of something

examples.en: The project has many different aspects to consider.
examples.ko: 이 프로젝트는 고려해야 할 다양한 측면이 있다.

meanings.english: To have a strong desire or ambition

examples.en: She aspires to become a successful businesswoman.
examples.ko: 그녀는 성공한 여사업가가 되기를 열망한다.

meanings.english: A violent physical or verbal attack

examples.en: The army launched an assault on the enemy's stronghold.
examples.ko: 군대가 적의 요새에 공격을 시작했다.

meanings.english: To gather or put together

examples.en: The team will assemble in the conference room for a meeting.
examples.ko: 팀은 회의를 위해 회의실에 모일 것이다.

meanings.english: to state with confidence or force

examples.en: She asserted her innocence to the police.
examples.ko: 그녀는 경찰에 자신의 결백을 주장했다.

meanings.english: to evaluate or estimate the nature, ability, or quality of

examples.en: Teachers assess students' progress through various tests.
examples.ko: 교사들은 다양한 시험을 통해 학생들의 진행 상황을 평가한다.

meanings.english: a useful or valuable thing, person, or quality

examples.en: Her positive attitude is her greatest asset.
examples.ko: 그녀의 긍정적인 태도는 그녀의 가장 큰 자산이다.

meanings.english: to allocate or designate for a particular purpose

examples.en: The teacher assigned homework to the students.
examples.ko: 선생님은 학생들에게 숙제를 할당했다.

meanings.english: to help or support in a task or activity

examples.en: Volunteers assist in organizing the event.
examples.ko: 자원봉사자들이 행사를 조직하는 데 도와준다.

meanings.english: to connect or bring into relation with something else

examples.en: People often associate the color red with passion.
examples.ko: 사람들은 종종 빨간색을 열정과 연관시킨다.

meanings.english: to take for granted or suppose to be the case

examples.en: I assume she will be at the meeting tomorrow.
examples.ko: 내가 그녀가 내일 회의에 참석할 것이라고 가정한다.

meanings.english: to make someone confident about something

examples.en: He assured his parents that he would study hard for the exam.
examples.ko: 그는 시험을 열심히 공부할 것이라고 부모님에게 확신시켰다.

meanings.english: To surprise or amaze someone greatly

examples.en: I was astonished by the magician's tricks.
examples.ko: 나는 마술사의 마술에 깜짝 놀랐다.

meanings.english: Used to indicate a location or position

examples.en: She is waiting at the bus stop.
examples.ko: 그녀는 버스 정류장에서 기다리고 있다.

meanings.english: A person who is proficient in sports and other forms of physical exercise

examples.en: He is a talented athlete who excels in both swimming and running.
examples.ko: 그는 수영과 달리기 둘 다 뛰어난 재능 있는 운동선수이다.

meanings.english: The envelope of gases surrounding the earth or another planet; the pervading tone or mood of a place

examples.en: The atmosphere in the classroom was tense before the exam.
examples.ko: 시험 전 교실의 분위기는 긴장되어 있었다.

meanings.english: The basic unit of a chemical element, consisting of a nucleus and one or more electrons

examples.en: An atom is the smallest unit of matter that retains the properties of an element.
examples.ko: 원자는 원소의 특성을 유지하는 물질의 가장 작은 단위이다.

meanings.english: To fasten or join one thing to another

examples.en: Please attach the file to your email before sending it.
examples.ko: 이메일을 보내기 전에 파일을 첨부해 주세요.

meanings.english: To take aggressive action against a place or person

examples.en: The army will attack the enemy camp at dawn.
examples.ko: 군대는 새벽에 적군 캠프를 공격할 것이다.

meanings.english: To make an effort to achieve or complete something

examples.en: She will attempt to climb the mountain next week.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다음 주에 산을 오르려고 시도할 것이다.

meanings.english: to be present at; to go to

examples.en: I will attend the meeting tomorrow.
examples.ko: 내일 회의에 참석할 거야.

meanings.english: the act or power of carefully thinking about, listening to, or watching someone or something

examples.en: Pay attention in class.
examples.ko: 수업 시간에 주의를 기울여.

meanings.english: a way of thinking or feeling about something or someone

examples.en: Having a positive attitude can make a big difference.
examples.ko: 긍정적인 태도를 가지는 것은 큰 차이를 만들 수 있어.

meanings.english: to cause to come near or adhere by physical force

examples.en: Bright colors attract bees.
examples.ko: 밝은 색깔이 벌을 끌어들인다.

meanings.english: a quality or feature regarded as a characteristic or inherent part of someone or something

examples.en: Her kindness is her most admirable attribute.
examples.ko: 그녀의 친절함은 그녀의 가장 칭찬할 만한 특성이다.

meanings.english: a public sale in which goods or property are sold to the highest bidder

examples.en: The painting was sold at an auction for a high price.
examples.ko: 그 그림은 경매에서 높은 가격에 팔렸다.

meanings.english: a group of people who have gathered to watch or listen to something

examples.en: The audience clapped after the performance.
examples.ko: 공연 후 청중이 박수를 쳤다.

meanings.english: the sister of one's father or mother

examples.en: My aunt lives in a different city.
examples.ko: 내 고모는 다른 도시에 산다.

meanings.english: genuine; real

examples.en: This painting is authentic, not a copy.
examples.ko: 이 그림은 진짜이며 복사본이 아닙니다.

meanings.english: a person who writes books or articles

examples.en: The author of this book is a famous novelist.
examples.ko: 이 책의 저자는 유명한 소설가입니다.

meanings.english: operating by itself with little or no direct human control

examples.en: My car has an automatic transmission.
examples.ko: 내 차는 자동 변속기가 있습니다.

meanings.english: the season between summer and winter

examples.en: The leaves change color in autumn.
examples.ko: 가을에는 잎이 색을 바꿉니다.

meanings.english: to be of use or advantage

examples.en: Studying hard will avail you in the exam.
examples.ko: 열심히 공부하는 것이 시험에서 도움이 될 것입니다.

meanings.english: a number expressing the central or typical value in a set of data

examples.en: The average score of the class was 85.
examples.ko: 반의 평균 점수는 85점이었습니다.

meanings.english: to keep away from; to prevent from happening

examples.en: To stay healthy, avoid eating too much junk food.
examples.ko: 건강을 유지하기 위해 과도한 쓰레기 음식 섭취를 피하세요.

meanings.english: to wait for; to look forward to

examples.en: I await your response to my email.
examples.ko: 제 이메일에 대한 답변을 기다리고 있습니다.

meanings.english: to be conscious and not asleep

examples.en: I was awake all night studying for the exam.
examples.ko: 시험공부로 밤새 깨어 있었어.

meanings.english: a prize or other mark of recognition given in honor of an achievement

examples.en: She received an award for her outstanding performance in the competition.
examples.ko: 그녀는 대회에서 뛰어난 성과로 상을 받았어.

meanings.english: having knowledge or perception of a situation or fact

examples.en: She was aware of the potential dangers of the experiment.
examples.ko: 그녀는 실험의 잠재적 위험을 알고 있었어.

meanings.english: at a distance from a particular place, person, or thing

examples.en: He went away on a business trip for a week.
examples.ko: 그는 일주일 동안 출장을 가고 있었어.

meanings.english: a feeling of reverential respect mixed with fear or wonder

examples.en: The majestic view of the mountains filled her with awe.
examples.ko: 산들의 웅장한 경치가 그녀를 경외감으로 채웠다.

meanings.english: lacking skill or dexterity; difficult to use or handle

examples.en: He felt awkward at the party because he didn't know anyone.
examples.ko: 그는 아는 사람이 없어서 파티에서 어색했다.

meanings.english: a very young child, especially one newly or recently born

examples.en: The baby slept peacefully in the crib.
examples.ko: 아기는 요란하지 않게 요람에서 잠을 잤다.

meanings.english: the rear surface of the human body from the shoulders to the hips; in the opposite direction from the one that one is facing or traveling

examples.en: She carried the heavy box on her back.
examples.ko: 그녀는 무거운 상자를 등에 메고 있었어.

meanings.english: the part of a scene or picture that is farthest from the viewer

examples.en: She posed for a photo with a beautiful mountain background.
examples.ko: 그녀는 아름다운 산 배경과 함께 사진을 찍었다.

meanings.english: cured and smoked meat from the sides and back of a pig

examples.en: I love the smell of sizzling bacon in the morning.
examples.ko: 나는 아침에 바삭바삭한 베이컨 냄새를 좋아한다.

meanings.english: not good; of poor quality

examples.en: It was a bad idea to go out without an umbrella in this rain.
examples.ko: 이 비에 우산 없이 나가는 것은 좋지 않은 생각이었다.

meanings.english: a game played on a rectangular court by hitting a shuttlecock over a net

examples.en: She practices badminton every weekend at the local sports center.
examples.ko: 그녀는 매주 지역 체육관에서 배드민턴을 연습한다.

meanings.english: a flexible container with an opening at the top, used for carrying things

examples.en: She packed her books and snacks in her school bag.
examples.ko: 그녀는 책과 간식거리를 가방에 담았다.

meanings.english: to cook food in an oven without direct exposure to flame

examples.en: She likes to bake cookies with her grandmother on weekends.
examples.ko: 그녀는 주말에 할머니와 함께 쿠키를 굽는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: a state of equilibrium or equipoise; equal distribution of weight

examples.en: She practices yoga to improve her balance and flexibility.
examples.ko: 그녀는 균형과 유연성을 향상시키기 위해 요가를 연습한다.

meanings.english: a round object used in various sports and games

examples.en: He kicked the ball into the goal and scored a point for his team.
examples.ko: 그는 공을 골대로 차서 팀에 점수를 따냈다.

meanings.english: A brightly colored bag that is filled with air and floats in the air.

examples.en: She held a red balloon in her hand.
examples.ko: 그녀는 손에 빨간 풍선을 들었다.

meanings.english: To officially or legally prohibit something.

examples.en: Smoking is banned in this area.
examples.ko: 이 지역에서는 흡연이 금지되어 있다.

meanings.english: A long curved fruit with a yellow skin and soft, sweet flesh.

examples.en: I like to eat bananas for breakfast.
examples.ko: 나는 아침에 바나나를 먹는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: A group of musicians who play music together.

examples.en: My favorite band is performing at the concert tonight.
examples.ko: 내가 좋아하는 밴드가 오늘 밤 콘서트에서 공연을 한다.

meanings.english: A sudden loud noise.

examples.en: The door slammed shut with a loud bang.
examples.ko: 문이 쾅 닫혔다.

meanings.english: A financial institution that provides various financial services.

examples.en: I need to go to the bank to deposit some money.
examples.ko: 돈을 입금하기 위해 은행에 가야 해.

meanings.english: Unable to pay debts; financially ruined.

examples.en: After the business failed, they were declared bankrupt.
examples.ko: 사업이 실패한 후 그들은 파산 선언을 받았다.

meanings.english: A place where alcoholic drinks are served.

examples.en: Let's meet at the bar for a drink after work.
examples.ko: 일이 끝난 후 술 한 잔 하러 바에서 만나자.

meanings.english: not covered or protected; exposed

examples.en: The tree branches were bare in winter.
examples.ko: 겨울에 나무 가지들은 벌거벗었다.

meanings.english: negotiate the terms and conditions of a transaction

examples.en: She bargained with the seller to get a lower price.
examples.ko: 그녀는 판매자와 가격을 낮추기 위해 흥정했다.

meanings.english: the tough protective outer covering of a tree; the sound a dog makes

examples.en: The dog began to bark loudly when the mailman arrived.
examples.ko: 우편 배달부가 도착하자 개가 크게 짖기 시작했다.

meanings.english: something that blocks or impedes progress or movement

examples.en: The language barrier made it difficult for them to communicate.
examples.ko: 언어 장벽으로 인해 그들은 소통하기 어려웠다.

meanings.english: the foundation or starting point of something

examples.en: Education is the base for a successful career.
examples.ko: 교육은 성공적인 경력의 기반이다.

meanings.english: a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of nine players each

examples.en: He enjoys playing baseball with his friends on weekends.
examples.ko: 그는 주말에 친구들과 야구를 즐긴다.

meanings.english: the underlying support or foundation for something

examples.en: The decision was made on the basis of the available information.
examples.ko: 가용한 정보를 근거로 결정이 내려졌다.

meanings.english: a container typically made of woven materials used for carrying or storing items

examples.en: She picked apples and placed them in the basket.
examples.ko: 그녀는 사과를 따서 바구니에 담았다.

meanings.english: A game played between two teams of five players each, in which the objective is to score points by throwing a ball through a hoop elevated above the floor.

examples.en: I enjoy playing basketball with my friends after school.
examples.ko: 나는 방과 후에 친구들과 농구를 즐기는 것을 좋아해.

meanings.english: A club-shaped implement used in sports such as baseball and cricket for hitting the ball.

examples.en: The baseball player swung the bat and hit a home run.
examples.ko: 야구 선수가 방망이를 휘둘러 홈런을 쳤다.

meanings.english: The act of washing oneself in a tub or shower.

examples.en: After a long day, I like to relax in a warm bath.
examples.ko: 긴 하루 끝에 나는 따뜻한 목욕에서 편안함을 누린다.

meanings.english: A container consisting of one or more cells, in which chemical energy is converted into electricity and used as a source of power.

examples.en: I need to replace the battery in my remote control.
examples.ko: 나는 리모컨의 배터리를 교체해야 해.

meanings.english: A sustained fight between large organized armed forces.

examples.en: The soldiers bravely fought in the battle to defend their country.
examples.ko: 군인들은 용감하게 자국을 지키기 위해 전투를 벌였다.

meanings.english: A broad inlet of the sea where the land curves inward.

examples.en: We enjoyed a picnic by the bay on a sunny day.
examples.ko: 우리는 화창한 날에 만가에서 소풍을 즐겼다.

meanings.english: Exist or occur; take place.

examples.en: To be or not to be, that is the question.
examples.ko: 있거나 없거나, 그것이 문제다.

meanings.english: A pebbly or sandy shore, especially by the ocean between high- and low-water marks.

examples.en: We spent the day building sandcastles on the beach.
examples.ko: 우리는 해변에서 모래성을 쌓으며 하루를 보냈다.

meanings.english: A long piece of wood, metal, or concrete, especially used to support weight in a building or other structure.

examples.en: The sunlight shone through the window, casting a beam of light across the room.
examples.ko: 햇빛이 창문을 통해 비쳐들어 방 안을 가로지르는 빔이 있었다.

meanings.english: The seed or pod of various leguminous plants, widely eaten as food.

examples.en: She added some beans to the soup to make it more nutritious.
examples.ko: 그녀는 수프에 콩을 넣어 영양가를 높였다.

meanings.english: A large, heavy mammal with thick fur and a very short tail.

examples.en: We were lucky to spot a bear in the forest during our camping trip.
examples.ko: 캠핑 여행 중 숲 속에서 곰을 발견해서 운이 좋았다.

meanings.english: The hair that grows on a man's chin and cheeks.

examples.en: He decided to grow a beard during the winter months to keep his face warm.
examples.ko: 그는 겨울 동안 얼굴을 따뜻하게 유지하기 위해 수염을 기르기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: An animal, especially a large or dangerous one.

examples.en: The beast roamed freely in the jungle, hunting for its next meal.
examples.ko: 야수는 정글을 자유롭게 돌아다니며 다음 식사를 위해 사냥을 했다.

meanings.english: To strike or hit repeatedly.

examples.en: The boxer managed to beat his opponent in the final round of the match.
examples.ko: 복서는 경기 마지막 라운드에서 상대를 이기는 데 성공했다.

meanings.english: A combination of qualities, such as shape, color, or form, that pleases the aesthetic senses.

examples.en: The beauty of the sunset over the ocean took her breath away.
examples.ko: 바다 위에 진행되는 일몰의 아름다움이 그녀의 숨을 멎게 했다.

meanings.english: For the reason that; since.

examples.en: He couldn't go to the party because he had to study for his exams.
examples.ko: 시험 공부를 해야 했기 때문에 그는 파티에 참석할 수 없었다.

meanings.english: to begin to be

examples.en: She will become a doctor in the future.
examples.ko: 그녀는 미래에 의사가 될 것이다.

meanings.english: a piece of furniture for sleeping on

examples.en: I like to read books in bed before sleeping.
examples.ko: 나는 자기 전에 침대에서 책을 읽는 것을 좋아해.

meanings.english: an insect that collects nectar and pollen

examples.en: Bees are important for pollinating flowers.
examples.ko: 벌들은 꽃을 수분화하는 데 중요하다.

meanings.english: the meat of a cow

examples.en: I enjoy eating grilled beef with my family.
examples.ko: 나는 가족과 함께 구운 소고기를 먹는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: an alcoholic drink made from malt and hops

examples.en: Many people enjoy drinking beer at social gatherings.
examples.ko: 많은 사람들이 사교 모임에서 맥주를 마시는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: at an earlier time

examples.en: Please finish your homework before going out to play.
examples.ko: 놀러 나가기 전에 숙제를 먼저 끝내 주세요.

meanings.english: to ask earnestly for something

examples.en: The hungry child would beg for food on the streets.
examples.ko: 배고픈 아이는 길거리에서 음식을 간청했다.

meanings.english: to start or commence

examples.en: Let's begin our English class with a warm-up activity.
examples.ko: 따뜻한 활동으로 영어 수업을 시작해 봅시다.

meanings.english: as a representative of

examples.en: He spoke on behalf of the team at the meeting.
examples.ko: 그는 회의에서 팀을 대표하여 발언했다.

meanings.english: to act in a particular way

examples.en: The students were asked to behave in the library.
examples.ko: 학생들에게 도서관에서 행동을 잘 하도록 요청했다.

meanings.english: at the back of something

examples.en: The cat is hiding behind the sofa.
examples.ko: 고양이가 소파 뒤에 숨어있다.

meanings.english: a feeling that something is true or exists

examples.en: Her belief in kindness inspires others.
examples.ko: 그녀의 친절에 대한 신념은 다른 사람들에게 영감을 준다.

meanings.english: to accept that something is true without proof

examples.en: I believe in your ability to succeed.
examples.ko: 당신의 성공 능력을 믿습니다.

meanings.english: a hollow object that makes a sound when struck

examples.en: The bell rang to signal the end of class.
examples.ko: 종소리가 울려 수업이 끝났음을 알렸다.

meanings.english: to be a member of a group or place

examples.en: These books belong on the top shelf.
examples.ko: 이 책들은 윗 선반에 속한다.

meanings.english: at a lower level or position

examples.en: Please write your name below the date.
examples.ko: 날짜 아래에 이름을 적어주세요.

meanings.english: A strip of leather or other material worn around the waist to support clothes or carry weapons.

examples.en: She wore a stylish belt with her dress.
examples.ko: 그녀는 드레스에 멋진 벨트를 차고 있었다.

meanings.english: A long seat for two or more people, typically made of wood or stone.

examples.en: They sat on the bench in the park and enjoyed the sunshine.
examples.ko: 그들은 공원의 벤치에 앉아 햇볕을 즐겼다.

meanings.english: To force or be forced out of a straight line or shape into a curve or angle.

examples.en: She had to bend down to pick up the fallen pen.
examples.ko: 그녀는 떨어진 펜을 주워 올리기 위해 몸을 구부려야 했다.

meanings.english: In or to a lower place; under.

examples.en: The treasure was buried beneath the old oak tree.
examples.ko: 보물은 오래된 참나무 아래에 묻혀 있었다.

meanings.english: An advantage or profit gained from something.

examples.en: Regular exercise has many health benefits.
examples.ko: 규칙적인 운동은 많은 건강 혜택을 가져다준다.

meanings.english: At the side of; next to.

examples.en: She sat beside her best friend during the movie.
examples.ko: 그녀는 영화 동안 가장 친한 친구 옆에 앉았다.

meanings.english: To risk money on the result of an event or a competition, such as a horse race.

examples.en: He bet $10 on the football game and won.
examples.ko: 그는 축구 경기에 10달러를 걸었고 이겼다.

meanings.english: To be disloyal to someone's trust or confidence.

examples.en: He felt betrayed when his best friend told his secret to everyone.
examples.ko: 그의 친한 친구가 그의 비밀을 모두에게 말해서 그는 배신당한 기분이었다.

meanings.english: in or into the space that separates two places, people, or objects

examples.en: The park is between the library and the school.
examples.ko: 공원은 도서관과 학교 사이에 있습니다.

meanings.english: at or to the further side of something

examples.en: The mountains are beyond the river.
examples.ko: 산은 강의 저편에 있습니다.

meanings.english: an unfair personal opinion that influences your judgment

examples.en: She tried to avoid showing any bias in her decision.
examples.ko: 그녀는 판단에 어떤 편견도 드러내지 않으려고 노력했습니다.

meanings.english: large in size or amount

examples.en: The elephant is a big animal.
examples.ko: 코끼리는 큰 동물입니다.

meanings.english: a vehicle with two wheels that you ride by sitting on it and pushing two pedals

examples.en: He rides his bike to school every day.
examples.ko: 그는 매일 학교에 자전거를 타고 갑니다.

meanings.english: a piece of paper that shows how much you owe for goods or services

examples.en: The waiter brought the bill after we finished eating.
examples.ko: 저희가 식사를 마치자 웨이터가 계산서를 가져왔습니다.

meanings.english: the number 1,000,000,000

examples.en: There are over seven billion people in the world.
examples.ko: 세계에는 70억 이상의 사람이 있습니다.

meanings.english: a container for waste, especially household waste

examples.en: Please throw the empty cans in the bin.
examples.ko: 빈 캔을 쓰레기통에 버려주세요.

meanings.english: to tie or fasten something tightly

examples.en: She used a rope to bind the boxes together.
examples.ko: 그녀는 상자들을 묶기 위해 밧줄을 사용했다.

meanings.english: an account of someone's life written by someone else

examples.en: I enjoyed reading the biography of Nelson Mandela.
examples.ko: 나는 넬슨 만델라의 전기를 읽는 것을 즐겼다.

meanings.english: the study of living organisms

examples.en: She decided to major in biology because she loves animals.
examples.ko: 그녀는 동물을 좋아해서 생물학을 전공하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: a warm-blooded vertebrate animal with feathers and wings

examples.en: I saw a beautiful bird perched on the tree branch.
examples.ko: 나는 나무 가지에 앉아 있는 아름다운 새를 봤다.

meanings.english: the emergence of a baby or other young from the body of its mother

examples.en: The baby's birth was a joyous occasion for the whole family.
examples.ko: 아기의 출생은 가족 모두에게 기쁜 일이었다.

meanings.english: a small baked unleavened cake

examples.en: Would you like a biscuit with your tea?
examples.ko: 차와 함께 비스킷 한 개 드릴까요?

meanings.english: a small piece or quantity of something

examples.en: He ate every bit of his sandwich.
examples.ko: 그는 샌드위치의 모든 조각을 다 먹었다.

meanings.english: to use your teeth to cut into something or someone

examples.en: The dog will bite if you try to pet him while he's eating.
examples.ko: 그 개는 밥을 먹는 동안 쓰다듬으려고 하면 물 것이다.

meanings.english: having a sharp, pungent taste; not sweet

examples.en: The bitter cold wind made her shiver.
examples.ko: 쓰라린 추위로 그녀는 오한을 느꼈다.

meanings.english: of the darkest color, like coal or the night sky

examples.en: She wore a black dress to the funeral.
examples.ko: 그녀는 장례식에 검은 드레스를 입었다.

meanings.english: to assign responsibility for a fault or wrong

examples.en: Don't blame others for your mistakes.
examples.ko: 당신의 실수를 남 탓하지 마세요.

meanings.english: having empty spaces to be filled in; showing no expression

examples.en: She stared at the blank page, unsure of what to write.
examples.ko: 그녀는 무엇을 써야 할지 모르고 빈 페이지를 바라보았다.

meanings.english: a large piece of cloth used for keeping warm, typically on a bed

examples.en: She wrapped herself in a warm blanket on the cold winter night.
examples.ko: 추운 겨울 밤에 그녀는 따뜻한 담요에 싸여 있었다.

meanings.english: a destructive wave of air pressure caused by an explosion

examples.en: The blast shattered the windows of the building.
examples.ko: 폭발로 건물 창문이 깨졌다.

meanings.english: to mix different substances together to create a unified whole

examples.en: The artist used various colors to blend a beautiful painting.
examples.ko: 작가는 다양한 색을 사용하여 아름다운 그림을 혼합했다.

meanings.english: to confer or invoke divine favor upon; to make holy

examples.en: May you be blessed with happiness and success.
examples.ko: 행복과 성공으로 축복받기를 바랍니다.

meanings.english: unable to see

examples.en: He is blind and uses a white cane to get around.
examples.ko: 그는 눈이 보이지 않아서 백색 지팡이를 사용해요.

meanings.english: to close and open your eyes quickly

examples.en: She blinked in surprise when the bright light turned on.
examples.ko: 밝은 불이 켜지자 그녀는 놀라서 눈을 깜빡였다.

meanings.english: to stop something from moving through or along

examples.en: The fallen tree blocked the road, so we had to find another way.
examples.ko: 넘어진 나무가 길을 막았기 때문에 우리는 다른 길을 찾아야 했다.

meanings.english: having light-colored hair

examples.en: She dyed her hair blonde for a change.
examples.ko: 그녀는 변화를 위해 머리를 금발로 염색했다.

meanings.english: the red liquid that flows through the bodies of humans and animals

examples.en: Blood carries oxygen to all parts of the body.
examples.ko: 피는 몸의 모든 부분으로 산소를 운반한다.

meanings.english: to produce flowers

examples.en: The roses will bloom in the spring.
examples.ko: 장미는 봄에 피어날 것이다.

meanings.english: to produce flowers

examples.en: The cherry trees blossom beautifully in the spring.
examples.ko: 벚나무는 봄에 아름답게 꽃을 피운다.

meanings.english: to move with force and speed

examples.en: The wind blew the leaves off the trees.
examples.ko: 바람이 나무의 잎을 날렸다.

meanings.english: having the color of the clear sky on a sunny day

examples.en: The sky is blue today.
examples.ko: 오늘 하늘은 파랗다.

meanings.english: a long, flat piece of wood

examples.en: He nailed the board to the wall.
examples.ko: 그는 판자를 벽에 못으로 고정했다.

meanings.english: a small vessel for travel on water

examples.en: We went fishing on a boat.
examples.ko: 우리는 배에서 낚시를 했다.

meanings.english: the physical structure of a person or an animal

examples.en: Exercise is good for your body.
examples.ko: 운동은 당신의 신체에 좋다.

meanings.english: to heat a liquid until bubbles rise constantly to the surface

examples.en: She likes to boil eggs for breakfast.
examples.ko: 그녀는 아침 식사로 계란을 삶는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: showing a willingness to take risks; confident and courageous

examples.en: She made a bold decision to quit her job and travel the world.
examples.ko: 그녀는 일을 그만두고 세계를 여행하기로 대담한 결정을 했다.

meanings.english: an explosive device used as a weapon

examples.en: The bomb exploded with a loud noise.
examples.ko: 폭탄이 큰 소리와 함께 터졌다.

meanings.english: a close connection joining two or more people

examples.en: The bond between the twins was unbreakable.
examples.ko: 쌍둥이들 사이의 유대감은 풀 수 없었다.

meanings.english: The hard tissue forming the skeleton of humans and other vertebrates.

examples.en: She broke a bone in her arm while playing soccer.
examples.ko: 그녀는 축구를 하다가 팔뼈를 부셨다.

meanings.english: A written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together along one side and bound in covers.

examples.en: I love reading books in my free time.
examples.ko: 나는 시간이 날 때 책을 읽는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: A period of great prosperity or rapid economic growth.

examples.en: The 1920s was a time of economic boom in the United States.
examples.ko: 1920년대는 미국에서의 경제적 붐의 시기였다.

meanings.english: To help or encourage something to increase or improve.

examples.en: Eating a healthy breakfast can boost your energy levels for the day.
examples.ko: 건강한 아침 식사를 하면 하루 동안 에너지 수준이 증가할 수 있다.

meanings.english: A sturdy item of footwear covering the foot, ankle, and sometimes the leg below the knee.

examples.en: She wore her favorite boots to the hiking trip.
examples.ko: 그녀는 등산 여행에 가서 자신이 가장 좋아하는 부츠를 신었다.

meanings.english: The line that separates two countries or areas.

examples.en: The river forms a natural border between the two countries.
examples.ko: 그 강은 두 나라 사이에 자연 경계를 형성한다.

meanings.english: To make someone feel very bored, or a person who is dull and uninteresting.

examples.en: The lecture bored me to tears.
examples.ko: 그 강의는 나를 지루하게 만들었다.

meanings.english: To take and use something that belongs to someone else with the intention of returning it.

examples.en: Can I borrow your pen for a moment?
examples.ko: 잠시 당신의 펜을 빌릴 수 있을까요?

meanings.english: A person who is in charge of a worker or organization

examples.en: My boss is very supportive and understanding.
examples.ko: 내 상사는 매우 지원적이고 이해심이 깊다.

meanings.english: Used to refer to two people or things together

examples.en: Both of my parents are doctors.
examples.ko: 내 부모님 둘 다 의사입니다.

meanings.english: To annoy or cause inconvenience to someone

examples.en: I'm sorry to bother you, but could you help me with this?
examples.ko: 불편을 끼쳐 죄송합니다만, 이것 좀 도와주실 수 있을까요?

meanings.english: A container, typically made of glass or plastic, with a narrow neck

examples.en: She filled the bottle with water and put it in the fridge.
examples.ko: 그녀는 병에 물을 채워 냉장고에 넣었다.

meanings.english: The lowest point or part of something

examples.en: The treasure chest was at the bottom of the ocean.
examples.ko: 보물 상자는 바다 밑바닥에 있었다.

meanings.english: To spring back after hitting a surface

examples.en: The ball bounced off the wall and landed on the floor.
examples.ko: 공이 벽에서 튀어 나와 바닥에 떨어졌다.

meanings.english: A line that marks the limits of an area; a dividing line

examples.en: The fence serves as a boundary between our yard and the neighbor's yard.
examples.ko: 울타리는 우리 집과 이웃 집 사이의 경계 역할을 한다.

meanings.english: To bend the upper part of the body forward as a sign of respect or greeting

examples.en: He gave a bow to the audience after his performance.
examples.ko: 그는 공연 후 관객들에게 절을 했다.

meanings.english: A round container that is open at the top and used for holding food or liquid

examples.en: She ate a bowl of soup for lunch.
examples.ko: 그녀는 점심으로 한 그릇의 수프를 먹었다.

meanings.english: A container with a flat base and sides, typically square or rectangular

examples.en: He put the gift in a beautifully wrapped box.
examples.ko: 그는 선물을 아름답게 포장된 상자에 넣었다.

meanings.english: A male child or young man

examples.en: The boy played happily in the park.
examples.ko: 소년은 공원에서 행복하게 놀았다.

meanings.english: The organ inside your head that controls your thoughts, feelings, and movements

examples.en: Studying and learning help to exercise your brain.
examples.ko: 공부하고 배우는 것은 당신의 뇌를 운동시키는 데 도움이 된다.

meanings.english: A device used for slowing or stopping a moving vehicle

examples.en: He pressed the brake pedal to stop the car.
examples.ko: 그는 차를 멈추기 위해 브레이크 페달을 밟았다.

meanings.english: A part of a tree that grows out from the trunk and has leaves, flowers, or fruit

examples.en: The bird perched on a branch of the tree.
examples.ko: 새가 나무의 한 가지에 앉아 있었다.

meanings.english: A type of product made by a particular company under a particular name

examples.en: She prefers to buy clothes from a well-known brand.
examples.ko: 그녀는 유명한 브랜드의 옷을 사는 것을 선호한다.

meanings.english: Showing courage or not being afraid

examples.en: The firefighter was praised for his brave actions.
examples.ko: 소방관은 용감한 행동으로 칭찬을 받았다.

meanings.english: Food made of flour, water, and yeast or baking powder, baked and usually sliced for eating.

examples.en: I bought a loaf of bread from the bakery.
examples.ko: 나는 빵집에서 한 조각 빵을 샀어.

meanings.english: To separate into pieces as a result of a blow, shock, or strain.

examples.en: Please be careful not to break the glass.
examples.ko: 유리를 깨지 않도록 조심해주세요.

meanings.english: The first meal of the day, usually eaten in the morning.

examples.en: I had cereal and milk for breakfast this morning.
examples.ko: 오늘 아침에 나는 시리얼과 우유를 먹었어.

meanings.english: Either of the two soft, protruding organs on a woman's chest that secrete milk after pregnancy.

examples.en: The baby was hungry, so the mother breastfed him.
examples.ko: 아기가 배고파서 어머니가 모유를 먹였다.

meanings.english: The air taken into or expelled from the lungs.

examples.en: He took a deep breath before jumping into the pool.
examples.ko: 수영장으로 뛰어들기 전에 그는 깊게 숨을 들이마셨다.

meanings.english: To take air into and expel it from the lungs.

examples.en: Close your eyes and take a deep breath.
examples.ko: 눈을 감고 깊게 숨을 들이마셔.

meanings.english: A stock of animals or plants within a species having a distinctive appearance and typically having been developed by deliberate selection.

examples.en: Labradors are a popular breed of dogs.
examples.ko: 래브라도르는 인기 있는 개 품종이다.

meanings.english: A gentle wind.

examples.en: The breeze rustled the leaves in the trees.
examples.ko: 산들바람이 나무의 잎을 소리쳤다.

meanings.english: a small rectangular block typically made of fired or sun-dried clay, used in building construction

examples.en: The house was built with red bricks.
examples.ko: 집은 붉은 벽돌로 지어졌다.

meanings.english: a structure carrying a road, path, railroad, or canal across a river, ravine, road, railroad, or other obstacle

examples.en: We crossed the bridge to get to the other side of the river.
examples.ko: 우리는 강의 반대편으로 가기 위해 다리를 건넜다.

meanings.english: of short duration; not lasting for long

examples.en: I will give you a brief summary of the meeting.
examples.ko: 회의 요약을 간단히 설명해 드리겠습니다.

meanings.english: giving out or reflecting a lot of light; shining

examples.en: The sun is so bright today.
examples.ko: 오늘 태양이 아주 밝다.

meanings.english: exceptionally clever or talented

examples.en: She is a brilliant scientist.
examples.ko: 그녀는 뛰어난 과학자이다.

meanings.english: carry or accompany to a place

examples.en: Don't forget to bring your umbrella.
examples.ko: 우산을 가져오는 걸 잊지 마세요.

meanings.english: having a distance larger than usual from side to side; wide

examples.en: The river is very broad at this point.
examples.ko: 이 지점에서 강은 매우 넓다.

meanings.english: transmit (a program or some information) by radio or television

examples.en: The news will be broadcast live at 8 PM.
examples.ko: 뉴스는 오후 8시에 실시간으로 방송될 것이다.

meanings.english: A male sibling

examples.en: My brother is two years older than me.
examples.ko: 내 형제는 나보다 두 살 연상이다.

meanings.english: Of a color similar to that of wood or soil

examples.en: She has beautiful brown eyes.
examples.ko: 그녀는 아름다운 갈색 눈을 가지고 있다.

meanings.english: An implement with bristles, wire, or other filaments

examples.en: He used a brush to paint the fence.
examples.ko: 그는 울타리를 칠하기 위해 솔을 사용했다.

meanings.english: A savagely violent person or animal

examples.en: The brute force of the storm destroyed the village.
examples.ko: 폭풍의 야수 같은 힘이 마을을 파괴했다.

meanings.english: A thin sphere of liquid enclosing air or gas

examples.en: The children were blowing bubbles with soap.
examples.ko: 어린이들이 비누로 거품을 불어냈다.

meanings.english: An estimate of income and expenditure for a set period of time

examples.en: We need to create a budget for our family vacation.
examples.ko: 가족 휴가를 위해 예산을 짜야 해.

meanings.english: An insect or other creeping or crawling small creature

examples.en: There was a bug crawling on the kitchen floor.
examples.ko: 부엌 바닥에 기어다니는 벌레가 있었다.

meanings.english: Construct something by putting parts or material together

examples.en: They are planning to build a new school in the neighborhood.
examples.ko: 그들은 동네에 새 학교를 건설할 계획이다.

meanings.english: the mass or magnitude of something large

examples.en: She buys rice in bulk to save money.
examples.ko: 그녀는 돈을 절약하기 위해 대량으로 쌀을 사요.

meanings.english: an adult male of any bovine animal

examples.en: The bull was grazing in the field.
examples.ko: 황소가 들판에서 풀을 뜯고 있었다.

meanings.english: a person who uses strength or power to harm or intimidate those who are weaker

examples.en: Stop being a bully and treat others with kindness.
examples.ko: 괴롭히지 말고 다른 사람들을 친절하게 대해주세요.

meanings.english: to collide with something in a jolting manner

examples.en: I accidentally bumped into the table.
examples.ko: 나는 실수로 테이블에 부딪혔다.

meanings.english: a group of things of the same kind that are held or tied together

examples.en: She picked a bunch of flowers from the garden.
examples.ko: 그녀는 정원에서 꽃 다발을 따왔다.

meanings.english: a collection of things wrapped or tied together

examples.en: He carried a bundle of firewood on his back.
examples.ko: 그는 등에 나무 다발을 메고 다녔다.

meanings.english: a heavy load that is difficult to bear

examples.en: The burden of responsibility weighed heavily on his shoulders.
examples.ko: 책임의 부담이 그의 어깨에 무겁게 짓눌렸다.

meanings.english: to undergo combustion or be consumed by fire

examples.en: The candle burned brightly in the dark room.
examples.ko: 어두운 방에서 양초가 밝게 탔다.

meanings.english: to break open or apart suddenly and violently

examples.en: The balloon burst when it hit a sharp object.
examples.ko: 풍선이 날카로운 물체에 부딪혀 터졌다.

meanings.english: to put something in the ground and cover it with earth

examples.en: We decided to bury our pet in the backyard.
examples.ko: 우리는 애완동물을 뒷마당에 묻기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: a large motor vehicle carrying passengers by road, typically one serving the public on a fixed route and for a fare

examples.en: I take the bus to school every morning.
examples.ko: 나는 매일 아침 학교에 버스를 타고 간다.

meanings.english: a shrub or clump of shrubs with stems of moderate length

examples.en: The rabbit hid in the bush to escape from the fox.
examples.ko: 토끼는 여우를 피하기 위해 수풀에 숨었다.

meanings.english: the activity of making, buying, or selling goods or providing services in exchange for money

examples.en: My father owns a small business in the city.
examples.ko: 우리 아버지는 도시에 작은 사업을 운영하고 계십니다.

meanings.english: having a great deal to do; occupied with or concentrating on a particular activity or object of attention

examples.en: I am too busy to go out with my friends tonight.
examples.ko: 오늘 밤 친구들과 나가기에 너무 바빠.

meanings.english: used to introduce a phrase or clause contrasting with what has already been mentioned

examples.en: I wanted to go to the party, but I had too much homework.
examples.ko: 파티에 가고 싶었지만 숙제가 너무 많았다.

meanings.english: a person who slaughters animals or dresses their flesh

examples.en: The butcher at the market sells fresh meat every day.
examples.ko: 시장의 정육점 주인은 매일 신선한 고기를 판매한다.

meanings.english: A pale yellow edible fatty substance made by churning cream and used as a spread or in cooking.

examples.en: I spread butter on my toast every morning.
examples.ko: 매일 아침 토스트에 버터를 바릅니다.

meanings.english: A small disc or knob sewn on to a garment, either to fasten it by being pushed through a slit or buttonhole or for decoration.

examples.en: She sewed a button back on her shirt.
examples.ko: 그녀는 셔츠에 단추를 다시 봤다.

meanings.english: Obtain in exchange for payment.

examples.en: I need to buy some groceries at the store.
examples.ko: 가게에서 식료품을 사야 해.

meanings.english: Make a low, continuous, humming sound.

examples.en: The bees buzzed around the flowers in the garden.
examples.ko: 벌들이 정원의 꽃 주위를 부르릉거렸다.

meanings.english: Indicating the point or period in time at which something happens.

examples.en: She sat by the window and read a book.
examples.ko: 그녀는 창가에 앉아 책을 읽었다.

meanings.english: A thick rope of wire or nonmetallic fiber typically used for construction, mooring ships, and towing vehicles.

examples.en: The cable company installed high-speed internet in our house.
examples.ko: 케이블 회사가 우리 집에 고속 인터넷을 설치했다.

meanings.english: A structure of bars or wires in which birds or animals are confined.

examples.en: The lion was pacing back and forth in its cage at the zoo.
examples.ko: 사자가 동물원에서 우리 속에서 왔다갔다했다.

meanings.english: An item of soft, sweet food made from a mixture of flour, shortening, eggs, sugar, and other ingredients, baked and often decorated.

examples.en: She baked a delicious chocolate cake for her friend's birthday.
examples.ko: 그녀는 친구의 생일을 위해 맛있는 초콜릿 케이크를 굽었다.

meanings.english: to determine by mathematical means

examples.en: I need to calculate the total cost of my shopping.
examples.ko: 나는 내 쇼핑의 총 비용을 계산해야 해.

meanings.english: a system of organizing days for social, religious, commercial or administrative purposes

examples.en: I marked my friend's birthday on the calendar.
examples.ko: 나는 친구의 생일을 달력에 표시했어.

meanings.english: to cry out in a loud voice

examples.en: Please call me when you arrive at the station.
examples.ko: 역에 도착하면 나에게 전화해줘.

meanings.english: not showing or feeling nervousness, anger, or other strong emotions

examples.en: Take a deep breath to stay calm in stressful situations.
examples.ko: 스트레스 상황에서 차분하게 유지하기 위해 깊게 숨을 들이마세요.

meanings.english: a device for recording visual images in the form of photographs, film, or video

examples.en: She loves taking pictures with her new camera.
examples.ko: 그녀는 새로운 카메라로 사진을 찍는 것을 좋아해.

meanings.english: a place with temporary accommodations of huts, tents, or other structures, typically used by soldiers, refugees, or travelers

examples.en: We set up a campfire during our camping trip.
examples.ko: 캠핑 여행 중에 우리는 캠프파이어를 만들었어.

meanings.english: a series of organized activities or events intended to achieve a particular social, commercial, or political aim

examples.en: The environmental campaign aims to raise awareness about recycling.
examples.ko: 환경 캠페인은 재활용에 대한 인식을 높이기 위해 노력하고 있습니다.

meanings.english: used to indicate ability or possibility

examples.en: I can speak three languages fluently.
examples.ko: 나는 세 가지 언어를 유창하게 구사할 수 있어.

meanings.english: To decide that an organized event will not happen, or to stop an order for goods or services

examples.en: I had to cancel my appointment due to unexpected circumstances.
examples.ko: 예상치 못한 사정으로 약속을 취소해야 했어.

meanings.english: A serious disease caused by cells that are not normal and that can spread to one or many parts of the body

examples.en: My grandmother is undergoing treatment for lung cancer.
examples.ko: 할머니가 폐암 치료를 받고 있어.

meanings.english: A person who is competing to be elected or chosen for a job

examples.en: She is a strong candidate for the student council president.
examples.ko: 그녀는 학생회장 후보로 강력한 경쟁자야.

meanings.english: A sweet food made with sugar or chocolate

examples.en: I bought some candy to share with my friends.
examples.ko: 친구들과 나누기 위해 사탕을 몇 개 샀어.

meanings.english: A strong, heavy cloth that is used for making tents, sails, bags, etc.

examples.en: The artist painted on a canvas to create a beautiful masterpiece.
examples.ko: 작가는 아름다운 걸작을 만들기 위해 캔버스에 그림을 그렸어.

meanings.english: A type of hat that covers the head

examples.en: He always wears a baseball cap when he goes out.
examples.ko: 그는 외출할 때 항상 야구 모자를 쓰고 다녀.

meanings.english: Having the ability, power, or qualities to be able to do something

examples.en: She is a capable student who excels in both academics and sports.
examples.ko: 그녀는 학업과 스포츠 모두에서 뛰어난 능력을 지닌 우수한 학생이야.

meanings.english: A piece of land that sticks out into the sea or a large area of water surrounded by land on three sides

examples.en: The lighthouse was built on the cape to guide ships safely to the harbor.
examples.ko: 등대가 항구로 배를 안전하게 안내하기 위해 곶에 지어졌어.

meanings.english: The city where the government of a country is located.

examples.en: Seoul is the capital of South Korea.
examples.ko: 서울은 대한민국의 수도입니다.

meanings.english: The person in charge of a ship, aircraft, or sports team.

examples.en: The captain of the team led them to victory.
examples.ko: 팀의 대장이 그들을 승리로 이끌었습니다.

meanings.english: To catch and hold onto something or someone.

examples.en: The police were able to capture the thief.
examples.ko: 경찰은 도둑을 붙잡을 수 있었습니다.

meanings.english: A vehicle with four wheels that is powered by an engine.

examples.en: He drives a red car to work every day.
examples.ko: 그는 매일 빨간 자동차로 출근합니다.

meanings.english: A small piece of plastic or paper used for various purposes.

examples.en: She paid for the groceries with her credit card.
examples.ko: 그녀는 크레딧 카드로 장보기를 했습니다.

meanings.english: To look after or provide for someone or something.

examples.en: Parents care for their children with love and attention.
examples.ko: 부모는 사랑과 주의를 가지고 자녀를 돌봅니다.

meanings.english: A person's progress through life in work or profession.

examples.en: She has had a successful career as a doctor.
examples.ko: 그녀는 의사로서 성공한 직업 경력을 가지고 있습니다.

meanings.english: A thick covering for floors, often made of wool or synthetic fibers.

examples.en: The living room is decorated with a beautiful carpet.
examples.ko: 거실은 아름다운 카펫으로 장식되어 있습니다.

meanings.english: A long, orange vegetable that grows underground.

examples.en: She likes to eat raw carrots as a snack.
examples.ko: 그녀는 간식으로 생 당근을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: To hold and move something from one place to another.

examples.en: Can you help me carry these heavy boxes?
examples.ko: 이 무거운 상자들을 나르는 데 도와줄 수 있니?

meanings.english: A small vehicle with wheels, used for carrying things.

examples.en: The farmer loaded the harvested crops onto the cart.
examples.ko: 농부가 수확한 작물을 수레에 실었어.

meanings.english: To cut and shape wood, stone, or other materials into a desired form.

examples.en: He carved a beautiful sculpture out of a block of wood.
examples.ko: 그는 한 조각의 나무에서 아름다운 조각품을 만들었어.

meanings.english: A particular situation or example of something happening.

examples.en: In this case, we need to find a solution quickly.
examples.ko: 이 경우에는 빨리 해결책을 찾아야 해.

meanings.english: Money in the form of coins or banknotes, not checks or credit.

examples.en: I need to withdraw some cash from the ATM.
examples.ko: ATM에서 현금을 인출해야 해.

meanings.english: To throw something forcefully in a specific direction.

examples.en: He cast the fishing line into the river to catch a fish.
examples.ko: 그는 물고기를 잡기 위해 강으로 낚싯줄을 던졌어.

meanings.english: A large, fortified building, typically with high walls and towers.

examples.en: The castle on the hill dates back to medieval times.
examples.ko: 언덕 위에 있는 성은 중세 시대로 거슬러 올라간다.

meanings.english: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur, a short snout, and retractile claws.

examples.en: The cat purrs when it is content.
examples.ko: 고양이는 만족할 때 꼬리를 흔들며 울음소리를 낸다.

meanings.english: A complete list of items, typically one in alphabetical or other systematic order.

examples.en: She flipped through the catalogue to find the item she wanted to purchase.
examples.ko: 그녀는 구매하고 싶은 물건을 찾기 위해 카탈로그를 넘겼다.

meanings.english: To intercept and hold (something that has been thrown, propelled, or dropped).

examples.en: He tried to catch the ball, but it slipped through his fingers.
examples.ko: 그는 공을 잡으려고 했지만 손가락 사이로 빠져버렸다.

meanings.english: A class or division of people or things regarded as having particular shared characteristics.

examples.en: Books are divided into different categories such as fiction and non-fiction.
examples.ko: 책은 소설과 비소설과 같은 다른 범주로 나뉘어진다.

meanings.english: To provide food and drink, typically at social events and in a professional capacity.

examples.en: The restaurant catered the wedding reception with a variety of delicious dishes.
examples.ko: 그 식당은 다양한 맛있는 요리로 결혼식을 제공했다.

meanings.english: Large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, domesticated for their meat or milk.

examples.en: The farmer raised cattle on his ranch for beef production.
examples.ko: 농부는 소를 육류 생산을 위해 목장에서 키웠다.

meanings.english: A person or thing that gives rise to an action, phenomenon, or condition.

examples.en: The heavy rain was the cause of the flooding in the area.
examples.ko: 강한 비가 그 지역의 홍수의 원인이었다.

meanings.english: Care taken to avoid danger or mistakes.

examples.en: He proceeded with caution as he walked on the slippery path.
examples.ko: 그는 미끄러운 길을 걸어갈 때 조심스럽게 진행했다.

meanings.english: a hollow in the earth, especially one opening more or less horizontally into a hillside or cliff

examples.en: The explorers discovered a hidden cave in the forest.
examples.ko: 탐험가들은 숲 속에 숨겨진 동굴을 발견했다.

meanings.english: to come to an end; stop

examples.en: Please cease talking during the exam.
examples.ko: 시험 중에는 말을 그만해 주세요.

meanings.english: the upper interior surface of a room or other similar compartment

examples.en: The ceiling of the room was painted with beautiful patterns.
examples.ko: 방의 천장은 아름다운 무늬로 칠해져 있었다.

meanings.english: to observe (a day) or commemorate (an event) with ceremonies or festivities

examples.en: We will celebrate our anniversary with a special dinner.
examples.ko: 우리는 특별한 저녁 식사로 기념일을 축하할 것이다.

meanings.english: a famous person, especially in entertainment or sports

examples.en: The celebrity arrived at the red carpet event in a glamorous gown.
examples.ko: 유명인은 화려한 가운을 입고 레드 카펫 행사에 도착했다.

meanings.english: the smallest structural and functional unit of an organism, typically microscopic and consisting of cytoplasm and a nucleus enclosed in a membrane

examples.en: The scientist studied the behavior of cells under a microscope.
examples.ko: 과학자는 현미경 아래에서 세포의 행동을 연구했다.

meanings.english: to examine and suppress or delete anything considered objectionable

examples.en: The government censored the controversial scenes in the movie.
examples.ko: 정부는 영화에서 논란이 되는 장면들을 검열했다.

meanings.english: the middle point or part

examples.en: The city center is a bustling area with shops and restaurants.
examples.ko: 도심은 가게와 식당이 있는 북적거리는 지역이다.

meanings.english: a period of 100 years

examples.en: The 20th century was a time of great technological advancement.
examples.ko: 20세기는 기술 발전의 시기였다.

meanings.english: having no doubt; sure

examples.en: I am certain that she will arrive on time.
examples.ko: 그녀가 시간에 도착할 것이라는 것을 확신해.

meanings.english: a document that proves or confirms something

examples.en: She received a certificate for completing the course.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그 수업을 마치고 증명서를 받았다.

meanings.english: a series of connected metal links or rings

examples.en: The dog was tied to a chain in the yard.
examples.ko: 개가 마당에 사슬에 묶여 있었다.

meanings.english: a piece of furniture designed for sitting on

examples.en: Please take a seat on the chair.
examples.ko: 의자에 앉아주세요.

meanings.english: a person who presides over a meeting, organization, or event

examples.en: The chairman called the meeting to order.
examples.ko: 의장이 회의를 소집했다.

meanings.english: a call to take part in a contest or competition

examples.en: She accepted the challenge to run a marathon.
examples.ko: 그녀는 마라톤에 참가하는 도전을 수락했다.

meanings.english: a room used for a special or official purpose

examples.en: The king held court in the grand chamber.
examples.ko: 왕은 웅장한 회의실에서 법정을 열었다.

meanings.english: a person who has defeated or surpassed all rivals in a competition

examples.en: She is the reigning champion of the tennis tournament.
examples.ko: 그녀는 테니스 대회의 연속 우승자이다.

meanings.english: an opportunity to do something

examples.en: Take a chance and apply for the scholarship.
examples.ko: 기회를 잡아 장학금 신청을 해봐.

meanings.english: the act or process of becoming different

examples.en: The change in weather was unexpected.
examples.ko: 날씨의 변화는 예상치 못했다.

meanings.english: a television station and its programs

examples.en: I enjoy watching cooking shows on the food channel.
examples.ko: 나는 음식 채널에서 요리 프로그램을 보는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: complete disorder and confusion

examples.en: The classroom was in chaos after the fire alarm went off.
examples.ko: 화재 경보음이 울리자 교실은 혼돈 속에 빠졌다.

meanings.english: the mental and moral qualities distinctive to an individual

examples.en: Her kind character makes her a great friend.
examples.ko: 그녀의 친절한 성격은 그녀를 좋은 친구로 만든다.

meanings.english: a feature or quality belonging typically to a person, place, or thing

examples.en: Patience is a characteristic that helps in problem-solving.
examples.ko: 인내심은 문제 해결에 도움이 되는 특징이다.

meanings.english: to demand payment

examples.en: The restaurant will charge extra for additional toppings on the pizza.
examples.ko: 그 식당은 피자에 추가 토핑에 대해 추가 요금을 청구할 것이다.

meanings.english: the voluntary giving of help, typically in the form of money, to those in need

examples.en: She donated money to charity every month.
examples.ko: 그녀는 매달 자선에 돈을 기부했다.

meanings.english: the power or quality of giving delight or arousing admiration

examples.en: Her smile has a special charm that captivates everyone.
examples.ko: 그녀의 미소는 모두를 사로잡는 특별한 매력이 있다.

meanings.english: a sheet of information in the form of a table, graph, or diagram

examples.en: The teacher used a chart to explain the data.
examples.ko: 선생님은 데이터를 설명하기 위해 도표를 사용했다.

meanings.english: to pursue in order to catch or catch up with

examples.en: The police chased the thief through the streets.
examples.ko: 경찰은 도둑을 거리를 통해 쫓았다.

meanings.english: talk in a friendly and informal way

examples.en: We sat and chatted for hours about our favorite movies.
examples.ko: 우리는 좋아하는 영화에 대해 몇 시간 동안 앉아서 잡담했다.

meanings.english: low in price, worth more than its cost

examples.en: I bought this shirt because it was cheap.
examples.ko: 이 셔츠는 싸서 샀어.

meanings.english: examine something in order to determine its accuracy, quality, or condition

examples.en: Please check your answers before submitting the test.
examples.ko: 시험지를 제출하기 전에 답안을 확인해주세요.

meanings.english: either side of the face below the eye

examples.en: She kissed him on the cheek before saying goodbye.
examples.ko: 그녀는 이별 인사를 하기 전에 그에게 뺨에 키스를 했다.

meanings.english: To give a loud shout of approval or encouragement

examples.en: The crowd cheered when the team scored a goal.
examples.ko: 팀이 골을 넣자 관중들이 환호했다.

meanings.english: A food made from the pressed curds of milk

examples.en: I love to eat cheese with crackers.
examples.ko: 나는 크래커와 치즈를 함께 먹는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: A professional cook, typically the chief cook in a restaurant

examples.en: The chef prepared a delicious meal for the guests.
examples.ko: 주방장이 손님들을 위해 맛있는 식사를 준비했다.

meanings.english: A distinct compound or substance, especially one which has been artificially prepared or purified

examples.en: The scientist mixed various chemicals in the laboratory.
examples.ko: 과학자가 연구실에서 다양한 화학물질을 섞었다.

meanings.english: The front surface of a person's or animal's body between the neck and the stomach
