examples.en: He felt pain in his chest after running for a long time.
examples.ko: 긴 시간을 뛰고 나니 그의 가슴이 아팠다.

meanings.english: To crush food with the teeth to make it easier to swallow

examples.en: You should chew your food slowly to aid digestion.
examples.ko: 소화를 돕기 위해 음식을 천천히 씹어야 해.

meanings.english: A domestic fowl kept for its eggs or meat

examples.en: My mom cooked a delicious chicken for dinner.
examples.ko: 엄마가 저녁으로 맛있는 닭을 요리했다.

meanings.english: Most important or main; a leader or ruler of a people or clan

examples.en: The chief executive officer made an important decision for the company.
examples.ko: 최고경영자가 회사를 위해 중요한 결정을 내렸다.

meanings.english: a young human being below the age of puberty or below the legal age of majority

examples.en: The children were playing in the park.
examples.ko: 어린이들이 공원에서 놀고 있었다.

meanings.english: a moderate but penetrating coldness

examples.en: I felt a chill when I stepped outside without a jacket.
examples.ko: 자켓 없이 밖으로 나가니 추위를 느꼈다.

meanings.english: the protruding part of the face below the mouth, formed by the apex of the lower jaw

examples.en: He rested his chin on his hand while thinking.
examples.ko: 그는 생각하면서 턱을 손에 올려놓았다.

meanings.english: a small piece of something removed in the course of chopping, cutting, or breaking

examples.en: She bit into a chocolate chip cookie.
examples.ko: 그녀는 초콜릿 칩 쿠키를 물어봤다.

meanings.english: a food in the form of a paste or solid block made from roasted and ground cacao seeds, typically sweetened

examples.en: She bought a box of assorted chocolates for her friend's birthday.
examples.ko: 그녀는 친구의 생일을 위해 다양한 종류의 초콜릿 상자를 샀다.

meanings.english: an act of selecting or making a decision when faced with two or more possibilities

examples.en: He had to make a difficult choice between studying abroad or staying home.
examples.ko: 그는 해외 유학과 집에 머물기 사이에서 어려운 선택을 해야 했다.

meanings.english: a group of singers, especially one that takes part in church services or performs in public

examples.en: She sings in the church choir every Sunday.
examples.ko: 그녀는 매주 일요일 교회 합창단에서 노래를 부른다.

meanings.english: pick out or select (someone or something) as being the best or most appropriate of two or more alternatives

examples.en: I couldn't decide, so I let her choose the movie we would watch.
examples.ko: 결정을 내리지 못해서, 그녀에게 우리가 볼 영화를 선택하게 했다.

meanings.english: To cut something into pieces with a sharp tool

examples.en: She chopped the vegetables for the salad.
examples.ko: 그녀는 샐러드를 만들기 위해 야채를 다져 놓았다.

meanings.english: A group of singers who perform together, often with the audience joining in

examples.en: The chorus sang beautifully at the concert.
examples.ko: 합창단은 콘서트에서 아름답게 노래했다.

meanings.english: Persisting for a long time or constantly recurring

examples.en: He suffers from chronic back pain.
examples.ko: 그는 만성적인 등통증을 겪고 있다.

meanings.english: A building used for public Christian worship

examples.en: We go to church every Sunday.
examples.ko: 우리는 매주 교회에 간다.

meanings.english: A thin cylinder of finely cut tobacco rolled in paper for smoking

examples.en: He took a long drag on his cigarette.
examples.ko: 그는 담배를 길게 피웠다.

meanings.english: A theater where movies are shown for public entertainment

examples.en: Let's go to the cinema this weekend.
examples.ko: 이번 주말에 영화관에 가자.

meanings.english: A perfectly round shape with all points equidistant from the center

examples.en: She drew a circle on the paper.
examples.ko: 그녀는 종이에 원을 그렸다.

meanings.english: To move or cause to move continuously or freely through a closed system or area

examples.en: The air conditioner circulates cool air throughout the room.
examples.ko: 에어컨은 시원한 공기를 방 전체에 순환시킨다.

meanings.english: a fact or condition connected with or relevant to an event or action

examples.en: Despite the difficult circumstances, she remained positive.
examples.ko: 어려운 상황에도 불구하고, 그녀는 긍정적으로 남았다.

meanings.english: to quote or mention as evidence or support for an argument or statement

examples.en: He cited several studies to back up his claim.
examples.ko: 그는 자신의 주장을 뒷받침하기 위해 여러 연구를 인용했다.

meanings.english: a legally recognized member of a state or country

examples.en: As a responsible citizen, he always participates in community activities.
examples.ko: 책임감 있는 시민으로서, 그는 항상 지역 사회 활동에 참여한다.

meanings.english: a large town or urban area that is a center of population, culture, and business activity

examples.en: Seoul is a vibrant city with a rich history and modern amenities.
examples.ko: 서울은 풍부한 역사와 현대적인 편의시설을 갖춘 활기찬 도시이다.

meanings.english: relating to ordinary citizens and their concerns, as distinct from military or ecclesiastical matters

examples.en: The civil rights movement aimed to secure equal rights for all citizens.
examples.ko: 민권 운동은 모든 시민에게 평등한 권리를 보장하기 위해 노력했다.

meanings.english: to state or assert that something is the case, typically without providing evidence or proof

examples.en: She claimed to have seen a UFO, but no one believed her.
examples.ko: 그녀는 UFO를 보았다고 주장했지만, 아무도 그녀를 믿지 않았다.

meanings.english: to strike the palms of the hands together with a sudden explosive sound, typically as a form of applause

examples.en: The audience began to clap enthusiastically after the performance.
examples.ko: 공연 후 관객들은 열정적으로 박수를 쳤다.

meanings.english: to come into conflict or opposition

examples.en: The two groups clashed over their differing opinions on the issue.
examples.ko: 두 그룹은 문제에 대한 의견 차이로 충돌했다.

meanings.english: A group of students who are taught together

examples.en: I have math class in the morning.
examples.ko: 나는 아침에 수학 수업이 있어.

meanings.english: A particular part of a legal document or contract

examples.en: The rental agreement includes a clause about pets.
examples.ko: 임대 계약서에는 애완동물에 관한 조항이 포함되어 있습니다.

meanings.english: A type of earth that is soft when wet and hard when dry

examples.en: The artist used clay to sculpt a beautiful vase.
examples.ko: 작가는 아름다운 꽃병을 조각하기 위해 점토를 사용했습니다.

meanings.english: Free from dirt, marks, or unwanted matter

examples.en: She always keeps her room clean and tidy.
examples.ko: 그녀는 항상 방을 깨끗하고 정돈되게 유지합니다.

meanings.english: Easy to perceive, understand, or interpret

examples.en: Please provide a clear explanation of the problem.
examples.ko: 문제에 대해 명확한 설명을 제공해 주세요.

meanings.english: A person employed in an office or bank to keep records and accounts

examples.en: The clerk helped me find the right form to fill out.
examples.ko: 서기가 나에게 올바른 양식을 찾아주는 데 도움을 주었습니다.

meanings.english: Quick to understand, learn, and devise or apply ideas

examples.en: She is a clever student who always gets top grades.
examples.ko: 그녀는 항상 최상의 성적을 받는 영리한 학생입니다.

meanings.english: A short, sharp sound made by a computer mouse or similar device

examples.en: You can open the file with just one click.
examples.ko: 한 번의 클릭으로 파일을 열 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: A person or organization using the services of a professional person or company.

examples.en: The lawyer met with her client to discuss the case.
examples.ko: 변호사는 사건을 논의하기 위해 그녀의 고객과 만났다.

meanings.english: A high, steep face of rock or earth.

examples.en: The hikers stood at the edge of the cliff, admiring the view below.
examples.ko: 등산객들은 절벽 가장자리에 서서 아래 경치를 감상했다.

meanings.english: The weather conditions prevailing in an area in general or over a long period.

examples.en: The tropical climate of the region makes it a popular tourist destination.
examples.ko: 해역의 열대 기후는 그것을 인기 있는 관광지로 만든다.

meanings.english: To go up or ascend, especially using one's hands and feet.

examples.en: The children decided to climb the tree to get a better view of the playground.
examples.ko: 아이들은 놀이터를 더 잘 볼 수 있도록 나무를 오르기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: To hold on tightly or adhere to something.

examples.en: The wet clothes clung to her body as she walked in the rain.
examples.ko: 비 오는 중 걸어다니는 동안 젖은 옷이 그녀의 몸에 달라붙었다.

meanings.english: A medical establishment run by a group of medical professionals.

examples.en: She visited the clinic to get a check-up on her health.
examples.ko: 그녀는 건강 상태를 점검하기 위해 진료소를 방문했다.

meanings.english: A small piece of metal or plastic used to hold things together or to fasten something.

examples.en: She used a clip to secure her hair in place.
examples.ko: 그녀는 머리카락을 고정하기 위해 클립을 사용했다.

meanings.english: An instrument for measuring and showing time, typically in hours and minutes.

examples.en: She glanced at the clock on the wall to check the time.
examples.ko: 그녀는 시간을 확인하기 위해 벽에 걸린 시계를 훑어보았다.

meanings.english: To shut; near in distance

examples.en: Please close the door before you leave.
examples.ko: 나가기 전에 문을 닫아주세요.

meanings.english: Items worn to cover the body

examples.en: She bought new clothes for the party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파티를 위해 새 옷을 샀다.

meanings.english: Visible mass of condensed water vapor in the sky

examples.en: The sky was filled with dark clouds before the storm.
examples.ko: 폭풍 전에 하늘은 어두운 구름으로 가득 찼다.

meanings.english: An organization or group for social or recreational activities

examples.en: She joined the photography club at school.
examples.ko: 그녀는 학교의 사진 동아리에 가입했다.

meanings.english: A piece of evidence or information used in solving a mystery or problem

examples.en: The detective found a clue that led to the suspect.
examples.ko: 탐정은 용의자로 이끄는 단서를 발견했다.

meanings.english: A group of similar things or people positioned closely together

examples.en: The bees formed a cluster around the queen bee.
examples.ko: 벌들은 여왕 벌 주위에 무리를 이뤘다.

meanings.english: A person who trains and instructs athletes or performers

examples.en: The basketball coach helped the team improve their skills.
examples.ko: 농구 코치가 팀이 실력을 향상시키도록 도왔다.

meanings.english: A black or dark brown rock used as fuel

examples.en: The power plant burns coal to generate electricity.
examples.ko: 발전소는 전기를 생산하기 위해 석탄을 태운다.

meanings.english: the land next to the sea; the edge of the land

examples.en: The children played on the coast during their beach vacation.
examples.ko: 아이들은 해변 휴가 중에 해안에서 놀았다.

meanings.english: a piece of clothing worn over other clothes to keep warm or dry

examples.en: She wore a thick coat to stay warm in the cold weather.
examples.ko: 그녀는 추운 날씨에서 따뜻하게 지내기 위해 두꺼운 외투를 입었다.

meanings.english: a system of words, letters, or signs used to represent a message in secret form or to operate a machine

examples.en: The students had to crack the secret code to unlock the treasure chest.
examples.ko: 학생들은 보물 상자를 열기 위해 비밀 코드를 풀어야 했다.

meanings.english: a hot drink made from roasted and ground coffee beans

examples.en: She enjoys a cup of coffee every morning to start her day.
examples.ko: 그녀는 매일 아침 하루를 시작하기 위해 한 잔의 커피를 즐긴다.

meanings.english: a flat, round piece of metal used as money

examples.en: He dropped a coin into the vending machine to buy a snack.
examples.ko: 그는 간식을 사기 위해 동전을 자판기에 넣었다.

meanings.english: to happen at the same time or to be in the same place or situation

examples.en: Their birthdays coincide, so they often celebrate together.
examples.ko: 그들의 생일이 일치하기 때문에 그들은 자주 함께 축하한다.

meanings.english: having a low temperature; not warm

examples.en: She wore a hat and gloves to stay warm in the cold weather.
examples.ko: 그녀는 추운 날씨에서 따뜻하게 지내기 위해 모자와 장갑을 착용했다.

meanings.english: to work together with others on a project or task

examples.en: The students collaborated on the group project to create a presentation.
examples.ko: 학생들은 발표 자료를 만들기 위해 그룹 프로젝트에서 협력했다.

meanings.english: To fall down suddenly

examples.en: The building collapsed after the earthquake.
examples.ko: 지진 후 건물이 붕괴했다.

meanings.english: The part of a shirt that goes around your neck

examples.en: He wore a shirt with a white collar.
examples.ko: 그는 흰색 칼라가 달린 셔츠를 입었다.

meanings.english: A person you work with

examples.en: She is my colleague at the office.
examples.ko: 그녀는 사무실에서 함께 일하는 동료이다.

meanings.english: To gather things together

examples.en: He collects stamps as a hobby.
examples.ko: 그는 취미로 우표를 수집한다.

meanings.english: An institution of higher education

examples.en: She is studying at a college in the city.
examples.ko: 그녀는 도시의 대학에서 공부하고 있다.

meanings.english: A group of people who settle in a new place

examples.en: The British established a colony in India.
examples.ko: 영국은 인도에 식민지를 설립했다.

meanings.english: The property possessed by an object of producing different sensations on the eye as a result of the way it reflects or emits light

examples.en: Blue is my favorite color.
examples.ko: 파랑이 내가 가장 좋아하는 색이다.

meanings.english: A tall, vertical post or structure

examples.en: The ancient building had beautiful marble columns.
examples.ko: 그 고대 건물에는 아름다운 대리석 기둥이 있었다.

meanings.english: a fight between armed forces

examples.en: The soldiers were trained for combat.
examples.ko: 그 병사들은 전투를 위해 훈련을 받았다.

meanings.english: to join or mix things together

examples.en: Let's combine our efforts to finish the project.
examples.ko: 프로젝트를 끝내기 위해 우리의 노력을 합쳐보자.

meanings.english: to move or travel towards a place

examples.en: I will come to your house after school.
examples.ko: 나는 학교 후에 네 집에 올 거야.

meanings.english: a type of entertainment that is funny

examples.en: We watched a comedy show and laughed a lot.
examples.ko: 우리는 코미디 쇼를 보고 많이 웃었다.

meanings.english: a state of physical ease and freedom from pain or constraint

examples.en: Her presence brought comfort to those in need.
examples.ko: 그녀의 존재가 필요한 사람들에게 위로를 주었다.

meanings.english: relating to or characteristic of comedy

examples.en: She enjoys reading comic books in her free time.
examples.ko: 그녀는 여가 시간에 만화책을 읽는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: to give an authoritative order

examples.en: The general commanded his troops to advance.
examples.ko: 장군은 그의 부대에 전진하라고 명령했다.

meanings.english: a verbal or written remark expressing an opinion or reaction

examples.en: She made a comment about the new movie.
examples.ko: 그녀는 새 영화에 대해 한 말을 했다.

meanings.english: the activity of buying and selling, especially on a large scale

examples.en: E-commerce has become increasingly popular in recent years.
examples.ko: 전자상거래는 최근 몇 년간 점점 인기를 얻고 있습니다.

meanings.english: to pledge or bind (a person or an organization) to a certain course or policy

examples.en: She decided to commit herself to studying harder for the exam.
examples.ko: 그녀는 시험을 위해 열심히 공부하기로 헌신하기로 결정했습니다.

meanings.english: a group of people appointed for a specific function, typically consisting of members of a larger group

examples.en: The committee will meet next week to discuss the budget proposal.
examples.ko: 위원회는 다음 주에 예산 제안을 논의하기 위해 회의를 갖게 될 것입니다.

meanings.english: a raw material or primary agricultural product that can be bought and sold

examples.en: Oil is one of the most traded commodities in the world.
examples.ko: 석유는 세계에서 가장 많이 거래되는 상품 중 하나입니다.

meanings.english: occurring, found, or done often; prevalent

examples.en: It is common for students to feel nervous before a big test.
examples.ko: 시험 전에 긴장을 느끼는 것은 학생들에게 보통입니다.

meanings.english: to share or exchange information, news, or ideas

examples.en: It is important to communicate effectively in a team setting.
examples.ko: 팀 환경에서 효과적으로 의사소통하는 것이 중요합니다.

meanings.english: a person who supports or believes in the principles of communism

examples.en: The country was ruled by a communist government for many years.
examples.ko: 그 나라는 많은 해 동안 공산주의 정부에 의해 통치되었습니다.

meanings.english: a group of people living in the same place or having a particular characteristic in common

examples.en: The local community came together to organize a charity event.
examples.ko: 지역 사회는 자선 행사를 조직하기 위해 모여들었습니다.

meanings.english: A person or animal with whom one spends a lot of time or travels

examples.en: She is my closest companion.
examples.ko: 그녀는 내 가장 친한 동반자야.

meanings.english: A commercial business

examples.en: He works for a multinational company.
examples.ko: 그는 다국적 기업에서 일해.

meanings.english: To examine the similarities and differences between two or more things

examples.en: Let's compare the prices before buying.
examples.ko: 살기 전에 가격을 비교해봐요.

meanings.english: Able to exist or work together without conflict

examples.en: These two software programs are not compatible.
examples.ko: 이 두 소프트웨어 프로그램은 호환되지 않아.

meanings.english: To force someone to do something

examples.en: I felt compelled to tell the truth.
examples.ko: 나는 진실을 말해야만 하는 것 같았다.

meanings.english: To make up for something unwelcome or unpleasant by exerting an opposite force or effect

examples.en: The company compensated her for the damages.
examples.ko: 회사가 그녀에게 손해를 보상했다.

meanings.english: To strive to gain or win something by defeating or establishing superiority over others

examples.en: The athletes will compete in the race tomorrow.
examples.ko: 선수들은 내일 경주에서 경쟁할 것이다.

meanings.english: To put together information or materials gathered from various sources

examples.en: She compiled a list of all the important dates.
examples.ko: 그녀는 모든 중요한 날짜들을 나열했다.

meanings.english: to express dissatisfaction or annoyance about something

examples.en: She always complains about the food at the cafeteria.
examples.ko: 그녀는 항상 구내식당의 음식에 대해 불평해요.

meanings.english: to add to something in a way that enhances or completes it

examples.en: The red wine complemented the steak perfectly.
examples.ko: 붉은 와인이 스테이크를 완벽하게 보완했습니다.

meanings.english: to finish or bring to an end

examples.en: He needs to complete the assignment by tomorrow.
examples.ko: 그는 내일까지 과제를 완료해야 합니다.

meanings.english: consisting of many different and connected parts

examples.en: The instructions for the experiment were quite complex.
examples.ko: 실험에 대한 지시사항은 상당히 복잡했습니다.

meanings.english: to make something more difficult or confusing

examples.en: Adding more rules will only complicate the game.
examples.ko: 더 많은 규칙을 추가하면 게임이 더 복잡해질 뿐입니다.

meanings.english: a part or element of a larger whole

examples.en: The engine consists of many different components.
examples.ko: 엔진은 여러 가지 다른 구성 요소로 이루어져 있습니다.

meanings.english: to create or put together by combining parts or elements

examples.en: The artist will compose a new piece of music for the concert.
examples.ko: 예술가는 콘서트를 위해 새 음악 조각을 작곡할 것입니다.

meanings.english: a substance formed by the chemical combination of two or more elements

examples.en: Water is a compound made up of hydrogen and oxygen.
examples.ko: 물은 수소와 산소의 화합물입니다.

meanings.english: to understand

examples.en: It took me a while to comprehend the complex instructions.
examples.ko: 복잡한 지시사항을 이해하는 데 시간이 걸렸다.

meanings.english: to include or contain

examples.en: The book comprises three main sections.
examples.ko: 이 책은 세 가지 주요 섹션으로 구성되어 있다.

meanings.english: to settle differences by mutual concessions

examples.en: They compromised on a meeting time that worked for both of them.
examples.ko: 그들은 서로에게 맞는 회의 시간에 대해 타협했다.

meanings.english: to calculate

examples.en: He needed to compute the total cost of the project.
examples.ko: 그는 프로젝트의 총 비용을 계산해야 했다.

meanings.english: to hide

examples.en: She tried to conceal her excitement about the surprise party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 서프라이즈 파티에 대한 흥분을 숨기려고 했다.

meanings.english: to imagine or think of

examples.en: The artist conceived a brilliant new idea for her next painting.
examples.ko: 작가는 다음 그림을 위한 뛰어난 새로운 아이디어를 상상했다.

meanings.english: to focus all one's attention or effort on a particular task or activity

examples.en: She needed to concentrate on studying for her exams.
examples.ko: 시험 공부에 집중해야 했다.

meanings.english: an abstract idea or general notion

examples.en: The teacher explained the concept of gravity to the students.
examples.ko: 선생님은 중력의 개념을 학생들에게 설명했다.

meanings.english: to relate to; be connected with; be about something

examples.en: I have a concern about my grades.
examples.ko: 내 성적에 대한 걱정이 있어.

meanings.english: a musical performance given in public, typically by several performers or of several separate compositions

examples.en: I went to a concert last night.
examples.ko: 어젯밤에 콘서트에 갔어.

meanings.english: to bring something to an end; to finish

examples.en: Let's conclude our discussion here.
examples.ko: 우리 토론을 여기서 마무리하자.

meanings.english: a building material made from a mixture of broken stone or gravel, sand, cement, and water; specific, definite

examples.en: The road was paved with concrete.
examples.ko: 길은 콘크리트로 포장되어 있었다.

meanings.english: to express complete disapproval of; to sentence to a particular punishment, especially death

examples.en: The court condemned the criminal to life in prison.
examples.ko: 법정은 범죄자에게 평생형을 선고했다.

meanings.english: the state of something, especially with regard to its appearance, quality, or working order; a circumstance that must exist or be established before something else can happen

examples.en: The car was in excellent condition.
examples.ko: 차는 훌륭한 상태였다.

meanings.english: the manner in which a person behaves, especially on a particular occasion or in a particular context; to organize and carry out

examples.en: His conduct during the meeting was exemplary.
examples.ko: 그의 회의 중 행동은 모범적이었다.

meanings.english: to discuss something important in order to make a decision; to grant or bestow

examples.en: The committee will confer about the new policy.
examples.ko: 위원회는 새로운 정책에 대해 상의할 것이다.

meanings.english: to admit or acknowledge something, especially something that one feels guilty about

examples.en: He confessed to stealing the money.
examples.ko: 그는 돈을 훔쳤다고 자백했다.

meanings.english: to trust someone with private or secret information

examples.en: She confided in her best friend about her problems.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신의 문제를 가장 친한 친구에게 신뢰했다.

meanings.english: to restrict or limit something within certain boundaries

examples.en: The doctor advised him to confine his activities to avoid further injury.
examples.ko: 의사는 그에게 활동을 제한해 부상을 더 막기를 권했다.

meanings.english: to verify or make sure that something is true or accurate

examples.en: Please confirm your reservation by replying to this email.
examples.ko: 이 이메일에 회신하여 예약을 확인해주세요.

meanings.english: a serious disagreement or argument between individuals or groups

examples.en: There was a conflict between the two countries over the border dispute.
examples.ko: 국경 분쟁으로 두 나라 간에 충돌이 있었다.

meanings.english: to comply with rules, standards, or expectations

examples.en: All employees must conform to the company's dress code.
examples.ko: 모든 직원은 회사의 복장 규정에 따라야 한다.

meanings.english: to face a difficult situation or person directly

examples.en: She had to confront her fear of public speaking during the presentation.
examples.ko: 발표 중에 그녀는 공개 연설에 대한 두려움에 직면해야 했다.

meanings.english: to make someone feel uncertain or puzzled

examples.en: The complex instructions confused the students.
examples.ko: 복잡한 지시사항으로 학생들이 혼란스러워했다.

meanings.english: to express pleasure to someone because of a success or good fortune

examples.en: I want to congratulate you on your graduation.
examples.ko: 당신의 졸업을 축하하고 싶어요.

meanings.english: a formal meeting or series of meetings for discussion between delegates, especially those from a political party or labor union

examples.en: The congress will convene next week to discuss the new bill.
examples.ko: 의회는 다음 주에 새 법안을 논의하기 위해 소집될 것이다.

meanings.english: to join or fasten together

examples.en: You need to connect the cables to the computer for it to work.
examples.ko: 컴퓨터가 작동하려면 케이블을 연결해야 합니다.

meanings.english: the inner sense of what is right or wrong in one's conduct or motives, impelling one toward right action

examples.en: His conscience wouldn't allow him to cheat on the exam.
examples.ko: 그의 양심은 시험에서 부정행위를 하지 못하게 했다.

meanings.english: aware of and responding to one's surroundings; awake

examples.en: She was conscious of the danger and acted quickly.
examples.ko: 그녀는 위험을 알고 빠르게 대응했다.

meanings.english: to give permission for something to happen

examples.en: You need to get your parents' consent before going on the field trip.
examples.ko: 수학여행을 가기 전에 부모님의 동의를 받아야 합니다.

meanings.english: to protect (something) from harm or destruction

examples.en: It's important to conserve water by not wasting it.
examples.ko: 물을 낭비하지 않고 보존하는 것이 중요합니다.

meanings.english: to think carefully about something before making a decision

examples.en: Please consider all the options before choosing one.
examples.ko: 하나를 선택하기 전에 모든 옵션을 신중히 고려해 주세요.

meanings.english: to be made up or composed

examples.en: The team consists of five members.
examples.ko: 팀은 다섯 명으로 구성되어 있습니다.

meanings.english: continuing or enduring

examples.en: She showed constant dedication to her studies.
examples.ko: 그녀는 공부에 대한 지속적인 헌신을 보여주었습니다.

meanings.english: to form or make up

examples.en: Women constitute half of the population.
examples.ko: 여성들은 인구의 반을 구성합니다.

meanings.english: to restrict or limit

examples.en: Financial constraints prevented them from traveling.
examples.ko: 재정적 제약으로 인해 그들은 여행을 못했습니다.

meanings.english: to build or create

examples.en: They plan to construct a new school building.
examples.ko: 그들은 새로운 학교 건물을 건설할 계획이다.

meanings.english: to seek advice or information from

examples.en: Before making a decision, it's important to consult with others.
examples.ko: 결정을 내리기 전에 다른 사람들과 상담하는 것이 중요합니다.

meanings.english: to use up or eat or drink

examples.en: He consumes a lot of energy while playing sports.
examples.ko: 그는 스포츠를 할 때 많은 에너지를 소비합니다.

meanings.english: to communicate with or get in touch with

examples.en: Please contact me if you have any questions.
examples.ko: 질문이 있으면 저에게 연락해 주세요.

meanings.english: To hold or have within

examples.en: The box can contain up to 20 books.
examples.ko: 상자 안에 최대 20권의 책을 담을 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: Belonging to the same period of time

examples.en: She is a contemporary artist known for her unique style.
examples.ko: 그녀는 독특한 스타일로 유명한 동시대 예술가입니다.

meanings.english: To struggle in opposition or competition

examples.en: The two teams will contend for the championship title next week.
examples.ko: 두 팀은 다음 주에 챔피언십 제목을 위해 경쟁할 것입니다.

meanings.english: The substance or material dealt with in a speech, literary work, etc.

examples.en: The content of the book covers a wide range of topics.
examples.ko: 책의 내용은 다양한 주제를 다룹니다.

meanings.english: A competition or rivalry between individuals or groups

examples.en: She won first place in the singing contest.
examples.ko: 그녀는 가수 대회에서 1등을 차지했습니다.

meanings.english: The circumstances that form the setting for an event, statement, or idea

examples.en: It's important to consider the context in which the story takes place.
examples.ko: 이야기가 일어나는 맥락을 고려하는 것이 중요합니다.

meanings.english: One of the main landmasses of the globe, such as Asia, Africa, or Europe

examples.en: Australia is the smallest continent in the world.
examples.ko: 호주는 세계에서 가장 작은 대륙입니다.

meanings.english: To persist in an activity or process

examples.en: Please continue reading the next chapter of the book.
examples.ko: 책의 다음 장을 계속 읽어주세요.

meanings.english: to make a formal agreement

examples.en: They will contract with the company for a new project.
examples.ko: 그들은 새 프로젝트를 위해 회사와 계약할 것이다.

meanings.english: to say the opposite of what someone else has said

examples.en: Her statement contradicts what the witness said.
examples.ko: 그녀의 진술은 증인이 말한 것과 모순된다.

meanings.english: opposite in nature, direction, or meaning

examples.en: His actions are contrary to his words.
examples.ko: 그의 행동은 그의 말과 반대이다.

meanings.english: to compare in order to show differences

examples.en: The artist used dark colors to contrast with the light background.
examples.ko: 작가는 밝은 배경과 대조되는 어두운 색을 사용했다.

meanings.english: to give something, especially money or goods, to help achieve or provide something

examples.en: Many people contributed to the charity event.
examples.ko: 많은 사람들이 자선 행사에 기부했다.

meanings.english: to have power over something

examples.en: She struggled to control her emotions during the speech.
examples.ko: 그녀는 연설 중 감정을 통제하기 위해 노력했다.

meanings.english: a lot of disagreement or argument about something

examples.en: The new policy sparked a controversy among the citizens.
examples.ko: 새로운 정책이 시민들 사이에 논란을 일으켰다.

meanings.english: to bring people together for a meeting or activity

examples.en: The board will convene next week to discuss the new proposal.
examples.ko: 이사회는 다음 주에 새 제안을 논의하기 위해 소집될 것이다.

meanings.english: to engage in conversation

examples.en: She enjoys conversing with her friends after school.
examples.ko: 그녀는 방과 후 친구들과 대화하는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: to change something into a different form or purpose

examples.en: He plans to convert the garage into a home office.
examples.ko: 그는 차고를 집 사무실로 변환할 계획이다.

meanings.english: to communicate or express something

examples.en: Her smile conveyed her happiness to everyone around her.
examples.ko: 그녀의 미소는 주변 사람들에게 그녀의 행복을 전달했다.

meanings.english: to declare someone guilty of a crime by the verdict of a court

examples.en: The jury will convict the suspect if there is enough evidence.
examples.ko: 증거가 충분하다면 배심원단은 용의자에게 유죄 판결을 내릴 것이다.

meanings.english: to make someone believe or feel certain about something

examples.en: She tried to convince her parents to let her go on the trip.
examples.ko: 그녀는 여행을 가게 해달라고 부모님을 납득시키려고 했다.

meanings.english: to prepare food by heating it

examples.en: She loves to cook delicious meals for her family.
examples.ko: 그녀는 가족을 위해 맛있는 음식을 요리하는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: a small sweet baked food typically round, flat, and crisp

examples.en: She enjoys eating chocolate chip cookies with a glass of milk.
examples.ko: 그녀는 우유 한 잔과 초콜릿 칩 쿠키를 먹는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: moderately cold; neither warm nor very cold

examples.en: The breeze from the ocean felt cool on a hot summer day.
examples.ko: 해변에서 불어오는 바람은 더운 여름 날 시원했다.

meanings.english: to work together with others towards a common goal

examples.en: It's important to cooperate with your team members to achieve success.
examples.ko: 성공을 이루기 위해 팀원들과 협력하는 것이 중요하다.

meanings.english: to organize different parts of a task or activity to work together effectively

examples.en: She needs to coordinate the schedules of all team members for the project.
examples.ko: 그녀는 프로젝트를 위해 모든 팀원들의 일정을 조정해야 한다.

meanings.english: police officer

examples.en: The cop arrested the thief who stole the car.
examples.ko: 경찰은 차를 훔친 도둑을 체포했다.

meanings.english: to deal effectively with something difficult

examples.en: She needs to learn how to cope with stress in a healthy way.
examples.ko: 그녀는 스트레스를 건강하게 대처하는 법을 배워야 한다.

meanings.english: to make a reproduction or imitation of something

examples.en: Please copy the text from the board into your notebooks.
examples.ko: 칠판의 글을 교과서에 복사해 주세요.

meanings.english: the exclusive legal right to reproduce, publish, and sell a work

examples.en: The author holds the copyright to the novel she wrote.
examples.ko: 그 작가는 자신이 쓴 소설에 대한 저작권을 소유하고 있다.

meanings.english: a thick string or rope

examples.en: He tied the boxes together with a strong cord.
examples.ko: 그는 강한 줄로 상자들을 묶었다.

meanings.english: the central or most important part of something

examples.en: Good time management is at the core of academic success.
examples.ko: 좋은 시간 관리는 학업 성공의 핵심이다.

meanings.english: A tall plant with large yellow seeds that are eaten as food or fed to animals.

examples.en: She enjoys eating grilled corn on the cob.
examples.ko: 그녀는 구운 옥수수를 즐겨 먹는다.

meanings.english: The place where two converging lines or surfaces meet.

examples.en: He found a cozy spot in the corner of the room to read his book.
examples.ko: 그는 방 모퉁이에 아늑한 자리를 찾아 책을 읽었다.

meanings.english: Relating to a large company or group.

examples.en: The corporate office is located in the heart of the city.
examples.ko: 본사는 도시 중심부에 위치해 있다.

meanings.english: Free from error; in accordance with fact or truth.

examples.en: Please make sure your answers are correct before submitting the test.
examples.ko: 시험을 제출하기 전에 답변이 맞는지 확인해 주세요.

meanings.english: Have a close similarity; match or agree almost exactly.

examples.en: The suspect's description corresponds with the witness's account of the incident.
examples.ko: 용의자의 설명이 목격자의 사건 설명과 일치한다.

meanings.english: A long passage in a building with doors leading to rooms on either side.

examples.en: She walked down the corridor to reach her classroom.
examples.ko: 그녀는 교실에 도착하기 위해 복도를 따라 걸었다.

meanings.english: Dishonest or illegal behavior, especially by people in positions of power.

examples.en: The corrupt politician was arrested for accepting bribes.
examples.ko: 부패한 정치인이 뇌물을 받아 체포되었다.

meanings.english: The amount that has to be paid or spent to buy or obtain something.

examples.en: The cost of the new phone is quite high.
examples.ko: 새 핸드폰의 가격은 꽤 비싸다.

meanings.english: Clothing worn by actors in a play or a particular style of clothing worn for a special occasion.

examples.en: She wore a beautiful costume for the Halloween party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 할로윈 파티를 위해 아름다운 의상을 입었다.

meanings.english: A small simple house, especially in the countryside.

examples.en: They spent their vacation in a cozy cottage by the lake.
examples.ko: 그들은 호수 옆 아늑한 작은 시골집에서 휴가를 보냈습니다.

meanings.english: A soft white fibrous substance that surrounds the seeds of a tropical and subtropical plant and is used as textile fiber and thread for sewing.

examples.en: She prefers clothes made of cotton because they are comfortable.
examples.ko: 그녀는 솜으로 만든 옷을 선호하는데, 그것들이 편하기 때문입니다.

meanings.english: Expel air from the lungs with a sudden sharp sound, often as a symptom of illness.

examples.en: He couldn't stop coughing after catching a cold.
examples.ko: 그는 감기에 걸린 후 기침을 멈출 수 없었습니다.

meanings.english: Used to indicate past ability or past permission.

examples.en: When she was younger, she could run very fast.
examples.ko: 그녀가 더 어렸을 때, 그녀는 아주 빨리 달릴 수 있었습니다.

meanings.english: A group of people who are chosen to make rules, laws, or decisions.

examples.en: The city council decided to build a new park in the neighborhood.
examples.ko: 시의회는 동네에 새 공원을 지을 것으로 결정했습니다.

meanings.english: Give advice, especially professional advice.

examples.en: She counseled her friend on how to deal with the problem.
examples.ko: 그녀는 친구에게 문제를 어떻게 해결할지에 대해 상담했습니다.

meanings.english: Determine the total number of something.

examples.en: She asked the students to count the number of apples in the basket.
examples.ko: 그녀는 학생들에게 바구니 속 사과의 수를 세라고 했습니다.

meanings.english: A person or thing that corresponds to or has the same function as another person or thing in a different place or situation.

examples.en: She met her American counterpart at the conference.
examples.ko: 그녀는 회의에서 그녀의 미국 대응자를 만났다.

meanings.english: A nation with its own government, occupying a particular territory.

examples.en: South Korea is a beautiful country with rich culture.
examples.ko: 대한민국은 풍부한 문화를 가진 아름다운 나라이다.

meanings.english: Rural areas, typically with scenic views and natural landscapes.

examples.en: She enjoys the peaceful countryside life away from the city.
examples.ko: 그녀는 도시에서 떨어진 평화로운 시골 생활을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: A political and administrative division of a state, providing certain local governmental services.

examples.en: She lives in Orange County, California.
examples.ko: 그녀는 캘리포니아주 오렌지 카운티에 산다.

meanings.english: Two individuals considered as a pair, especially in a romantic or intimate relationship.

examples.en: The couple went on a romantic vacation to Paris.
examples.ko: 그 부부는 파리로 로맨틱한 휴가를 다녀왔다.

meanings.english: A voucher entitling the holder to a discount for a particular product or service.

examples.en: She used a coupon to get 20% off her purchase.
examples.ko: 그녀는 20% 할인 쿠폰을 사용하여 구매를 했다.

meanings.english: The ability to do something that frightens one; bravery.

examples.en: She showed great courage in facing her fears.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신의 두려움에 맞서며 큰 용기를 보여주었다.

meanings.english: A series of lectures or lessons in a particular subject, leading to an examination or qualification.

examples.en: She is taking a cooking course to improve her culinary skills.
examples.ko: 그녀는 요리 실력을 향상시키기 위해 요리 수업을 듣고 있다.

meanings.english: A place where legal matters are dealt with; a playing area in sports

examples.en: The case will be heard in court next week.
examples.ko: 다음 주에 그 사건이 법정에서 다뤄질 것이다.

meanings.english: A child of one's uncle or aunt

examples.en: My cousin is coming over for dinner tonight.
examples.ko: 오늘 저녁에 사촌이 저희 집에 온다.

meanings.english: To put something over or on top of something else; a thing that lies on, over, or around something

examples.en: Please cover the pot with a lid while cooking.
examples.ko: 요리할 때 뚜껑으로 냄비를 덮어주세요.

meanings.english: A large female animal kept on farms for its milk or meat

examples.en: The cow was grazing peacefully in the field.
examples.ko: 암소가 들판에서 평화롭게 풀을 뜯고 있었다.

meanings.english: A line on the surface of something where it has broken without dividing into separate parts; to break or cause to break

examples.en: He accidentally cracked the mirror while moving furniture.
examples.ko: 가구를 옮기는 동안 우연히 거울을 깨뜨렸다.

meanings.english: Skill in making things by hand; a type of boat or ship

examples.en: She learned the craft of pottery from her grandmother.
examples.ko: 그녀는 할머니로부터 도자기 공예 기술을 배웠다.

meanings.english: To collide violently with an obstacle or another vehicle; a sudden loud noise like an object hitting something hard

examples.en: The car crashed into a tree, but luckily no one was hurt.
examples.ko: 차가 나무에 충돌했지만 다행히 아무도 다치지 않았다.

meanings.english: To move forward on hands and knees or by dragging the body close to the ground

examples.en: The baby is learning to crawl before learning to walk.
examples.ko: 아기가 걷기를 배우기 전에 기어가는 법을 배우고 있다.

meanings.english: A colored pencil made of wax, used for drawing or coloring.

examples.en: She loves to draw with crayons.
examples.ko: 그녀는 크레용으로 그림을 그리는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: A sudden and widespread enthusiasm for something.

examples.en: The new dance craze is taking over social media.
examples.ko: 새로운 춤 유행이 소셜 미디어를 강타하고 있어요.

meanings.english: The thick white or yellow part of milk that contains fat.

examples.en: She likes to put cream in her coffee.
examples.ko: 그녀는 커피에 크림을 넣는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: To bring something into existence.

examples.en: She likes to create art with different materials.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다양한 재료로 예술 작품을 만드는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: Able to be believed; convincing.

examples.en: The news report was credible and trustworthy.
examples.ko: 뉴스 보도는 신뢰할 만하고 믿을 만했어요.

meanings.english: The ability of a customer to obtain goods or services before payment, based on the trust that payment will be made in the future.

examples.en: She has good credit, so she was approved for a loan.
examples.ko: 그녀는 신용도가 좋아 대출이 승인되었어요.

meanings.english: To move slowly and quietly in order to avoid being noticed.

examples.en: The cat likes to creep up on birds in the garden.
examples.ko: 고양이는 정원에서 새에게 몰래 다가가는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: A group of people who work together, especially all those who work on and operate a ship, aircraft, or train.

examples.en: The crew on the ship worked together to navigate through the storm.
examples.ko: 선박의 승무원들은 함께 노력하여 폭풍우를 헤쳐나가기 위해 노력했어요.

meanings.english: An illegal act that can be punished by law

examples.en: He was arrested for committing a crime.
examples.ko: 그는 범죄를 저질렀다는 이유로 체포되었다.

meanings.english: A time of intense difficulty, trouble, or danger

examples.en: The country is facing an economic crisis.
examples.ko: 그 나라는 경제 위기에 직면하고 있다.

meanings.english: Food that is pleasantly firm and fresh

examples.en: I love the crisp sound of autumn leaves under my feet.
examples.ko: 가을 낙엽이 발밑에서 바삭거리는 소리를 좋아해.

meanings.english: A principle or standard by which something may be judged or decided

examples.en: One important criterion for the job is excellent communication skills.
examples.ko: 그 직업의 중요한 기준 중 하나는 탁월한 커뮤니케이션 기술이다.

meanings.english: A person who judges the merits of literary, artistic, or musical works

examples.en: The movie critic gave the film a positive review.
examples.ko: 영화 비평가는 그 영화에 긍정적인 평가를 했다.

meanings.english: A plant that is grown and harvested for food or profit

examples.en: Farmers are busy harvesting the wheat crop.
examples.ko: 농부들은 밀 작물을 수확하는 데 바쁘다.

meanings.english: To go from one side to the other side of something

examples.en: Please wait for the green light before you cross the street.
examples.ko: 길을 건너기 전에 초록불을 기다려주세요.

meanings.english: A large group of people gathered together

examples.en: The crowd cheered loudly at the concert.
examples.ko: 콘서트에서 군중은 시끄럽게 환호했다.

meanings.english: a circular ornamental headdress worn by a monarch as a symbol of authority

examples.en: The queen wore a sparkling crown on her head.
examples.ko: 여왕은 머리에 반짝이는 왕관을 썼다.

meanings.english: of great importance; necessary or essential

examples.en: Good communication is crucial in building strong relationships.
examples.ko: 좋은 소통은 견고한 관계를 구축하는 데 결정적이다.

meanings.english: wilfully causing pain or suffering to others, or feeling no concern about it

examples.en: It is cruel to mistreat animals.
examples.ko: 동물을 학대하는 것은 잔인하다.

meanings.english: a voyage on a ship or boat taken for pleasure or as a vacation

examples.en: We went on a cruise to the Caribbean last summer.
examples.ko: 지난 여름에 우리는 카리브해로 크루즈 여행을 갔다.

meanings.english: to press or squeeze something so hard that it breaks or gets damaged

examples.en: She accidentally crushed the glass in her hand.
examples.ko: 그녀는 실수로 손에 있는 유리를 눌러 부쉈다.

meanings.english: to shed tears or make a loud sound because of pain, sadness, or other strong emotions

examples.en: The baby began to cry when she dropped her toy.
examples.ko: 그 아기는 장난감을 떨어뜨린 순간 울기 시작했다.

meanings.english: a piece of a homogeneous solid substance having a natural geometrically regular form with symmetrically arranged plane faces

examples.en: The crystal in the necklace sparkled in the sunlight.
examples.ko: 목걸이의 수정이 햇빛에 반짝였다.

meanings.english: to prepare and work on land in order to raise crops; to promote or improve the growth of something

examples.en: Farmers cultivate the fields to grow various crops.
examples.ko: 농부들은 다양한 작물을 키우기 위해 밭을 경작한다.

meanings.english: The beliefs, customs, arts, etc., of a particular society, group, place, or time.

examples.en: Korean culture is rich in tradition and history.
examples.ko: 한국 문화는 전통과 역사가 풍부하다.

meanings.english: A small, round container, often with a handle, used for drinking tea, coffee, etc.

examples.en: She poured herself a cup of hot tea.
examples.ko: 그녀는 따뜻한 차 한 잔을 따르다.

meanings.english: To make someone with an illness healthy again.

examples.en: The doctor prescribed antibiotics to cure the infection.
examples.ko: 의사는 감염을 치료하기 위해 항생제를 처방했다.

meanings.english: Eager to know or learn something.

examples.en: The children were curious about the strange noise coming from the attic.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 다락방에서 들리는 이상한 소리에 궁금해했다.

meanings.english: A lock of hair that coils or spirals.

examples.en: Her long, brown curls framed her face beautifully.
examples.ko: 그녀의 긴 갈색 곱슬머리가 얼굴을 아름답게 감싸고 있었다.

meanings.english: The system of money that a country uses.

examples.en: The euro is the currency used in many European countries.
examples.ko: 유로는 많은 유럽 국가에서 사용되는 통화이다.

meanings.english: Belonging to the present time; happening or being used or done now.

examples.en: The current situation requires immediate action.
examples.ko: 현재 상황은 즉각적인 조치가 필요하다.

meanings.english: The subjects comprising a course of study in a school or college.

examples.en: The new curriculum includes courses on computer programming and digital literacy.
examples.ko: 새 교육과정에는 컴퓨터 프로그래밍과 디지털 리터러시 과목이 포함되어 있다.

meanings.english: a dish of meat, vegetables, etc., cooked in a sauce containing curry powder

examples.en: I love eating spicy curry for dinner.
examples.ko: 저는 저녁으로 매운 카레를 먹는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: an offensive word or phrase used to express anger or annoyance

examples.en: He muttered a curse under his breath when he stubbed his toe.
examples.ko: 그가 발가락을 다치자 입속으로 저주를 중얼거렸다.

meanings.english: a piece of material that hangs down to cover a window, stage, etc.

examples.en: She drew the curtains to block out the sunlight.
examples.ko: 그녀는 커튼을 닫아 햇빛을 막았다.

meanings.english: a smooth, rounded line, shape, or movement

examples.en: The road ahead has a sharp curve, so drive carefully.
examples.ko: 앞의 도로에는 급한 곡선이 있으니 조심히 운전하세요.

meanings.english: the legal right or duty to care for someone or something, especially a child after a divorce or separation

examples.en: The mother was granted custody of the children after the divorce.
examples.ko: 그 어머니는 이혼 후 아이들의 양육권을 부여받았다.

meanings.english: a traditional and widely accepted way of behaving or doing something that is specific to a particular society, place, or time

examples.en: It is a custom to bow when greeting someone in Korean culture.
examples.ko: 한국 문화에서 누군가를 인사할 때는 인사할 때는 절을 하는 것이 습관이다.

meanings.english: a person or organization that buys goods or services from a store or business

examples.en: The store manager always greets every customer with a smile.
examples.ko: 가게 매니저는 항상 미소를 지으며 모든 고객을 인사한다.

meanings.english: to divide something with a sharp tool such as a knife

examples.en: She cut the cake into small slices for everyone to enjoy.
examples.ko: 그녀는 모두가 즐길 수 있도록 케이크를 작은 조각으로 잘랐다.

meanings.english: attractive in a pretty or endearing way

examples.en: The puppy is so cute.
examples.ko: 그 강아지 정말 귀엽다.

meanings.english: a series of events that are regularly repeated in the same order

examples.en: The water cycle is essential for life on Earth.
examples.ko: 물의 순환은 지구상의 생명에 필수적이다.

meanings.english: believing that people are motivated purely by self-interest; distrustful of human sincerity or integrity

examples.en: She had a cynical view of politicians.
examples.ko: 그녀는 정치인들을 냉소적으로 보았다.

meanings.english: food made from milk, such as butter, cheese, and yogurt

examples.en: I avoid dairy products because I'm lactose intolerant.
examples.ko: 나는 젖당분해효소 부족으로 유제품을 피한다.

meanings.english: physical harm caused to something which makes it less attractive, useful, or valuable

examples.en: The storm caused a lot of damage to the houses.
examples.ko: 폭풍이 집들에 많은 피해를 주었다.

meanings.english: slightly wet, often in a way that is unpleasant

examples.en: The towels were still damp after being left out in the rain.
examples.ko: 비에 젖어서 말린 수건들은 아직 축축했다.

meanings.english: to move the body and feet to music

examples.en: She loves to dance to her favorite songs.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신이 좋아하는 노래에 춰서 춤추는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: the possibility of something unpleasant or harmful happening

examples.en: There is a danger of falling on the slippery floor.
examples.ko: 미끄러운 바닥에서 넘어질 위험이 있다.

meanings.english: to have enough courage to do something

examples.en: I dare you to jump off the diving board.
examples.ko: 수영대에서 뛰어내리는 것에 도전한다고 해봐.

meanings.english: having very little or no light

examples.en: The room was so dark that I couldn't see anything.
examples.ko: 그 방은 너무 어두워서 아무것도 보이지 않았어.

meanings.english: someone who is very dear to another person

examples.en: She is my darling and I can't imagine my life without her.
examples.ko: 그녀는 나의 애인이고, 그녀 없이 삶을 상상할 수 없어.

meanings.english: to run or move quickly or suddenly

examples.en: She dashed across the street to catch the bus.
examples.ko: 그녀는 버스를 타기 위해 길을 돌진했다.

meanings.english: a structured set of data held in a computer

examples.en: The company uses a database to store all the customer information.
examples.ko: 회사는 모든 고객 정보를 저장하기 위해 데이터베이스를 사용한다.

meanings.english: a particular day of the month or year

examples.en: What is the date today?
examples.ko: 오늘 몇 월 몇 일이야?

meanings.english: a single piece of information, usually used in the context of data analysis

examples.en: The researchers collected a large amount of data, but only a few key datums were relevant to their study.
examples.ko: 연구자들은 많은 양의 자료를 수집했지만, 연구에 관련된 중요한 자료는 몇 개뿐이었다.

meanings.english: a female child in relation to her parents

examples.en: She is a loving daughter who always takes care of her family.
examples.ko: 그녀는 항상 가족을 돌보는 사랑스러운 딸이야.

meanings.english: the first light of day; daybreak

examples.en: The birds start singing at dawn.
examples.ko: 새들이 새벽에 노래하기 시작한다.

meanings.english: a period of 24 hours; the time between sunrise and sunset

examples.en: I have a busy day ahead.
examples.ko: 내일은 바쁜 하루가 될 것 같다.

meanings.english: no longer alive; lifeless

examples.en: The flowers in the garden are dead.
examples.ko: 정원에 있는 꽃들은 다 시들었다.

meanings.english: an agreement or arrangement, especially in business

examples.en: They made a deal to share the profits.
examples.ko: 그들은 이익을 나누기로 합의했다.

meanings.english: the end of life; the state of being dead

examples.en: The family mourned the death of their pet dog.
examples.ko: 가족은 애완견의 죽음을 애도했다.

meanings.english: a formal discussion on a particular topic in a public meeting or legislative assembly

examples.en: The candidates engaged in a heated debate over healthcare policies.
examples.ko: 후보자들은 의료 정책에 대해 치열한 토론을 벌였다.

meanings.english: something, typically money, that is owed or due

examples.en: She struggled to pay off her student debt.
examples.ko: 그녀는 학자금 대출을 갚기 위해 고군분투했다.

meanings.english: a period of ten years

examples.en: They celebrated their 10th wedding anniversary, marking a decade of marriage.
examples.ko: 그들은 결혼 10주년을 축하했으며, 결혼 10년을 기념했다.

meanings.english: to rot or deteriorate

examples.en: The old house had started to decay due to neglect.
examples.ko: 노후한 집은 방치로 인해 부패하기 시작했다.

meanings.english: appropriate or fitting

examples.en: He always tries to dress decently for important meetings.
examples.ko: 그는 항상 중요한 회의를 위해 예의 바르게 옷을 입으려고 노력한다.

meanings.english: to make a choice or come to a conclusion

examples.en: After much thought, she finally decided to study abroad.
examples.ko: 많은 고민 끝에 그녀는 결국 해외로 유학하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: a flat surface that forms a floor on a ship or outdoor area

examples.en: We enjoyed the view from the deck of the cruise ship.
examples.ko: 우리는 크루즈선의 갑판에서 보는 풍경을 즐겼다.

meanings.english: to announce or make known publicly

examples.en: The president will declare a national holiday next week.
examples.ko: 대통령은 다음 주에 국경일을 선언할 것이다.

meanings.english: to refuse or decrease

examples.en: She had to decline the invitation due to a prior commitment.
examples.ko: 이전 약속 때문에 그녀는 초대를 거절해야 했다.

meanings.english: to adorn or embellish

examples.en: They decorated the house with colorful lights for the party.
examples.ko: 그들은 파티를 위해 집을 다채로운 불빛으로 장식했다.

meanings.english: to lessen or reduce

examples.en: The company decided to decrease the prices to attract more customers.
examples.ko: 회사는 더 많은 고객을 유치하기 위해 가격을 낮추기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: to devote (time, effort, or oneself) to a particular task or purpose

examples.en: She decided to dedicate her life to helping others.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다른 사람들을 돕는 데 자신의 삶을 바치기로 결심했다.

meanings.english: extending far down from the top or surface

examples.en: The lake is very deep, reaching depths of over 100 feet.
examples.ko: 그 호수는 매우 깊어서 100피트 이상의 깊이에 이른다.

meanings.english: to win a victory over in a battle or contest

examples.en: Despite their best efforts, they were unable to defeat the opposing team.
examples.ko: 최선을 다해도, 그들은 상대팀을 이기지 못했다.

meanings.english: to protect from harm or danger

examples.en: The soldiers worked together to defend their country from invasion.
examples.ko: 군인들은 침입으로부터 나라를 지키기 위해 함께 일했다.

meanings.english: the act of protecting from harm or danger

examples.en: The castle's strong defense prevented the enemy from entering.
examples.ko: 성의 강력한 방어가 적이 들어오는 것을 막았다.

meanings.english: a lack or shortage of something

examples.en: The doctor diagnosed her with an iron deficiency and recommended dietary changes.
examples.ko: 의사는 그녀에게 철분 결핍증을 진단하고 식이 변경을 권장했다.

meanings.english: an excess of liabilities over assets

examples.en: The company faced a financial deficit due to overspending.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 지출이 과도하여 재정적 적자에 직면했다.

meanings.english: to state or describe the exact meaning of something

examples.en: It is important to define the terms before starting the project.
examples.ko: 프로젝트를 시작하기 전에 용어를 명확히 정의하는 것이 중요하다.

meanings.english: clearly defined or determined

examples.en: She gave a definite answer to the question.
examples.ko: 그녀는 질문에 명확한 대답을 했다.

meanings.english: an academic rank conferred by a college or university

examples.en: He received his bachelor's degree in business administration.
examples.ko: 그는 경영학 학사 학위를 받았다.

meanings.english: a period of time by which something is late or postponed

examples.en: The flight was delayed due to bad weather.
examples.ko: 비날씨로 비행기가 지연되었다.

meanings.english: a person sent or authorized to represent others

examples.en: She was chosen as the delegate to attend the conference.
examples.ko: 그녀는 회의에 참석할 대표자로 선출되었다.

meanings.english: to remove or erase

examples.en: Please delete the unnecessary files from the computer.
examples.ko: 컴퓨터에서 불필요한 파일을 삭제해 주세요.

meanings.english: to think carefully or intentionally

examples.en: They need to deliberate on the best course of action.
examples.ko: 그들은 최선의 조치에 대해 숙고해야 한다.

meanings.english: easily broken or damaged; fragile

examples.en: Be careful with the delicate glassware.
examples.ko: 섬세한 유리제품을 조심하세요.

meanings.english: having a pleasant taste; enjoyable to eat

examples.en: The cake was absolutely delicious.
examples.ko: 케이크는 정말 맛있었다.

meanings.english: A feeling of great pleasure and happiness.

examples.en: The children were filled with delight when they saw the colorful balloons.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 다채로운 풍선을 보고 큰 기쁨에 가득 찼다.

meanings.english: To bring and hand over (a letter, parcel, or ordered goods) to the proper recipient or address.

examples.en: The postman will deliver the package to your doorstep tomorrow.
examples.ko: 우체부가 내일 당신의 문 앞에 소포를 전달할 것입니다.

meanings.english: To ask authoritatively or brusquely.

examples.en: The workers demanded higher wages for their hard work.
examples.ko: 노동자들은 힘들게 일한 대가로 더 높은 임금을 요구했다.

meanings.english: A system of government by the whole population or all the eligible members of a state, typically through elected representatives.

examples.en: Democracy allows citizens to participate in decision-making processes through voting.
examples.ko: 민주주의는 시민들이 투표를 통해 의사결정 과정에 참여할 수 있게 한다.

meanings.english: A supporter or member of the Democratic Party.

examples.en: She has been a loyal democrat and has voted for the party in every election.
examples.ko: 그녀는 충실한 민주당원이며 모든 선거에서 그 당에 투표했다.

meanings.english: An evil spirit or devil, especially one thought to possess a person or act as a tormentor in hell.

examples.en: The villagers believed that the old abandoned house was haunted by a demon.
examples.ko: 마을 사람들은 오래된 버려진 집이 악마에 의해 귀신이 든 곳이라고 믿었다.

meanings.english: To show clearly and deliberately.

examples.en: The teacher will demonstrate the experiment to the students before they conduct it themselves.
examples.ko: 학생들이 직접 실험을 진행하기 전에 선생님은 학생들에게 실험을 시연할 것이다.

meanings.english: Closely compacted in substance; thick.

examples.en: The forest became dense with trees as we ventured deeper into the woods.
examples.ko: 우리가 숲 속으로 더 깊이 들어갈수록 숲은 나무로 밀집해졌다.

meanings.english: A person qualified to treat diseases and conditions that affect the teeth and gums.

examples.en: My sister wants to become a dentist in the future.
examples.ko: 내 여동생은 미래에 치과의사가 되고 싶어합니다.

meanings.english: To state that something is not true or that you do not believe something.

examples.en: He will deny any involvement in the crime.
examples.ko: 그는 범죄와 아무런 연관이 없다고 부인할 것이다.

meanings.english: To leave, especially to start a journey.

examples.en: The train will depart from the station at 3 PM.
examples.ko: 열차는 오후 3시에 역에서 출발할 것이다.

meanings.english: To rely on someone or something for support or help.

examples.en: Our success will depend on how well we work together.
examples.ko: 우리의 성공은 우리가 얼마나 잘 협력하는지에 달려있을 것이다.

meanings.english: To represent or show something in a picture, story, movie, etc.

examples.en: The painting depicts a beautiful sunset over the mountains.
examples.ko: 이 그림은 산 위에 떠 있는 아름다운 일몰을 묘사하고 있다.

meanings.english: To put money or something valuable in a bank or safe place.

examples.en: I need to deposit this check into my bank account.
examples.ko: 나는 이 수표를 내 은행 계좌에 예금해야 합니다.

meanings.english: To make someone feel very unhappy and without hope.

examples.en: The constant rain tends to depress her mood.
examples.ko: 계속된 비는 그녀의 기분을 우울하게 만드는 경향이 있습니다.

meanings.english: To take something away from someone, especially something necessary or pleasant.

examples.en: The war has deprived many children of their homes and families.
examples.ko: 전쟁으로 많은 아이들이 집과 가족을 잃었습니다.

meanings.english: to obtain or receive from a source

examples.en: She derives great pleasure from reading.
examples.ko: 그녀는 독서로 큰 즐거움을 얻는다.

meanings.english: to move or fall downward

examples.en: The sun began to descend below the horizon.
examples.ko: 해가 지평선 아래로 내려가기 시작했다.

meanings.english: to give an account in words of (someone or something)

examples.en: Can you describe the suspect to the police?
examples.ko: 당신은 경찰에 범인을 묘사할 수 있나요?

meanings.english: a dry, barren area of land / to abandon (a person, cause, or organization) in a way considered disloyal or treacherous

examples.en: The Sahara Desert is the largest hot desert in the world.
examples.ko: 사하라 사막은 세계에서 가장 큰 뜨거운 사막이다.

meanings.english: to be worthy of, to be entitled to

examples.en: She deserves a promotion for all her hard work.
examples.ko: 그녀는 모든 열심히 한 일에 대해 승진을 받을 자격이 있다.

meanings.english: a plan or drawing produced to show the look and function or workings of a building, garment, or other object before it is built or made / to plan and make decisions about something that is being built or created

examples.en: The architect will design a new office building for the company.
examples.ko: 건축가는 회사를 위해 새로운 사무실 건물을 설계할 것이다.

meanings.english: to appoint or specify (something) for a specific purpose

examples.en: The parking lot is designated for employees only.
examples.ko: 주차장은 직원들만을 위해 지정되어 있다.

meanings.english: a strong feeling of wanting to have something or wishing for something to happen / to wish or long for; crave

examples.en: She has a strong desire to travel around the world.
examples.ko: 그녀는 세계 일주를 하고 싶어하는 강한 욕망을 가지고 있다.

meanings.english: A piece of furniture with a flat or sloped surface for writing or working on

examples.en: I have a computer on my desk.
examples.ko: 나는 책상 위에 컴퓨터가 있다.

meanings.english: The complete loss or absence of hope

examples.en: She was filled with despair after failing the test.
examples.ko: 시험에 떨어진 후 그녀는 절망에 가득 찼다.

meanings.english: Feeling or showing a hopeless sense that a situation is so bad as to be impossible to deal with

examples.en: He was desperate to find a solution to his financial problems.
examples.ko: 그는 자신의 재정 문제에 대한 해결책을 찾기 위해 절박했다.

meanings.english: Without being affected by; in spite of

examples.en: Despite the rain, they went for a walk.
examples.ko: 비에도 불구하고, 그들은 산책을 갔다.

meanings.english: To intend for a particular purpose or fate

examples.en: She felt that she was destined to become a great artist.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신이 위대한 예술가가 될 운명이라고 느꼈다.

meanings.english: The events that will necessarily happen to a particular person or thing in the future

examples.en: He believed that his destiny was to become a doctor.
examples.ko: 그는 자신의 운명이 의사가 되는 것이라고 믿었다.

meanings.english: To damage something so badly that it no longer exists or cannot be repaired

examples.en: The hurricane destroyed many houses in the area.
examples.ko: 허리케인이 그 지역의 많은 집을 파괴했다.

meanings.english: To cause great damage or harm to something

examples.en: The fire destructed the entire forest.
examples.ko: 불이 전체 숲을 파괴했다.

meanings.english: to separate or disconnect

examples.en: She detached the key from the keychain.
examples.ko: 그녀는 열쇠를 열쇠고리에서 분리했다.

meanings.english: a small part or item that is considered separately

examples.en: The report includes every detail of the project.
examples.ko: 보고서에는 프로젝트의 모든 세부사항이 포함되어 있다.

meanings.english: to discover or notice something, especially something that is not easy to see, hear, etc.

examples.en: The dog can detect the smell of food from far away.
examples.ko: 개는 멀리서 음식 냄새를 감지할 수 있다.

meanings.english: to decide or settle something

examples.en: She determined to finish her homework before dinner.
examples.ko: 그녀는 저녁 식사 전에 숙제를 끝내기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: to grow or cause to grow and become more mature, advanced, or elaborate

examples.en: The company plans to develop a new product next year.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 내년에 새 제품을 개발할 계획이다.

meanings.english: a machine or tool that does a special job

examples.en: He used a GPS device to find his way to the destination.
examples.ko: 그는 목적지로 가는 길을 찾기 위해 GPS 장치를 사용했다.

meanings.english: a powerful evil spirit

examples.en: Some people believe that the devil tempts humans to do bad things.
examples.ko: 일부 사람들은 악마가 사람들을 나쁜 일을 하도록 유혹한다고 믿는다.

meanings.english: to invent or plan something, especially a complex system or process

examples.en: She devised a new strategy to increase sales.
examples.ko: 그녀는 매출을 증가시키기 위해 새 전략을 고안했다.

meanings.english: to give all or a large part of one's time or resources to a person, activity, or cause

examples.en: She devoted her life to helping the homeless.
examples.ko: 그녀는 노숙자들을 돕는 데 자신의 삶을 바쳤다.

meanings.english: a medical condition where the body is unable to regulate blood sugar levels

examples.en: My grandfather has diabetes and needs to monitor his blood sugar daily.
examples.ko: 제 할아버지는 당뇨병이 있어서 매일 혈당을 모니터링해야 합니다.

meanings.english: conversation between two or more people

examples.en: The dialogue between the two characters in the movie was captivating.
examples.ko: 영화 속 두 캐릭터 간의 대화는 매혹적이었다.

meanings.english: a book in which one keeps a daily record of events and experiences

examples.en: She wrote in her diary every night before going to bed.
examples.ko: 그녀는 매일 밤 잠들기 전에 일기를 썼다.

meanings.english: to say or read aloud words to be typed, written down, or recorded

examples.en: The teacher dictated the spelling words for the students to write down.
examples.ko: 선생님은 학생들이 적을 스펠링 단어를 따라 읽었다.

meanings.english: a book or electronic resource that lists the words of a language with their meanings

examples.en: When in doubt about a word's meaning, you can look it up in the dictionary.
examples.ko: 단어의 뜻을 모를 때는 사전에서 찾아볼 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: to stop living; to cease to exist

examples.en: Plants die if they don't receive enough sunlight.
examples.ko: 식물은 충분한 햇빛을 받지 못하면 죽습니다.

meanings.english: the kinds of food that a person, animal, or community habitually eats

examples.en: She went on a diet to lose weight before her wedding.
examples.ko: 그녀는 결혼 전에 체중을 감량하기 위해 다이어트를 시작했다.

meanings.english: to be unlike or distinct in nature, form, or characteristics

examples.en: Their opinions differ on the best way to solve the problem.
examples.ko: 그들의 의견은 문제를 해결하는 가장 좋은 방법에 대해 다르다.

meanings.english: requiring much effort or skill to accomplish or understand

examples.en: Learning a new language can be difficult, but it is rewarding.
examples.ko: 새로운 언어를 배우는 것은 어려울 수 있지만 보람있는 경험이다.

meanings.english: to break up, turn over, or remove earth, sand, etc., with a tool or by using hands

examples.en: The dog likes to dig in the garden.
examples.ko: 개는 정원에서 파는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: the quality of being worthy of honor or respect

examples.en: She carried herself with dignity even in difficult situations.
examples.ko: 그녀는 어려운 상황에서도 존엄을 유지했다.

meanings.english: a measurable extent of a particular kind, such as length, breadth, depth, or height

examples.en: The new building has impressive dimensions.
examples.ko: 새 건물은 인상적인 크기를 가지고 있다.

meanings.english: to make or become less; reduce or decrease

examples.en: The importance of the issue should not be diminished.
examples.ko: 문제의 중요성은 줄어서는 안 된다.

meanings.english: to eat dinner

examples.en: We decided to dine at a fancy restaurant for our anniversary.
examples.ko: 우리는 기념일을 맞아 고급 레스토랑에서 식사하기로 했다.

meanings.english: the main meal of the day, usually eaten in the evening

examples.en: We had a delicious dinner with our family last night.
examples.ko: 어젯밤 가족과 맛있는 저녁 식사를 했다.

meanings.english: to put something briefly into a liquid

examples.en: She dipped her brush into the paint.
examples.ko: 그녀는 붓을 페인트에 담갔다.

meanings.english: a person who represents their country in dealing with other countries

examples.en: The diplomat negotiated a peace treaty between the two nations.
examples.ko: 외교관이 두 나라 사이의 평화 조약을 협상했다.

meanings.english: straightforward; not involving anything else

examples.en: She gave me direct instructions on how to get to the library.
examples.ko: 그녀는 도서관에 가는 방법에 대해 직접적인 지시를 해 주었다.

meanings.english: soil or earth that is not clean

examples.en: The children played in the dirt and got their clothes dirty.
examples.ko: 어린이들이 먼지 속에서 놀다가 옷을 더럽혔다.

meanings.english: to make someone feel sad because something they hoped for did not happen

examples.en: I was disappointed when my favorite team lost the game.
examples.ko: 내가 좋아하는 팀이 경기에서 졌을 때 실망했다.

meanings.english: a sudden event causing great damage or suffering

examples.en: The earthquake was a disaster that destroyed many buildings.
examples.ko: 지진은 많은 건물을 파괴한 재앙이었다.

meanings.english: a flat, thin, circular object

examples.en: She inserted the disc into the computer to play the movie.
examples.ko: 그녀는 영화를 보기 위해 컴퓨터에 디스크를 넣었다.

meanings.english: training that makes people more willing to obey or more able to control themselves

examples.en: Studying regularly is an important part of maintaining discipline in school.
examples.ko: 규칙적으로 공부하는 것은 학교에서 규율을 유지하는 중요한 부분이다.

meanings.english: written or spoken communication or debate

examples.en: She engaged in a thoughtful discourse with her classmates.
examples.ko: 그녀는 동료들과 사려 깊은 대화를 나눴다.

meanings.english: to recognize a distinction; differentiate

examples.en: It is important not to discriminate against others based on their race.
examples.ko: 다른 사람을 인종에 따라 차별하는 것은 중요하지 않다.

meanings.english: to talk about something with another person or group

examples.en: Let's discuss our plans for the upcoming project.
examples.ko: 다가오는 프로젝트에 대한 계획을 논의해봐요.

meanings.english: a strong feeling of dislike or disapproval

examples.en: The sight of the spoiled food filled her with disgust.
examples.ko: 상한 음식을 보자 그녀는 역겨움을 느꼈다.

meanings.english: a shallow, flat container for serving food

examples.en: She placed the delicious cake on a beautiful dish.
examples.ko: 그녀는 맛있는 케이크를 아름다운 접시에 올렸다.

meanings.english: to decide that something is not important or not true

examples.en: The teacher had to dismiss the class early due to a sudden power outage.
examples.ko: 갑작스러운 정전으로 선생님은 수업을 일찍 마무리해야 했다.

meanings.english: to show something for others to see

examples.en: The museum will display rare artifacts from ancient civilizations.
examples.ko: 박물관은 고대 문명의 희귀한 유물을 전시할 것이다.

meanings.english: to argue or debate; a disagreement or argument

examples.en: The siblings often dispute over who gets to use the computer first.
examples.ko: 형제자매들은 컴퓨터를 먼저 사용할지에 대해 자주 논쟁한다.

meanings.english: To interrupt the normal course or unity of something

examples.en: The loud noise disrupted the class.
examples.ko: 시끄러운 소리가 수업을 방해했다.

meanings.english: The amount of space between two things or people

examples.en: The distance between the two cities is 100 kilometers.
examples.ko: 두 도시 사이의 거리는 100 킬로미터이다.

meanings.english: Clear and definite; different in a way that you can see, hear, feel, etc.

examples.en: Each twin has a distinct personality.
examples.ko: 각 쌍둥이는 뚜렷한 성격을 가지고 있다.

meanings.english: To recognize or understand the difference between things or people

examples.en: She can easily distinguish between right and wrong.
examples.ko: 그녀는 쉽게 옳고 그름을 구별할 수 있다.

meanings.english: To change something so that it is no longer true or accurate

examples.en: The mirror distorted her reflection.
examples.ko: 거울이 그녀의 반영을 왜곡했다.

meanings.english: To take someone's attention away from what they are trying to do

examples.en: The loud noise distracted him from his homework.
examples.ko: 시끄러운 소리가 그를 숙제에서 산만하게 했다.

meanings.english: To give something out to several people, or to spread or supply something

examples.en: The teacher distributed the test papers to the students.
examples.ko: 선생님은 시험지를 학생들에게 나눠 주었다.

meanings.english: An area of a country or city, especially one characterized by a particular feature or activity

examples.en: She lives in the downtown district.
examples.ko: 그녀는 시내 지구에 산다.

meanings.english: To interrupt the quiet, rest, peace, or order of; unsettle.

examples.en: The loud noise outside disturbed my concentration.
examples.ko: 밖에서 나는 시끄러운 소리가 내 집중력을 방해했다.

meanings.english: To plunge into water headfirst.

examples.en: He decided to dive into the pool to cool off.
examples.ko: 그는 시원해지기 위해 수영장으로 다이빙하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: Of various kinds or forms; multiform.

examples.en: The university campus is diverse, with students from many different countries.
examples.ko: 대학 캠퍼스는 다양한 국가의 학생들이 있는 다양성을 가지고 있다.

meanings.english: To separate into parts, groups, sections, etc.

examples.en: The teacher asked the students to divide into pairs for the group activity.
examples.ko: 선생님은 학생들에게 그룹 활동을 위해 짝을 이루도록 나누라고 했다.

meanings.english: Of, relating to, or proceeding directly from God or a god.

examples.en: The ancient temple was believed to be a place of divine power.
examples.ko: 고대 신전은 신성한 힘이 깃든 곳으로 믿어졌다.

meanings.english: To legally dissolve a marriage between two people.

examples.en: After years of unhappiness, they decided to divorce and go their separate ways.
examples.ko: 불행한 시간을 보낸 후, 그들은 이혼하고 각자의 길을 가기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: To perform an action, activity, or task.

examples.en: I need to do my homework before going to bed.
examples.ko: 나는 잠들기 전에 숙제를 해야 한다.

meanings.english: A person licensed to practice medicine, especially one who specializes in diagnosis and medical treatment.

examples.en: My sister wants to become a doctor and help people who are sick.
examples.ko: 내 여동생은 의사가 되어 병든 사람들을 돕고 싶어 한다.

meanings.english: A written or printed record that provides information or evidence

examples.en: Please bring your identification document with you.
examples.ko: 신분증 문서를 가져오세요.

meanings.english: A domesticated carnivorous mammal that typically has a long snout and an acute sense of smell

examples.en: My dog loves to play fetch in the park.
examples.ko: 우리 개는 공놀이를 하는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: A small model of a human figure, often used as a child's toy

examples.en: She collects antique dolls from different countries.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다른 나라에서 온 고전 인형을 수집합니다.

meanings.english: A small gregarious toothed whale that typically has a beaklike snout and a curved fin on the back

examples.en: We were lucky to see a pod of dolphins swimming in the ocean.
examples.ko: 우리는 바다에서 수무래들이 수영하는 것을 볼 수 있어서 운이 좋았습니다.

meanings.english: An area of territory owned or controlled by a particular ruler or government

examples.en: The internet has become a domain for sharing information worldwide.
examples.ko: 인터넷은 전 세계적으로 정보를 공유하는 영역이 되었습니다.

meanings.english: Relating to the running of a home or to family relations

examples.en: Domestic chores include cleaning, cooking, and laundry.
examples.ko: 가정일에는 청소, 요리, 빨래 등이 포함됩니다.

meanings.english: To have control or power over others

examples.en: The tall skyscraper dominates the city skyline.
examples.ko: 높은 초고층 건물이 도시의 하늘을 지배합니다.

meanings.english: To give money or goods to help a person or organization

examples.en: Many people donate blood regularly to save lives.
examples.ko: 많은 사람들이 정기적으로 피를 기부하여 생명을 구합니다.

meanings.english: a hinged, sliding, or revolving barrier at the entrance to a building, room, or vehicle

examples.en: Please close the door when you leave.
examples.ko: 나가실 때 문을 닫아주세요.

meanings.english: a quantity of a medicine or drug taken or recommended to be taken at a particular time

examples.en: Take one dose of this medicine after meals.
examples.ko: 식사 후 이 약을 한 번 복용하세요.

meanings.english: a small round mark or spot

examples.en: She put a dot above the letter 'i'.
examples.ko: 그녀는 'i' 위에 점을 찍었습니다.

meanings.english: consisting of two equal, identical, or similar parts or things

examples.en: The price is double what I expected.
examples.ko: 가격이 제가 기대한 것의 두 배입니다.

meanings.english: a feeling of uncertainty or lack of conviction

examples.en: I have some doubt about his story.
examples.ko: 그의 이야기에 대해 의심이 듭니다.

meanings.english: a small fried cake of sweetened dough, typically in the shape of a ball or ring

examples.en: I love to eat a chocolate doughnut with my coffee.
examples.ko: 커피와 초콜릿 도넛을 먹는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: towards or in a lower place or position, especially to or on the ground or another surface

examples.en: Please sit down and relax.
examples.ko: 앉아서 쉬세요.

meanings.english: a group or set of twelve

examples.en: She bought a dozen eggs at the store.
examples.ko: 그녀는 가게에서 달걀 12개를 샀어요.

meanings.english: a preliminary version of a piece of writing

examples.en: I need to work on my draft before submitting the final report.
examples.ko: 최종 보고서를 제출하기 전에 초안을 작업해야 합니다.

meanings.english: to pull something along the ground

examples.en: She had to drag her heavy suitcase up the stairs.
examples.ko: 그녀는 무거운 가방을 계단을 올라가면서 끌어야 했습니다.

meanings.english: to remove liquid from an area by letting it flow away or out

examples.en: Remember to drain the pasta before adding the sauce.
examples.ko: 소스를 넣기 전에 파스타의 물을 빼는 것을 기억하세요.

meanings.english: a play for theater, radio, or television

examples.en: The school will perform a drama for the annual talent show.
examples.ko: 학교에서는 매년 개최되는 재능 공연을 위해 연극을 연출할 것입니다.

meanings.english: to produce a picture or diagram by making lines and marks on paper

examples.en: She likes to draw portraits of her friends in her sketchbook.
examples.ko: 그녀는 친구들의 초상화를 스케치북에 그리는 것을 좋아합니다.

meanings.english: a strong feeling of fear or worry about something unpleasant or dangerous

examples.en: She felt a sense of dread before taking the important exam.
examples.ko: 중요한 시험을 보기 전에 그녀는 두려움을 느꼈습니다.

meanings.english: a series of thoughts, images, and sensations occurring in a person's mind during sleep

examples.en: She had a dream about flying over the mountains last night.
examples.ko: 어젯밤 그녀는 산 위를 날아다니는 꿈을 꾸었습니다.

meanings.english: clothing worn on the body

examples.en: She picked out a beautiful dress to wear to the party.
examples.ko: 파티에 입을 아름다운 옷을 골라냈습니다.

meanings.english: A tool with a pointed end for making holes

examples.en: He used a drill to hang the picture on the wall.
examples.ko: 그는 그림을 벽에 걸기 위해 드릴을 사용했다.

meanings.english: To consume liquid through the mouth

examples.en: She likes to drink tea in the morning.
examples.ko: 그녀는 아침에 차를 마시는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: To operate and control a vehicle

examples.en: He learned to drive a car when he turned 18.
examples.ko: 그는 18살이 되었을 때 차를 운전하는 법을 배웠다.

meanings.english: To fall or let something fall

examples.en: She accidentally dropped her phone on the floor.
examples.ko: 그녀는 실수로 핸드폰을 바닥에 떨어뜨렸다.

meanings.english: To die by suffocating in water

examples.en: Swim carefully in the deep end of the pool to avoid drowning.
examples.ko: 익사를 피하기 위해 수영장의 깊은 곳에서 조심히 수영하세요.

meanings.english: A substance used for medical purposes or as a narcotic

examples.en: The doctor prescribed a drug to help with her pain.
examples.ko: 의사는 그녀의 통증을 도와주기 위해 약물을 처방했다.

meanings.english: A musical instrument played by striking with hands or sticks

examples.en: He enjoys playing the drum in the school band.
examples.ko: 그는 학교 밴드에서 북을 연주하는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: Free from moisture or water

examples.en: Hang your wet clothes outside to let them dry in the sun.
examples.ko: 젖은 옷을 밖에 걸어서 해에 말리게 하세요.

meanings.english: Having two parts or aspects

examples.en: The car has dual airbags for safety.
examples.ko: 이 차는 안전을 위해 이중 에어백을 갖고 있습니다.

meanings.english: A waterbird with a broad blunt bill, short legs, and webbed feet

examples.en: The duck swam gracefully in the pond.
examples.ko: 오리가 연못에서 우아하게 수영했습니다.

meanings.english: Expected to happen or arrive at a particular time

examples.en: The report is due by the end of the week.
examples.ko: 보고서는 이번 주 끝까지 제출해야 합니다.

meanings.english: Not sharp, bright, or interesting

examples.en: The lecture was so dull that I almost fell asleep.
examples.ko: 강의가 너무 지루해서 거의 잠이 들 뻔했습니다.

meanings.english: To get rid of something unwanted or unpleasant

examples.en: He decided to dump his old clothes and buy new ones.
examples.ko: 그는 옷을 버리고 새로 사기로 결정했습니다.

meanings.english: Throughout the course or duration of

examples.en: I like to read books during my free time.
examples.ko: 나는 여가 시간에 책을 읽는 것을 좋아합니다.

meanings.english: Fine, dry powder consisting of tiny particles of earth or waste matter

examples.en: She wiped the dust off the shelves with a cloth.
examples.ko: 그녀는 천으로 선반 위의 먼지를 닦았습니다.

meanings.english: A moral or legal obligation; a responsibility

examples.en: It is your duty to help those in need.
examples.ko: 도움이 필요한 사람들을 돕는 것이 당신의 의무입니다.

meanings.english: to live in a particular place

examples.en: She dwells in a small village.
examples.ko: 그녀는 작은 마을에 거주한다.

meanings.english: characterized by constant change, activity, or progress

examples.en: The dynamic nature of the city attracts many people.
examples.ko: 도시의 동적인 성격은 많은 사람들을 끌어들인다.

meanings.english: every one of two or more people or things, considered separately

examples.en: Each student must complete the assignment individually.
examples.ko: 각 학생은 과제를 개별적으로 완료해야 한다.

meanings.english: having or showing keen interest or intense desire

examples.en: The children were eager to open their presents.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 선물을 열기를 열망했다.

meanings.english: the organ of hearing and balance in humans and other vertebrates

examples.en: She whispered in his ear.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그의 귀에 속삭였다.

meanings.english: happening or done before the usual or expected time

examples.en: He arrived early for the meeting.
examples.ko: 그는 회의에 일찍 도착했다.

meanings.english: to receive money in return for work that you do

examples.en: She earns a good salary at her job.
examples.ko: 그녀는 직장에서 좋은 급여를 받는다.

meanings.english: the planet we live on; the ground

examples.en: We must take care of the earth for future generations.
examples.ko: 우리는 미래 세대를 위해 지구를 보호해야 한다.

meanings.english: a state of being comfortable or free from stress

examples.en: She felt at ease in her new job.
examples.ko: 그녀는 새 직장에서 편안함을 느꼈다.

meanings.english: the direction where the sun rises

examples.en: Japan is located to the east of Korea.
examples.ko: 일본은 한국의 동쪽에 위치해 있습니다.

meanings.english: to consume food

examples.en: I like to eat pizza for dinner.
examples.ko: 저는 저녁으로 피자를 먹는 것을 좋아합니다.

meanings.english: the system of production, distribution, and consumption of goods and services in a country or region

examples.en: The government is working to improve the country's economy.
examples.ko: 정부는 나라의 경제를 개선하기 위해 노력하고 있습니다.

meanings.english: the outside limit of an object, area, or surface

examples.en: Be careful near the edge of the cliff.
examples.ko: 절벽 가장자리에서 조심하세요.

meanings.english: to prepare written material for publication by correcting, condensing, or otherwise modifying it

examples.en: She asked her friend to edit her essay before submitting it.
examples.ko: 그녀는 에세이를 제출하기 전에 친구에게 편집해 달라고 부탁했습니다.

meanings.english: to teach or train someone in a particular subject or skill

examples.en: Parents play a crucial role in educating their children.
examples.ko: 부모는 자녀를 교육하는 데 중요한 역할을 합니다.

meanings.english: a change that is a result or consequence of an action or other cause

examples.en: The new law had a positive effect on the environment.
examples.ko: 새로운 법이 환경에 긍정적인 영향을 미쳤습니다.
