examples.ko: 그녀는 악몽에서 소리지르며 깼다.

meanings.english: The number after eight and before ten.

examples.en: I have nine apples.
examples.ko: 나는 사과 아홉 개를 가지고 있어.

meanings.english: Used to give a negative response or refusal.

examples.en: No, I don't want any more candy.
examples.ko: 아니, 나는 더이상 사탕을 원하지 않아.

meanings.english: Having or showing fine personal qualities or high moral principles.

examples.en: The king was known for his noble deeds.
examples.ko: 그 왕은 그의 고귀한 행동으로 유명했다.

meanings.english: To move your head up and down to show agreement or understanding.

examples.en: She nodded in approval.
examples.ko: 그녀는 찬성으로 머리를 끄덕였다.

meanings.english: A sound, especially one that is loud or unpleasant.

examples.en: The noise from the construction site was bothersome.
examples.ko: 공사 현장에서 나는 소음이 귀찮았다.

meanings.english: To officially suggest someone for a job, position, or honor.

examples.en: The committee will nominate a new chairman.
examples.ko: 위원회는 새로운 의장을 지명할 것이다.

meanings.english: Not any; not one.

examples.en: There are none left.
examples.ko: 남은 것이 하나도 없다.

meanings.english: In spite of that; nevertheless.

examples.en: She was tired; nonetheless, she continued working.
examples.ko: 그녀는 피곤했지만 그럼에도 불구하고 계속 일했다.

meanings.english: the middle of the day; 12 o'clock in the daytime

examples.en: Let's meet at noon for lunch.
examples.ko: 우리 점심 때 정오에 만나요.

meanings.english: used before the second or further of two or more alternatives

examples.en: I neither smoke nor drink.
examples.ko: 나는 담배도 피우지 않고 술도 마시지 않아.

meanings.english: a standard or pattern, especially of social behavior, that is typical or expected

examples.en: Punctuality is the norm in this company.
examples.ko: 이 회사에서는 시간을 지키는 것이 표준이다.

meanings.english: the direction in which a compass needle normally points, toward the horizon on the left-hand side of a person facing east

examples.en: Canada is located to the north of the United States.
examples.ko: 캐나다는 미국의 북쪽에 위치해 있습니다.

meanings.english: the part of the face that sticks out above the mouth, through which a person or animal smells and breathes

examples.en: She has a cute little nose.
examples.ko: 그녀는 귀여운 작은 코를 가지고 있어요.

meanings.english: used to form a negative phrase

examples.en: I am not going to the party tonight.
examples.ko: 나는 오늘 밤 파티에 가지 않을 거야.

meanings.english: a brief record of points or ideas written down as an aid to memory

examples.en: Make a note of the important details.
examples.ko: 중요한 세부 사항을 메모해 두세요.

meanings.english: a book with blank pages for recording notes or memoranda

examples.en: She carries her notebook everywhere she goes.
examples.ko: 그녀는 가는 곳마다 공책을 들고 다닙니다.

meanings.english: Not anything; no single thing

examples.en: There is nothing in the box.
examples.ko: 상자 안에는 아무것도 없다.

meanings.english: Attention; written or printed announcement

examples.en: Please pay attention to the notice on the bulletin board.
examples.ko: 게시판에 있는 공지에 주의하세요.

meanings.english: Fictional prose narrative of book length

examples.en: I enjoy reading novels in my free time.
examples.ko: 나는 여가 시간에 소설을 읽는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: At the present time; immediately

examples.en: I am busy now, can we talk later?
examples.ko: 지금 바빠서 나중에 얘기할 수 있을까요?

meanings.english: In the present period of time; currently

examples.en: Nowadays, many people use smartphones for communication.
examples.ko: 요즘에는 많은 사람들이 통신을 위해 스마트폰을 사용한다.

meanings.english: Not in or to any place

examples.en: I searched everywhere, but the key was nowhere to be found.
examples.ko: 내가 어디든 찾아봤지만, 열쇠는 어디에도 없었다.

meanings.english: Relating to the nucleus of an atom or to nuclear energy

examples.en: The country is investing in nuclear power for electricity generation.
examples.ko: 그 나라는 전기 생산을 위해 원자력에 투자하고 있다.

meanings.english: Mathematical value or quantity expressed by an Arabic numeral

examples.en: Can you tell me the number of students in your class?
examples.ko: 당신의 반 학생 수를 말해줄 수 있나요?

meanings.english: consisting of a large number; many

examples.en: There are numerous books in the library.
examples.ko: 도서관에는 다수의 책이 있다.

meanings.english: a person trained to care for the sick or infirm, especially in a hospital

examples.en: My sister wants to become a nurse and help people.
examples.ko: 내 여동생은 간호사가 되어 사람들을 돕고 싶어 한다.

meanings.english: a hard-shelled fruit or seed with an edible kernel

examples.en: She enjoys snacking on mixed nuts.
examples.ko: 그녀는 혼합 견과류를 간식으로 즐긴다.

meanings.english: a type of tree that produces acorns and has strong, hard wood

examples.en: The oak tree in the park provides shade in the summer.
examples.ko: 공원에 있는 참나무는 여름에 그늘을 제공한다.

meanings.english: to comply with or follow the commands, restrictions, wishes, or instructions of

examples.en: Children should obey their parents.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 부모의 말을 따라야 한다.

meanings.english: a material thing that can be seen and touched

examples.en: She found a shiny object on the beach.
examples.ko: 그녀는 해변에서 반짝이는 물건을 발견했다.

meanings.english: to make (someone) legally or morally bound to an action or course of action

examples.en: I feel obliged to help my friend move this weekend.
examples.ko: 이번 주말에 친구가 이사를 하는 데 도와주어야 할 것 같아.

meanings.english: to watch carefully the way something happens or the way someone does something

examples.en: Scientists observe the behavior of animals in the wild.
examples.ko: 과학자들은 야생동물들의 행동을 관찰한다.

meanings.english: to preoccupy or fill the mind of (someone) continually, intrusively, and to a troubling extent

examples.en: She was obsessed with becoming a famous singer.
examples.ko: 그녀는 유명한 가수가 되는 것에 집착했다.

meanings.english: to come into possession of; get, acquire, or procure, as through an effort or by a request

examples.en: He obtained a scholarship to study abroad.
examples.ko: 그는 해외 유학 장학금을 받았다.

meanings.english: easily perceived or understood; clear, self-evident, or apparent

examples.en: It was obvious that she was upset.
examples.ko: 그녀가 화가 났다는 것은 명백했다.

meanings.english: a particular time or instance of an event

examples.en: We dressed up for the special occasion.
examples.ko: 우리는 그 특별한 날을 위해 멋진 옷을 입었다.

meanings.english: to take up or fill (space, time, etc.); to engage or employ the mind, energy, or attention of

examples.en: The new company will occupy the entire building.
examples.ko: 새로운 회사가 건물 전체를 차지할 것이다.

meanings.english: to happen; take place; come to pass

examples.en: The accident occurred on a rainy night.
examples.ko: 사고는 비오는 밤에 발생했다.

meanings.english: a very large expanse of sea, in particular each of the main areas into which the sea is divided geographically

examples.en: The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth.
examples.ko: 태평양은 지구상에서 가장 큰 바다이다.

meanings.english: different from what is usual or expected; strange

examples.en: It's odd to see a cat chasing its own tail.
examples.ko: 고양이가 자신의 꼬리를 쫓는 것은 이상하다.

meanings.english: expressing the relationship between a part and a whole

examples.en: The book of my friend.
examples.ko: 내 친구의 책.

meanings.english: away from a place or position

examples.en: She turned off the lights.
examples.ko: 그녀는 불을 끄었다.

meanings.english: cause to feel upset, annoyed, or resentful

examples.en: I didn't mean to offend you.
examples.ko: 너를 모욕하려고 한 건 아니야.

meanings.english: present or proffer (something) for (someone) to accept or reject

examples.en: He offered me a piece of cake.
examples.ko: 그는 나에게 케이크 한 조각을 제안했다.

meanings.english: a room, set of rooms, or building used as a place for commercial, professional, or bureaucratic work

examples.en: She works in an office building.
examples.ko: 그녀는 사무실 건물에서 일한다.

meanings.english: a person holding a position of authority, especially in the armed services or in a government department

examples.en: The police officer helped the lost child.
examples.ko: 경찰관이 길을 잃은 아이를 도와주었다.

meanings.english: frequently; many times

examples.en: She often goes to the library.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자주 도서관에 간다.

meanings.english: a viscous liquid derived from petroleum, especially for use as a fuel or lubricant

examples.en: The car engine needs oil to run smoothly.
examples.ko: 자동차 엔진은 부드럽게 작동하기 위해 기름이 필요하다.

meanings.english: satisfactory, acceptable

examples.en: Is it okay if I come over later?
examples.ko: 나가도 괜찮아?

meanings.english: having lived for a long time; not new

examples.en: My grandparents live in an old house.
examples.ko: 할아버지, 할머니는 낡은 집에 살아요.

meanings.english: physically in contact with and supported by

examples.en: The book is on the table.
examples.ko: 책이 탁자 위에 있어요.

meanings.english: one time only; on one occasion

examples.en: I visited Paris once when I was a child.
examples.ko: 어릴 때 한 번 파리를 방문했어요.

meanings.english: the number 1

examples.en: There is only one apple left.
examples.ko: 남은 사과가 하나뿐이에요.

meanings.english: solely, exclusively; single or solitary

examples.en: She is the only person who knows the truth.
examples.ko: 그녀는 진실을 아는 유일한 사람이에요.

meanings.english: not closed or blocked; to cause something to be no longer closed or blocked

examples.en: Please open the window to let some fresh air in.
examples.ko: 신선한 공기가 들어올 수 있도록 창문을 열어주세요.

meanings.english: a dramatic work in one or more acts, set to music for singers and instrumentalists

examples.en: We are going to see an opera at the theater tonight.
examples.ko: 오늘 밤 극장에서 오페라를 보러 갈 거에요.

meanings.english: to function or work in a particular way

examples.en: The doctors will operate on the patient tomorrow.
examples.ko: 의사들이 내일 환자를 수술할 것입니다.

meanings.english: a belief or judgment about something

examples.en: Everyone is entitled to their own opinion.
examples.ko: 모든 사람은 자신의 의견을 가질 자격이 있습니다.

meanings.english: suitable or right for a particular situation

examples.en: It was an opportune moment to ask for a raise.
examples.ko: 인상을 요청하기에 적시의 순간이었습니다.

meanings.english: to be against something or someone

examples.en: I oppose the new policy because it will hurt small businesses.
examples.ko: 그 새로운 정책에 반대합니다. 소상공인들에게 해를 끼칠 것이기 때문입니다.

meanings.english: to choose one thing or do one thing instead of another

examples.en: I opted to stay home and relax instead of going out.
examples.ko: 나는 외출하는 대신 집에 있어서 휴식하기로 선택했습니다.

meanings.english: a person who tends to be hopeful and confident about the future

examples.en: Despite the challenges, she remained an optimist and believed things would get better.
examples.ko: 어려움에도 불구하고, 그녀는 낙천주의자로 남아 미래가 더 나아질 것이라고 믿었습니다.

meanings.english: used to connect words or phrases that give a choice

examples.en: You can have tea or coffee with your breakfast.
examples.ko: 아침 식사할 때 차나 커피 중 선택할 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: spoken rather than written

examples.en: The students had to give an oral presentation in front of the class.
examples.ko: 학생들은 수업 앞에서 구두 발표를 해야 했습니다.

meanings.english: a round juicy citrus fruit with a tough bright reddish-yellow rind

examples.en: I love eating fresh oranges in the morning.
examples.ko: 나는 아침에 신선한 오렌지를 먹는 것을 좋아해.

meanings.english: the curved path of a celestial object or spacecraft around a star, planet, or moon

examples.en: The satellite is in orbit around the Earth.
examples.ko: 그 위성은 지구 주위를 도는 중이다.

meanings.english: a large group of musicians who play many different instruments together

examples.en: The orchestra performed a beautiful symphony last night.
examples.ko: 어제 밤 오케스트라가 아름다운 심포니를 연주했다.

meanings.english: to request something to be made, supplied, or delivered

examples.en: I would like to order a pizza for dinner.
examples.ko: 저녁으로 피자를 주문하고 싶어요.

meanings.english: not special, different, or unusual in any way

examples.en: Today was just an ordinary day at school.
examples.ko: 오늘은 학교에서 그냥 보통의 하루였다.

meanings.english: a part of the body that performs a specific function

examples.en: The heart is an important organ in the human body.
examples.ko: 심장은 인체에서 중요한 기관이다.

meanings.english: to find one's position in relation to the points of a compass

examples.en: She needed a moment to orient herself in the new city.
examples.ko: 그녀는 새로운 도시에서 자신의 위치를 파악하는 데 시간이 필요했다.

meanings.english: the point or place where something begins, arises, or is derived

examples.en: The origin of the tradition dates back to ancient times.
examples.ko: 그 전통의 기원은 고대로 거슬러 올라간다.

meanings.english: Used to refer to a person or thing that is different or distinct from one already mentioned or known.

examples.en: I need to buy some other books for my collection.
examples.ko: 내 컬렉션에 다른 책 몇 권을 더 사야 해.

meanings.english: In circumstances different from those present or considered; or else.

examples.en: You should study hard, otherwise you might fail the exam.
examples.ko: 열심히 공부해야 해, 그렇지 않으면 시험에서 떨어질 수도 있어.

meanings.english: Used to indicate duty or correctness, typically when criticizing someone's actions.

examples.en: You ought to apologize for what you said.
examples.ko: 네가 한 말에 대해 사과해야 해.

meanings.english: Away from, or not in, the inside or center.

examples.en: The cat ran out of the house when I opened the door.
examples.ko: 문을 열자마자 고양이가 집 밖으로 뛰어나갔어.

meanings.english: The way a thing turns out; a consequence.

examples.en: The outcome of the game was a tie.
examples.ko: 경기 결과는 무승부였다.

meanings.english: A general description or plan showing the essential features of something but not the detail.

examples.en: Before writing the essay, make sure to create an outline.
examples.ko: 수필을 쓰기 전에 개요를 작성하는 것을 잊지 마세요.

meanings.english: The amount of something produced by a person, machine, or industry.

examples.en: The factory increased its output by 20% this year.
examples.ko: 공장은 올해 생산량을 20% 증가시켰다.

meanings.english: An extremely strong reaction of anger, shock, or indignation.

examples.en: The community was in outrage over the unjust decision.
examples.ko: 그 무정한 결정에 커뮤니티는 분노에 휩싸였다.

meanings.english: Exceptionally good; excellent

examples.en: She received an outstanding award for her academic achievements.
examples.ko: 그녀는 학업 성취에 대한 뛰어난 상을 받았다.

meanings.english: A thermally insulated chamber used for heating, baking, or drying

examples.en: She baked a delicious cake in the oven.
examples.ko: 그녀는 오븐에서 맛있는 케이크를 굽다.

meanings.english: In a position above and in contact with

examples.en: The cat jumped over the fence.
examples.ko: 고양이가 울타리 위로 뛰어넘었다.

meanings.english: Taking everything into account; including everything

examples.en: The overall performance of the team was impressive.
examples.ko: 팀의 전반적인 성과는 인상적이었다.

meanings.english: Succeed in dealing with a problem or difficulty

examples.en: She had to overcome her fear of public speaking to give the presentation.
examples.ko: 그녀는 발표를 하기 위해 대중 연설에 대한 두려움을 극복해야 했다.

meanings.english: Situated above the level of the head; in the sky

examples.en: The plane flew overhead, leaving a trail in the sky.
examples.ko: 비행기가 머리 위를 날아가며 하늘에 흔적을 남겼다.

meanings.english: Extend over so as to cover partly

examples.en: The two circles overlap in the middle.
examples.ko: 두 개의 원이 중앙에서 겹친다.

meanings.english: Fail to notice or consider something

examples.en: She accidentally overlooked the important email in her inbox.
examples.ko: 그녀는 우연히 받은 편지함의 중요한 이메일을 놓쳤다.

meanings.english: During or for the length of one night.

examples.en: We stayed overnight at the hotel.
examples.ko: 우리는 호텔에서 하룻밤을 보냈습니다.

meanings.english: Situated or originating in a foreign country.

examples.en: He works for an oversea company.
examples.ko: 그는 해외 회사에서 일합니다.

meanings.english: To have a strong emotional effect on someone.

examples.en: She was overwhelmed with joy when she won the award.
examples.ko: 그녀는 상을 받았을 때 큰 기쁨에 압도당했습니다.

meanings.english: To be under obligation to pay or repay someone.

examples.en: I owe my friend some money for lunch.
examples.ko: 나는 점심 값으로 친구에게 돈을 빚졌어.

meanings.english: To possess something as one's own.

examples.en: She owns a beautiful house in the countryside.
examples.ko: 그녀는 시골에 아름다운 집을 소유하고 있습니다.

meanings.english: The speed at which someone or something moves or does something.

examples.en: He walked at a slow pace.
examples.ko: 그는 천천히 걸었습니다.

meanings.english: A group of items wrapped or tied together.

examples.en: She packed her bags for the trip.
examples.ko: 그녀는 여행을 위해 가방을 싸 주었습니다.

meanings.english: A thick piece of soft material used to protect or shape something.

examples.en: She placed a pad on the chair for extra comfort.
examples.ko: 그녀는 더 편안함을 위해 의자에 방석을 놓았습니다.

meanings.english: one side of a sheet of paper in a book, newspaper, or magazine

examples.en: Please turn to page 10 in your textbook.
examples.ko: 교과서의 10쪽으로 넘겨주세요.

meanings.english: physical suffering or discomfort caused by illness or injury

examples.en: He felt a sharp pain in his back after lifting heavy boxes.
examples.ko: 그는 무거운 상자를 옮긴 후 등에 예리한 통증을 느꼈다.

meanings.english: a colored substance that is spread over a surface and dries to leave a thin decorative or protective coating / to apply color to something using paint

examples.en: She decided to paint her room blue to create a calming atmosphere.
examples.ko: 그녀는 안정적인 분위기를 만들기 위해 방을 파랗게 칠하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: two corresponding things designed for use together

examples.en: She bought a new pair of shoes for the upcoming party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다가오는 파티를 위해 새 신발 한 켤레를 샀다.

meanings.english: a large, impressive building that is the official home of a king, queen, president, etc.

examples.en: The royal family lives in the grand palace at the center of the city.
examples.ko: 왕실 가족은 도시 중심에 있는 웅장한 궁전에 산다.

meanings.english: light in color, especially when compared to something else of the same type

examples.en: Her face turned pale when she heard the shocking news.
examples.ko: 그녀는 충격적인 소식을 듣고 얼굴이 창백해졌다.

meanings.english: the inner surface of the hand between the wrist and fingers

examples.en: She placed the coin on her palm and showed it to her friends.
examples.ko: 그녀는 동전을 손바닥에 올려 친구들에게 보여주었다.

meanings.english: a metal container used for cooking food

examples.en: She heated the pan before adding the chopped vegetables.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다진 야채를 넣기 전에 팬을 데웠다.

meanings.english: a flat or curved component, typically rectangular, that forms or is set into the surface of a door, wall, or ceiling

examples.en: The control panel on the machine is used to operate it.
examples.ko: 기계의 제어판은 그것을 작동시키는 데 사용됩니다.

meanings.english: sudden uncontrollable fear or anxiety, often causing wildly unthinking behavior

examples.en: There was panic in the crowd when the fire alarm went off.
examples.ko: 화재 경보음이 울릴 때 사람들 사이에 공황이 퍼졌다.

meanings.english: an outer garment covering the body from the waist to the ankles, with a separate part for each leg

examples.en: He wore his favorite jeans, a t-shirt, and a pair of sneakers with white pants.
examples.ko: 그는 좋아하는 청바지, 티셔츠, 그리고 하얀 바지에 스니커즈를 신었다.

meanings.english: material manufactured in thin sheets from the pulp of wood or other fibrous substances, used for writing, drawing, or printing on

examples.en: She wrote her name on a piece of paper and handed it to the teacher.
examples.ko: 그녀는 종이 한 장에 자신의 이름을 써서 선생님에게 건넸다.

meanings.english: a public procession, especially one celebrating a special day or event and including marching bands and floats

examples.en: The city held a parade to celebrate its founding anniversary.
examples.ko: 그 도시는 창립 기념일을 축하하기 위해 퍼레이드를 열었다.

meanings.english: a distinct section of a piece of writing, usually dealing with a single theme and indicated by a new line, indentation, or numbering

examples.en: Please write a paragraph about your favorite book for homework.
examples.ko: 숙제로 자신이 좋아하는 책에 대한 한 문단을 써 주세요.

meanings.english: occurring or existing at the same time or in a similar way; corresponding

examples.en: The two roads run parallel to each other for several miles.
examples.ko: 두 도로는 몇 마일 동안 서로 평행하게 뻗어 있다.

meanings.english: the action of forgiving or being forgiven for an error or offense

examples.en: She asked for his pardon after realizing her mistake.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신의 실수를 깨닫고 그의 용서를 구했다.

meanings.english: A person's father or mother

examples.en: My parents always support me in everything I do.
examples.ko: 부모님은 항상 제가 하는 모든 일에 지원해 주세요.

meanings.english: A public area with grass, trees, and playground equipment

examples.en: I enjoy taking a walk in the park with my friends.
examples.ko: 나는 친구들과 함께 공원에서 산책하는 것을 즐겨요.

meanings.english: The highest legislature, consisting of elected representatives

examples.en: The parliament debates and passes laws for the country.
examples.ko: 의회는 국가를 위한 법을 토론하고 통과시킵니다.

meanings.english: A piece or segment of something

examples.en: Each team member has a part to play in the project.
examples.ko: 각 팀원은 프로젝트에서 할 일이 있어요.

meanings.english: To take part in an activity or event

examples.en: It's important to participate in class discussions to learn effectively.
examples.ko: 효과적으로 배우기 위해 수업 토론에 참여하는 것이 중요해요.

meanings.english: A tiny piece of matter

examples.en: Dust particles can cause allergies for some people.
examples.ko: 먼지 입자는 일부 사람들에게 알레르기를 유발할 수 있어요.

meanings.english: Specific or distinct

examples.en: She has a particular interest in astronomy.
examples.ko: 그녀는 천문학에 특별한 관심을 가지고 있어요.

meanings.english: A person who shares in a business or activity with another

examples.en: They are business partners and work together on various projects.
examples.ko: 그들은 사업 파트너이며 다양한 프로젝트에서 함께 일합니다.

meanings.english: a social gathering of invited guests, typically involving eating, drinking, and entertainment

examples.en: We had a great time at the birthday party last night.
examples.ko: 어젯밤 생일 파티에서 즐거운 시간을 보냈습니다.

meanings.english: to move in a particular direction, especially towards, and go past something

examples.en: You need to pass the exam to graduate from high school.
examples.ko: 고등학교를 졸업하려면 시험에 통과해야 합니다.

meanings.english: a narrow space between two rows of buildings, leading from one street or place to another

examples.en: The secret passage behind the bookshelf led to a hidden room.
examples.ko: 책장 뒤의 비밀 통로가 숨겨진 방으로 이어졌다.

meanings.english: a person who is traveling in a vehicle but is not driving it

examples.en: The train was crowded with passengers during rush hour.
examples.ko: 러시아워에 기차 안은 승객으로 붐볐다.

meanings.english: strong and barely controllable emotion or feeling towards something

examples.en: She pursued her passion for painting and became a successful artist.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그림에 대한 열정을 추구하여 성공한 화가가 되었다.

meanings.english: an official document issued by a government, certifying the holder's identity and citizenship and entitling them to travel under its protection to and from foreign countries

examples.en: Make sure to keep your passport safe while traveling abroad.
examples.ko: 해외 여행 시 여권을 안전하게 보관하세요.

meanings.english: the time that has gone by; things that have happened

examples.en: He couldn't change the mistakes he made in the past.
examples.ko: 그는 과거에 저지른 실수들을 바꿀 수 없었다.

meanings.english: to touch quickly and gently with the flat of the hand

examples.en: She patted her dog on the head as a sign of affection.
examples.ko: 그녀는 애정을 표현하기 위해 강아지 머리를 가볍게 쳤다.

meanings.english: a small area that is different from the area around it

examples.en: She sewed a patch on her jeans.
examples.ko: 그녀는 청바지에 패치를 덧대었다.

meanings.english: an official document that gives a person or company the right to be the only one that can make or sell a new invention for a certain period of time

examples.en: He applied for a patent for his innovative design.
examples.ko: 그는 그의 혁신적인 디자인에 대한 특허를 신청했다.

meanings.english: a way or track laid down for walking or made by continual treading

examples.en: The path through the forest was narrow but beautiful.
examples.ko: 숲을 통하는 길은 좁았지만 아름다웠다.

meanings.english: a person receiving or registered to receive medical treatment

examples.en: The doctor saw several patients in the morning.
examples.ko: 의사는 아침에 여러 명의 환자를 진료했다.

meanings.english: a repeated decorative design

examples.en: The dress had a floral pattern on it.
examples.ko: 그 드레스에는 꽃무늬가 있었다.

meanings.english: a temporary stop in action or speech

examples.en: There was a brief pause before the music started.
examples.ko: 음악이 시작되기 전에 잠시 멈춤이 있었다.

meanings.english: to cover a piece of ground with a hard, flat surface such as concrete or bricks

examples.en: The city decided to pave the dirt road with asphalt.
examples.ko: 도시는 질긴 토지를 아스팔트로 포장하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: to give money to someone for something you have received or done

examples.en: He will pay for the meal with his credit card.
examples.ko: 그는 신용카드로 식사 비용을 지불할 것이다.

meanings.english: a state or period in which there is no war or fighting

examples.en: The two countries signed a peace treaty.
examples.ko: 두 나라가 평화 조약을 체결했다.

meanings.english: the pointed top of a mountain

examples.en: They reached the peak of the mountain after a long hike.
examples.ko: 긴 하이킹 끝에 그들은 산 정상에 도달했다.

meanings.english: a sweet fruit that is narrow near the stem and rounded at the bottom

examples.en: She enjoyed a juicy pear for dessert.
examples.ko: 그녀는 디저트로 즙이 많은 배를 즐겼다.

meanings.english: a person who works on the land, especially in poor countries

examples.en: The peasant harvested the crops in the fields.
examples.ko: 농민은 밭에서 작물을 수확했다.

meanings.english: to remove the outer covering of a fruit or vegetable

examples.en: She carefully peeled the orange before eating it.
examples.ko: 그녀는 주의 깊게 오렌지의 껍질을 벗겨 먹었다.

meanings.english: a person who is equal to another in abilities, qualifications, age, background, and social status

examples.en: She respected her peer's opinion on the matter.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그 일에 대한 동료의 의견을 존중했다.

meanings.english: a long, thin object used for writing or drawing

examples.en: He always carries a pen in his pocket.
examples.ko: 그는 항상 주머니에 펜을 들고 다닌다.

meanings.english: a punishment imposed for breaking a law, rule, or contract

examples.en: The referee awarded a penalty kick to the opposing team.
examples.ko: 심판은 상대팀에게 패널티 킥을 주었다.

meanings.english: A long, thin object used for writing or drawing, usually made of wood and graphite.

examples.en: I need a pencil to write my essay.
examples.ko: 수필을 쓰려면 연필이 필요해.

meanings.english: Human beings in general or considered collectively.

examples.en: People enjoy spending time with their friends.
examples.ko: 사람들은 친구들과 시간을 보내는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: A pungent, hot-tasting powder prepared from dried and ground peppercorns.

examples.en: I like to add pepper to my soup for extra flavor.
examples.ko: 더 맛있게 하기 위해 수프에 후추를 넣는다.

meanings.english: For each (used with units to express a rate).

examples.en: The cost is $10 per person.
examples.ko: 비용은 한 사람당 10달러입니다.

meanings.english: To become aware of through the senses, especially the sight or hearing.

examples.en: She perceived a change in his attitude towards her.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그의 태도 변화를 인식했다.

meanings.english: Having all the required or desirable elements, qualities, or characteristics; as good as it is possible to be.

examples.en: She has a perfect score on the test.
examples.ko: 그녀는 시험에서 만점을 받았다.

meanings.english: To carry out, accomplish, or fulfill (an action, task, or function).

examples.en: The band will perform at the concert tonight.
examples.ko: 밴드는 오늘 밤 콘서트에서 공연할 것이다.

meanings.english: Used to express uncertainty or possibility.

examples.en: Perhaps we can go to the movies tomorrow.
examples.ko: 내일 영화를 보러 갈 수도 있겠다.

meanings.english: A length of time.

examples.en: She studied for a long period of time before the exam.
examples.ko: 시험 전에 그녀는 오랜 기간 동안 공부했다.

meanings.english: Lasting or intended to last indefinitely.

examples.en: The ink on the paper was permanent and could not be erased.
examples.ko: 종이 위의 잉크는 영구적이었고 지워질 수 없었다.

meanings.english: To allow something to happen.

examples.en: The teacher permitted the students to work in groups.
examples.ko: 선생님은 학생들에게 그룹으로 일할 것을 허용했다.

meanings.english: To continue to exist or happen, especially for longer than is usual or desirable.

examples.en: Despite the difficulties, he persisted in pursuing his dream.
examples.ko: 어려움에도 불구하고, 그는 꿈을 추구하는 데 계속했다.

meanings.english: A human being.

examples.en: She is a kind person who always helps others.
examples.ko: 그녀는 항상 다른 사람들을 도와주는 친절한 사람이다.

meanings.english: A particular way of considering something.

examples.en: From her perspective, the situation seemed different.
examples.ko: 그녀의 관점에서는 상황이 다르게 보였다.

meanings.english: To make someone do or believe something by giving them a good reason to do it.

examples.en: She tried to persuade her parents to let her go to the party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파티에 가도록 부모님을 설득하려고 했다.

meanings.english: An animal that is kept in the home as a companion and treated kindly.

examples.en: She loves her pet dog and takes good care of it.
examples.ko: 그녀는 애완견을 사랑하고 잘 돌봐준다.

meanings.english: a distinct period or stage in a process of change or development

examples.en: The project is in its final phase.
examples.ko: 프로젝트는 마지막 단계에 있다.

meanings.english: a fact or situation that is observed to exist or happen, especially one whose cause or explanation is in question

examples.en: The Northern Lights are a natural phenomenon.
examples.ko: 북극광은 자연 현상이다.

meanings.english: the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence, especially when considered as an academic discipline

examples.en: Eastern philosophy emphasizes harmony with nature.
examples.ko: 동양 철학은 자연과의 조화를 강조한다.

meanings.english: a picture made using a camera, in which an image is focused on to light-sensitive material and then made visible and permanent by chemical treatment, or stored digitally

examples.en: She took a beautiful photograph of the sunset.
examples.ko: 그녀는 일몰의 아름다운 사진을 찍었다.

meanings.english: a small group of words standing together as a conceptual unit, typically forming a component of a clause

examples.en: The phrase 'once in a blue moon' means very rarely.
examples.ko: '한때 청달에'라는 구문은 매우 드물게를 의미한다.

meanings.english: relating to the body as opposed to the mind

examples.en: Regular exercise is important for maintaining physical health.
examples.ko: 규칙적인 운동은 신체 건강을 유지하는 데 중요하다.

meanings.english: the branch of science concerned with the nature and properties of matter and energy

examples.en: She is studying physics at university.
examples.ko: 그녀는 대학에서 물리학을 공부하고 있다.

meanings.english: a large keyboard musical instrument with a wooden case enclosing a soundboard and metal strings, which are struck by hammers when the keys are depressed

examples.en: She plays the piano beautifully.
examples.ko: 그녀는 피아노를 아름답게 연주한다.

meanings.english: To choose or select from a group

examples.en: She will pick a book to read.
examples.ko: 그녀는 읽을 책을 고를 것이다.

meanings.english: An outdoor meal where people eat together in a natural environment

examples.en: We had a picnic in the park.
examples.ko: 우리는 공원에서 소풍을 했다.

meanings.english: A visual representation of something, often captured by a camera or drawn by hand

examples.en: She drew a beautiful picture of a flower.
examples.ko: 그녀는 아름다운 꽃 그림을 그렸다.

meanings.english: A baked dish with a sweet or savory filling, typically with a pastry crust

examples.en: I love eating apple pie.
examples.ko: 나는 사과 파이를 먹는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: A part of something, often separated or cut from a whole

examples.en: Can I have a piece of cake?
examples.ko: 케이크 한 조각 주세요.

meanings.english: A domesticated mammal with a stout body, short legs, and a snout for a nose

examples.en: The pig rolled in the mud.
examples.ko: 돼지가 진흙 속에서 구르고 있었다.

meanings.english: A collection of things placed one on top of another, or to place things in a heap

examples.en: There was a pile of books on the table.
examples.ko: 탁자 위에 책 더미가 있었다.

meanings.english: A small round mass of solid medicine to be swallowed whole

examples.en: She took a pill to relieve her headache.
examples.ko: 그녀는 두통을 완화하기 위해 한 알약을 먹었다.

meanings.english: a person who operates the controls of an aircraft

examples.en: The pilot safely landed the plane in bad weather.
examples.ko: 조종사는 나쁜 날씨 속에서 비행기를 안전하게 착륙시켰다.

meanings.english: a thin piece of metal with a sharp point at one end

examples.en: She used a pin to attach the paper to the corkboard.
examples.ko: 그녀는 종이를 코르크보드에 붙이기 위해 핀을 사용했다.

meanings.english: to squeeze a small amount of something between your thumb and finger

examples.en: She pinched her brother playfully on the arm.
examples.ko: 그녀는 장난스럽게 동생의 팔을 꼬집었다.

meanings.english: a type of coniferous tree with needle-like leaves

examples.en: The pine tree in the backyard provides shade in the summer.
examples.ko: 뒷마당에 있는 소나무는 여름에 그늘을 제공한다.

meanings.english: a pale red color

examples.en: She wore a pretty pink dress to the party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파티에 예쁜 분홍색 드레스를 입었다.

meanings.english: a person who is among the first to explore or settle a new country or area

examples.en: She was a pioneer in the field of women's rights.
examples.ko: 그녀는 여성 인권 분야에서 개척자였다.

meanings.english: a tube of metal, plastic, or other material used to convey water, gas, oil, or other fluid substances

examples.en: The plumber fixed the leak in the pipe under the sink.
examples.ko: 배관공은 싱크대 아래 파이프의 누수를 고쳤다.

meanings.english: the act of throwing a baseball to a batter

examples.en: The pitcher's fast pitch struck out the batter.
examples.ko: 투수의 빠른 투구가 타자를 삼진으로 물리쳤다.

meanings.english: Feeling of sorrow and compassion for someone's misfortune

examples.en: I felt pity for the stray cat in the rain.
examples.ko: 나는 비오는 날에 길고양이를 불쌍히 여겼다.

meanings.english: Italian dish consisting of a flat, round base of dough baked with toppings

examples.en: Let's order a pizza for dinner tonight.
examples.ko: 오늘 저녁에는 피자를 주문하자.

meanings.english: A particular position or point in space

examples.en: This is a great place to have a picnic.
examples.ko: 소풍을 하기에 좋은 장소다.

meanings.english: Clear or obvious

examples.en: She gave me a plain answer to my question.
examples.ko: 그녀는 내 질문에 명확한 대답을 했다.

meanings.english: A detailed proposal for doing or achieving something

examples.en: We need to make a plan for our summer vacation.
examples.ko: 여름 휴가를 위한 계획을 세워야 해.

meanings.english: A powered flying vehicle with fixed wings and a weight greater than that of the air it displaces

examples.en: We will travel to Europe by plane next month.
examples.ko: 다음 달에 비행기로 유럽으로 여행할 거야.

meanings.english: A celestial body moving in an elliptical orbit around a star

examples.en: Earth is the third planet from the sun in our solar system.
examples.ko: 지구는 우리 태양계에서 태양으로부터 세 번째로 떨어진 행성이다.

meanings.english: A living organism that typically grows in soil and has leaves, stems, and roots

examples.en: My mom likes to plant flowers in our garden.
examples.ko: 엄마는 우리 정원에 꽃을 심는 것을 좋아해.

meanings.english: a synthetic material made from a wide range of organic polymers

examples.en: She put the leftovers in a plastic container.
examples.ko: 그녀는 남은 음식을 플라스틱 용기에 넣었다.

meanings.english: a flat, round dish used for serving food

examples.en: He placed the sandwich on a plate.
examples.ko: 그는 샌드위치를 접시에 올렸다.

meanings.english: a raised level surface on which people or things can stand

examples.en: The speaker stood on the platform to address the crowd.
examples.ko: 연설자는 사람들에게 연설하기 위해 플랫폼에 서 있었다.

meanings.english: to engage in activity for enjoyment; a dramatic work for the stage or screen

examples.en: The children love to play in the park.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 공원에서 놀기를 좋아한다.

meanings.english: to make someone happy or satisfied by doing something

examples.en: Could you please pass me the salt?
examples.ko: 소금 좀 주시겠어요?

meanings.english: a large or sufficient amount or quantity

examples.en: There's plenty of food for everyone at the party.
examples.ko: 파티에 참석한 모든 사람들에게 충분한 음식이 있다.

meanings.english: to plan secretly to do something wrong or illegal; the main events of a play, novel, movie, or similar work

examples.en: The detective tried to unravel the mystery of the plot.
examples.ko: 탐정은 줄거리의 미스터리를 풀어가려고 노력했다.

meanings.english: used to show that one number or amount is added to another

examples.en: Five plus five equals ten.
examples.ko: 다섯 더하기 다섯은 열이다.

meanings.english: A small bag or pouch in a garment for carrying small articles.

examples.en: He put his phone in his pocket.
examples.ko: 그는 핸드폰을 주머니에 넣었다.

meanings.english: A piece of writing in which the expression of feelings and ideas is given intensity by particular attention to diction, rhyme, rhythm, and imagery.

examples.en: She wrote a beautiful poem about nature.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자연에 관한 아름다운 시를 썼다.

meanings.english: A person who writes poems.

examples.en: Emily Dickinson is a famous poet.
examples.ko: 에밀리 디킨슨은 유명한 시인이다.

meanings.english: A particular spot, place, or position in an area or on a map, object, or surface.

examples.en: The main point of the story is to be kind to others.
examples.ko: 이야기의 주요 요점은 다른 사람에게 친절해야 한다는 것이다.

meanings.english: A substance that is capable of causing illness or death of a living organism when introduced or absorbed.

examples.en: She accidentally ingested poison and had to go to the hospital.
examples.ko: 그녀가 실수로 독을 섭취해서 병원에 가야 했다.

meanings.english: A long, slender, rounded piece of wood or metal, typically used with one end placed in the ground as a support for something.

examples.en: He used a pole to push the boat away from the dock.
examples.ko: 그는 막대기를 사용해서 보트를 부두에서 멀리 밀었다.

meanings.english: An organized civil force for maintaining order, preventing and detecting crime, and enforcing the laws.

examples.en: The police officer helped the lost child find his parents.
examples.ko: 경찰관은 길을 잃은 아이가 부모님을 찾도록 도와주었다.

meanings.english: A course or principle of action adopted or proposed by a government, party, business, or individual.

examples.en: The company has a strict policy against harassment in the workplace.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 직장 내 괴롭힘에 대해 엄격한 정책을 가지고 있다.

meanings.english: to make something smooth and shiny by rubbing

examples.en: She polished her shoes before the party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파티 전에 신발을 닦았다.

meanings.english: showing good manners towards others

examples.en: It is polite to say 'thank you' when someone helps you.
examples.ko: 누군가가 도와줄 때 '고마워'라고 말하는 것이 예의바르다.

meanings.english: activities related to making decisions for a country or area

examples.en: She studied politics in college to understand how governments work.
examples.ko: 그녀는 정부가 어떻게 작동하는지 이해하기 위해 대학에서 정치를 공부했다.

meanings.english: a survey of people's opinions or voting intentions

examples.en: The poll showed that most people prefer to travel by car.
examples.ko: 그 여론조사는 대부분의 사람들이 차로 여행하는 것을 선호한다는 것을 보여줬다.

meanings.english: to make air, water, or soil dirty or harmful to people, animals, and plants

examples.en: Factory waste can pollute rivers and harm aquatic life.
examples.ko: 공장 폐기물은 강을 오염시키고 수생생물에 해를 끼칠 수 있다.

meanings.english: a small area of still water, often man-made

examples.en: Children love to feed the ducks at the pond in the park.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 공원의 연못에서 오리에게 먹이를 주는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: a small area of still water, often man-made, used for swimming

examples.en: Let's meet at the pool after school for a swim.
examples.ko: 수업 후 수영을 하기 위해 수영장에서 만나자.

meanings.english: having little money or few possessions

examples.en: The poor family couldn't afford to buy new clothes.
examples.ko: 가난한 가족은 새 옷을 살 여유가 없었다.

meanings.english: to make a short, sharp, explosive sound

examples.en: The balloon popped suddenly.
examples.ko: 풍선이 갑자기 터졌다.

meanings.english: liked or enjoyed by many people

examples.en: K-pop is very popular around the world.
examples.ko: K-pop은 전 세계에서 매우 인기가 있다.

meanings.english: to live in; to inhabit

examples.en: Many people populate the city.
examples.ko: 많은 사람들이 그 도시에 거주하고 있다.

meanings.english: meat from a pig

examples.en: I don't eat pork because I'm a vegetarian.
examples.ko: 나는 채식주의자라서 돼지고기를 먹지 않아.

meanings.english: a place on the coast where ships can dock

examples.en: The cruise ship arrived at the port early in the morning.
examples.ko: 크루즈 선박이 아침 일찍 항구에 도착했다.

meanings.english: a part of a whole; a share

examples.en: She only ate a small portion of her meal.
examples.ko: 그녀는 식사의 작은 부분만 먹었다.

meanings.english: a painting, drawing, or photograph of a person

examples.en: The artist painted a beautiful portrait of the queen.
examples.ko: 작가는 여왕의 아름다운 초상화를 그렸다.

meanings.english: to present oneself in a particular way

examples.en: The model posed for the photographer.
examples.ko: 모델이 사진작가를 위해 자세를 취했다.

meanings.english: to assume as a fact or principle

examples.en: She posited that the theory was flawed.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그 이론이 결함이 있다고 가정했다.

meanings.english: to have as belonging to one; own

examples.en: He possesses great talent in music.
examples.ko: 그는 음악에 대한 큰 재능을 소유하고 있다.

meanings.english: able to be done; within the power or capacity of someone or something

examples.en: It is possible to achieve your dreams with hard work.
examples.ko: 열심히 노력한다면 꿈을 이룰 수 있다.

meanings.english: to display or announce in a public place

examples.en: Please post the notice on the bulletin board.
examples.ko: 게시판에 공지를 올려주세요.

meanings.english: a container, typically rounded and made of metal or ceramic, used for cooking

examples.en: She boiled water in a large pot.
examples.ko: 그녀는 큰 냄비에 물을 끓였다.

meanings.english: a starchy plant tuber that is one of the most important food crops, cooked and eaten as a vegetable

examples.en: She mashed the potatoes to make creamy mashed potatoes.
examples.ko: 그녀는 감자를 으깨서 부드러운 감자맛탕을 만들었다.

meanings.english: having or showing the capacity to become or develop into something in the future

examples.en: She has the potential to be a great leader.
examples.ko: 그녀는 훌륭한 리더가 될 잠재력을 갖고 있다.

meanings.english: to cause a liquid to flow from a container in a steady stream

examples.en: She poured the milk into a glass.
examples.ko: 그녀는 우유를 유리잔에 붓았다.

meanings.english: A substance in the form of very small dry particles

examples.en: She applied face powder before going out.
examples.ko: 그녀는 외출 전에 파우더를 발랐다.

meanings.english: The ability to do something or act in a particular way

examples.en: With great power comes great responsibility.
examples.ko: 위대한 힘에는 큰 책임이 따른다.

meanings.english: Relating to what is real rather than to what is possible or imagined

examples.en: Learning how to cook is a practical skill.
examples.ko: 요리하는 법을 배우는 것은 실용적인 기술이다.

meanings.english: Repetition of an activity to improve skill

examples.en: Regular practice is essential for mastering a musical instrument.
examples.ko: 정기적인 연습은 악기를 숙달하는 데 필수적이다.

meanings.english: Expressing approval or admiration for someone or something

examples.en: She received praise for her outstanding performance.
examples.ko: 그녀는 훌륭한 성과로 칭찬을 받았다.

meanings.english: To communicate with a deity, especially to make a request or give thanks

examples.en: People often pray for good health and happiness.
examples.ko: 사람들은 종종 건강과 행복을 위해 기도한다.

meanings.english: To publicly proclaim or teach a religious message

examples.en: The priest preached about forgiveness and compassion.
examples.ko: 사제는 용서와 동정에 대해 설교했다.

meanings.english: To come before something in time or order

examples.en: The opening ceremony will precede the main event.
examples.ko: 개막식은 본 행사 앞서 진행될 것이다.

meanings.english: Exactly or sharply defined or stated

examples.en: She gave a precise answer to the question.
examples.ko: 그녀는 질문에 정확하게 대답했다.

meanings.english: An animal that preys on others

examples.en: The lion is a fierce predator in the wild.
examples.ko: 사자는 야생에서 사나운 포식자이다.

meanings.english: To say or estimate that (a specified thing) will happen in the future

examples.en: The weather forecast predicts rain tomorrow.
examples.ko: 날씨 예보는 내일 비가 올 것으로 예측하고 있다.

meanings.english: To like (one thing or person) better than another or others

examples.en: I prefer tea to coffee in the morning.
examples.ko: 나는 아침에 커피보다 차를 선호한다.

meanings.english: Carrying a developing embryo or fetus within the body

examples.en: She is pregnant and expecting a baby in six months.
examples.ko: 그녀는 임신하고 6개월 후에 아기를 낳을 예정이다.

meanings.english: Preconceived opinion that is not based on reason or actual experience

examples.en: She was a victim of prejudice because of her race.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신의 인종 때문에 편견의 피해자가 되었다.

meanings.english: An amount to be paid for an insurance policy

examples.en: The premium for health insurance increased this year.
examples.ko: 올해 건강 보험료가 인상되었다.

meanings.english: To make (something) ready for use or consideration

examples.en: She needs to prepare for the exam next week.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다음 주 시험을 위해 준비해야 한다.

meanings.english: To recommend and authorize the use of a medicine or treatment

examples.en: The doctor will prescribe antibiotics for your infection.
examples.ko: 의사는 당신의 감염에 항생제를 처방할 것입니다.

meanings.english: The state of being present in a particular place

examples.en: His presence in the meeting made everyone feel more comfortable.
examples.ko: 그의 존재로 모임에 있는 모든 사람들이 더 편안해졌다.

meanings.english: Existing or occurring now

examples.en: The teacher is present in the classroom.
examples.ko: 선생님은 교실에 계십니다.

meanings.english: To maintain something in its original state

examples.en: It is important to preserve our environment for future generations.
examples.ko: 미래 세대를 위해 우리의 환경을 보존하는 것이 중요합니다.

meanings.english: To be in charge of a formal meeting or event

examples.en: The president will preside over the ceremony.
examples.ko: 대통령이 그식을 주재할 것입니다.

meanings.english: To apply pressure on something to flatten or shape it

examples.en: Please press the button to start the machine.
examples.ko: 기계를 가동시키기 위해 버튼을 눌러주세요.

meanings.english: To suppose that something is the case without proof

examples.en: I presume you have already finished your homework.
examples.ko: 당신이 이미 숙제를 끝냈다고 가정합니다.

meanings.english: To behave as if something is true when it is not

examples.en: The children like to pretend they are pirates on a ship.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 배 위의 해적인 척을 하는 것을 좋아합니다.

meanings.english: attractive in a delicate way without being truly beautiful

examples.en: She wore a pretty dress to the party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파티에 예쁜 드레스를 입었다.

meanings.english: to be widespread or current; to be in general use or acceptance

examples.en: Despite the challenges, positivity will prevail.
examples.ko: 도전에도 불구하고 긍정적인 분위기가 만연할 것이다.

meanings.english: to stop something from happening or someone from doing something

examples.en: Regular exercise can help prevent many health problems.
examples.ko: 규칙적인 운동은 많은 건강 문제를 예방하는 데 도움이 될 수 있다.

meanings.english: existing or occurring before in time or order

examples.en: Please refer to the previous chapter for more information.
examples.ko: 더 많은 정보를 원하시면 이전 장을 참조해주세요.

meanings.english: an animal that is hunted and killed by another for food

examples.en: The lion stalked its prey in the savanna.
examples.ko: 사자가 사바나에서 먹이를 추적했다.

meanings.english: the amount of money for which something is bought, sold, or offered for sale

examples.en: The price of the car was too high for me to afford.
examples.ko: 나에게는 너무 비싼 차의 가격이었다.

meanings.english: a feeling of deep pleasure or satisfaction derived from one's own achievements

examples.en: She felt a sense of pride after winning the competition.
examples.ko: 그녀는 대회에서 우승한 후 긍지를 느꼈다.

meanings.english: a person who is ordained for religious duties and can perform certain rites and sacraments

examples.en: The priest conducted the wedding ceremony at the church.
examples.ko: 신부가 교회에서 결혼식을 진행했다.

meanings.english: of the best possible quality; chief; most important

examples.en: She is in the prime of her life.
examples.ko: 그녀는 인생의 전성기에 있다.

meanings.english: relating to an early stage in the development of something

examples.en: The tribe still lives in primitive conditions.
examples.ko: 그 부족은 아직 원시적인 환경에서 살고 있다.

meanings.english: a male member of a royal family, especially a son of the king or queen

examples.en: The prince rode through the town on a white horse.
examples.ko: 왕자는 흰 말을 타고 마을을 통과했다.

meanings.english: main; most important

examples.en: The principal reason for his success is hard work.
examples.ko: 그의 성공의 주요 이유는 노력이다.

meanings.english: a fundamental truth or proposition that serves as the foundation for a system of belief or behavior

examples.en: She always sticks to her principles.
examples.ko: 그녀는 항상 자신의 원칙을 지킨다.

meanings.english: to produce a text or picture on paper, typically using a printer; a newspaper or magazine

examples.en: I need to print this document for the meeting.
examples.ko: 회의를 위해 이 문서를 출력해야 해.

meanings.english: existing or coming before in time, order, or importance

examples.en: Please inform us prior to your arrival.
examples.ko: 도착 전에 미리 알려주세요.

meanings.english: a building where people are legally held as a punishment for a crime they have committed or while awaiting trial

examples.en: He spent five years in prison for robbery.
examples.ko: 그는 강도 혐의로 5년간 감옥에서 보냈다.

meanings.english: The state of being free from public attention or observation.

examples.en: She values her privacy and doesn't like sharing personal information online.
examples.ko: 그녀는 사생활을 소중히 여기며 온라인에서 개인 정보를 공유하는 것을 싫어합니다.

meanings.english: Belonging to or for the use of one particular person or group of people only.

examples.en: He has a private office where he can work without distractions.
examples.ko: 그는 방해받지 않고 일할 수 있는 사적인 사무실을 가지고 있습니다.

meanings.english: A special right, advantage, or immunity granted or available only to a particular person or group.

examples.en: Having access to quality education is a privilege that not everyone around the world enjoys.
examples.ko: 우수한 교육에 접근할 수 있는 것은 전 세계의 모든 사람이 즐기지 못하는 특권입니다.

meanings.english: A thing given as a reward to the winner of a competition or in recognition of an achievement.

examples.en: She won first prize in the art contest for her beautiful painting.
examples.ko: 그녀는 아름다운 그림으로 예술 대회에서 1등 상을 받았습니다.

meanings.english: Likely to be true or to happen.

examples.en: Based on the dark clouds, it is probable that it will rain soon.
examples.ko: 어두운 구름을 보면 곧 비가 올 가능성이 높습니다.

meanings.english: A matter or situation regarded as unwelcome or harmful and needing to be dealt with and overcome.

examples.en: She solved the math problem by carefully following the steps in the textbook.
examples.ko: 그녀는 교과서에 나온 단계를 주의 깊게 따라가며 수학 문제를 해결했습니다.

meanings.english: Begin or continue a course of action.

examples.en: After the meeting, they decided to proceed with the plan to launch a new product.
examples.ko: 회의 끝나고, 그들은 새 제품 출시 계획을 진행하기로 결정했습니다.

meanings.english: A series of actions or steps taken in order to achieve a particular end.

examples.en: The manufacturing process of the car involves various stages from design to assembly.
examples.ko: 자동차의 제조 과정은 설계부터 조립까지 다양한 단계를 거칩니다.

meanings.english: To make or create something

examples.en: Farmers produce fruits and vegetables.
examples.ko: 농부들은 과일과 채소를 생산합니다.

meanings.english: A paid occupation, especially one that requires advanced training or education

examples.en: Being a doctor is a respected profession.
examples.ko: 의사가 되는 것은 존경받는 직업입니다.

meanings.english: A teacher of the highest rank in a college or university

examples.en: The professor explained the complex theory clearly.
examples.ko: 교수님은 복잡한 이론을 명확하게 설명했습니다.

meanings.english: A brief description or outline of a person or organization

examples.en: She updated her social media profile picture.
examples.ko: 그녀는 소셜 미디어 프로필 사진을 업데이트했습니다.

meanings.english: The financial gain made from a business transaction

examples.en: The company's profit increased this year.
examples.ko: 그 회사의 이익이 올해 증가했습니다.

meanings.english: Having deep insight or understanding

examples.en: The philosopher shared a profound thought about life.
examples.ko: 철학자는 인생에 대한 심오한 생각을 나누었습니다.

meanings.english: A planned series of activities or events

examples.en: The school organized a talent show program.
examples.ko: 학교는 재능 발휘 대회 프로그램을 조직했습니다.

meanings.english: Forward or onward movement towards a destination or goal

examples.en: Studying regularly helps you make progress in your learning.
examples.ko: 규칙적으로 공부하는 것은 학습에서 진전을 이루는 데 도움이 됩니다.

meanings.english: To forbid by authority

examples.en: Smoking is prohibited in this area.
examples.ko: 이 지역에서는 흡연이 금지되어 있습니다.

meanings.english: A planned undertaking

examples.en: She presented her project to the class.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신의 계획을 수업에 발표했습니다.

meanings.english: Standing out so as to be easily seen; important

examples.en: The prominent building in the city is the tallest skyscraper.
examples.ko: 도시에서 가장 두드러진 건물은 가장 높은 초고층 건물입니다.

meanings.english: To assure that one will do, give, or arrange something

examples.en: He promised to help her with her homework.
examples.ko: 그는 숙제를 도와주겠다고 약속했습니다.

meanings.english: To help or encourage something to develop or increase

examples.en: The company decided to promote her to a higher position.
examples.ko: 회사는 그녀를 더 높은 직책으로 승진시키기로 결정했습니다.

meanings.english: Done without delay; on time

examples.en: She gave a prompt response to the question.
examples.ko: 그녀는 질문에 신속하게 대답했습니다.

meanings.english: To make the sound of a word in the correct way

examples.en: Can you pronounce this word correctly?
examples.ko: 이 단어를 제대로 발음할 수 있나요?

meanings.english: Evidence that shows something is true or correct

examples.en: She provided proof of her innocence.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신의 결백을 입증하는 증거를 제시했습니다.

meanings.english: Suitable or correct for a particular purpose or situation

examples.en: It's important to wear proper attire for the job interview.
examples.ko: 면접 때 적절한 복장을 입는 것이 중요하다.

meanings.english: Something owned by a person or entity

examples.en: He inherited a large property from his grandparents.
examples.ko: 그는 할아버지와 할머니로부터 큰 재산을 상속받았다.

meanings.english: A part, share, or number considered in relation to a whole

examples.en: The proportion of boys to girls in the class is almost equal.
examples.ko: 수업에 있는 남자 학생들과 여자 학생들의 비율은 거의 같다.

meanings.english: To suggest a plan or idea for others to consider

examples.en: He proposed a new project to improve the company's efficiency.
examples.ko: 그는 회사의 효율성을 향상시키기 위한 새로운 프로젝트를 제안했다.

meanings.english: The possibility or likelihood of something happening in the future

examples.en: There is a good prospect of finding a job with your qualifications.
examples.ko: 당신의 자격으로 일자리를 찾을 가능성이 높다.

meanings.english: To be successful or thrive, especially financially

examples.en: The business prospered after implementing the new marketing strategy.
examples.ko: 새로운 마케팅 전략을 시행한 후에 비즈니스가 번창했다.

meanings.english: To keep safe from harm, damage, or danger

examples.en: It is important to protect the environment for future generations.
examples.ko: 미래 세대를 위해 환경을 보호하는 것이 중요하다.

meanings.english: A vital nutrient that helps build and repair body tissues

examples.en: Eggs and meat are good sources of protein for a balanced diet.
examples.ko: 계란과 고기는 균형 잡힌 식사를 위한 좋은 단백질 공급원이다.

meanings.english: to express strong disapproval or objection

examples.en: Many people gathered to protest against the new law.
examples.ko: 많은 사람들이 새로운 법에 항의하기 위해 모였다.

meanings.english: feeling deep pleasure or satisfaction as a result of one's own achievements

examples.en: She felt proud of her younger brother for winning the competition.
examples.ko: 그녀는 동생이 대회에서 우승해서 자랑스러웠다.

meanings.english: to demonstrate the truth or existence of something

examples.en: He had to prove his innocence in court.
examples.ko: 그는 법정에서 자신의 결백을 증명해야 했다.

meanings.english: to supply or make available for use

examples.en: The school cafeteria provides students with nutritious meals.
examples.ko: 학교 구내 식당은 학생들에게 영양가 있는 식사를 제공한다.

meanings.english: a territory governed as an administrative or political unit of a country or empire

examples.en: Jeju Island is a province in South Korea.
examples.ko: 제주도는 대한민국의 한 도이다.

meanings.english: to deliberately make someone angry or annoyed

examples.en: He tried not to provoke his little sister during their argument.
examples.ko: 그는 다툼 중에 여동생을 화나게 하지 않으려고 노력했다.

meanings.english: the scientific study of the human mind and behavior

examples.en: She decided to major in psychology to understand human behavior better.
examples.ko: 그녀는 인간 행동을 더 잘 이해하기 위해 심리학을 전공하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: a place where alcoholic drinks are served and consumed

examples.en: After work, they went to a nearby pub for a drink.
examples.ko: 일이 끝난 후, 그들은 근처 주점에 한 잔 하러 갔다.

meanings.english: relating to or involving people in general, not just a particular group

examples.en: The event is open to the public.
examples.ko: 이 행사는 대중에게 공개되어 있습니다.

meanings.english: to make information available to people, especially by printing it in a book, magazine, etc.

examples.en: The author will publish a new book next month.
examples.ko: 작가는 다음 달에 새 책을 발표할 것입니다.

meanings.english: to hold something firmly and use force in order to bring it towards yourself or towards the thing that you are holding

examples.en: She pulled the door open.
examples.ko: 그녀는 문을 당겼다.

meanings.english: a machine that is used to force liquid, gas, or air into or out of something

examples.en: The pump is used to inflate the tires.
examples.ko: 펌프는 타이어를 부풀리는 데 사용됩니다.

meanings.english: a forceful hit with a fist

examples.en: He gave a powerful punch to the punching bag.
examples.ko: 그는 펀칭백에 강력한 주먹질을 했다.

meanings.english: to make someone suffer because they have done something wrong or broken the law

examples.en: Parents should not punish their children harshly.
examples.ko: 부모는 자녀를 가혹하게 처벌해서는 안 됩니다.

meanings.english: a student in school

examples.en: The teacher asked the pupils to solve the math problem.
examples.ko: 선생님은 학생들에게 수학 문제를 풀라고 했다.

meanings.english: a young dog

examples.en: The family adopted a cute puppy from the shelter.
examples.ko: 가족은 보호소에서 귀여운 강아지를 입양했다.

meanings.english: to buy something

examples.en: I need to purchase some new clothes for the party.
examples.ko: 파티를 위해 새 옷을 사야 해.

meanings.english: not mixed with anything else; clean and clear

examples.en: The water in the mountain stream is pure and refreshing.
examples.ko: 산 계곡의 물은 순수하고 상쾌해.

meanings.english: a color that is a mix of blue and red; having a color between red and blue

examples.en: She wore a beautiful purple dress to the party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파티에 아름다운 보라색 드레스를 입었어.

meanings.english: the reason for which something is done or created; the goal or intention behind an action

examples.en: Studying hard with a purpose will help you achieve your goals.
examples.ko: 목적을 갖고 열심히 공부하면 목표를 이룰 수 있어.

meanings.english: to follow or chase after someone or something; to try to achieve something

examples.en: She decided to pursue a career in music after graduating from college.
examples.ko: 대학을 졸업한 후 음악 분야에서의 경력을 추구하기로 결심했어.

meanings.english: to apply force in order to move something away from oneself or the origin of the force

examples.en: Please push the door to open it.
examples.ko: 문을 열기 위해 밀어주세요.

meanings.english: to place something in a particular position

examples.en: Put your books on the shelf when you finish studying.
examples.ko: 공부를 끝내면 책을 책장에 놓아.

meanings.english: a game, toy, or problem designed to test ingenuity or knowledge

examples.en: Solving a jigsaw puzzle can be a fun way to spend time with friends.
examples.ko: 지그소 퍼즐을 푸는 것은 친구들과 시간을 보내는 재미있는 방법일 수 있어.

meanings.english: The standard of something as measured against other things of a similar kind; the degree of excellence of something.

examples.en: She always ensures the quality of her work is top-notch.
examples.ko: 그녀는 항상 자신의 작업의 품질이 최고 수준임을 보장합니다.

meanings.english: The amount or number of something, especially that can be measured.

examples.en: Please specify the quantity of apples you would like to order.
examples.ko: 주문하고 싶은 사과의 양을 명시해 주세요.

meanings.english: One of four equal or corresponding parts into which something is or can be divided.

examples.en: The year is divided into four quarters for financial reporting purposes.
examples.ko: 재무 보고 목적으로 1년은 4분기로 나누어집니다.

meanings.english: The female ruler of an independent state, especially one who inherits the position by right of birth.

examples.en: Queen Elizabeth II is the longest-reigning monarch in British history.
examples.ko: 엘리자베스 2세 여왕은 영국 역사상 가장 오래 통치한 군주입니다.

meanings.english: A sentence worded or expressed so as to elicit information.

examples.en: I have a question for the teacher about the homework assignment.
examples.ko: 선생님께 숙제 과제에 대한 질문이 있습니다.

meanings.english: A set of questions for obtaining statistically useful or personal information from individuals.

examples.en: Please fill out the questionnaire to provide feedback on your shopping experience.
examples.ko: 쇼핑 경험에 대한 피드백을 제공하기 위해 설문지를 작성해 주세요.

meanings.english: Moving fast or doing something in a short time; prompt.

examples.en: She has a quick mind and can solve problems efficiently.
examples.ko: 그녀는 빠른 두뇌를 가지고 있어 문제를 효율적으로 해결할 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: Making little or no noise; free of loud sounds.

examples.en: The library is a quiet place for studying and reading.
examples.ko: 도서관은 공부와 독서를 위한 조용한 장소입니다.

meanings.english: to leave or resign from something

examples.en: I decided to quit my job and travel the world.
examples.ko: 나는 일을 그만두고 세계를 여행하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: fairly, rather

examples.en: The movie was quite interesting.
examples.ko: 영화는 상당히 흥미로웠다.

meanings.english: a test of knowledge, typically as a game or competition

examples.en: We had a quiz in class today.
examples.ko: 오늘 수업시간에 퀴즈를 봤다.

meanings.english: to repeat or copy out a group of words from a text or speech

examples.en: She quoted a famous line from the movie.
examples.ko: 그녀는 영화에서 유명한 대사를 인용했다.

meanings.english: a small mammal with long ears, long hind legs, and a short tail

examples.en: The rabbit hopped around the garden.
examples.ko: 토끼가 정원 주변을 뛰어다녔다.

meanings.english: a competition of speed

examples.en: The runners lined up at the start of the race.
examples.ko: 달리기 선수들이 경주 시작 지점에 줄을 섰다.

meanings.english: a device for receiving broadcast sound programs

examples.en: I listen to the radio every morning while getting ready for school.
examples.ko: 나는 학교를 준비하는 동안 매일 아침 라디오를 듣는다.

meanings.english: violent, uncontrollable anger

examples.en: His rage was so intense that he couldn't control himself.
examples.ko: 그의 분노는 너무 강해서 그는 스스로를 제어할 수 없었다.

meanings.english: A track or set of tracks made of steel rails on which trains run.

examples.en: The train runs on the rail.
examples.ko: 기차는 철로 위를 달린다.

meanings.english: Water that falls from the sky in drops.

examples.en: I forgot my umbrella, so I got wet in the rain.
examples.ko: 우산을 깜빡해서 비에 젖었어.

meanings.english: A natural display in the sky of a spectrum of colors.

examples.en: After the rain, a beautiful rainbow appeared in the sky.
examples.ko: 비가 그친 뒤 아름다운 무지개가 하늘에 나타났다.

meanings.english: To move or lift something to a higher position.

examples.en: She raised her hand to ask a question.
examples.ko: 그녀는 질문을 하기 위해 손을 올렸다.

meanings.english: A large public meeting to support or oppose something.

examples.en: The students held a rally to protest against the new school policy.
examples.ko: 학생들은 새로운 학교 정책에 반대하기 위해 집회를 열었다.

meanings.english: Happening, done, or chosen by chance rather than according to a plan.

examples.en: He picked a random book from the shelf to read.
examples.ko: 그는 책장에서 무작위로 책을 골라서 읽었다.

meanings.english: The area of variation between upper and lower limits on a particular scale.

examples.en: The price range for the new phone is $500 to $800.
examples.ko: 새 핸드폰의 가격 범위는 500달러부터 800달러까지이다.

meanings.english: A position in a hierarchy or scale.

examples.en: She achieved the top rank in her class.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신의 반에서 최상위 순위를 달성했다.

meanings.english: happening or moving quickly

examples.en: The rapid growth of technology has changed our lives.
examples.ko: 기술의 빠른 발전이 우리 삶을 바꿨다.

meanings.english: not occurring very often

examples.en: It is rare to see snow in this region.
examples.ko: 이 지역에서 눈을 보는 것은 드물다.

meanings.english: a small rodent with a long tail

examples.en: There was a rat in the kitchen last night.
examples.ko: 어젯밤에 부엌에 쥐가 있었다.

meanings.english: a measure of the speed at which something happens

examples.en: The crime rate in the city has decreased.
examples.ko: 그 도시의 범죄율이 감소했다.

meanings.english: used to indicate one's preference in a particular situation

examples.en: I would rather stay home than go out in this weather.
examples.ko: 이 날씨에 나는 집에 머물러 있는 게 더 좋다.

meanings.english: based on or in accordance with reason or logic

examples.en: It is important to make rational decisions in difficult situations.
examples.ko: 어려운 상황에서 합리적인 결정을 내리는 것이 중요하다.

meanings.english: in its natural state; not cooked or processed

examples.en: I prefer to eat raw vegetables for better health.
examples.ko: 더 좋은 건강을 위해 날견 야채를 먹는 것을 선호한다.

meanings.english: to arrive at a place, especially after a journey

examples.en: With hard work, you can reach your goals.
examples.ko: 열심히 노력하면 목표를 달성할 수 있다.

meanings.english: to respond or behave in a particular way in response to something

examples.en: She reacted angrily to the news.
examples.ko: 그녀는 뉴스에 화를 내며 반응했다.

meanings.english: to look at and understand the meaning of written or printed words or symbols

examples.en: I like to read books in my free time.
examples.ko: 나는 여가 시간에 책을 읽는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: prepared or in a suitable state for an activity, action, or situation

examples.en: The food is ready to eat.
examples.ko: 음식이 먹을 준비가 되어 있다.

meanings.english: actually existing as a thing or occurring in fact; not imagined or supposed

examples.en: This is a real diamond.
examples.ko: 이것은 진짜 다이아몬드이다.

meanings.english: the back part of something

examples.en: The car hit the rear of the truck.
examples.ko: 차가 트럭의 뒷부분에 부딪혔다.

meanings.english: a cause, explanation, or justification for an action or event

examples.en: There is no reason for you to be upset.
examples.ko: 당신이 화를 내야 할 이유가 없어.

meanings.english: to resist or defy an authority, control, or tradition

examples.en: The students rebelled against the new school rules.
examples.ko: 학생들은 새로운 학교 규칙에 반항했다.

meanings.english: a written acknowledgment that something, usually money or goods, has been received

examples.en: Don't forget to ask for a receipt after your purchase.
examples.ko: 구매 후 영수증을 요청하는 것을 잊지 마세요.

meanings.english: to get or accept something sent or given to you

examples.en: I will receive a gift from my friend.
examples.ko: 친구로부터 선물을 받을 거야.

meanings.english: happening or starting from a short time ago

examples.en: I read a recent article about climate change.
examples.ko: 최근 기후 변화에 관한 기사를 읽었어.

meanings.english: a set of instructions for preparing a particular dish

examples.en: I followed a recipe to make chocolate chip cookies.
examples.ko: 초콜릿 칩 쿠키를 만들기 위해 조리법을 따랐어.

meanings.english: to know someone or something because you have seen or heard him, her, or it before

examples.en: I can recognize my favorite singer's voice.
examples.ko: 내가 좋아하는 가수의 목소리를 인식할 수 있어.

meanings.english: to suggest that someone or something would be good or suitable for a particular job or purpose

examples.en: I recommend this book to anyone who loves adventure stories.
examples.ko: 모험 이야기를 좋아하는 사람에게 이 책을 추천해요.

meanings.english: a written account of something that is kept so that it can be looked at and used in the future

examples.en: I keep a record of my expenses in a notebook.
examples.ko: 나는 지출 내역을 노트에 기록해 놓아.

meanings.english: to become healthy, happy, or normal again after an illness, injury, or period of sadness

examples.en: I need to rest to recover from a cold.
examples.ko: 감기에서 회복하기 위해 쉬어야 해.

meanings.english: activities done for enjoyment when one is not working

examples.en: I like to go hiking for recreation on weekends.
examples.ko: 주말에 여가 활동으로 등산을 즐겨해.

meanings.english: to enlist someone for a job or organization

examples.en: The company is recruiting new employees.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 새 직원을 모집하고 있습니다.

meanings.english: having the color like blood or a ripe tomato

examples.en: She wore a beautiful red dress to the party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파티에 아름다운 빨간 드레스를 입었습니다.

meanings.english: to make something smaller in size, amount, or number

examples.en: Eating less sugar can help reduce the risk of diabetes.
examples.ko: 설탕 섭취를 줄이면 당뇨병 발병 위험을 줄일 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: to mention or direct someone to a source for information

examples.en: The teacher referred the students to the library for further research.
examples.ko: 선생님은 학생들을 더 깊은 연구를 위해 도서관으로 보냈습니다.

meanings.english: to improve something by making small changes

examples.en: The chef refined the recipe to make it taste even better.
examples.ko: 요리사는 레시피를 더 맛있게 만들기 위해 개선했습니다.

meanings.english: to show or be a sign of a particular situation or feeling

examples.en: Her smile reflected her happiness.
examples.ko: 그녀의 미소는 그녀의 행복을 반영했습니다.

meanings.english: to make changes in order to improve a system or organization

examples.en: The government promised to reform the education system.
examples.ko: 정부는 교육 시스템을 개혁하기로 약속했습니다.

meanings.english: to keep something cold in order to preserve it

examples.en: Please refrigerate the leftovers to keep them fresh.
examples.ko: 남은 음식을 신선하게 보관하기 위해 냉장해 주세요.

meanings.english: to decline to accept or agree to something

examples.en: She refused to help him with his project.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그의 프로젝트를 돕지 않기로 거절했다.

meanings.english: to consider or think of in a specified way

examples.en: He regards her as his best friend.
examples.ko: 그는 그녀를 자신의 가장 친한 친구로 여긴다.

meanings.english: an area, especially part of a country or the world

examples.en: This region is known for its beautiful landscapes.
examples.ko: 이 지역은 아름다운 풍경으로 유명하다.

meanings.english: to record or enter information in an official list or book

examples.en: Please register your name at the front desk.
examples.ko: 앞 책상에서 이름을 등록해주세요.

meanings.english: to feel sad, repentant, or disappointed over something that has happened or been done

examples.en: I regret not studying harder for the exam.
examples.ko: 시험을 더 열심히 공부하지 않아서 후회한다.

meanings.english: happening or doing something frequently or at uniform intervals

examples.en: She goes to the gym on a regular basis.
examples.ko: 그녀는 규칙적으로 체육관에 간다.

meanings.english: to control or maintain the rate or speed of something

examples.en: The government regulates the prices of certain goods.
examples.ko: 정부는 특정 상품의 가격을 규제한다.

meanings.english: to strengthen or support something, especially with additional material

examples.en: The teacher used positive feedback to reinforce good behavior.
examples.ko: 선생님은 긍정적인 피드백을 사용하여 좋은 행동을 강화했다.

meanings.english: to refuse to accept, consider, or use something

examples.en: She rejected his proposal.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그의 제안을 거부했다.

meanings.english: to make a connection between two or more things

examples.en: The teacher asked the students to relate the story to their own experiences.
examples.ko: 선생님은 학생들에게 그 이야기를 자신들의 경험에 연관시키라고 했다.

meanings.english: to become less tense or anxious; to rest or take leisure

examples.en: After a long day at work, she likes to relax by reading a book.
examples.ko: 긴 하루 일한 뒤, 그녀는 책을 읽으며 편안해지는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: to set free from confinement, obligation, or pain

examples.en: The company will release a new product next month.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 다음 달에 새 제품을 출시할 것이다.

meanings.english: closely connected or appropriate to what is being done or considered

examples.en: Please only include relevant information in your report.
examples.ko: 보고서에는 관련된 정보만 포함해 주세요.

meanings.english: a feeling of reassurance and relaxation following release from anxiety or distress

examples.en: He sighed with relief when he found his lost wallet.
examples.ko: 분실한 지갑을 찾았을 때 그는 안도하며 한숨을 쉬었다.

meanings.english: to make (pain, distress, or difficulty) less severe or serious

examples.en: Taking a warm bath can help relieve muscle pain.
examples.ko: 따뜻한 목욕을 하는 것은 근육통을 경감시키는 데 도움이 된다.

meanings.english: a particular system of faith and worship

examples.en: Many people find comfort and guidance in their religion.
examples.ko: 많은 사람들이 종교에서 안정과 지침을 찾는다.

meanings.english: unwilling or hesitant

examples.en: She was reluctant to speak in front of the class.
examples.ko: 그녀는 수업 중에 말하기를 꺼렸다.

meanings.english: to depend on with confidence

examples.en: I rely on my friends for support during tough times.
examples.ko: 어려운 시기에는 친구들에게 의지한다.

meanings.english: to stay in the same place or condition

examples.en: Please remain seated until the bus comes to a complete stop.
examples.ko: 버스가 완전히 멈출 때까지 앉아 계세요.

meanings.english: to say something about or comment on something

examples.en: She remarked on how beautiful the flowers were.
examples.ko: 그녀는 꽃이 얼마나 아름다운지 언급했다.

meanings.english: a solution or treatment for a problem or illness

examples.en: Drinking plenty of water is a simple remedy for a headache.
examples.ko: 물을 많이 마시는 것은 두통의 간단한 치료법이다.

meanings.english: to recall information from the past

examples.en: I always remember my grandmother's wise words.
examples.ko: 나는 항상 할머니의 지혜로운 말을 기억한다.

meanings.english: to cause someone to remember something

examples.en: Please remind me to buy milk on the way home.
examples.ko: 집에 가는 길에 우유를 사야 한다고 일깨워 주세요.

meanings.english: distant or far away in space or time

examples.en: They lived in a remote village with no access to modern technology.
examples.ko: 그들은 현대 기술에 접근할 수 없는 외진 마을에 살았다.

meanings.english: To take something away or off

examples.en: Please remove your shoes before entering the house.
examples.ko: 집에 들어가기 전에 신발을 벗어 주세요.

meanings.english: To pay money to use something for a period of time

examples.en: We decided to rent a car for our road trip.
examples.ko: 우리는 로드 트립을 위해 차를 빌리기로 결정했습니다.

meanings.english: To fix something that is broken or damaged

examples.en: The mechanic will repair my car tomorrow.
examples.ko: 수리공이 내 차를 내일 고칠 것입니다.

meanings.english: To do or say something again

examples.en: Can you repeat what you just said?
examples.ko: 지금 말한 것을 다시 말해 줄 수 있나요?

meanings.english: To put something new in the place of something old or broken

examples.en: I need to replace the batteries in my remote control.
examples.ko: 리모컨의 배터리를 교체해야 합니다.

meanings.english: To say or write something in response to something that has been said or written

examples.en: He replied to my email within minutes.
examples.ko: 그는 몇 분 안에 내 이메일에 회신했습니다.

meanings.english: To give an account of something that has happened

examples.en: The students will report their findings to the teacher.
examples.ko: 학생들은 발견한 것을 선생님께 보고할 것입니다.

meanings.english: To act or speak officially for someone or something

examples.en: The elected official will represent our district in the parliament.
examples.ko: 선출된 공직자가 국회에서 우리 지역을 대표할 것입니다.

meanings.english: A country that is governed by elected representatives and by an elected leader (such as a president) rather than by a king or queen

examples.en: South Korea is a democratic republic.
examples.ko: 한국은 민주공화국이다.

meanings.english: The opinion that people have about someone or something based on their behavior or character

examples.en: She has a good reputation for being honest.
examples.ko: 그녀는 정직한 평판을 가지고 있다.

meanings.english: The act of asking for something in a polite or formal way

examples.en: I sent a request for more information.
examples.ko: 더 많은 정보를 요청했다.

meanings.english: To need something; to make it necessary for someone to do something

examples.en: This job requires good communication skills.
examples.ko: 이 직업은 좋은 커뮤니케이션 기술이 필요하다.

meanings.english: To save someone or something from a dangerous or harmful situation

examples.en: The firefighters rescued the cat from the burning building.
examples.ko: 소방대가 불타는 건물에서 고양이를 구조했다.

meanings.english: The detailed study of a subject, especially in order to discover (new) information or reach a new understanding

examples.en: She is conducting research on climate change.
examples.ko: 그녀는 기후 변화에 대한 연구를 진행하고 있다.

meanings.english: To look like or be similar to someone or something

examples.en: The twins resemble each other a lot.
examples.ko: 쌍둥이들은 많이 닮았다.

meanings.english: To keep something for a particular purpose or time

examples.en: I reserved a table at the restaurant for tonight.
examples.ko: 오늘 밤을 위해 식당에 테이블을 예약했다.

meanings.english: to live in a particular place

examples.en: She resides in a small town.
examples.ko: 그녀는 작은 마을에 거주하고 있습니다.

meanings.english: to quit a job or position

examples.en: He decided to resign from his job.
examples.ko: 그는 직장에서 사임하기로 결정했습니다.

meanings.english: to try to stop or fight against something

examples.en: She resisted the temptation to eat the cake.
examples.ko: 그녀는 케이크를 먹는 유혹에 저항했습니다.

meanings.english: to find a solution to a problem

examples.en: They resolved the issue through discussion.
examples.ko: 그들은 토론을 통해 문제를 해결했습니다.

meanings.english: a place where people go for relaxation or recreation

examples.en: They decided to spend their vacation at a beach resort.
examples.ko: 그들은 휴가를 해변 리조트에서 보내기로 결정했습니다.

meanings.english: a source of help or support

examples.en: The library is a great resource for students.
examples.ko: 도서관은 학생들에게 큰 도움이 되는 자원입니다.

meanings.english: to show admiration and consideration for someone

examples.en: It is important to respect others' opinions.
examples.ko: 다른 사람들의 의견을 존중하는 것이 중요합니다.

meanings.english: to reply or react to something

examples.en: She quickly responded to the email.
examples.ko: 그녀는 이메일에 빠르게 대답했습니다.

meanings.english: Having an obligation to do something, or having control over or care for someone, as part of one's job or role.

examples.en: She is a responsible student who always completes her homework on time.
examples.ko: 시간 내에 항상 숙제를 끝내는 책임감 있는 학생입니다.

meanings.english: A period of relaxing, sleeping, or not working.

examples.en: After a long day at school, she needed to rest and recharge her energy.
examples.ko: 학교에서 긴 하루를 보낸 후, 그녀는 휴식을 취하고 에너지를 충전해야 했습니다.

meanings.english: A place where people pay to sit and eat meals that are cooked and served on the premises.

examples.en: They decided to have dinner at a fancy restaurant to celebrate their anniversary.
examples.ko: 그들은 기념일을 축하하기 위해 고급 음식점에서 저녁 식사를 하기로 결정했습니다.

meanings.english: To bring back to a former or original condition, place, or position.

examples.en: The old house was beautifully restored to its former glory.
examples.ko: 그 오래된 집은 아름답게 복구되어 원래의 영광을 되찾았습니다.

meanings.english: To prevent someone or something from doing something, especially by using physical strength or force.

examples.en: He had to restrain himself from laughing during the serious meeting.
examples.ko: 그는 진지한 회의 중에 웃음을 참아야 했습니다.

meanings.english: To limit or control someone or something.

examples.en: The new rules restrict the use of mobile phones in the school building.
examples.ko: 새 규칙은 학교 건물 내에서의 휴대전화 사용을 제한합니다.

meanings.english: A room equipped with facilities for washing and relieving oneself, typically containing a toilet and sink.

examples.en: Excuse me, where is the restroom in this building?
examples.ko: 실례합니다, 이 건물에 화장실이 어디에 있나요?

meanings.english: A consequence, effect, or outcome of something occurring earlier.

examples.en: Studying hard usually leads to good results in exams.
examples.ko: 열심히 공부하는 것은 보통 시험에서 좋은 결과로 이어집니다.

meanings.english: to begin again after stopping

examples.en: After a short break, he will resume his work on the project.
examples.ko: 짧은 휴식 후, 그는 프로젝트 작업을 다시 시작할 것이다.

meanings.english: the sale of goods to the public in small quantities

examples.en: She works in retail, helping customers find products they need.
examples.ko: 그녀는 소비자가 필요로 하는 제품을 찾도록 도와주는 소매업에서 일한다.

meanings.english: to keep or continue to have something

examples.en: It is important to retain good employees in a company.
examples.ko: 회사에서 좋은 직원들을 유지하는 것이 중요하다.
