meanings.english: to stop working, typically because of age

examples.en: He decided to retire after working for 30 years at the same company.
examples.ko: 그는 같은 회사에서 30년 일한 후 은퇴하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: to move back or withdraw, especially from a dangerous situation

examples.en: The soldiers had to retreat when the enemy forces became too strong.
examples.ko: 적군이 너무 강해지자 병사들은 후퇴해야 했다.

meanings.english: to come or go back to a place

examples.en: She will return home after finishing her studies abroad.
examples.ko: 해외 연수를 마치고 집으로 돌아갈 것이다.

meanings.english: to make known or show something that was previously secret or hidden

examples.en: The detective will reveal the truth about the mysterious case.
examples.ko: 형사는 그 신비로운 사건에 대한 진실을 밝힐 것이다.

meanings.english: the action of hurting or harming someone in return for an injury or wrong

examples.en: He sought revenge on those who had wronged him in the past.
examples.ko: 과거에 자신을 해치거나 잘못한 사람들에게 복수를 하려고 했다.

meanings.english: to turn or move something so that it faces in the opposite direction

examples.en: He reversed the car into the parking space.
examples.ko: 그는 차를 주차 공간으로 뒤집어 주차했다.

meanings.english: to look at or consider again an idea, piece of writing, etc. in order to correct or improve it

examples.en: She revised her essay before submitting it to the teacher.
examples.ko: 그녀는 선생님께 제출하기 전에 에세이를 수정했다.

meanings.english: to bring something back after it has been dead, stopped, or inactive

examples.en: The doctor tried to revive the patient with CPR.
examples.ko: 의사는 심폐소생술로 환자를 소생시키려고 했다.

meanings.english: a sudden, complete, or marked change in something

examples.en: The Industrial Revolution brought about significant changes in society.
examples.ko: 산업 혁명은 사회에 중요한 변화를 가져왔다.

meanings.english: something given in return for good behavior or good work

examples.en: She received a reward for her excellent performance in the competition.
examples.ko: 그녀는 대회에서의 훌륭한 성적에 대한 보상을 받았다.

meanings.english: a strong pattern of sounds, words, or musical notes that is repeated regularly

examples.en: The music had a catchy rhythm that made everyone want to dance.
examples.ko: 음악은 모두가 춤추고 싶어하는 멋진 리듬을 가지고 있었다.

meanings.english: a narrow strip of material used to tie things or for decoration

examples.en: She tied a ribbon around the gift box to make it look more festive.
examples.ko: 그녀는 선물 상자에 리본을 묶어 더 화려하게 만들었다.

meanings.english: the small seeds of a particular type of grass, cooked and eaten as food

examples.en: In many Asian countries, rice is a staple food.
examples.ko: 많은 아시아 국가에서 쌀은 주식이다.

meanings.english: Having a lot of money or valuable possessions

examples.en: She comes from a rich family.
examples.ko: 그녀는 부유한 가정에서 왔어요.

meanings.english: To free from something unwanted or unpleasant

examples.en: He was finally able to rid himself of the bad habit.
examples.ko: 그는 마침내 나쁜 습관을 없앨 수 있었어요.

meanings.english: To sit on and control the movement of an animal or vehicle

examples.en: She loves to ride her bike in the park.
examples.ko: 그녀는 공원에서 자전거를 타는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: To make fun of or mock someone or something in a cruel or unkind way

examples.en: She felt hurt when her classmates ridiculed her appearance.
examples.ko: 동급생들이 그녀의 외모를 조롱할 때 그녀는 상처받았어요.

meanings.english: In accordance with what is good, proper, or just

examples.en: It's important to do the right thing even when no one is watching.
examples.ko: 아무도 보지 않을 때도 올바른 일을 하는 것이 중요해요.

meanings.english: A small circular band, typically of precious metal, worn on a finger as an ornament or a token of marriage

examples.en: She received a beautiful diamond ring for her engagement.
examples.ko: 그녀는 약혼 선물로 아름다운 다이아몬드 반지를 받았어요.

meanings.english: A violent disturbance of the peace by a crowd

examples.en: The police were called to control the riot in the city center.
examples.ko: 경찰이 시내의 폭동을 진압하기 위해 호출되었어요.

meanings.english: To move from a lower position to a higher one; to get up

examples.en: The sun rises in the east every morning.
examples.ko: 태양은 매일 아침 동쪽에서 떠오르는데요.

meanings.english: the possibility of something bad happening

examples.en: Investing in stocks carries a certain amount of risk.
examples.ko: 주식에 투자하는 것은 일정한 위험을 수반합니다.

meanings.english: a person or thing competing with another for the same objective or for superiority in the same field of activity

examples.en: Samsung and Apple are fierce rivals in the smartphone market.
examples.ko: 삼성과 애플은 스마트폰 시장에서 치열한 경쟁자입니다.

meanings.english: a large natural stream of water flowing in a channel to the sea, a lake, or another such stream

examples.en: The Nile River is the longest river in the world.
examples.ko: 나일 강은 세계에서 가장 긴 강입니다.

meanings.english: a wide way leading from one place to another, especially one with a specially prepared surface that vehicles can use

examples.en: We took a road trip along the scenic coastal road.
examples.ko: 우리는 경치 좋은 해안도로를 따라 로드 트립을 했습니다.

meanings.english: to make a loud, deep, prolonged sound

examples.en: The lion let out a mighty roar in the jungle.
examples.ko: 사자가 밀림 속에서 강한 울음을 지르다.

meanings.english: food that has been cooked by dry heat in an oven

examples.en: The Thanksgiving turkey was perfectly roasted and delicious.
examples.ko: 추수감사절 칠면조는 완벽하게 구워져 맛있었습니다.

meanings.english: to take property unlawfully from a person or place by force or threat of force

examples.en: The thieves robbed the bank and fled with the money.
examples.ko: 도둑들이 은행을 털고 돈을 가지고 도망쳤다.

meanings.english: a machine capable of carrying out a complex series of actions automatically, especially one programmable by a computer

examples.en: The factory uses robots to assemble cars efficiently.
examples.ko: 공장은 차량을 효율적으로 조립하기 위해 로봇을 사용합니다.

meanings.english: a large mass of stone forming a hill, cliff, or other rocky outcrop

examples.en: The children climbed the rock to reach the top of the hill.
examples.ko: 아이들이 언덕 꼭대기에 도달하기 위해 바위를 올라갔다.

meanings.english: a cylindrical projectile that can be propelled to a great height or distance by the combustion of its contents

examples.en: The rocket launched into space with a loud roar.
examples.ko: 로켓이 큰 울음소리와 함께 우주로 발사되었다.

meanings.english: a thin straight bar, especially of wood or metal

examples.en: He used a fishing rod to catch fish in the river.
examples.ko: 그는 강에서 물고기를 잡기 위해 낚싯대를 사용했다.

meanings.english: the function assumed or part played by a person or thing in a particular situation

examples.en: In the school play, she had the role of the princess.
examples.ko: 학교 연극에서 그녀는 공주의 역할을 맡았다.

meanings.english: move or cause to move in a particular direction by turning over and over on an axis

examples.en: He likes to roll down the hill for fun.
examples.ko: 그는 재미로 언덕을 굴러 내려가는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: relating to love or a close loving relationship

examples.en: They had a romantic dinner by candlelight on the beach.
examples.ko: 그들은 해변에서 양초빛 로맨틱한 저녁 식사를 했다.

meanings.english: the structure forming the upper covering of a building or vehicle

examples.en: The snow on the roof melted under the warm sun.
examples.ko: 따뜻한 태양 아래 지붕 위의 눈이 녹았다.

meanings.english: a space that can be occupied or where something can be done

examples.en: She decorated her room with colorful posters.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다채로운 포스터로 방을 장식했다.

meanings.english: the part of a plant that attaches it to the ground and gets water and nutrients

examples.en: The roots of the tree spread deep into the soil.
examples.ko: 나무의 뿌리는 토양 속으로 깊게 퍼져 있습니다.

meanings.english: a thick cord or wire used for tying, pulling, or fastening

examples.en: The sailor tied the rope to the mast.
examples.ko: 선원은 로프를 돛대에 매었습니다.

meanings.english: a type of flower with a pleasant fragrance and usually thorny stems

examples.en: She received a bouquet of red roses on her birthday.
examples.ko: 그녀는 생일에 빨간 장미 꽃다발을 받았습니다.

meanings.english: to decay or decompose due to bacterial or fungal action

examples.en: Leaving food out for too long can cause it to rot.
examples.ko: 음식을 너무 오래 방치하면 썩을 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: having an uneven or irregular surface; not smooth

examples.en: The rough texture of the sandpaper helped smooth the wood.
examples.ko: 사포지의 거친 질감이 나무를 매끄럽게 만들었습니다.

meanings.english: shaped like a circle or sphere; curved

examples.en: The moon is round in shape.
examples.ko: 달은 둥근 모양을 하고 있습니다.

meanings.english: a way or course taken in getting from a starting point to a destination

examples.en: The GPS helped us find the best route to our destination.
examples.ko: GPS가 우리에게 목적지로 가는 최적의 경로를 찾아주었습니다.

meanings.english: a sequence of actions regularly followed; a set way of doing things

examples.en: Her morning routine includes brushing her teeth and having breakfast.
examples.ko: 그녀의 아침 일상에는 이를 닦고 아침 식사를 하는 것이 포함되어 있습니다.

meanings.english: a line of things, people, or vehicles

examples.en: She sat in the front row of the classroom.
examples.ko: 그녀는 교실의 앞 줄에 앉았다.

meanings.english: relating to a king or queen

examples.en: The royal family lives in the palace.
examples.ko: 왕가는 궁전에 산다.

meanings.english: to move your hand, a cloth, etc. over a surface while pressing firmly

examples.en: She rubbed her eyes to wake up.
examples.ko: 그녀는 눈을 비비어 깨어났다.

meanings.english: not polite; offensive or embarrassing

examples.en: It's rude to talk with your mouth full.
examples.ko: 입에 음식을 가득 두고 말하는 건 무례하다.

meanings.english: the remains of a building, city, etc., that has been destroyed

examples.en: The ancient ruins attract many tourists.
examples.ko: 고대 유적지는 많은 관광객을 끌어들인다.

meanings.english: an official instruction that says how things must be done or what is allowed

examples.en: Follow the rules to avoid getting into trouble.
examples.ko: 문제에 휘말리지 않으려면 규칙을 따르세요.

meanings.english: information or a story that is passed from one person to another and which may or may not be true

examples.en: Don't believe everything you hear as it might just be a rumor.
examples.ko: 들은 모든 소문을 믿지 마세요. 그것이 그냥 루머일 수도 있습니다.

meanings.english: to move quickly on foot, or to operate or manage something

examples.en: He runs every morning to stay fit.
examples.ko: 그는 건강을 유지하기 위해 매일 아침 달려요.

meanings.english: relating to the countryside rather than the town

examples.en: She grew up in a rural area surrounded by farms.
examples.ko: 그녀는 농장으로 둘러싸인 시골 지역에서 자랐다.

meanings.english: move with urgent haste; act quickly

examples.en: I had to rush to catch the bus.
examples.ko: 나는 버스를 타기 위해 서둘러야 했다.

meanings.english: a large bag made of a strong material such as hessian, used for storing and carrying goods

examples.en: He carried a sack of potatoes on his back.
examples.ko: 그는 등에 감자 자루를 메고 다녔다.

meanings.english: connected with God or a god or dedicated to a religious purpose and so deserving veneration

examples.en: The temple was a sacred place for worship.
examples.ko: 그 사원은 숭배를 위한 신성한 장소였다.

meanings.english: an act of giving up something valued for the sake of something else regarded as more important or worthy

examples.en: She made a sacrifice to help her friend in need.
examples.ko: 그녀는 친구를 돕기 위해 희생을 했다.

meanings.english: feeling or showing sorrow; unhappy

examples.en: He felt sad when his pet passed away.
examples.ko: 그의 애완동물이 죽었을 때 그는 슬펐다.

meanings.english: protected from or not exposed to danger or risk; secure

examples.en: Make sure to wear a helmet to stay safe while riding a bike.
examples.ko: 자전거를 탈 때 안전을 위해 헬멧을 쓰도록 하세요.

meanings.english: move across water in a boat using sails; a piece of material extended on a mast to catch the wind and propel a boat or ship

examples.en: They decided to sail around the world on their yacht.
examples.ko: 그들은 요트로 세계 일주 항해하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: A cold dish of various mixtures of raw or cooked vegetables, usually seasoned with oil, vinegar, or other dressing.

examples.en: I had a delicious Caesar salad for lunch.
examples.ko: 점심으로 맛있는 시저 샐러드를 먹었어.

meanings.english: A fixed regular payment, typically paid on a monthly basis, made by an employer to an employee.

examples.en: She received a raise in her salary after working hard for a year.
examples.ko: 1년 동안 열심히 일한 후에 월급이 인상되었어.

meanings.english: The exchange of a commodity for money; the action of selling something.

examples.en: There is a big sale at the department store this weekend.
examples.ko: 이번 주말에 백화점에서 대규모 세일이 있어.

meanings.english: A white crystalline substance that gives seawater its characteristic taste and is used for seasoning or preserving food.

examples.en: Please pass the salt for my soup.
examples.ko: 내 수프에 소금 좀 주세요.

meanings.english: Identical; not different.

examples.en: We both have the same favorite color.
examples.ko: 우리 둘 다 같은 좋아하는 색이야.

meanings.english: A small part or quantity intended to show what the whole is like.

examples.en: The store offers free samples of their new products.
examples.ko: 가게에서 새 제품의 무료 샘플을 제공해.

meanings.english: A loose granular substance, typically pale yellowish brown, resulting from the erosion of siliceous and other rocks.

examples.en: Children love playing in the sand at the beach.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 해변에서 모래 놀이를 좋아해.

meanings.english: An item of food consisting of two pieces of bread with a filling between them, eaten as a light meal.

examples.en: I packed a turkey sandwich for my picnic.
examples.ko: 소풍을 위해 칠면조 샌드위치를 싸들고 갔어.

meanings.english: A celestial body that orbits around a planet.

examples.en: The satellite orbits the Earth every 90 minutes.
examples.ko: 위성은 지구를 90분마다 돌고 있습니다.

meanings.english: To fulfill a desire or need.

examples.en: Eating a delicious meal can satisfy your hunger.
examples.ko: 맛있는 식사를 먹으면 배고픔을 만족시킬 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: A flavorful liquid or semi-solid condiment used in cooking or as a topping.

examples.en: I like to add barbecue sauce to my grilled chicken.
examples.ko: 나는 구운 닭에 바베큐 소스를 넣는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: To keep something for future use; to rescue from harm or danger.

examples.en: Remember to save your work frequently while using the computer.
examples.ko: 컴퓨터를 사용할 때 작업을 자주 저장하는 것을 기억하세요.

meanings.english: To speak words; to express thoughts, feelings, or information verbally.

examples.en: Can you please say your name again?
examples.ko: 이름을 다시 한번 말해주시겠어요?

meanings.english: The size or level of something, often in relation to other similar things.

examples.en: The scale of the project was much larger than we anticipated.
examples.ko: 프로젝트의 규모는 예상보다 훨씬 컸습니다.

meanings.english: To examine something closely or quickly; to digitally capture an image or document.

examples.en: The security officer scanned my bag at the airport.
examples.ko: 보안 요원이 공항에서 내 가방을 스캔했습니다.

meanings.english: An action or event that causes public outrage or disgrace.

examples.en: The politician was involved in a scandal that shocked the nation.
examples.ko: 정치인이 국가를 충격에 빠뜨린 스캔들에 연루되었습니다.

meanings.english: insufficient for the demand; not plentiful

examples.en: Fresh water is becoming scarce in many parts of the world.
examples.ko: 세계 여러 지역에서 미네랄이 부족해지고 있습니다.

meanings.english: to frighten or cause fear

examples.en: The sudden noise scared the cat.
examples.ko: 갑자기 나는 소리에 고양이가 놀라 버렸다.

meanings.english: a piece of fabric worn around the neck for warmth or fashion

examples.en: She wrapped a colorful scarf around her neck.
examples.ko: 그녀는 목에 화려한 목도리를 감았다.

meanings.english: to throw or drop things in different directions

examples.en: The wind scattered the leaves all over the yard.
examples.ko: 바람이 잎들을 마당 곳곳에 흩뿌렸다.

meanings.english: a part of a play, movie, or story where events happen in one place

examples.en: The final scene of the movie was very emotional.
examples.ko: 영화의 마지막 장면은 매우 감동적이었다.

meanings.english: a plan that lists activities or events and the times when they will happen

examples.en: I need to check my schedule before making plans for the weekend.
examples.ko: 주말 계획을 세우기 전에 내 시간표를 확인해야 해.

meanings.english: a plan or system for doing or organizing something

examples.en: The company came up with a new marketing scheme to attract more customers.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 더 많은 고객을 유치하기 위해 새로운 마케팅 계획을 세웠다.

meanings.english: a person who has studied a subject and knows a lot about it

examples.en: She is a renowned scholar in the field of history.
examples.ko: 그녀는 역사 분야에서 유명한 학자입니다.

meanings.english: An institution for educating children

examples.en: I go to school every day.
examples.ko: 매일 학교에 갑니다.

meanings.english: The study of the natural world based on facts learned through experiments and observation

examples.en: She enjoys studying science.
examples.ko: 그녀는 과학 공부를 즐깁니다.

meanings.english: A tool used for cutting paper or cloth

examples.en: Please hand me the scissors.
examples.ko: 가위 좀 내주세요.

meanings.english: The extent of the area or subject that something deals with or to which it is relevant

examples.en: The scope of the project is vast.
examples.ko: 이 프로젝트의 범위는 광대합니다.

meanings.english: A number that represents achievement in a game or test

examples.en: She got a high score on the exam.
examples.ko: 시험에서 높은 점수를 받았어.

meanings.english: To move or climb quickly but with difficulty, often using your hands to help you

examples.en: The kids scrambled up the hill.
examples.ko: 어린이들이 언덕을 뒤죽박죽 오르려 했다.

meanings.english: To rub your skin with something sharp, usually because it is itching

examples.en: Don't scratch your mosquito bite.
examples.ko: 모기 물린 자국을 긁지 마세요.

meanings.english: To make a loud, high-pitched cry, especially when you are hurt, frightened, or excited

examples.en: The child screamed when she saw the spider.
examples.ko: 그 아이는 거미를 보고 고함쳤다.

meanings.english: a flat surface in a cinema, on a television, or as part of a computer, on which pictures or words are shown

examples.en: I watched a movie on the big screen last night.
examples.ko: 어젯밤에 큰 화면에서 영화를 봤어.

meanings.english: a thin, pointed metal pin with a raised helical thread running around it and a slotted head, used to join things together by being rotated so that it pierces wood or other material

examples.en: Please tighten the screw to secure the shelf.
examples.ko: 선반을 고정하기 위해 나사를 조이세요.

meanings.english: to make something by carving or shaping a solid material such as wood or stone

examples.en: The artist will sculpt a statue out of marble.
examples.ko: 작가가 대리석으로 조각상을 만들 것입니다.

meanings.english: the expanse of salt water that covers most of the earth's surface and surrounds its land masses

examples.en: We enjoyed swimming in the clear blue sea.
examples.ko: 우리는 맑고 푸른 바다에서 수영을 즐겼어.

meanings.english: a large mammal that lives in the sea and on the shore and eats fish

examples.en: We saw a seal sunbathing on the rocks by the beach.
examples.ko: 우리는 해변 옆 바위 위에서 누워 태양을 쬐는 물개를 봤어.

meanings.english: to try to find something by looking carefully and thoroughly in a specific place

examples.en: I need to search for my missing keys.
examples.ko: 분실된 열쇠를 찾아야 해.

meanings.english: each of the four divisions of the year (spring, summer, autumn, and winter) marked by particular weather patterns and daylight hours

examples.en: I love the colors of the leaves changing in the autumn season.
examples.ko: 가을 계절에 나뭇잎이 변하는 색깔을 좋아해.

meanings.english: a piece of furniture designed for sitting on, such as a chair or a bench

examples.en: Please take a seat and make yourself comfortable.
examples.ko: 앉아 편안하게 해주세요.

meanings.english: The one that comes after the first in order

examples.en: I will be the second person to arrive at the party.
examples.ko: 파티에 두 번째로 도착할 거야.

meanings.english: Something that is known by only a few people and should not be told to others

examples.en: She told me a secret about her new job.
examples.ko: 그녀가 새 직장에 관한 비밀을 내게 알렸다.

meanings.english: A person who works in an office, writing letters, making phone calls, and arranging meetings

examples.en: The secretary scheduled a meeting for next Monday.
examples.ko: 비서가 다음 주 월요일에 회의 일정을 잡았다.

meanings.english: A separate part of something

examples.en: Please read the first section of the book for homework.
examples.ko: 숙제로 책의 첫 부분을 읽어 주세요.

meanings.english: A part of an area of activity, especially of business, industry, or trade

examples.en: She works in the education sector.
examples.ko: 그녀는 교육 부문에서 일합니다.

meanings.english: Safe from danger or harm

examples.en: Make sure to secure your belongings before leaving the room.
examples.ko: 방을 나가기 전에 물건들을 안전하게 보호하세요.

meanings.english: To perceive with the eyes; to understand or realize

examples.en: I can see the beautiful sunset from my window.
examples.ko: 나는 창문으로 아름다운 일몰을 볼 수 있어.

meanings.english: A small, usually hard part of a plant from which a new plant can grow

examples.en: She planted seeds in the garden and watched them grow into flowers.
examples.ko: 그녀는 정원에 씨앗을 심고, 그것들이 꽃으로 자라나는 것을 지켜봤다.

meanings.english: to look for or try to find something

examples.en: She seeks advice from her teacher.
examples.ko: 그녀는 선생님에게 조언을 구한다.

meanings.english: to appear to be or feel a certain way

examples.en: She seems happy today.
examples.ko: 그녀는 오늘 행복해 보인다.

meanings.english: to grab or take hold of something suddenly and forcefully

examples.en: The police seized the stolen goods.
examples.ko: 경찰은 도난된 물품을 잡았다.

meanings.english: to choose or pick out from a group

examples.en: Please select your preferred color.
examples.ko: 원하는 색상을 선택해주세요.

meanings.english: the individual person as the object of his or her own reflective consciousness

examples.en: She needs to work on improving herself.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신을 개선하기 위해 노력해야 한다.

meanings.english: to exchange goods for money

examples.en: He sells handmade crafts at the market.
examples.ko: 그는 시장에서 수공예품을 판매한다.

meanings.english: to cause to go or be taken to a destination

examples.en: She will send you an email with the details.
examples.ko: 그녀가 세부 내용을 담은 이메일을 보내줄 것이다.

meanings.english: of a higher level or standing; a person who is older or higher in rank

examples.en: He is a senior member of the team.
examples.ko: 그는 팀의 고위 직원이다.

meanings.english: a faculty by which the body perceives an external stimulus

examples.en: She has a keen sense of smell.
examples.ko: 그녀는 예리한 후각을 가지고 있습니다.

meanings.english: having or showing good sense or judgment

examples.en: It's sensible to wear a helmet when riding a bike.
examples.ko: 자전거를 탈 때 헬멧을 쓰는 것이 분별 있는 일입니다.

meanings.english: a set of words that is complete in itself, typically containing a subject and predicate

examples.en: He wrote a beautiful sentence in his essay.
examples.ko: 그는 에세이에 아름다운 문장을 썼습니다.

meanings.english: a view or attitude towards a situation or event; an emotion

examples.en: Her sentiment towards the movie was positive.
examples.ko: 그녀의 영화에 대한 감정은 긍정적이었습니다.

meanings.english: not joined or touching; distinct

examples.en: The twins have separate bedrooms.
examples.ko: 쌍둥이들은 분리된 침실을 가지고 있습니다.

meanings.english: a set of related events, actions, or items that follow each other in a particular order

examples.en: The sequence of events in the story was captivating.
examples.ko: 이야기 속 사건들의 연속은 매혹적이었습니다.

meanings.english: a number of things or events of a similar kind that come one after another

examples.en: The TV series has a new episode every week.
examples.ko: 그 TV 시리즈는 매주 새로운 에피소드가 나옵니다.

meanings.english: demanding or characterized by careful consideration or application

examples.en: He has a serious attitude towards his studies.
examples.ko: 그는 공부에 대해 진지한 태도를 갖고 있습니다.

meanings.english: to work for or help someone

examples.en: She serves in a restaurant.
examples.ko: 그녀는 식당에서 일합니다.

meanings.english: assistance or work performed for someone else

examples.en: The hotel offers excellent service.
examples.ko: 그 호텔은 훌륭한 서비스를 제공합니다.

meanings.english: a meeting or period of time dedicated to a particular activity

examples.en: We had a study session after school.
examples.ko: 우리는 방과 후에 공부 세션을 가졌다.

meanings.english: to put something in a particular place or position

examples.en: She set the table for dinner.
examples.ko: 그녀는 저녁 식사를 위해 식탁을 차렸다.

meanings.english: to resolve a problem or reach an agreement

examples.en: They settled their dispute peacefully.
examples.ko: 그들은 분쟁을 평화롭게 해결했다.

meanings.english: the number 7

examples.en: There are seven days in a week.
examples.ko: 일주일에는 7일이 있다.

meanings.english: more than two but not many

examples.en: She bought several books at the bookstore.
examples.ko: 그녀는 서점에서 몇 권의 책을 샀다.

meanings.english: very bad or serious

examples.en: The storm caused severe damage to the town.
examples.ko: 폭풍이 마을에 심각한 피해를 끼쳤다.

meanings.english: To join or repair something by using a needle and thread

examples.en: She sewed a button onto her shirt.
examples.ko: 그녀는 셔츠에 단추를 더놨다.

meanings.english: The state of being male or female

examples.en: Sex education is important for teenagers.
examples.ko: 성교육은 십대들에게 중요하다.

meanings.english: An area where direct light from the sun cannot reach

examples.en: Let's sit in the shade to stay cool.
examples.ko: 시원하게 지내기 위해 그늘에 앉자.

meanings.english: A dark area or shape produced by a body coming between rays of light and a surface

examples.en: The tree cast a long shadow on the ground.
examples.ko: 나무가 땅에 긴 그림자를 드리웠다.

meanings.english: To move quickly up and down or from side to side in a way that is not controlled

examples.en: She shook the bottle before opening it.
examples.ko: 그녀는 병을 열기 전에 흔들었다.

meanings.english: Used to say that something certainly will or must happen in the future

examples.en: We shall meet again next week.
examples.ko: 다음 주에 다시 만날 것이다.

meanings.english: Not having much distance between the top or surface and the bottom

examples.en: The water in the pool is shallow, so be careful.
examples.ko: 수영장의 물은 얕으니 조심해.

meanings.english: A painful feeling of humiliation or distress caused by the consciousness of wrong or foolish behavior

examples.en: He felt a deep sense of shame for his actions.
examples.ko: 그는 자신의 행동에 대해 깊은 부끄러움을 느꼈다.

meanings.english: The form or outline of an object

examples.en: The artist used clay to create a beautiful shape.
examples.ko: 예술가는 예쁜 모양을 만들기 위해 점토를 사용했다.

meanings.english: To divide or distribute portions of something

examples.en: Let's share the cake equally among all the guests.
examples.ko: 손님들 사이에 케이크를 공평하게 나눠먹자.

meanings.english: Having an edge or point that can cut or pierce

examples.en: Be careful with the sharp knife in the kitchen.
examples.ko: 부엌에서 날카로운 칼에 주의하세요.

meanings.english: To remove hair from the body using a razor or shaver

examples.en: He likes to shave his beard every morning.
examples.ko: 그는 매일 아침 수염을 깎는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: Used to refer to a female person or animal

examples.en: She is going to the store to buy some groceries.
examples.ko: 그녀는 가게에 장을 보러 간다.

meanings.english: A domesticated ruminant mammal with a thick woolly coat

examples.en: The farmer herds his sheep in the green pasture.
examples.ko: 농부는 초록 초원에서 양떼를 몰고 다닌다.

meanings.english: A large rectangular piece of cloth used on a bed

examples.en: She put a clean sheet on the bed before going to sleep.
examples.ko: 그녀는 잠자러 가기 전에 침대에 깨끗한 시트를 깔았다.

meanings.english: A flat, horizontal board used for storage or display

examples.en: She placed her books neatly on the shelf in her room.
examples.ko: 그녀는 방 안 선반에 책들을 깔끔하게 놓았다.

meanings.english: the hard outer covering of something

examples.en: She collected seashells on the beach.
examples.ko: 그녀는 해변에서 조개껍질을 모았다.

meanings.english: a place that provides protection from weather or danger

examples.en: The homeless people sought shelter in the abandoned building.
examples.ko: 무주택자들은 버려진 건물에서 피난처를 찾았다.

meanings.english: a change in position or direction

examples.en: There was a shift in the company's policy towards remote work.
examples.ko: 회사의 원격 근무 정책에 변화가 있었다.

meanings.english: to give off light; to be bright

examples.en: The sun shines brightly in the sky.
examples.ko: 태양이 하늘에서 밝게 빛난다.

meanings.english: a large boat used for carrying goods or people over water

examples.en: The cargo ship arrived at the port with goods from overseas.
examples.ko: 화물선이 해외에서 온 화물을 싣고 항구에 도착했다.

meanings.english: a garment for the upper body, usually with a collar and buttons down the front

examples.en: He wore a clean white shirt to the job interview.
examples.ko: 그는 채용 면접 때 깨끗한 흰색 셔츠를 입었다.

meanings.english: a sudden upsetting or surprising event or experience

examples.en: The news of the accident came as a shock to everyone.
examples.ko: 사고 소식은 모두에게 충격적이었다.

meanings.english: a covering for the foot, typically made of leather or other material

examples.en: She bought a new pair of running shoes for her marathon training.
examples.ko: 그녀는 마라톤 훈련을 위해 새로운 운동화 한 켤레를 샀다.

meanings.english: to fire a bullet or an arrow from a weapon

examples.en: He shot the target with his bow and arrow.
examples.ko: 그는 활과 화살로 목표물을 쏘았다.

meanings.english: a place where goods are sold to the public

examples.en: She went to the shop to buy some groceries.
examples.ko: 그녀는 잡화점에 가서 식료품을 샀다.

meanings.english: the land along the edge of a sea, lake, or river

examples.en: The children played on the shore of the beach.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 해변의 해안에서 놀았다.

meanings.english: not long in length or distance

examples.en: She wore a short skirt to the party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파티에 짧은 치마를 입었다.

meanings.english: used to indicate what is proper, right, or reasonable

examples.en: You should study hard for your exams.
examples.ko: 시험을 위해 열심히 공부해야 한다.

meanings.english: the part of the body between the neck and the upper arm

examples.en: He carried the heavy bag on his shoulder.
examples.ko: 그는 무거운 가방을 어깨에 메고 다녔다.

meanings.english: to speak loudly and forcefully

examples.en: The coach shouted instructions to the players.
examples.ko: 코치는 선수들에게 지시를 소리치며 했다.

meanings.english: to allow something to be seen

examples.en: She will show her artwork at the exhibition.
examples.ko: 그녀는 전시회에서 자신의 작품을 보여줄 것이다.

meanings.english: a brief period of rain

examples.en: We got caught in a sudden shower on our way home.
examples.ko: 우리는 집에 가는 길에 갑자기 소나기에 적셨다.

meanings.english: to close something

examples.en: Please shut the door when you leave the room.
examples.ko: 방을 나갈 때 문을 닫아 주세요.

meanings.english: nervous or timid in the company of others

examples.en: She's too shy to speak in front of a large group.
examples.ko: 그녀는 대규모 그룹 앞에서 말하기를 너무 수줍어한다.

meanings.english: affected by physical or mental illness

examples.en: I had to stay home from school because I was sick.
examples.ko: 나는 아파서 학교를 결석해야 했다.

meanings.english: a position to the left or right of an object, place, or central point

examples.en: The book is on the side table next to the bed.
examples.ko: 책은 침대 옆 서랍 탁자 위에 놓여 있다.

meanings.english: a long, deep audible breath expressing sadness, relief, tiredness, or similar

examples.en: She let out a sigh of relief when she heard the good news.
examples.ko: 그녀는 좋은 소식을 듣고 안도의 한숨을 내쉬었다.

meanings.english: something that is seen; a view or prospect

examples.en: The sunset over the ocean was a breathtaking sight.
examples.ko: 바다 위의 일몰은 아름다운 광경이었다.

meanings.english: an object, quality, or event whose presence or occurrence indicates the probable presence or occurrence of something else

examples.en: The dark clouds were a sign that a storm was approaching.
examples.ko: 어두운 구름은 폭풍이 다가오고 있다는 징조였다.

meanings.english: making no sound; quiet

examples.en: She remained silent during the meeting.
examples.ko: 그녀는 회의 중에 조용했다.

meanings.english: lacking in good sense, judgment, or discretion; foolish

examples.en: Don't be silly; it's just a joke.
examples.ko: 어리석지 마; 그냥 농담이야.

meanings.english: a shiny grayish-white metal

examples.en: She wore a beautiful silver necklace.
examples.ko: 그녀는 아름다운 은 목걸이를 했다.

meanings.english: alike in appearance or nature; resembling without being identical

examples.en: The two sisters look very similar.
examples.ko: 두 자매는 매우 닮았다.

meanings.english: easy to understand, deal with, use, etc.; not complicated or elaborate

examples.en: Cooking this dish is simple; just follow the recipe.
examples.ko: 이 요리는 간단해; 레시피를 따르면 된다.

meanings.english: to imitate the appearance or character of

examples.en: The flight simulator can simulate real flying conditions.
examples.ko: 비행 시뮬레이터는 실제 비행 조건을 모방할 수 있다.

meanings.english: occurring, operating, or done at the same time

examples.en: The two events happened simultaneously.
examples.ko: 두 이벤트는 동시에 일어났다.

meanings.english: an immoral act considered to be a transgression against divine law

examples.en: Forgiveness is sought for the sins committed.
examples.ko: 지은 죄에 대해 용서를 구한다.

meanings.english: From a particular time or event in the past until now

examples.en: I have been studying English since last year.
examples.ko: 작년부터 영어를 공부하고 있어요.

meanings.english: To make musical sounds with the voice

examples.en: She loves to sing in the choir at church.
examples.ko: 그녀는 교회 합창단에서 노래하는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: Only one in number; not one of several

examples.en: He lives in a single room apartment in the city.
examples.ko: 그는 도시의 원룸 아파트에서 살고 있어요.

meanings.english: To go down below the surface of water, mud, etc.

examples.en: The ship began to sink after hitting an iceberg.
examples.ko: 그 배는 빙산에 부딪힌 후 가라앉기 시작했어요.

meanings.english: A girl or woman who has the same parents as another person

examples.en: My sister is two years older than me.
examples.ko: 내 언니는 나보다 두 살이 많아.

meanings.english: To be in a position in which your bottom is resting on a seat or on the ground

examples.en: Please sit down and make yourself comfortable.
examples.ko: 앉아서 편하게 해주세요.

meanings.english: A place where something is, was, or will be located

examples.en: The construction of the new school site will begin next month.
examples.ko: 새 학교 건설 현장은 다음 달에 시작될 것이다.

meanings.english: To place or locate in a particular position

examples.en: The hotel is situated near the beach, offering a beautiful view.
examples.ko: 해변 근처에 위치한 이 호텔은 아름다운 전망을 제공해.

meanings.english: The number 6.

examples.en: I have six apples.
examples.ko: 나는 사과 여섯 개를 가지고 있어.

meanings.english: The dimensions or proportions of something.

examples.en: What size shoes do you wear?
examples.ko: 너는 어떤 사이즈의 신발을 신어?

meanings.english: To move on skates.

examples.en: I like to skate at the ice rink.
examples.ko: 나는 아이스 링크에서 스케이트 타는 것을 좋아해.

meanings.english: To move on skis over snow.

examples.en: I learned how to ski last winter.
examples.ko: 저번 겨울에 스키 타는 법을 배웠어.

meanings.english: The ability to do something well.

examples.en: She has great skill in playing the piano.
examples.ko: 그녀는 피아노 연주에 대단한 기술을 가지고 있어.

meanings.english: The outer covering of the body.

examples.en: It's important to protect your skin from the sun.
examples.ko: 태양으로부터 피부를 보호하는 것이 중요해.

meanings.english: To move lightly and quickly by hopping on alternate feet.

examples.en: Let's skip rope together.
examples.ko: 함께 줄다리기를 뛰어보자.

meanings.english: A garment fastened around the waist and hanging down around the legs.

examples.en: She wore a beautiful skirt to the party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파티에 아름다운 치마를 입었어.

meanings.english: the region of the atmosphere and outer space seen from the earth

examples.en: The sun was setting in the sky.
examples.ko: 해가 하늘에 지고 있었다.

meanings.english: a person who is the legal property of another and is forced to obey them

examples.en: Slaves were treated cruelly in the past.
examples.ko: 과거에 노예들은 잔인하게 대우받았다.

meanings.english: a condition of body and mind that typically recurs for several hours every night, in which the nervous system is inactive, the eyes closed, the postural muscles relaxed, and consciousness practically suspended

examples.en: I need to get enough sleep to feel rested.
examples.ko: 휴식을 취하기 위해 충분한 잠을 자야 한다.

meanings.english: a thin, broad piece of food, such as bread, meat, or cake, cut from a larger portion

examples.en: She cut a slice of cake for each guest.
examples.ko: 그녀는 각 손님들에게 케이크 한 조각을 잘랐다.

meanings.english: move along a smooth surface while maintaining continuous contact with it

examples.en: The children love to slide down the playground slide.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 놀이터 미끄럼틀에서 미끄러지는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: small in degree; inconsiderable

examples.en: There was a slight change in the weather today.
examples.ko: 오늘 날씨에 약간의 변화가 있었다.

meanings.english: attractively thin

examples.en: She has a slim figure due to regular exercise.
examples.ko: 규칙적인 운동으로 그녀는 날씬한 체형을 가지고 있다.

meanings.english: lose one's footing and slide unintentionally for a short distance

examples.en: Be careful not to slip on the wet floor.
examples.ko: 젖은 바닥에서 미끄러지지 않도록 조심하세요.

meanings.english: an inclined surface or a hill

examples.en: The hikers climbed up the steep slope to reach the top of the mountain.
examples.ko: 등산객들은 산 정상에 도달하기 위해 가파른 비탈길을 오르고 있었다.

meanings.english: not moving quickly; taking more time than usual

examples.en: The turtle is slow compared to the rabbit in the race.
examples.ko: 거북이는 토끼에 비해 경주에서 느리다.

meanings.english: not large in size; little in amount

examples.en: She found a small kitten hiding under the bushes.
examples.ko: 그녀는 수풀 아래 숨어 있는 작은 새끼 고양이를 발견했다.

meanings.english: intelligent; showing quick-witted intelligence

examples.en: He is a smart student who always gets good grades in school.
examples.ko: 그는 항상 학교에서 좋은 성적을 받는 영리한 학생이다.

meanings.english: to break violently into pieces

examples.en: The angry man smashed the window with a baseball bat.
examples.ko: 화난 남자가 야구 배트로 창문을 박살냈다.

meanings.english: the sense by which odors are perceived; to perceive or detect the odor of something

examples.en: The delicious smell of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.
examples.ko: 따끈따끈 구운 빵의 향기가 부엌을 가득 채웠다.

meanings.english: a pleased, kind, or amused facial expression typically with the corners of the mouth turned up

examples.en: She couldn't help but smile when she saw the adorable puppy.
examples.ko: 그녀는 귀여운 강아지를 보고 웃음을 참을 수 없었다.

meanings.english: the visible vapor and gases given off by a burning or smoldering substance; to inhale and exhale the fumes of burning tobacco

examples.en: The chimney was billowing smoke from the fireplace.
examples.ko: 벽난로에서 연기가 솟아나고 있었다.

meanings.english: Having an even and level surface; free from roughness.

examples.en: The baby's skin felt smooth to the touch.
examples.ko: 아기의 피부는 만져도 부드러웠다.

meanings.english: A small amount of food eaten between meals.

examples.en: I like to have a healthy snack like fruits in the afternoon.
examples.ko: 나는 오후에 과일 같은 건강한 간식을 좋아해.

meanings.english: A long, legless reptile that moves by winding its body in an S shape.

examples.en: We saw a snake slithering across the path in the forest.
examples.ko: 우리는 숲 속 길을 기어가는 뱀을 보았다.

meanings.english: To make a sharp cracking sound.

examples.en: He snapped his fingers to get the dog's attention.
examples.ko: 그는 손가락을 튕겨서 개의 주의를 끌었다.

meanings.english: To move quietly and secretly in order to avoid being noticed.

examples.en: The cat tried to sneak up on the bird without making a sound.
examples.ko: 고양이는 소리 없이 새에게 가까이 다가가려고 했다.

meanings.english: Atmospheric water vapor frozen into ice crystals and falling in light white flakes or lying on the ground as a white layer.

examples.en: The children were excited to play in the snow during winter.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 겨울에 눈으로 놀 수 있어서 흥분했다.

meanings.english: To such a great extent.

examples.en: She was so tired that she fell asleep immediately.
examples.ko: 그녀는 너무 피곤해서 즉시 잠들었다.

meanings.english: To make or allow something to become thoroughly wet by immersing it in liquid.

examples.en: You should soak the beans in water before cooking them.
examples.ko: 콩을 요리하기 전에 물에 푹 불려야 해.

meanings.english: A substance used for washing and cleaning.

examples.en: She used a bar of soap to wash her hands.
examples.ko: 그녀는 손을 씻기 위해 비누 한 조각을 사용했다.

meanings.english: A game played by two teams of eleven players with a round ball that is kicked and headed without using hands or arms.

examples.en: He enjoys playing soccer with his friends on weekends.
examples.ko: 주말에 친구들과 축구를 즐기는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: Relating to society and its organization; relating to human society and its members.

examples.en: She is a very social person who enjoys meeting new people.
examples.ko: 그녀는 새로운 사람들을 만나는 것을 즐기는 매우 사교적인 사람이다.

meanings.english: The aggregate of people living together in a more or less ordered community.

examples.en: Our society values equality and diversity.
examples.ko: 우리 사회는 평등과 다양성을 중요시한다.

meanings.english: The study of society, social institutions, and social relationships.

examples.en: She decided to major in sociology to better understand human behavior.
examples.ko: 그녀는 인간 행동을 더 잘 이해하기 위해 사회학을 전공하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: A garment for the foot and lower part of the leg, typically knitted from wool, cotton, or nylon.

examples.en: He put on a pair of warm socks to keep his feet cozy.
examples.ko: 그는 발을 따뜻하게 유지하기 위해 한 켤레의 따뜻한 양말을 신었다.

meanings.english: Easily yielding to pressure or weight; gentle, mild, or kind.

examples.en: The kitten's fur was soft to the touch.
examples.ko: 새끼 고양이의 털은 만져도 부드러웠다.

meanings.english: The programs and other operating information used by a computer.

examples.en: She is studying computer science and learning how to develop software.
examples.ko: 그녀는 컴퓨터 과학을 공부하며 소프트웨어를 개발하는 방법을 배우고 있다.

meanings.english: The top layer of the earth's surface in which plants grow, a black or dark brown material typically consisting of a mixture of organic substances

examples.en: The soil in the garden is rich and fertile.
examples.ko: 정원의 토양은 풍부하고 비옥합니다.

meanings.english: A person who serves in an army

examples.en: My grandfather was a brave soldier during the war.
examples.ko: 제 할아버지는 전쟁 중 용감한 군인이었습니다.

meanings.english: Being the only one of its kind; single or solitary

examples.en: She is the sole survivor of the accident.
examples.ko: 그녀는 사고의 유일한 생존자입니다.

meanings.english: Firm and stable in shape; not liquid or fluid

examples.en: Ice turns into a solid when it freezes.
examples.ko: 얼음은 얼 때 고체로 변합니다.

meanings.english: To find an answer to, explanation for, or means of effectively dealing with (a problem or mystery)

examples.en: We need to solve this math problem before the class ends.
examples.ko: 수업이 끝나기 전에 이 수학 문제를 해결해야 해요.

meanings.english: An unspecified amount or number of

examples.en: I have some books on my desk.
examples.ko: 내 책상 위에 일부 책이 있어요.

meanings.english: To some extent; a little

examples.en: I feel somewhat tired after a long day at work.
examples.ko: 긴 하루 일한 후에는 어느 정도 피곤해요.

meanings.english: A male child in relation to his parents

examples.en: My son is studying in college.
examples.ko: 내 아들은 대학교에서 공부하고 있어요.

meanings.english: A musical composition with lyrics for singing

examples.en: She sang a beautiful song at the concert.
examples.ko: 그녀는 콘서트에서 아름다운 노래를 불렀다.

meanings.english: In a short time; before long

examples.en: We will leave for the airport soon.
examples.ko: 우리는 곧 공항으로 떠날 것이다.

meanings.english: Having refined taste, manners, or knowledge

examples.en: She is a sophisticate who appreciates fine art.
examples.ko: 그녀는 고급 예술을 감상하는 세련된 사람이다.

meanings.english: Painful or aching; tender

examples.en: His sore throat made it difficult to swallow.
examples.ko: 그의 목이 아파서 삼키기 어려웠다.

meanings.english: Feeling regret, sympathy, or disappointment

examples.en: I'm sorry for being late to the meeting.
examples.ko: 회의에 늦어서 미안합니다.

meanings.english: A category or type of something

examples.en: Can you help me sort these books by genre?
examples.ko: 이 책들을 장르별로 분류하는 데 도와줄 수 있나요?

meanings.english: The spiritual or immaterial part of a human being

examples.en: She believed that the soul lives on after death.
examples.ko: 그녀는 영혼이 죽은 뒤에도 살아간다고 믿었다.

meanings.english: Vibrations that travel through the air and can be heard

examples.en: The sound of waves crashing against the shore was soothing.
examples.ko: 파도가 해변에 부딪치는 소리는 진정했다.

meanings.english: a liquid food made by boiling meat, fish, or vegetables in water

examples.en: I love to have a bowl of hot soup on a cold day.
examples.ko: 추운 날에 따뜻한 국 한 그릇 먹는 걸 좋아해.

meanings.english: having a sharp, biting taste like lemon or vinegar

examples.en: The lemonade tasted too sour for my liking.
examples.ko: 나는 레몬에이드가 내 취향에 너무 신해서 못 먹겠다.

meanings.english: the place where something comes from or is obtained

examples.en: The river is the main source of water for the village.
examples.ko: 그 강은 그 마을의 주요 수원지다.

meanings.english: the direction towards the point on the horizon 90 degrees clockwise from east

examples.en: We are planning to travel south for our vacation.
examples.ko: 휴가 때 남쪽으로 여행을 가기로 계획 중이야.

meanings.english: a continuous area or expanse that is free, available, or unoccupied

examples.en: There is not enough space in the room for a big table.
examples.ko: 그 방에는 큰 탁자를 놓을 만한 공간이 충분하지 않아.

meanings.english: a type of pasta in the form of long, thin strings

examples.en: My favorite dish is spaghetti with meatballs.
examples.ko: 내가 가장 좋아하는 요리는 고기볼이 들어간 스파게티야.

meanings.english: the full extent of something from end to end; the length of time

examples.en: The bridge has a span of 300 meters.
examples.ko: 그 다리의 길이는 300미터야.

meanings.english: additional to what is required for ordinary use

examples.en: Do you have a spare pen I can borrow?
examples.ko: 빌릴 수 있는 여분의 펜 있어?

meanings.english: A small fiery particle thrown off from a fire, alight in ashes, or produced by striking together two hard surfaces such as stone or metal.

examples.en: The spark from the campfire lit up the night sky.
examples.ko: 캠프파이어에서 나온 불꽃이 밤하늘을 밝혔다.

meanings.english: To communicate or express thoughts, feelings, or information by speaking.

examples.en: She speaks three languages fluently.
examples.ko: 그녀는 세 가지 언어를 유창하게 구사한다.

meanings.english: A group of living organisms consisting of similar individuals capable of exchanging genes or interbreeding.

examples.en: There are many different species of birds in the forest.
examples.ko: 숲 속에는 다양한 종류의 새들이 살고 있다.

meanings.english: Clearly defined or identified; precise or exact.

examples.en: Please provide specific details about the incident.
examples.ko: 그 사건에 대해 구체적인 세부사항을 제공해 주세요.

meanings.english: A visually striking performance or display; an event or scene regarded in terms of its visual impact.

examples.en: The fireworks show was a spectacular spectacle.
examples.ko: 불꽃놀이는 환상적인 광경이었다.

meanings.english: A band of colors, as seen in a rainbow, produced by separation of the components of light by their different degrees of refraction according to wavelength.

examples.en: The spectrum of visible light ranges from red to violet.
examples.ko: 가시광선의 스펙트럼은 빨강부터 보라색까지이다.

meanings.english: The expression of or the ability to express thoughts and feelings by articulate sounds.

examples.en: The president delivered a powerful speech to the nation.
examples.ko: 대통령이 국민에게 강력한 연설을 했다.

meanings.english: The rate at which someone or something moves or operates or is able to move or operate.

examples.en: The car was traveling at a high speed on the highway.
examples.ko: 차는 고속도로에서 빠른 속도로 이동하고 있었다.

meanings.english: to say, write, or show the letters of a word in the correct order

examples.en: Can you spell your name for me?
examples.ko: 당신의 이름을 맞춰서 말해 줄 수 있나요?

meanings.english: to use money to buy or pay for something

examples.en: I spent all my allowance on video games.
examples.ko: 나는 용돈을 모두 비디오 게임에 썼다.

meanings.english: a round object, or a shape that is like a ball

examples.en: The crystal ball is a sphere used for fortune-telling.
examples.ko: 수정 구슬은 점을 치는 데 사용되는 구체이다.

meanings.english: to accidentally pour out the contents of a container

examples.en: Be careful not to spill your drink on the carpet.
examples.ko: 카펫에 음료를 엎지르지 않도록 조심하세요.

meanings.english: to turn or cause something to turn around repeatedly

examples.en: The dancer can spin around very fast.
examples.ko: 춤추는 사람은 아주 빨리 돌 수 있어요.

meanings.english: the non-physical part of a person which is the seat of emotions and character

examples.en: She showed great spirit in facing the challenge.
examples.ko: 그녀는 도전에 맞서며 큰 의지를 보였다.

meanings.english: to force out the contents of the mouth, especially saliva

examples.en: Please do not spit on the sidewalk.
examples.ko: 인도에 침을 뱉지 마세요.

meanings.english: to cause liquid to scatter in flying masses

examples.en: The kids love to splash in the puddles after the rain.
examples.ko: 아이들은 비 후 웅덩이에서 물을 튀기는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: to divide into parts or sections

examples.en: She split the cake into slices.
examples.ko: 그녀는 케이크를 조각으로 나눴다.

meanings.english: to ruin or damage something

examples.en: Leaving food out in the sun will spoil it.
examples.ko: 해에 두고 놓은 음식은 상할 것이다.

meanings.english: to support financially or through other means

examples.en: The company will sponsor the event.
examples.ko: 회사가 그 행사를 후원할 것이다.

meanings.english: a tool used for eating or serving food, with a small bowl-shaped end

examples.en: She stirred her tea with a spoon.
examples.ko: 그녀는 숟가락으로 차를 저었다.

meanings.english: physical activity or game that involves skill and competition

examples.en: He enjoys playing various sports like soccer and basketball.
examples.ko: 그는 축구와 농구와 같은 다양한 스포츠를 즐긴다.

meanings.english: a small mark or stain

examples.en: There was a spot of paint on his shirt.
examples.ko: 그의 셔츠에는 한 점의 페인트 자국이 있었다.

meanings.english: a husband or wife

examples.en: She has been happily married to her spouse for 10 years.
examples.ko: 그녀는 10년 동안 행복하게 배우자와 결혼했다.

meanings.english: to disperse liquid in small drops

examples.en: She sprayed perfume on her wrist.
examples.ko: 그녀는 손목에 향수를 뿌렸다.

meanings.english: to open out, arrange, or place (something) over a surface

examples.en: She spread the blanket on the grass.
examples.ko: 그녀는 이불을 잔디 위에 펼쳤다.

meanings.english: the season between winter and summer when plants begin to grow

examples.en: The flowers bloom in spring.
examples.ko: 꽃들은 봄에 피어난다.

meanings.english: a person who secretly collects and reports information about the activities, movements, and plans of an enemy or competitor

examples.en: The spy gathered intelligence on the enemy's plans.
examples.ko: 스파이는 적의 계획에 대한 정보를 수집했다.

meanings.english: a plane figure with four equal straight sides and four right angles

examples.en: The table has a square top.
examples.ko: 테이블은 정사각형 모양의 위쪽을 가지고 있다.

meanings.english: to press something firmly, especially from all sides in order to change its shape, reduce its size, or remove liquid from it

examples.en: She squeezed the orange to make juice.
examples.ko: 그녀는 주스를 만들기 위해 오렌지를 짰다.

meanings.english: not likely to change or fail; firmly established

examples.en: The economy is finally stable after the reforms.
examples.ko: 개혁 이후에 경제는 드디어 안정되었다.

meanings.english: to arrange things in a pile, usually neatly

examples.en: She stacked the books on the shelf.
examples.ko: 그녀는 책들을 선반에 쌓았다.

meanings.english: the employees of a business or organization

examples.en: The staff is working hard to meet the deadline.
examples.ko: 직원들은 마감일을 맞추기 위해 열심히 일하고 있다.

meanings.english: A raised floor or platform where performers stand to be seen by an audience.

examples.en: The actors performed on the stage.
examples.ko: 배우들이 무대에서 연기했다.

meanings.english: A colored patch or dirty mark that is difficult to remove.

examples.en: The coffee stain on the table was hard to clean.
examples.ko: 테이블 위의 커피 얼룩은 지우기 어려웠다.

meanings.english: A series of steps or flights of steps for going from one level to another.

examples.en: She climbed the stairs to reach the top floor.
examples.ko: 그녀는 맨 위 층에 도달하기 위해 계단을 올라갔다.

meanings.english: A small piece of paper with a design on it that is stuck onto a letter or package to show that the cost of sending it has been paid.

examples.en: He put a stamp on the envelope before mailing it.
examples.ko: 우편을 보내기 전에 그는 봉투에 우표를 붙였다.

meanings.english: To be in or maintain an upright position, supported by one's feet.

examples.en: Please stand up when the national anthem is played.
examples.ko: 국가 애국가가 연주될 때 일어서 주세요.

meanings.english: A level of quality or attainment that is considered acceptable or desirable.

examples.en: This product meets the industry standard for safety.
examples.ko: 이 제품은 안전을 위한 산업 표준을 충족시킨다.

meanings.english: A fixed luminous point in the night sky that is a large, remote incandescent body like the sun.

examples.en: The stars were shining brightly in the clear night sky.
examples.ko: 맑은 밤하늘에 별들이 밝게 빛나고 있었다.

meanings.english: To look fixedly or vacantly at someone or something with one's eyes wide open.

examples.en: She stared at the painting on the wall for a long time.
examples.ko: 그녀는 벽에 걸린 그림을 오랫동안 응시했다.

meanings.english: To begin or set in motion

examples.en: Let's start the meeting now.
examples.ko: 지금 회의를 시작합시다.

meanings.english: To suffer or die from lack of food

examples.en: Many people in the world starve due to poverty.
examples.ko: 많은 사람들이 가난으로 인해 굶주립니다.

meanings.english: The condition or circumstances of a person or thing

examples.en: She is in a state of shock after hearing the news.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그 소식을 듣고 충격 상태에 있습니다.

meanings.english: A place where trains or buses regularly stop for passengers

examples.en: I will meet you at the train station at 3 PM.
examples.ko: 오후 3시에 기차역에서 너를 만날게.

meanings.english: A numerical fact or data used to analyze something

examples.en: The statistic shows an increase in the number of students attending college.
examples.ko: 통계는 대학에 다니는 학생 수가 증가했다는 것을 보여줍니다.

meanings.english: A sculpture representing a person or animal

examples.en: The statue of liberty is a famous landmark in New York City.
examples.ko: 자유의 여신상은 뉴욕시의 유명한 랜드마크입니다.

meanings.english: The position or rank of someone in relation to others

examples.en: He achieved a high status in his career through hard work.
examples.ko: 그는 열심히 일하여 경력에서 높은 지위를 달성했습니다.

meanings.english: To remain in a particular place or situation

examples.en: I will stay at my friend's house for the weekend.
examples.ko: 주말에 친구 집에 머물러 있을 거야.

meanings.english: firmly fixed, supported, or balanced; not shaking or moving

examples.en: She took steady steps towards her goal.
examples.ko: 그녀는 목표로 향해 꾸준한 걸음을 내디뎠다.

meanings.english: a slice of meat, typically beef, cooked by broiling, frying, or grilling

examples.en: I ordered a medium-rare steak for dinner.
examples.ko: 저녁으로 미디엄 레어 스테이크를 주문했다.

meanings.english: to take (something) without permission or legal right and without intending to return it

examples.en: He tried to steal money from the cash register.
examples.ko: 그는 금전을 현금 등록기에서 훔치려고 시도했다.

meanings.english: the hot gas that is produced when water boils

examples.en: The steam from the kettle fogged up the kitchen window.
examples.ko: 주전자에서 나오는 증기가 부엌 창문을 흐릿하게 만들었다.

meanings.english: a hard, strong, gray or bluish-gray alloy of iron with carbon and usually other elements

examples.en: The bridge was constructed using steel beams.
examples.ko: 그 다리는 강철 보를 사용하여 건설되었다.

meanings.english: rising or falling sharply; almost straight up and down

examples.en: The mountain path became too steep to climb.
examples.ko: 산길이 너무 가파르게 되어 올라갈 수 없었다.

meanings.english: the main body or stalk of a plant or shrub; to originate or derive from

examples.en: The rose stem had thorns along its length.
examples.ko: 장미 줄기에는 길게 가시가 있었다.

meanings.english: an act or movement of putting one leg in front of the other in walking or running

examples.en: She took a step forward to get a better view.
examples.ko: 더 나은 전망을 얻기 위해 한 걸음 앞으로 나아갔다.

meanings.english: to adhere or cling to something

examples.en: The sticker won't stick to the wall.
examples.ko: 스티커가 벽에 붙지 않아요.

meanings.english: rigid or not easily bent

examples.en: The new shoes are stiff and uncomfortable.
examples.ko: 새 신발이 딱딱해서 불편해요.

meanings.english: not moving or making a sound

examples.en: The lake was still and calm in the morning.
examples.ko: 아침에 호수는 여전히 조용하고 평온했다.

meanings.english: to encourage or excite a response or activity

examples.en: Music can stimulate creativity in children.
examples.ko: 음악은 아이들의 창의력을 자극할 수 있다.

meanings.english: to mix or agitate with a circular motion

examples.en: Please stir the soup before serving.
examples.ko: 서빙하기 전에 국을 휘젓어 주세요.

meanings.english: to sew or mend with a needle and thread

examples.en: She had to stitch up the tear in her shirt.
examples.ko: 그녀는 셔츠의 찢어진 부분을 꿰매야 했다.

meanings.english: inventory of goods or ownership of shares in a company

examples.en: The store needs to restock its inventory.
examples.ko: 가게는 재고를 보충해야 합니다.

meanings.english: the organ in the body where food is digested

examples.en: Her stomach growled because she was hungry.
examples.ko: 그녀의 배는 배고픈 상태였기 때문에 울렸다.

meanings.english: a hard solid nonmetallic mineral matter of which rock is made

examples.en: She skipped a stone across the water.
examples.ko: 그녀는 돌을 물 위로 던졌다.

meanings.english: to cease moving or operating

examples.en: The bus will stop at the next corner.
examples.ko: 버스는 다음 모퉁이에서 멈출 것이다.

meanings.english: a retail establishment selling items to the public

examples.en: I need to go to the store to buy some groceries.
examples.ko: 식료품을 사러 가게에 가야 해.

meanings.english: a violent disturbance of the atmosphere with strong winds and usually rain, thunder, lightning, or snow

examples.en: The storm knocked down trees and power lines.
examples.ko: 폭풍이 나무와 전선을 쓰러뜨렸다.

meanings.english: a narrative, either true or fictitious, in prose or verse, designed to interest, amuse, or instruct the hearer or reader

examples.en: She told us a story about her adventures in the jungle.
examples.ko: 그녀는 우리에게 정글에서의 모험에 관한 이야기를 했다.

meanings.english: a kitchen appliance used for cooking food

examples.en: She cooked dinner on the stove.
examples.ko: 그녀는 저녁 식사를 가스레인지에서 요리했다.

meanings.english: extending or moving uniformly in one direction only; without a curve or bend

examples.en: The road is straight for miles.
examples.ko: 길이 몇 마일 동안 곧다.

meanings.english: a force tending to pull or stretch something to an extreme or damaging degree

examples.en: Lifting heavy boxes can put strain on your back.
examples.ko: 무거운 상자를 들면 등에 부담이 갈 수 있다.

meanings.english: unusual or surprising in a way that is unsettling or hard to understand

examples.en: It's strange that he didn't show up for the meeting.
examples.ko: 그가 회의에 나타나지 않은 것이 이상하다.

meanings.english: a plan of action designed to achieve a long-term or overall aim

examples.en: Our company needs a new marketing strategy to attract more customers.
examples.ko: 우리 회사는 더 많은 고객을 유치하기 위해 새로운 마케팅 전략이 필요하다.

meanings.english: a sweet soft red fruit with tiny seeds on its surface

examples.en: I love eating fresh strawberries in the summer.
examples.ko: 여름에 신선한 딸기를 먹는 것을 좋아해.

meanings.english: a small, narrow river

examples.en: Children were playing by the stream, catching fish.
examples.ko: 어린이들이 시냇가에서 놀며 물고기를 잡고 있었다.

meanings.english: a public road in a city or town, typically with buildings on either side

examples.en: The street was bustling with people shopping and walking around.
examples.ko: 거리는 쇼핑하고 걷는 사람들로 북적거렸다.

meanings.english: pressure or tension exerted on a material object or a mental state

examples.en: Too much stress can lead to health problems.
examples.ko: 너무 많은 스트레스는 건강 문제로 이어질 수 있다.

meanings.english: to make something longer or wider by pulling it

examples.en: Remember to stretch your muscles before exercising to prevent injuries.
examples.ko: 부상을 예방하기 위해 운동 전에 근육을 스트레칭하는 것을 잊지 마세요.

meanings.english: demanding that rules concerning behavior are obeyed and observed

examples.en: The teacher is very strict about homework deadlines.
examples.ko: 선생님은 숙제 마감일에 대해 매우 엄격하다.

meanings.english: to hit forcefully or deliberately

examples.en: He struck the ball with great force.
examples.ko: 그는 큰 힘으로 공을 치다.

meanings.english: a thin piece of cord used to tie, bind, or hang things

examples.en: She tied the package with a piece of string.
examples.ko: 그녀는 물건을 끈 한 조각으로 묶었다.

meanings.english: to remove clothing or covering from something

examples.en: He stripped off his wet clothes after coming in from the rain.
examples.ko: 그는 비에서 들어와서 젖은 옷을 벗었다.

meanings.english: a long, narrow band or strip differing in color or texture from the surface on either side of it

examples.en: She wore a dress with blue and white stripes.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파랑과 흰색 줄무늬가 있는 드레스를 입었다.

meanings.english: to move one's hand or an object gently along a surface

examples.en: She stroked the cat's fur softly.
examples.ko: 그녀는 고양이 털을 부드럽게 쓰다.

meanings.english: having the power to move heavy weights or perform other physically demanding tasks

examples.en: He is a strong man who can lift heavy boxes easily.
examples.ko: 그는 쉽게 무거운 상자를 들 수 있는 강한 사람이다.

meanings.english: the arrangement of and relations between the parts or elements of something complex

examples.en: The structure of the building was carefully designed by the architect.
examples.ko: 건물의 구조는 건축가에 의해 신중하게 설계되었다.

meanings.english: to make forceful or violent efforts to get free of restraint or constriction

examples.en: She struggled to break free from the ropes that bound her.
examples.ko: 그녀는 자신을 묶은 밧줄에서 벗어나려고 애를 썼다.

meanings.english: A room where an artist, photographer, or designer works

examples.en: She set up her art studio in the attic.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다락방에 예술 작업실을 설치했다.

meanings.english: To spend time learning about a subject

examples.en: He likes to study in the library for his exams.
examples.ko: 그는 시험을 위해 도서관에서 공부하는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: Things that are considered as a group or mass, often without much thought

examples.en: She packed her stuff and moved to a new city.
examples.ko: 그녀는 물건을 싸서 새로운 도시로 이사했다.

meanings.english: A particular way in which something is done, created, or performed

examples.en: Her fashion style is unique and eye-catching.
examples.ko: 그녀의 패션 스타일은 독특하고 눈에 띈다.

meanings.english: A topic that is being discussed, studied, or written about

examples.en: Math is his favorite subject in school.
examples.ko: 수학은 그의 학교에서 가장 좋아하는 과목이다.

meanings.english: A ship that can operate underwater

examples.en: The navy uses submarines for underwater missions.
examples.ko: 해군은 잠수함을 수중 작전에 사용한다.

meanings.english: To give something for a decision to be made by others

examples.en: Please submit your homework by the end of the week.
examples.ko: 이번 주 마감일까지 숙제를 제출해 주세요.

meanings.english: To pay to receive regular copies of a publication or access to a service

examples.en: She decided to subscribe to the magazine for fashion tips.
examples.ko: 그녀는 패션 팁을 위해 그 잡지를 구독하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: a particular kind of matter with uniform properties

examples.en: Water is a vital substance for all living organisms.
examples.ko: 물은 모든 생물에게 필수적인 물질이다.

meanings.english: to use or add in place of another

examples.en: I had to substitute butter with margarine in the recipe.
examples.ko: 나는 레시피에서 버터를 마가린으로 대체해야 했다.

meanings.english: not immediately obvious; elusive

examples.en: She noticed the subtle change in his tone of voice.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그의 목소리 톤의 미묘한 변화에 주목했다.

meanings.english: a residential district located on the outskirts of a city

examples.en: Many families prefer living in the suburbs for a quieter environment.
examples.ko: 많은 가족들이 조용한 환경을 선호해 교외에 살고 있다.

meanings.english: an underground railway system for public transportation

examples.en: I take the subway to work every day.
examples.ko: 나는 매일 지하철을 타고 출근한다.

meanings.english: to achieve a desired aim or result

examples.en: With hard work and determination, you can succeed in anything you set your mind to.
examples.ko: 열심히 노력하고 결의를 갖는다면, 마음먹은 모든 일에 성공할 수 있다.

meanings.english: the accomplishment of an aim or purpose

examples.en: His hard work and dedication led to his success in the competition.
examples.ko: 그의 노력과 헌신이 그를 대회에서 성공으로 이끌었다.

meanings.english: of the type previously mentioned

examples.en: She had never seen such a beautiful sunset before.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그 전에는 본 적이 없는 아름다운 일몰을 보았다.

meanings.english: To draw into the mouth by contracting the muscles of the lips and mouth to make a partial vacuum.

examples.en: Babies suck their thumbs for comfort.
examples.ko: 아기들은 안심을 위해 엄지손가락을 빨아요.

meanings.english: Happening or coming unexpectedly.

examples.en: The sudden rain caught us off guard.
examples.ko: 갑작스러운 비로 우리를 당황하게 만들었어요.

meanings.english: To experience something unpleasant or painful.

examples.en: She suffered from a headache all day.
examples.ko: 그녀는 하루 종일 두통으로 고통을 받았어요.

meanings.english: To be enough or adequate.

examples.en: A simple apology may suffice to resolve the issue.
examples.ko: 간단한 사과가 문제를 해결하는 데 충분할 수도 있어요.

meanings.english: A sweet crystalline substance obtained from various plants.

examples.en: I like my coffee with a little sugar.
examples.ko: 저는 커피에 조금 설탕을 넣어 마셔요.

meanings.english: To put forward for consideration or to imply.

examples.en: She suggested going to the park for a picnic.
examples.ko: 그녀는 소풍을 위해 공원에 가는 것을 제안했어요.

meanings.english: The act of intentionally causing one's own death.

examples.en: Suicide is a serious issue that requires attention and support.
examples.ko: 자살은 주의와 지원이 필요한 심각한 문제입니다.

meanings.english: A set of clothes made of the same fabric, typically consisting of a jacket and trousers.

examples.en: He wore a sharp suit to the job interview.
examples.ko: 그는 면접에 예쁜 정장을 입었어요.

meanings.english: a set of rooms designated for one person's or one group's use or for a particular purpose

examples.en: The hotel suite had a bedroom, living room, and kitchenette.
examples.ko: 호텔 스위트는 침실, 거실, 주방이 있는 공간이었다.

meanings.english: the total amount resulting from the addition of two or more numbers

examples.en: The sum of 5 and 3 is 8.
examples.ko: 5와 3의 합은 8이다.

meanings.english: the warmest season of the year, occurring between spring and autumn

examples.en: We love going to the beach in the summer.
examples.ko: 여름에는 해변에 가는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: the highest point of a hill or mountain

examples.en: Reaching the summit of the mountain was a challenging but rewarding experience.
examples.ko: 산 정상에 도달하는 것은 어려운 일이었지만 보람찬 경험이었다.

meanings.english: the star around which the Earth orbits, providing light and heat

examples.en: The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.
examples.ko: 태양은 동쪽에서 뜨고 서쪽에서 진다.

meanings.english: excellent, first-rate, superior in quality or performance

examples.en: She did a super job on her school project.
examples.ko: 그녀는 학교 프로젝트를 아주 잘 해냈다.

meanings.english: excellently done, splendid, very impressive

examples.en: The chef prepared a superb meal for the guests.
examples.ko: 요리사가 손님들을 위해 훌륭한 식사를 준비했다.

meanings.english: higher in rank, quality, or importance

examples.en: The superior performance of the team led them to victory.
examples.ko: 팀의 우수한 성과가 그들을 승리로 이끌었다.

meanings.english: to oversee, manage, or direct

examples.en: She supervises the project to ensure it stays on track.
examples.ko: 그녀는 프로젝트를 감독하여 계획대로 진행되도록 한다.

meanings.english: an evening meal, typically a light or informal one

examples.en: We usually have supper around 7 PM.
examples.ko: 우리는 보통 7시경에 저녁을 먹는다.

meanings.english: something added to complete a thing, make up for a deficiency, or extend or strengthen the whole

examples.en: She takes vitamin supplements to stay healthy.
examples.ko: 그녀는 건강을 유지하기 위해 비타민 보충제를 복용한다.

meanings.english: to provide something that is needed or wanted

examples.en: The store supplies fresh fruits and vegetables.
examples.ko: 가게는 신선한 과일과 채소를 공급한다.

meanings.english: to help, assist, or be there for someone or something

examples.en: Family and friends support each other during difficult times.
examples.ko: 가족과 친구들은 어려운 시기에 서로를 지원한다.

meanings.english: to assume something is true without evidence, to guess

examples.en: I suppose she will arrive late, as usual.
examples.ko: 그녀가 보통처럼 늦게 도착할 것이라고 가정해 봅니다.

meanings.english: certain, confident, without doubt

examples.en: I am sure I left my keys on the table.
examples.ko: 내 열쇠를 탁자 위에 두었음을 확신합니다.

meanings.english: the outer or topmost part of something

examples.en: The boat slowly rose to the surface of the water.
examples.ko: 보트가 천천히 물 위로 올라왔다.

meanings.english: medical treatment that involves cutting open a person's body to repair or remove something

examples.en: The surgery was successful, and the patient is recovering well.
examples.ko: 수술은 성공적이었고, 환자는 잘 회복하고 있습니다.

meanings.english: to make someone feel unexpectedly amazed or shocked

examples.en: She planned a surprise party for her best friend's birthday.
examples.ko: 그녀는 친구의 생일을 위해 의외로 파티를 준비했습니다.

meanings.english: to give up or hand over control to someone else

examples.en: The enemy troops were forced to surrender after a long battle.
examples.ko: 긴 전투 끝에 적군은 항복해야 했습니다.

meanings.english: to be all around someone or something

examples.en: The beautiful garden was surrounded by tall trees.
examples.ko: 아름다운 정원은 키 큰 나무들로 둘러싸여 있었습니다.

meanings.english: to examine or look at something carefully in order to gather information

examples.en: The company conducted a survey to understand customer satisfaction.
examples.ko: 회사는 고객 만족도를 이해하기 위해 조사를 실시했습니다.

meanings.english: to continue to live or exist, especially after a dangerous situation

examples.en: Despite the harsh conditions, the explorers managed to survive in the wilderness.
examples.ko: 가혹한 환경에도 불구하고, 탐험가들은 황야에서 살아남았습니다.

meanings.english: to believe that someone may have committed a crime or done something wrong

examples.en: The detective suspected the butler of stealing the valuable necklace.
examples.ko: 형사는 집사가 값비싼 목걸이를 훔쳤을 것으로 의심했습니다.

meanings.english: to temporarily stop something from happening or being in effect

examples.en: The school decided to suspend classes due to the heavy snowstorm.
examples.ko: 학교는 폭설로 인해 수업을 일시 중단하기로 결정했습니다.

meanings.english: to support, hold, or bear up from below; to keep in existence; maintain

examples.en: We need to find ways to sustain economic growth.
examples.ko: 우리는 경제 성장을 유지할 방법을 찾아야 합니다.

meanings.english: to cause or allow something to pass down the throat

examples.en: She took a deep breath and swallowed the pill.
examples.ko: 그녀는 깊게 숨을 들이마시고 알약을 삼켰다.

meanings.english: to make a solemn declaration or affirmation with an appeal to a deity or to some revered person or thing

examples.en: He swore to tell the truth in court.
examples.ko: 그는 법정에서 진실을 말할 것을 맹세했다.

meanings.english: to excrete perspiration through the pores in the skin

examples.en: After running for an hour, he was sweating profusely.
examples.ko: 한 시간 동안 뛰어서 그는 심하게 땀을 흘렸다.

meanings.english: a knitted garment typically with long sleeves, worn over the upper body

examples.en: She wore a cozy sweater to keep warm in the cold weather.
examples.ko: 그녀는 추운 날씨에 따뜻하게 입기 위해 아늑한 스웨터를 입었다.

meanings.english: to clean or clear a space or surface with a broom or brush

examples.en: She swept the floor before the guests arrived.
examples.ko: 손님이 도착하기 전에 그녀는 바닥을 썼다.

meanings.english: having the pleasant taste characteristic of sugar or honey; not salty, sour, or bitter

examples.en: She loves to eat sweet desserts like cakes and cookies.
examples.ko: 그녀는 케이크나 쿠키와 같은 달콤한 디저트를 좋아한다.

meanings.english: to increase in size or volume as a result of internal pressure; to become larger or rounder in size

examples.en: The injured area began to swell after he bumped into the table.
examples.ko: 상처를 입은 부위가 탁자에 부딪힌 후 부풀기 시작했다.

meanings.english: moving or capable of moving with great speed

examples.en: The cheetah is known for its swift running speed.
examples.ko: 치타는 빠른 속도로 달리는 것으로 알려져 있습니다.

meanings.english: to move through water by moving the body or parts of the body

examples.en: I love to swim in the ocean during the summer.
examples.ko: 여름에 바다에서 수영하는 것을 좋아합니다.

meanings.english: to move back and forth or from side to side while hanging from something

examples.en: Children love to swing on the playground swings.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 놀이터 그네에서 흔들리는 것을 좋아합니다.

meanings.english: to change from one thing to another

examples.en: Don't forget to switch off the lights before leaving the room.
examples.ko: 방을 나가기 전에 전등을 끄는 것을 잊지 마세요.

meanings.english: a thing that represents or stands for something else

examples.en: The dove is often used as a symbol of peace.
examples.ko: 비둘기는 종종 평화의 상징으로 사용됩니다.

meanings.english: feelings of pity and sorrow for someone else's misfortune

examples.en: I have sympathy for those who are going through a difficult time.
examples.ko: 어려운 시기를 겪고 있는 사람들에게 동정을 표합니다.

meanings.english: a long piece of music for an orchestra, usually with several different sections

examples.en: Attending a symphony concert is a wonderful experience for music lovers.
examples.ko: 교향악단의 연주회에 참석하는 것은 음악 애호가들에게 훌륭한 경험입니다.

meanings.english: a physical or mental feature that is regarded as indicating a condition of disease

examples.en: Fever is a common symptom of the flu.
examples.ko: 열은 독감의 일반적인 증상입니다.

meanings.english: A set of connected things or parts forming a complex whole

examples.en: The school has a new system for grading students.
examples.ko: 학교는 학생들을 평가하는 새로운 체계를 도입했다.

meanings.english: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs

examples.en: We sat around the table to have dinner together.
examples.ko: 우리는 함께 저녁을 먹기 위해 탁자 주위에 앉았다.

meanings.english: Deal with a problem or difficult task

examples.en: We need to tackle the issue of pollution in our city.
examples.ko: 우리 도시의 오염 문제를 해결해야 한다.

meanings.english: A label attached to someone or something for identification or classification

examples.en: Please put your name tag on your bag.
examples.ko: 가방에 이름표를 붙여주세요.

meanings.english: The hindmost part of an animal, especially when extended beyond the rest of the body

examples.en: The cat wagged its tail happily.
examples.ko: 고양이가 행복하게 꼬리를 흔들었다.

meanings.english: To hold, grasp, or grip

examples.en: Please take my hand and follow me.
examples.ko: 내 손을 잡고 따라와주세요.

meanings.english: A fictitious or true narrative or story, especially one that is imaginatively recounted

examples.en: Grandma told us a tale about her childhood adventures.
examples.ko: 할머니는 어린 시절 모험에 관한 이야기를 했다.

meanings.english: Natural aptitude or skill

examples.en: She has a talent for playing the piano.
examples.ko: 그녀는 피아노 연주에 재능이 있다.

meanings.english: To have a conversation with someone

examples.en: I like to talk to my friends after school.
examples.ko: 나는 방과 후에 친구들과 이야기하는 것을 좋아해.

meanings.english: Having a greater height than average

examples.en: My brother is very tall for his age.
examples.ko: 내 동생은 그의 나이에 비해 아주 키가 크다.

meanings.english: A large container for holding liquid or gas

examples.en: The army used tanks in the battle.
examples.ko: 군대는 전투에서 탱크를 사용했다.

meanings.english: A device for controlling the flow of liquid; to gently hit something

examples.en: Please tap the screen to open the app.
examples.ko: 앱을 열기 위해 화면을 탭해주세요.

meanings.english: A long, narrow strip of material used for sticking things together or recording

examples.en: I used tape to wrap the present.
examples.ko: 선물을 포장하기 위해 테이프를 사용했다.

meanings.english: An object or place that someone is trying to hit or reach

examples.en: The archer aimed at the target and shot an arrow.
examples.ko: 궁수는 목표물을 조준하고 화살을 쏘았다.

meanings.english: A piece of work to be done or undertaken

examples.en: My task for today is to finish my homework.
examples.ko: 오늘 나의 일은 숙제를 끝내는 것이다.

meanings.english: The sensation of flavor perceived in the mouth and throat on contact with a substance

examples.en: The soup has a delicious taste.
examples.ko: 이 수프는 맛있는 맛이 난다.

meanings.english: Money that people and businesses must pay to the government based on their income or profits.

examples.en: I need to file my tax return by the end of the month.
examples.ko: 이달 말까지 세금 신고를 해야 해.

meanings.english: A car that carries passengers for a fare determined by a meter or flat rate.

examples.en: I took a taxi to the airport this morning.
examples.ko: 오늘 아침 공항까지 택시를 탔어.

meanings.english: A hot drink made by infusing dried, crushed leaves of the tea plant in boiling water.

examples.en: Would you like some tea with your breakfast?
examples.ko: 아침 식사할 때 차 한 잔 드릴까요?

meanings.english: To give knowledge or instruction to someone.

examples.en: She teaches English at the local school.
examples.ko: 그녀는 지역 학교에서 영어를 가르친다.

meanings.english: A group of people who work together to achieve a common goal.

examples.en: Our team won the championship last year.
examples.ko: 우리 팀은 작년에 우승했어.

meanings.english: A drop of salty liquid that comes out of your eye when you cry.

examples.en: She wiped away a tear with her sleeve.
examples.ko: 그녀는 소매로 눈물을 닦았다.

meanings.english: To make fun of or attempt to provoke in a playful or unkind way.

examples.en: Stop teasing your little brother and play nicely with him.
examples.ko: 남동생을 놀리는 건 그만두고 착하게 놀아줘.

meanings.english: A way of carrying out a particular task, especially the execution or performance of an artistic work or a scientific procedure.

examples.en: She is a master of painting techniques.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그림 기술의 대가야.

meanings.english: The application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes, especially in industry.

examples.en: Technology has greatly improved our lives.
examples.ko: 기술은 우리 삶을 크게 향상시켰다.

meanings.english: Relating to or characteristic of teenagers.

examples.en: Teenage years can be challenging for many young people.
examples.ko: 10대 시기는 많은 젊은이들에게 도전적일 수 있다.

meanings.english: A system for transmitting messages from a distance along a wire, especially one creating signals by making and breaking an electrical connection.

examples.en: The telegraph revolutionized long-distance communication.
examples.ko: 전신은 장거리 통신을 혁신했다.

meanings.english: A system for transmitting voices over a distance using wire or radio, by converting acoustic vibrations to electrical signals.

examples.en: I'll call you on the telephone later.
examples.ko: 나중에 전화로 널 부를게.

meanings.english: A system for transmitting visual images and sound that are reproduced on screens, typically in color.

examples.en: We watch television every evening.
examples.ko: 우리는 매일 저녁에 텔레비전을 봅니다.

meanings.english: Communicate information, facts, or news to someone in spoken or written words.

examples.en: Can you tell me what happened?
examples.ko: 무슨 일이 있었는지 말해줄 수 있니?

meanings.english: A measure of the warmth or coldness of an object or substance with reference to some standard value.

examples.en: The temperature outside is very high today.
examples.ko: 오늘 밖의 온도가 매우 높다.

meanings.english: A building devoted to the worship, or regarded as the dwelling place, of a god or gods or other objects of religious reverence.

examples.en: We visited a beautiful temple during our trip.
examples.ko: 여행 중 아름다운 사원을 방문했다.

meanings.english: lasting for only a limited period of time; not permanent

examples.en: I'm staying in a temporary apartment until I find a permanent place.
examples.ko: 나는 영구적인 곳을 찾을 때까지 일시적인 아파트에 머물러 있어.

meanings.english: to entice or attract someone to do something, often something unwise or wrong

examples.en: The delicious smell of fresh cookies tempted me to eat one before dinner.
examples.ko: 신선한 쿠키의 향기가 나를 유혹하여 저녁 전에 하나를 먹게 했다.

meanings.english: the number equivalent to the sum of 9 and 1; one more than nine

examples.en: There are ten fingers on two hands.
examples.ko: 두 손에는 열 손가락이 있다.

meanings.english: a person who occupies land or property rented from a landlord

examples.en: The tenant of the apartment paid rent to the landlord every month.
examples.ko: 그 아파트의 세입자는 매달 집주인에게 임대료를 지불했다.

meanings.english: to regularly or frequently behave in a particular way or have a certain characteristic

examples.en: She tends to be late for appointments.
examples.ko: 그녀는 약속에 늦는 경향이 있다.

meanings.english: soft or delicate in texture; not hard or tough

examples.en: The baby's skin is so tender and smooth.
