examples.ko: 아기의 피부는 너무 부드럽고 매끈하다.

meanings.english: a sport played with rackets and a ball on a rectangular court divided by a net

examples.en: She enjoys playing tennis with her friends on weekends.
examples.ko: 그녀는 주말에 친구들과 테니스를 즐긴다.

meanings.english: in a state of mental or nervous strain; stretched tight

examples.en: She felt tense before the important exam.
examples.ko: 그녀는 중요한 시험 전에 긴장을 느꼈다.

meanings.english: a portable shelter made of cloth or other material stretched over a supporting framework of poles and ropes

examples.en: We set up a tent in the woods for camping.
examples.ko: 우리는 캠핑을 위해 숲 속에 텐트를 설치했다.

meanings.english: a fixed or limited period for which something, e.g. a prison sentence, lasts

examples.en: The school term ends in June.
examples.ko: 학교 학기는 6월에 끝난다.

meanings.english: a building or set of buildings at a transport hub where passengers can board or alight from vehicles

examples.en: We arrived at the airport terminal to catch our flight.
examples.ko: 우리는 비행기를 타기 위해 공항 터미널에 도착했다.

meanings.english: bring to an end

examples.en: The contract will terminate at the end of the month.
examples.ko: 계약은 이달 말에 종료될 것이다.

meanings.english: a flat area of stone or grass outside a house, where people sit and relax

examples.en: We enjoyed the view from the terrace of the cafe.
examples.ko: 우리는 카페의 테라스에서 전망을 즐겼다.

meanings.english: extremely bad or unpleasant

examples.en: The storm caused terrible damage to the town.
examples.ko: 폭풍이 마을에 끔찍한 피해를 끼쳤다.

meanings.english: very good or impressive

examples.en: She did a terrific job on her school project.
examples.ko: 그녀는 학교 프로젝트를 대단히 잘 해냈다.

meanings.english: an area of land under the jurisdiction of a ruler or state

examples.en: The explorers ventured into uncharted territory.
examples.ko: 탐험가들은 미개척된 영토로 모험을 떴다.

meanings.english: extreme fear or dread

examples.en: The movie filled me with terror.
examples.ko: 그 영화는 나를 공포에 빠뜨렸다.

meanings.english: an examination of a person's knowledge or proficiency in a subject

examples.en: I have a math test tomorrow.
examples.ko: 내일 수학 시험이 있다.

meanings.english: a message sent or received on a mobile phone

examples.en: I received a text from my friend.
examples.ko: 친구로부터 문자 메시지를 받았다.

meanings.english: a book used as a standard work for the study of a particular subject

examples.en: The history textbook is very informative.
examples.ko: 역사 교과서는 매우 유익하다.

meanings.english: used in making comparisons

examples.en: I am taller than my brother.
examples.ko: 나는 내 동생보다 키가 크다.

meanings.english: express gratitude or appreciation to someone

examples.en: I want to thank you for your help.
examples.ko: 당신의 도움에 감사드립니다.

meanings.english: used to identify a specific person or thing

examples.en: Is that your book?
examples.ko: 그 책이 당신의 책인가요?

meanings.english: used to point forward to a following qualifying or defining clause or phrase

examples.en: The cat is sleeping.
examples.ko: 고양이가 잠들어 있다.

meanings.english: A building or outdoor area where plays, movies, and other performances take place.

examples.en: We went to the theater to watch a play.
examples.ko: 우리는 연극을 보러 극장에 갔다.

meanings.english: The subject or main idea in a piece of writing, speech, art, etc.

examples.en: The theme of the story is love and friendship.
examples.ko: 이 이야기의 주제는 사랑과 우정이다.

meanings.english: At that time; at the time being referred to.

examples.en: We went to the park, and then we had lunch.
examples.ko: 우리는 공원에 갔다가 그 후에 점심을 먹었다.

meanings.english: A system of ideas intended to explain something, especially one based on general principles independent of the thing to be explained.

examples.en: The theory of evolution is widely accepted in the scientific community.
examples.ko: 진화이론은 과학계에서 널리 받아들여지고 있다.

meanings.english: Treatment intended to relieve or heal a disorder.

examples.en: She goes to therapy to help with her anxiety.
examples.ko: 그녀는 불안을 해소하기 위해 치료를 받는다.

meanings.english: In, at, or to that place or position.

examples.en: The keys are over there on the table.
examples.ko: 열쇠들은 탁자 위에 있다.

meanings.english: As a result of that; for that reason.

examples.en: She didn't study for the test; therefore, she didn't do well.
examples.ko: 시험공부를 안 했기 때문에 그녀는 잘하지 못했다.

meanings.english: Used to refer to two or more people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.

examples.en: They are going to the beach this weekend.
examples.ko: 그들은 이번 주말에 해변으로 간다.

meanings.english: having a relatively great extent from one surface to the opposite; not thin

examples.en: The book has a thick cover.
examples.ko: 책 표지가 두꺼워요.

meanings.english: a person who steals

examples.en: The thief stole my wallet.
examples.ko: 도둑이 내 지갑을 훔쳤어.

meanings.english: having little extent from one surface to its opposite; not thick

examples.en: She is wearing a thin sweater.
examples.ko: 그녀는 얇은 스웨터를 입고 있어.

meanings.english: an object that one need not, cannot, or does not wish to give a specific name to

examples.en: I forgot to bring my favorite thing.
examples.ko: 내가 제일 좋아하는 것을 가져오는 것을 깜빡했어.

meanings.english: to have a conscious mind, to some extent of reasoning, remembering experiences, making rational decisions, etc.

examples.en: I think we should go now.
examples.ko: 우리 지금 가야 한다고 생각해.

meanings.english: constituting number three in a sequence; 3rd

examples.en: She finished third in the race.
examples.ko: 그녀는 경주에서 세 번째로 끝냈어.

meanings.english: a strong desire for something; a need or desire for something to drink

examples.en: After running, I had a thirst for water.
examples.ko: 달리고 나서 물이 갈증이 났어.

meanings.english: the number that comes after twelve and before fourteen; 13

examples.en: There are thirteen students in the classroom.
examples.ko: 교실에는 십삼 명의 학생이 있어.

meanings.english: The number 30.

examples.en: I will turn thirty years old next month.
examples.ko: 다음 달에 서른 살이 될 거예요.

meanings.english: Used to identify a specific person or thing close at hand.

examples.en: This is my favorite book.
examples.ko: 이 책이 내가 가장 좋아하는 책이에요.

meanings.english: Complete with regard to every detail; meticulous.

examples.en: She did a thorough job cleaning the house.
examples.ko: 그녀는 집 청소를 철저히 했어요.

meanings.english: Despite the fact that; although.

examples.en: She decided to go out, though it was raining heavily.
examples.ko: 그녀는 비가 많이 오는데도 나가기로 결정했어요.

meanings.english: The number 1,000.

examples.en: There were a thousand people at the concert.
examples.ko: 콘서트에는 천 명의 사람이 있었어요.

meanings.english: A long, thin strand of cotton, nylon, or other fibers used in sewing or weaving.

examples.en: She used a red thread to sew the buttons.
examples.ko: 그녀는 단추를 끼우기 위해 빨간 실을 사용했어요.

meanings.english: A statement of an intention to inflict pain, injury, damage, or other hostile action on someone.

examples.en: He received a threat from an anonymous caller.
examples.ko: 그는 익명의 전화로 위협을 받았어요.

meanings.english: The number 3.

examples.en: There are three apples on the table.
examples.ko: 테이블 위에는 사과가 세 개 있어요.

meanings.english: a sudden feeling of excitement and pleasure

examples.en: The roller coaster ride gave me a thrill.
examples.ko: 롤러코스터를 타는 것은 나에게 흥분을 주었다.

meanings.english: the passage that leads from the back of your mouth to your stomach

examples.en: My throat is sore, so I can't speak well.
examples.ko: 내 목이 아파서 잘 말할 수 없어.

meanings.english: moving in one side and out of the other side of something

examples.en: I can see the light through the window.
examples.ko: 나는 창문을 통해 빛을 볼 수 있다.

meanings.english: to send something through the air with force, especially by a sudden movement of the arm

examples.en: She can throw a ball very far.
examples.ko: 그녀는 공을 아주 멀리 던질 수 있다.

meanings.english: the short, thick finger on the side of your hand that makes it possible to hold and pick things up easily

examples.en: He sucked his thumb when he was a baby.
examples.ko: 그는 아기 때 엄지손가락을 빨았다.

meanings.english: in this way; like this

examples.en: She studied hard and thus she passed the exam.
examples.ko: 그녀는 열심히 공부해서 시험에 통과했다.

meanings.english: a small, regular sound made by a clock

examples.en: I can hear the tick of the clock in the quiet room.
examples.ko: 조용한 방에서 시계의 틱 소리를 들을 수 있다.

meanings.english: a small piece of paper that shows that you have paid to enter a place or to travel on a vehicle

examples.en: I bought a ticket for the concert.
examples.ko: 나는 콘서트를 위한 표를 샀다.

meanings.english: the rise and fall of sea levels caused by the gravitational pull of the moon and sun

examples.en: The tide was high, so we couldn't walk along the beach.
examples.ko: 조수가 높아서 우리는 해변을 걸어다닐 수 없었다.

meanings.english: a piece of material worn around the neck, typically with a shirt and suit

examples.en: He wore a colorful tie to the wedding.
examples.ko: 그는 결혼식에 화려한 넥타이를 매었다.

meanings.english: a large carnivorous feline mammal with a yellow-brown coat striped with black

examples.en: The tiger is a majestic and powerful animal.
examples.ko: 호랑이는 웅장하고 강력한 동물이다.

meanings.english: firmly or closely fixed in place; not loose or able to be moved

examples.en: She wore tight jeans that were uncomfortable.
examples.ko: 그녀는 불편한 타이트한 청바지를 입었다.

meanings.english: up to the point in time or degree that

examples.en: You can play outside till it gets dark.
examples.ko: 어둡게 될 때까지 밖에서 놀 수 있어.

meanings.english: wood prepared for use in building and carpentry

examples.en: The house was built using timber from the nearby forest.
examples.ko: 집은 인근 숲에서 나온 목재로 지어졌다.

meanings.english: the indefinite continued progress of existence and events in the past, present, and future

examples.en: Time flies when you're having fun.
examples.ko: 즐거운 시간은 순식간에 지나간다.

meanings.english: a silvery-white metal, the chemical element of atomic number 50

examples.en: The can was made of tin.
examples.ko: 그 캔은 주석으로 만들어졌다.

meanings.english: very small in size

examples.en: I found a tiny kitten in the garden.
examples.ko: 나는 정원에서 아주 작은 새끼 고양이를 발견했다.

meanings.english: a piece of advice or useful information

examples.en: Here's a tip for studying English: practice speaking every day.
examples.ko: 영어 공부 팁 하나 주겠어요: 매일 말하기 연습하세요.

meanings.english: a rubber covering, typically inflated or surrounding an inflated inner tube, placed around a wheel to form a flexible contact with the road

examples.en: The tire of the bicycle needs to be replaced.
examples.ko: 자전거 타이어를 교체해야 해요.

meanings.english: a soft, disposable piece of paper used for cleaning or wiping

examples.en: She used a tissue to wipe her tears.
examples.ko: 그녀는 눈물을 닦기 위해 휴지를 사용했다.

meanings.english: the name of a book, composition, or other artistic work

examples.en: What is the title of the new movie?
examples.ko: 새 영화의 제목이 뭐에요?

meanings.english: expressing motion in the direction of (a particular location)

examples.en: She went to the store to buy some groceries.
examples.ko: 그녀는 장보러 가게에 갔다.

meanings.english: sliced bread browned on both sides by heat

examples.en: She likes to eat toast with butter for breakfast.
examples.ko: 그녀는 아침 식사로 버터를 바른 토스트를 좋아해요.

meanings.english: on this present day

examples.en: I have a lot of homework to do today.
examples.ko: 오늘 할 일이 많아요.

meanings.english: One of the five separate parts at the end of your foot

examples.en: I stubbed my toe on the table.
examples.ko: 나는 탁자에 발가락을 찧었다.

meanings.english: With or in proximity to another person or people

examples.en: Let's work together to finish the project.
examples.ko: 프로젝트를 끝내기 위해 함께 일해요.

meanings.english: A large bowl attached to a pipe that you sit on or stand over when you get rid of waste substances from your body

examples.en: Please remember to flush the toilet after using it.
examples.ko: 사용 후 변기를 플러시하는 걸 잊지 마세요.

meanings.english: A red or yellowish fruit with a juicy pulp, used as a vegetable in cooking

examples.en: I love eating tomatoes in salads.
examples.ko: 나는 샐러드에 토마토를 넣어 먹는 걸 좋아해.

meanings.english: The day after today

examples.en: Let's meet for lunch tomorrow.
examples.ko: 내일 점심에 만나자.

meanings.english: The quality of a sound, especially a musical sound, or the quality of a voice

examples.en: She spoke in a calm tone.
examples.ko: 그녀는 차분한 음색으로 말했다.

meanings.english: The soft, movable part in the mouth that is used for tasting, swallowing, and speaking

examples.en: Your tongue helps you taste different flavors.
examples.ko: 당신의 혀는 다양한 맛을 맛볼 수 있게 도와줍니다.

meanings.english: The evening or night of this present day

examples.en: Let's watch a movie together tonight.
examples.ko: 오늘 밤에 영화를 같이 보자.

meanings.english: in addition; also; excessively

examples.en: She ate too much cake at the party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파티에서 너무 많은 케이크를 먹었다.

meanings.english: a device or implement used to carry out a particular function

examples.en: A hammer is a useful tool for building things.
examples.ko: 망치는 물건을 만드는 데 유용한 도구이다.

meanings.english: a hard structure in the mouth used for biting and chewing

examples.en: I need to brush my teeth before bed.
examples.ko: 나는 잠자기 전에 이를 닦아야 해.

meanings.english: the highest point or part of something

examples.en: The flag was waving at the top of the mountain.
examples.ko: 깃발이 산 정상에서 흔들리고 있었다.

meanings.english: a subject of discussion, conversation, or study

examples.en: The teacher asked us to choose a topic for our research project.
examples.ko: 선생님은 우리에게 연구 프로젝트 주제를 선택하라고 했다.

meanings.english: the action or practice of inflicting severe pain or suffering; inflict severe pain or suffering

examples.en: Torture is a violation of human rights.
examples.ko: 고문은 인권 침해이다.

meanings.english: throw something lightly or casually; move something with a quick and sudden motion

examples.en: He tossed the ball to his friend.
examples.ko: 그는 친구에게 공을 던졌다.

meanings.english: complete; the whole amount

examples.en: The total cost of the project was more than expected.
examples.ko: 프로젝트의 총 비용은 예상보다 많았다.

meanings.english: to put your hand or another part of your body lightly onto and off something or someone

examples.en: She gently touched the flowers in the garden.
examples.ko: 그녀는 정원의 꽃을 부드럽게 만졌다.

meanings.english: strong; not easily broken or made weaker

examples.en: The leather jacket is tough and durable.
examples.ko: 가죽 자켓은 튼튼하고 내구성이 있다.

meanings.english: a journey during which you visit several places of interest, especially as a holiday

examples.en: We went on a guided tour of the historic city.
examples.ko: 우리는 역사적인 도시를 안내받으며 여행했다.

meanings.english: in the direction of

examples.en: She walked toward the park.
examples.ko: 그녀는 공원 쪽으로 걸었다.

meanings.english: a piece of cloth or paper used for drying someone or something that is wet

examples.en: Please hand me a towel after swimming.
examples.ko: 수영 후 수건 좀 주세요.

meanings.english: a tall, narrow building or part of a building that rises high above the ground

examples.en: The castle had a tall tower overlooking the town.
examples.ko: 그 성은 마을을 내려다보는 높은 탑이 있었다.

meanings.english: a place where people live and work, larger than a village but smaller than a city

examples.en: I grew up in a small town in the countryside.
examples.ko: 나는 시골의 작은 마을에서 자랐다.

meanings.english: poisonous; harmful to living organisms

examples.en: Be careful not to touch the toxic chemicals.
examples.ko: 유독한 화학 물질에 손대지 않도록 조심하세요.

meanings.english: An object for children to play with

examples.en: She loves playing with her new toy.
examples.ko: 그녀는 새 장난감으로 놀기를 좋아해요.

meanings.english: A mark or sign left by something that has passed

examples.en: The detective found a trace of the missing person.
examples.ko: 탐정은 실종자의 흔적을 발견했습니다.

meanings.english: A path or route that is made for a particular purpose

examples.en: The runners raced around the track.
examples.ko: 달리기 선수들이 트랙 주위를 경주했습니다.

meanings.english: The activity of buying, selling, or exchanging goods or services

examples.en: International trade has increased over the years.
examples.ko: 국제 무역이 몇 년 동안 증가했습니다.

meanings.english: A belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time

examples.en: It's a tradition in our family to have a big meal on holidays.
examples.ko: 우리 가족은 공휴일에 큰 식사를 하는 것이 전통입니다.

meanings.english: The movement of vehicles or people along roads or in the air

examples.en: There was heavy traffic on the highway this morning.
examples.ko: 오늘 아침 고속도로에 교통체증이 있었습니다.

meanings.english: Causing extreme sadness or suffering

examples.en: The movie tells the tragic story of a young girl's life.
examples.ko: 영화는 한 소녀의 비극적인 이야기를 전합니다.

meanings.english: A path or track that is made by the passage of people or animals

examples.en: We followed the trail through the forest.
examples.ko: 우리는 숲 속을 따라 산책로를 따라갔습니다.

meanings.english: to teach someone new skills

examples.en: She trained hard for the marathon.
examples.ko: 그녀는 마라톤을 위해 열심히 훈련했다.

meanings.english: to carry out a business deal

examples.en: They transacted the sale smoothly.
examples.ko: 그들은 거래를 원활하게 처리했다.

meanings.english: to move from one place to another

examples.en: He transferred the files to his new computer.
examples.ko: 그는 파일을 새 컴퓨터로 옮겼다.

meanings.english: to change in form or appearance

examples.en: The caterpillar transformed into a butterfly.
examples.ko: 애벌레가 나비로 변모했다.

meanings.english: the process of changing from one state to another

examples.en: The country is going through a transition to democracy.
examples.ko: 그 나라는 민주주의로의 전환을 겪고 있다.

meanings.english: to express in another language

examples.en: She can translate English to Korean fluently.
examples.ko: 그녀는 영어를 한국어로 유창하게 번역할 수 있다.

meanings.english: to send or pass on from one person or place to another

examples.en: The radio station transmits news every hour.
examples.ko: 그 라디오 방송국은 매 시간마다 뉴스를 전송한다.

meanings.english: to carry or move from one place to another

examples.en: The truck transports goods to the warehouse.
examples.ko: 그 트럭은 상품을 창고로 수송한다.

meanings.english: A device used to catch animals or hold something in place.

examples.en: The hunter set a trap to catch the rabbit.
examples.ko: 사냥꾼은 토끼를 잡기 위해 덫을 설치했다.

meanings.english: The act of going from one place to another, especially over a long distance.

examples.en: I love to travel and explore new places.
examples.ko: 새로운 장소를 탐험하고 여행하는 것을 좋아해.

meanings.english: A flat, shallow container with a raised edge, used for carrying or holding things.

examples.en: She brought me a tray of tea and cookies.
examples.ko: 그녀가 차와 쿠키가 담긴 쟁반을 가져다 주었다.

meanings.english: Valuable things, such as gold, jewels, or money, that are hidden or kept in a safe place.

examples.en: The pirate ship was said to be carrying a treasure chest full of gold coins.
examples.ko: 해적선에는 금화로 가득 찬 보물 상자가 실려 있다고 전해졌다.

meanings.english: To behave towards or deal with someone in a particular way.

examples.en: She always treats her friends with kindness and respect.
examples.ko: 그녀는 항상 친절하고 존중하여 친구들을 대해.

meanings.english: A formal agreement between two or more countries.

examples.en: The two nations signed a peace treaty to end the war.
examples.ko: 두 나라는 전쟁을 종식시키기 위해 평화 조약을 체결했다.

meanings.english: A tall plant with a wooden trunk and branches.

examples.en: The apple tree in our backyard produces delicious fruits every year.
examples.ko: 우리 뒷마당에 있는 사과나무는 매년 맛있는 과일을 맺습니다.

meanings.english: Extremely large or great.

examples.en: The team made a tremendous effort to win the championship.
examples.ko: 팀은 선수권을 차지하기 위해 엄청난 노력을 기울였다.

meanings.english: a general direction in which something is developing or changing

examples.en: The current trend in fashion is oversized clothing.
examples.ko: 요즘 패션의 추세는 오버사이즈 의류입니다.

meanings.english: a closed plane figure with three straight sides and three angles

examples.en: The flag of South Korea has a red and blue yin-yang symbol in the center of a white triangle.
examples.ko: 대한민국 국기는 흰색 삼각형의 중앙에 빨간색과 파란색의 태극문양이 있습니다.

meanings.english: a social group consisting of families or communities linked by social, economic, religious, or blood ties

examples.en: The Maasai tribe in Kenya is known for their distinctive cultural traditions.
examples.ko: 케냐의 마사이 부족은 독특한 문화적 전통으로 유명합니다.

meanings.english: a cunning or deceitful action designed to deceive or outwit someone

examples.en: She used a clever trick to solve the difficult puzzle.
examples.ko: 그녀는 어려운 퍼즐을 풀기 위해 교묘한 속임수를 사용했습니다.

meanings.english: a small device that releases a spring or catch and so sets off a mechanism, especially in a firearm / cause (an event or situation) to happen or exist

examples.en: The sound of a gunshot can be a trigger for traumatic memories.
examples.ko: 총소리는 외상적인 기억을 유발할 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: make (something) neat or of the required size or form by cutting away irregular or unwanted parts

examples.en: She trimmed the bushes in her garden to give them a tidy appearance.
examples.ko: 그녀는 정원의 수풀을 다듬어 깔끔한 모습을 만들었습니다.

meanings.english: a journey or excursion, especially for pleasure / catch one's foot on something and stumble or fall

examples.en: We are planning a trip to Europe next summer.
examples.ko: 우리는 다음 여름 유럽 여행을 계획 중입니다.

meanings.english: a great victory or achievement

examples.en: His triumph in the competition was celebrated by his friends and family.
examples.ko: 그의 대회에서의 승리는 친구들과 가족에 의해 축하되었습니다.

meanings.english: A group of soldiers or other people who work or live together

examples.en: The troop marched in formation.
examples.ko: 군대가 진형을 이루며 행군했다.

meanings.english: Difficulty or problems that cause distress or worry

examples.en: She's been having trouble sleeping lately.
examples.ko: 요즘 그녀는 잠을 자는 데 문제가 있었다.

meanings.english: A large motor vehicle used for transporting goods or materials

examples.en: The truck delivered the supplies to the construction site.
examples.ko: 트럭이 공사 현장으로 공급품을 배달했다.

meanings.english: In accordance with fact or reality

examples.en: It is true that honesty is the best policy.
examples.ko: 정직이 최고의 정책이라는 것은 사실이다.

meanings.english: The main stem of a tree or a large box with a lid used for storage

examples.en: She packed her clothes in the trunk of the car.
examples.ko: 그녀는 옷을 차의 트렁크에 싸서 가방에 넣었다.

meanings.english: Firm belief in the reliability, truth, or ability of someone or something

examples.en: Trust is the foundation of any strong relationship.
examples.ko: 신뢰는 어떤 강한 관계의 기반이다.

meanings.english: The quality or state of being true or accurate

examples.en: The truth will always come out in the end.
examples.ko: 진실은 결국 항상 밝혀진다.

meanings.english: To make an effort to do something

examples.en: I will try my best to finish the project on time.
examples.ko: 나는 프로젝트를 제시간에 완료하기 위해 최선을 다하겠다.

meanings.english: a long, hollow cylinder

examples.en: She put the paint in a tube.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그림 물감을 튜브에 넣었다.

meanings.english: a melody or sequence of notes

examples.en: He hummed a tune while walking.
examples.ko: 그는 걸으면서 한 멜로디를 흥얼거렸다.

meanings.english: an underground passage

examples.en: The train went through the tunnel.
examples.ko: 기차가 터널을 통과했다.

meanings.english: to move in a circular direction

examples.en: She will turn left at the next intersection.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다음 교차로에서 왼쪽으로 돌 것이다.

meanings.english: the amount of money taken by a business in a particular period

examples.en: The company's turnover increased by 10% this year.
examples.ko: 그 회사의 매출액이 올해 10% 증가했다.

meanings.english: the number 12

examples.en: There are twelve months in a year.
examples.ko: 일 년에는 열두 달이 있다.

meanings.english: the number 20

examples.en: She turned twenty last week.
examples.ko: 그녀는 지난 주 스무 살이 되었다.

meanings.english: the number 21 in order

examples.en: He was the twenty-first person to arrive at the party.
examples.ko: 그는 파티에 도착한 스물 첫째 사람이었다.

meanings.english: Coming after the twenty-first in a series.

examples.en: She was born on the twenty-second of May.
examples.ko: 그녀는 5월 22일에 태어났다.

meanings.english: Coming after the twenty-second in a series.

examples.en: The event will take place on the twenty-third of this month.
examples.ko: 이번 달 23일에 그 이벤트가 열릴 것이다.

meanings.english: Two times; on two occasions.

examples.en: I go to the gym twice a week.
examples.ko: 나는 매주 두 번 체육관에 간다.

meanings.english: One of two children or animals born at the same birth.

examples.en: She has a twin brother.
examples.ko: 그녀에게는 쌍둥이 남동생이 있다.

meanings.english: To form into a bent, curling, or distorted shape.

examples.en: She twisted her ankle while running.
examples.ko: 그녀는 달리다가 발목을 삐었다.

meanings.english: Equivalent to the sum of one and one.

examples.en: I have two cats.
examples.ko: 나는 고양이 두 마리를 키우고 있다.

meanings.english: A category of people or things having common characteristics.

examples.en: What type of music do you like?
examples.ko: 어떤 유형의 음악을 좋아하시나요?

meanings.english: Unpleasant or repulsive in appearance.

examples.en: She felt ugly in that dress.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그 드레스를 입고 못생겼다고 느꼈다.

meanings.english: being the best or most extreme example of its kind

examples.en: Winning the championship was the ultimate goal for the team.
examples.ko: 우승하는 것이 팀의 궁극적인 목표였다.

meanings.english: a device consisting of a circular canopy of cloth on a folding metal frame supported by a central rod, used as protection against rain or sometimes sun

examples.en: Don't forget to bring your umbrella with you in case it rains.
examples.ko: 비가 올 수도 있으니 우산을 가져가는 걸 잊지 마세요.

meanings.english: the brother of one's father or mother, or the husband of one's aunt

examples.en: My uncle is coming to visit us this weekend.
examples.ko: 이번 주말에 삼촌이 우리를 방문하러 온다.

meanings.english: in or to a position below or lower than something else

examples.en: The cat is hiding under the table.
examples.ko: 고양이가 테이블 아래에 숨어있다.

meanings.english: to experience or be subjected to something, especially something unpleasant or arduous

examples.en: She had to undergo surgery to remove the tumor.
examples.ko: 종양을 제거하기 위해 수술을 받아야 했다.

meanings.english: to be the cause or basis of something

examples.en: Trust and communication underlie a healthy relationship.
examples.ko: 신뢰와 의사소통이 건강한 관계의 기초를 이룬다.

meanings.english: to weaken or damage gradually, especially someone's power or confidence

examples.en: Constant criticism can undermine a person's self-esteem.
examples.ko: 지속적인 비판은 사람의 자존감을 약화시킬 수 있다.

meanings.english: to comprehend the meaning or nature of something

examples.en: I understand the instructions clearly now.
examples.ko: 이제 지시사항을 분명히 이해했다.

meanings.english: to take on a task or responsibility

examples.en: She undertook the project and completed it successfully.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그 프로젝트를 맡아 성공적으로 완료했다.

meanings.english: a particular set of clothes worn by all members of a group

examples.en: The students wear a uniform to school every day.
examples.ko: 학생들은 매일 학교에 교복을 입고 간다.

meanings.english: to bring parts together to form a whole

examples.en: The treaty aimed to unify the two countries into one nation.
examples.ko: 그 조약은 두 나라를 하나의 국가로 통일하는 것을 목표로 했다.

meanings.english: being the only one of its kind

examples.en: Each snowflake is unique in its shape and pattern.
examples.ko: 각 눈송이는 모양과 무늬에서 독특하다.

meanings.english: an individual thing or person regarded as single and complete

examples.en: The basic unit of currency in this country is the dollar.
examples.ko: 이 나라의 기본 통화 단위는 달러다.

meanings.english: to come or bring together for a common purpose or action

examples.en: The citizens united to protest against the new law.
examples.ko: 시민들은 새로운 법에 반대하기 위해 힘을 모았다.

meanings.english: all of space and everything in it including stars, planets, and galaxies

examples.en: Scientists study the universe to understand its vastness.
examples.ko: 과학자들은 우주를 연구하여 그 넓이를 이해한다.

meanings.english: an institution of higher education where students study for degrees

examples.en: She is planning to attend university next year to pursue her dream career.
examples.ko: 그녀는 내년에 꿈꾸는 직업을 추구하기 위해 대학에 입학할 계획이다.

meanings.english: except if

examples.en: I will go to the party unless I have too much homework.
examples.ko: 과제가 많지 않다면 파티에 갈 거야.

meanings.english: up to the point in time or the event mentioned

examples.en: I will wait here until you come back.
examples.ko: 네가 돌아올 때까지 여기서 기다릴게.

meanings.english: toward a higher place or position

examples.en: Please pick up the books from the floor.
examples.ko: 바닥에서 책들을 주워주세요.

meanings.english: make something more modern or up to date

examples.en: I need to update my computer software.
examples.ko: 컴퓨터 소프트웨어를 업데이트해야 해.

meanings.english: on the occasion of

examples.en: She made her decision upon hearing the news.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그 소식을 듣자마자 결정을 했다.

meanings.english: situated above something else

examples.en: The upper floor of the building is where the offices are located.
examples.ko: 건물의 윗층은 사무실이 있는 곳이야.

meanings.english: disturbed or agitated emotionally

examples.en: She was upset when she heard the bad news.
examples.ko: 그녀는 나쁜 소식을 듣고 당황했다.

meanings.english: moving or pointing towards a higher position

examples.en: The stock prices have been on an upward trend recently.
examples.ko: 최근 주가는 상승 추세에 있었다.

meanings.english: related to cities or towns

examples.en: Many young people prefer urban living for its convenience.
examples.ko: 많은 젊은이들이 편의성 때문에 도시 생활을 선호합니다.

meanings.english: a strong desire or impulse

examples.en: She felt an urge to travel and explore new places.
examples.ko: 그녀는 여행하고 새로운 장소를 탐험하고 싶다는 충동을 느꼈습니다.

meanings.english: to employ for a purpose

examples.en: You can use this pen to write your name.
examples.ko: 당신은 이 펜을 사용해서 당신의 이름을 쓸 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: to make practical or effective use of

examples.en: We need to utilize our resources wisely to achieve success.
examples.ko: 성공을 이루기 위해 우리는 자원을 현명하게 활용해야 합니다.

meanings.english: complete; absolute

examples.en: His betrayal was an utter shock to everyone.
examples.ko: 그의 배신은 모두에게 완전한 충격이었습니다.

meanings.english: to leave a place that one previously occupied

examples.en: Please vacate the room by noon tomorrow.
examples.ko: 내일 정오까지 방을 비워 주세요.

meanings.english: a substance used to stimulate the production of antibodies and provide immunity against a disease

examples.en: The vaccine helped prevent the spread of the flu in the community.
examples.ko: 백신은 지역 내에서 독감의 확산을 막는 데 도움이 되었습니다.

meanings.english: a space entirely devoid of matter

examples.en: The vacuum of space is a harsh environment for humans.
examples.ko: 우주의 진공은 인간에게 가혹한 환경입니다.

meanings.english: Not clearly or explicitly stated or expressed

examples.en: His explanation was vague and confusing.
examples.ko: 그의 설명은 모호하고 혼란스러웠다.

meanings.english: Legally or officially acceptable; sound; rational

examples.en: Please make sure your ticket is valid before boarding the train.
examples.ko: 기차를 탑승하기 전에 티켓이 유효한지 확인해주세요.

meanings.english: A low area of land between hills or mountains, typically with a river or stream flowing through it

examples.en: The valley was lush and green, surrounded by towering mountains.
examples.ko: 골짜기는 푸르고 녹색이 우거져 있었고, 높은 산들로 둘러싸여 있었다.

meanings.english: The regard that something is held to deserve; the importance, worth, or usefulness of something

examples.en: She placed a high value on honesty and integrity.
examples.ko: 그녀는 정직과 성실함을 높이 평가했다.

meanings.english: A medium to large motor vehicle used for transporting goods or people

examples.en: The delivery company uses vans to transport packages to customers.
examples.ko: 배송 회사는 고객들에게 소포를 전달하기 위해 밴을 사용한다.

meanings.english: Disappear suddenly and completely

examples.en: The magician made the rabbit vanish into thin air.
examples.ko: 마술사가 토끼를 순식간에 사라지게 만들었다.

meanings.english: Different from one another; of different kinds or sorts

examples.en: There are various reasons why people choose to study abroad.
examples.ko: 사람들이 해외로 유학을 선택하는 이유는 다양하다.

meanings.english: Change or differ in size, amount, or degree

examples.en: The prices of fruits vary depending on the season.
examples.ko: 과일의 가격은 계절에 따라 다양하게 변한다.

meanings.english: very great in size, amount, degree, intensity, or extent

examples.en: The vast ocean stretched out before them.
examples.ko: 그들 앞에 광대한 바다가 펼쳐져 있었다.

meanings.english: a plant or part of a plant used as food, typically as accompaniment to meat or fish

examples.en: She eats a lot of vegetables to stay healthy.
examples.ko: 그녀는 건강을 유지하기 위해 많은 채소를 먹는다.

meanings.english: a machine, such as a car or truck, that transports people or goods

examples.en: We traveled to the countryside in a vehicle.
examples.ko: 우리는 차량으로 시골로 여행했다.

meanings.english: a risky or daring journey or undertaking

examples.en: They decided to venture into the unknown forest.
examples.ko: 그들은 알려지지 않은 숲으로 모험을 떠났다.

meanings.english: a word used to describe an action, state, or occurrence

examples.en: In the sentence 'She sings beautifully,' 'sings' is a verb.
examples.ko: '그녀는 아름답게 노래합니다'라는 문장에서 'sings'는 동사이다.

meanings.english: a group of lines that form a unit in a poem or song

examples.en: He recited a beautiful verse from his favorite poem.
examples.ko: 그는 자신이 좋아하는 시에서 아름다운 구절을 낭독했다.

meanings.english: a particular form of something differing in certain respects from an earlier form or other forms of the same type of thing

examples.en: I prefer this version of the song over the original.
examples.ko: 나는 이 노래의 이 버전을 원본보다 선호한다.

meanings.english: against; in contrast or comparison with

examples.en: It's a classic match-up: good versus evil.
examples.ko: 이것은 전형적인 대결이다: 선과 악.

meanings.english: perpendicular to the plane of the horizon; upright

examples.en: The flagpole stood vertical against the clear blue sky.
examples.ko: 깨끗한 파란 하늘에 대고 있는 깃대는 수직으로 섰다.

meanings.english: used to emphasize the degree of an adjective or adverb

examples.en: She was very happy to receive the award.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그 상을 받아서 매우 행복했다.

meanings.english: a ship or large boat; a hollow container used to hold liquids

examples.en: The fishing vessel returned to the harbor with a full catch.
examples.ko: 어선이 가득한 어획을 싣고 항구로 돌아왔다.

meanings.english: a person qualified to treat diseased or injured animals

examples.en: The veterinarian examined the sick dog and prescribed medication.
examples.ko: 수의사는 아픈 개를 진찰하고 약을 처방했다.

meanings.english: by way of; through

examples.en: She traveled to Italy via France.
examples.ko: 그녀는 프랑스를 경유하여 이탈리아로 여행했다.

meanings.english: immoral or wicked behavior

examples.en: Smoking is a vice that can harm your health.
examples.ko: 흡연은 건강에 해를 끼칠 수 있는 나쁜 습관이다.

meanings.english: a person who suffers from a destructive or injurious action

examples.en: The victim of the robbery reported the incident to the police.
examples.ko: 강도의 피해자는 사건을 경찰에 신고했다.

meanings.english: the defeat of an enemy or opponent in a battle, game, or competition

examples.en: The team celebrated their victory with cheers and high-fives.
examples.ko: 팀은 환호와 하이파이브로 승리를 축하했다.

meanings.english: A recording of moving visual images

examples.en: I enjoy watching funny videos on the internet.
examples.ko: 나는 인터넷에서 재미있는 동영상을 보는 것을 즐깁니다.

meanings.english: The ability to see something or to be seen from a particular place

examples.en: From the top of the mountain, we had a breathtaking view of the city below.
examples.ko: 산 정상에서 우리는 아래 도시의 숨막히는 전망을 감상했다.

meanings.english: Physical strength and good health

examples.en: Despite his age, he still has the vigor of a young man.
examples.ko: 나이에도 불구하고, 그는 여전히 젊은 남자의 활기를 가지고 있다.

meanings.english: A large and luxurious house in the countryside or a suburb

examples.en: The wealthy businessman owned a beautiful villa overlooking the ocean.
examples.ko: 부자 비즈니스맨은 바다를 내려다보는 아름다운 별장을 소유했다.

meanings.english: A small community in a rural area

examples.en: The village was known for its friendly residents and peaceful atmosphere.
examples.ko: 그 마을은 친절한 주민들과 평화로운 분위기로 유명했다.

meanings.english: Using or involving physical force intended to hurt, damage, or kill someone or something

examples.en: The violent storm caused extensive damage to the town.
examples.ko: 폭풍이 마을에 막대한 피해를 일으켰다.

meanings.english: A stringed musical instrument of treble pitch, played with a horsehair bow

examples.en: She has been playing the violin since she was a child.
examples.ko: 그녀는 어릴 때부터 바이올린을 연주해 왔다.

meanings.english: A person who has never had sexual intercourse

examples.en: In some cultures, being a virgin until marriage is highly valued.
examples.ko: 어떤 문화에서는 결혼 전까지 처녀로 남아 있는 것이 높이 평가된다.

meanings.english: Behavior showing high moral standards.

examples.en: She is admired for her virtue and integrity.
examples.ko: 그녀는 덕과 정직함으로 존경받는다.

meanings.english: A small infectious agent that replicates only inside the living cells of other organisms.

examples.en: The computer virus infected many devices.
examples.ko: 컴퓨터 바이러스가 많은 기기를 감염시켰다.

meanings.english: Able to be seen.

examples.en: The stars were clearly visible in the night sky.
examples.ko: 별들이 밤하늘에서 분명히 보였다.

meanings.english: The ability to see.

examples.en: Her vision was impaired after the accident.
examples.ko: 사고 이후 그녀의 시력이 손상되었다.

meanings.english: Go to see and spend time with someone.

examples.en: We plan to visit our grandparents next weekend.
examples.ko: 다음 주말에 할아버지와 할머니를 방문할 계획이다.

meanings.english: Relating to seeing or sight.

examples.en: The visual arts include painting and sculpture.
examples.ko: 시각 예술에는 회화와 조각이 포함된다.

meanings.english: Absolutely necessary or important.

examples.en: Water is vital for all living organisms.
examples.ko: 물은 모든 생물에게 필수적이다.

meanings.english: Producing powerful feelings or strong, clear images in the mind.

examples.en: The sunset painted a vivid picture in the sky.
examples.ko: 일몰은 하늘에 생생한 그림을 그렸다.

meanings.english: the words used in a particular language or subject

examples.en: She has a rich vocabulary.
examples.ko: 그녀는 풍부한 어휘력을 가지고 있다.

meanings.english: a strong feeling of suitability for a particular career or occupation

examples.en: Teaching is her vocation.
examples.ko: 가르치는 것이 그녀의 사명이다.

meanings.english: the sound produced in a person's larynx and uttered through the mouth, used for speaking, singing, etc.

examples.en: Her voice is beautiful.
examples.ko: 그녀의 목소리는 아름답다.

meanings.english: the amount of space that a substance or object occupies, or that is enclosed within a container

examples.en: Please adjust the volume of the music.
examples.ko: 음악의 볼륨을 조절해 주세요.

meanings.english: a person who freely offers to take part in an enterprise or undertake a task

examples.en: She decided to volunteer at the local shelter.
examples.ko: 그녀는 지역 보호소에서 자원봉사하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: to express a formal opinion or choice on a particular matter by ballot or show of hands

examples.en: Citizens have the right to vote in elections.
examples.ko: 시민들은 선거에서 투표할 권리가 있다.

meanings.english: a fixed regular payment, typically paid on a daily or weekly basis, made by an employer to an employee

examples.en: He earns a good wage at his job.
examples.ko: 그는 직장에서 좋은 임금을 받는다.

meanings.english: stay where one is or delay action until a particular time or event

examples.en: Please wait for me here.
examples.ko: 여기서 제게 기다려 주세요.

meanings.english: To stop sleeping and become conscious

examples.en: I wake up at 7 AM every morning.
examples.ko: 나는 매일 아침 7시에 일어난다.

meanings.english: To move on foot at a moderate pace by taking regular steps

examples.en: She likes to walk in the park in the evening.
examples.ko: 그녀는 저녁에 공원을 걸어다니는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: A vertical structure, usually solid, that divides or surrounds an area

examples.en: The wall of the house is painted white.
examples.ko: 집의 벽은 흰색으로 칠해져 있다.

meanings.english: To move around or go to different places without a definite purpose or direction

examples.en: We decided to wander through the streets of the old town.
examples.ko: 우리는 오래된 마을의 거리를 헤매기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: To have a desire to possess or do something

examples.en: I want to buy a new phone.
examples.ko: 나는 새 핸드폰을 사고 싶다.

meanings.english: A state of armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

examples.en: Many lives were lost during the war.
examples.ko: 전쟁 중 많은 목숨이 잃어졌다.

meanings.english: A large building where raw materials or manufactured goods may be stored before their export or distribution for sale

examples.en: The company stores its products in a warehouse before shipping them to stores.
examples.ko: 회사는 제품을 창고에 저장한 후 상점으로 발송한다.

meanings.english: Having or producing a comfortably high temperature; not cold

examples.en: She wrapped herself in a warm blanket on a cold winter night.
examples.ko: 그녀는 추운 겨울밤에 따뜻한 담요로 몸을 싸맸다.

meanings.english: To inform someone in advance of a possible danger or problem.

examples.en: I warned him about the icy road ahead.
examples.ko: 나는 그에게 앞에 얼어붙은 도로에 대해 경고했다.

meanings.english: To justify or necessitate a certain action or belief.

examples.en: His hard work warrants a promotion.
examples.ko: 그의 노력은 승진을 보장한다.

meanings.english: To clean something with water and usually soap.

examples.en: She washes her hands before eating.
examples.ko: 그녀는 식사 전에 손을 씻는다.

meanings.english: To use something carelessly or extravagantly.

examples.en: Don't waste your time on trivial matters.
examples.ko: 사소한 일에 시간을 낭비하지 마세요.

meanings.english: To observe or pay attention to something over a period of time.

examples.en: I like to watch the stars at night.
examples.ko: 나는 밤에 별을 보는 것을 좋아해요.

meanings.english: A clear liquid that has no color, taste, or smell, and is essential for life.

examples.en: Plants need water to grow.
examples.ko: 식물은 자라기 위해 물이 필요해요.

meanings.english: A large, round fruit with green skin, pink flesh, and black seeds.

examples.en: Watermelon is a popular summer fruit.
examples.ko: 수박은 인기 있는 여름 과일이다.

meanings.english: A long body of water curling into an arched form and breaking on the shore.

examples.en: The children enjoyed playing in the waves at the beach.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 해변에서 파도에서 놀기를 즐겼다.

meanings.english: A method, style, or manner of doing something.

examples.en: She found a way to solve the problem.
examples.ko: 그녀는 문제를 해결할 방법을 찾았다.

meanings.english: Used to refer to oneself and one or more other people as the object of a verb or preposition.

examples.en: We are going to the park tomorrow.
examples.ko: 우리는 내일 공원에 갈 거야.

meanings.english: Lacking in physical strength or energy.

examples.en: He felt weak after being sick for a week.
examples.ko: 일주일 동안 아파서 그는 힘이 빠졌다.

meanings.english: An abundance of valuable possessions or money.

examples.en: She inherited great wealth from her grandparents.
examples.ko: 그녀는 할아버지와 할머니로부터 큰 재산을 상속받았다.

meanings.english: A thing designed or used for inflicting bodily harm or physical damage.

examples.en: The soldier carried a weapon for protection.
examples.ko: 그 병사는 보호를 위해 무기를 들고 다녔다.

meanings.english: To have clothing, jewelry, or accessories on one's body.

examples.en: She likes to wear colorful dresses.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다채로운 드레스를 입는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: The state of the atmosphere at a particular place and time, such as temperature, wind, and precipitation.

examples.en: The weather is sunny today.
examples.ko: 오늘 날씨는 맑다.

meanings.english: To form fabric by interlacing threads.

examples.en: She learned how to weave a basket from her grandmother.
examples.ko: 그녀는 할머니로부터 바구니를 짜는 법을 배웠다.

meanings.english: A location connected to the internet that maintains one or more web pages.

examples.en: I found the information on their website.
examples.ko: 그들의 웹사이트에서 정보를 찾았다.

meanings.english: A ceremony where two people are united in marriage.

examples.en: The wedding was beautiful and romantic.
examples.ko: 결혼식은 아름답고 로맨틱했다.

meanings.english: A wild plant growing where it is not wanted and in competition with cultivated plants.

examples.en: I need to pull out the weeds in my garden.
examples.ko: 내 정원에서 잡초를 뽑아야 해.

meanings.english: A period of seven days.

examples.en: I have a busy week ahead of me.
examples.ko: 내 앞으로 바쁜 주가 기다리고 있어.

meanings.english: The period from Friday evening through Sunday evening, especially regarded as a time for leisure.

examples.en: I love spending time with my family on the weekend.
examples.ko: 주말에 가족과 함께 시간을 보내는 것을 좋아해.

meanings.english: To find out how heavy something is.

examples.en: I need to weigh the package before shipping it.
examples.ko: 배송하기 전에 소포의 무게를 재야 해.

meanings.english: The amount that something weighs.

examples.en: The weight of the luggage exceeded the limit.
examples.ko: 짐의 무게가 제한을 초과했다.

meanings.english: Suggesting something supernatural; strange and unusual.

examples.en: It was a weird experience that I can't explain.
examples.ko: 나는 설명할 수 없는 기묘한 경험이었다.

meanings.english: to greet someone in a warm and friendly way

examples.en: She welcomed the new students to the school.
examples.ko: 그녀는 새로 온 학생들을 학교에 환영했다.

meanings.english: financial or other aid provided by the government to people in need

examples.en: The government provides welfare support to low-income families.
examples.ko: 정부는 저소득층 가족에게 복지 지원을 제공합니다.

meanings.english: in a good or satisfactory way

examples.en: She speaks English well.
examples.ko: 그녀는 영어를 잘합니다.

meanings.english: the direction where the sun sets, opposite of east

examples.en: The beach is located to the west of the city.
examples.ko: 해변은 그 도시의 서쪽에 위치해 있습니다.

meanings.english: covered or saturated with water or another liquid

examples.en: Don't go outside without an umbrella; it's wet out there.
examples.ko: 우산 없이 밖으로 나가지 마세요; 밖이 젖어 있어요.

meanings.english: a very large marine mammal with a streamlined body and a horizontal tail fin

examples.en: Whales are known for their impressive size and gentle nature.
examples.ko: 고래들은 그들의 인상적인 크기와 온순한 성격으로 유명합니다.

meanings.english: used to ask for information about something

examples.en: What is your favorite color?
examples.ko: 당신의 가장 좋아하는 색깔은 무엇인가요?

meanings.english: a cereal plant that is the most important kind grown in temperate countries

examples.en: Bread is often made from wheat flour.
examples.ko: 빵은 종종 밀가루로 만들어집니다.

meanings.english: A circular object that revolves on an axle and is fixed below a vehicle or other object to enable it to move easily over the ground.

examples.en: The car's wheels were spinning fast.
examples.ko: 차의 바퀴가 빠르게 회전했다.

meanings.english: At what time.

examples.en: When will you arrive at the party?
examples.ko: 당신은 파티에 언제 도착하실 건가요?

meanings.english: In or to what place or position.

examples.en: Where is the nearest bus stop?
examples.ko: 가장 가까운 버스 정류장이 어디에 있나요?

meanings.english: In contrast or comparison with the fact that.

examples.en: She likes tea, whereas her brother prefers coffee.
examples.ko: 그녀는 차를 좋아하고, 그녀의 남동생은 커피를 선호한다.

meanings.english: Expressing a doubt or choice between alternatives.

examples.en: I don't know whether I should go or not.
examples.ko: 가야 할지 말아야 할지 모르겠어.

meanings.english: Asking for information specifying one or more people or things from a definite set.

examples.en: Which book do you want to read?
examples.ko: 어떤 책을 읽고 싶으세요?

meanings.english: During the time that.

examples.en: I'll wait here while you finish your homework.
examples.ko: 네가 숙제를 끝낼 때까지 여기서 기다릴게.

meanings.english: A strip of leather or length of cord fastened to a handle, used for beating or whipping.

examples.en: The cowboy cracked his whip to start the race.
examples.ko: 카우보이가 경주를 시작하기 위해 채찍을 휘두르었다.

meanings.english: to speak very softly or quietly

examples.en: She whispered a secret to her friend.
examples.ko: 그녀는 친구에게 비밀을 속삭였다.

meanings.english: to make a high sound by blowing air through your lips

examples.en: The referee whistled to start the game.
examples.ko: 심판이 경기를 시작하기 위해 휘파람을 붨다.

meanings.english: having the color of milk or snow

examples.en: She wore a beautiful white dress to the party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파티에 아름다운 흰색 드레스를 입었다.

meanings.english: used to ask about a person's identity

examples.en: Who is that girl standing over there?
examples.ko: 저기 서 있는 그 소녀는 누구인가요?

meanings.english: complete; entire

examples.en: She ate the whole pizza by herself.
examples.ko: 그녀는 혼자서 피자 전체를 다 먹었다.

meanings.english: for what reason or purpose

examples.en: Why did you come to school late today?
examples.ko: 오늘 왜 학교에 늦게 왔어?

meanings.english: evil or morally wrong

examples.en: The witch cast a wicked spell on the prince.
examples.ko: 마녀가 왕자에게 사악한 주문을 걸었다.

meanings.english: having a great distance from one side to the other

examples.en: The river is wide and deep.
examples.ko: 그 강은 넓고 깊다.

meanings.english: A married woman considered in relation to her spouse.

examples.en: She is a loving wife and caring mother.
examples.ko: 그녀는 사랑스러운 아내이자 따뜻한 어머니다.

meanings.english: Living or growing in the natural environment; not domesticated or cultivated.

examples.en: We saw a wild deer in the forest.
examples.ko: 우리는 숲 속에서 야생 사슴을 봤다.

meanings.english: The mental faculty by which one deliberately chooses or decides upon a course of action.

examples.en: With strong willpower, she overcame all obstacles.
examples.ko: 강한 의지력으로 그녀는 모든 장애물을 극복했다.

meanings.english: To be successful or victorious in a competition, game, or conflict.

examples.en: The team worked hard to win the championship.
examples.ko: 팀은 선수권 대회에서 우승하기 위해 열심히 노력했다.

meanings.english: The natural movement of the air, especially in the form of a current of air blowing from a particular direction.

examples.en: The wind was strong, making the trees sway.
examples.ko: 바람이 세게 불어 나무들이 흔들렸다.

meanings.english: An opening in the wall or roof of a building or vehicle that is fitted with glass or other transparent material in a frame to admit light or air and allow people to see out.

examples.en: She opened the window to let in some fresh air.
examples.ko: 그녀는 창문을 열어서 신선한 공기를 들이키기 위해 했다.

meanings.english: An alcoholic drink made from fermented grape juice.

examples.en: They enjoyed a glass of wine with their dinner.
examples.ko: 그들은 저녁 식사와 함께 와인 한 잔을 즐겼다.

meanings.english: A flat appendage of an animal's body that enables it to fly.

examples.en: The bird spread its wings and took off into the sky.
examples.ko: 새가 날개를 펴고 하늘로 날아 올랐다.

meanings.english: the coldest season of the year, in the northern hemisphere from December to February and in the southern hemisphere from June to August

examples.en: I love the snow in winter.
examples.ko: 겨울에 눈을 좋아해.

meanings.english: clean or dry something by rubbing its surface with a cloth, a piece of paper, or one's hand

examples.en: Please wipe the table after eating.
examples.ko: 식사 후 테이블을 닦아 주세요.

meanings.english: a thin, flexible thread of metal

examples.en: The wire is used to connect the electricity.
examples.ko: 전선은 전기를 연결하는 데 사용됩니다.

meanings.english: having or showing experience, knowledge, and good judgment

examples.en: It is wise to listen to your parents' advice.
examples.ko: 부모님의 조언을 듣는 것이 현명합니다.

meanings.english: have a desire or hope for something to happen

examples.en: I wish for world peace.
examples.ko: 세계 평화를 소망합니다.

meanings.english: the ability to use words in a clever and humorous way

examples.en: She is known for her quick wit.
examples.ko: 그녀는 빠른 재치로 유명합니다.

meanings.english: accompanied by; in the company of

examples.en: Let's go to the park with our friends.
examples.ko: 우리 친구들과 함께 공원에 가요.

meanings.english: remove or take away something from a particular place or position

examples.en: I need to withdraw money from the bank.
examples.ko: 은행에서 돈을 빼야 해.

meanings.english: inside of something; not outside

examples.en: The answer lies within yourself.
examples.ko: 답은 네 안에 있다.

meanings.english: not having or using something

examples.en: She managed to survive without any help.
examples.ko: 그녀는 어떤 도움도 받지 않고 살아남았다.

meanings.english: someone who sees an event and can describe it

examples.en: The witness provided crucial information to the police.
examples.ko: 증인은 경찰에게 중요한 정보를 제공했다.

meanings.english: an adult female human

examples.en: She is a strong and independent woman.
examples.ko: 그녀는 강하고 독립적인 여자입니다.

meanings.english: to think about something with curiosity or doubt

examples.en: I wonder what the future holds for us.
examples.ko: 우리에게 미래가 무엇을 가져다 줄지 궁금하다.

meanings.english: the hard material that makes up the stems and branches of trees

examples.en: The table is made of solid wood.
examples.ko: 그 테이블은 튼튼한 나무로 만들어졌다.

meanings.english: the soft, thick hair that grows on the bodies of sheep and some other animals

examples.en: She knitted a warm scarf with wool.
examples.ko: 그녀는 양털로 따뜻한 목도리를 짰다.

meanings.english: a single distinct meaningful element of speech or writing

examples.en: Learning new words can expand your vocabulary.
examples.ko: 새로운 단어를 배우면 어휘가 넓어질 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: Activity involving mental or physical effort done in order to achieve a purpose or result.

examples.en: She has a lot of work to do before the deadline.
examples.ko: 그녀는 마감 전에 해야 할 일이 많다.

meanings.english: The earth, together with all of its countries, peoples, and natural features.

examples.en: There are seven continents in the world.
examples.ko: 세계에는 7개 대륙이 있다.

meanings.english: Anxious consideration of a problem.

examples.en: Don't worry, everything will be fine.
examples.ko: 걱정 마, 모든 게 괜찮을 거야.

meanings.english: The feeling or expression of reverence and adoration for a deity.

examples.en: They go to the temple to worship every Sunday.
examples.ko: 그들은 매주 일요일에 예배를 드리러 사원에 간다.

meanings.english: The value equivalent to that of someone or something under consideration; the level at which someone or something deserves to be valued or rated.

examples.en: This painting is worth a lot of money.
examples.ko: 이 그림은 많은 돈을 가치 있다.

meanings.english: Expressing the conditional mood; indicating the consequence of an imagined event or situation.

examples.en: If I had more time, I would finish this project.
examples.ko: 더 많은 시간이 있었다면, 이 프로젝트를 끝냈을 것이다.

meanings.english: An injury to living tissue caused by a cut, blow, or other impact, typically one in which the skin is cut or broken.

examples.en: He cleaned and bandaged the wound on his arm.
examples.ko: 그는 팔에 상처를 닦고 붕대로 싸서 보호했다.

meanings.english: Cover or enclose (someone or something) in paper or soft material.

examples.en: She wrapped the gift in colorful paper.
examples.ko: 그녀는 선물을 다채로운 종이로 싸 주었다.

meanings.english: to destroy or severely damage something

examples.en: The storm wrecked the ship.
examples.ko: 폭풍이 배를 파괴했다.

meanings.english: to put thoughts, words, or information onto paper or a computer

examples.en: She likes to write stories in her free time.
examples.ko: 그녀는 여가 시간에 이야기를 쓰는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: not correct or true; mistaken or incorrect

examples.en: It's wrong to cheat on a test.
examples.ko: 시험에서 부정행위를 하는 것은 잘못된 일이다.

meanings.english: a period of 365 days or 12 months

examples.en: My birthday is in September, so I was born in the same year as my friend.
examples.ko: 내 생일은 9월이라서 나는 친구와 같은 해에 태어났다.

meanings.english: to shout loudly, especially because you are angry, excited, or in pain

examples.en: Please don't yell at me.
examples.ko: 제발 나에게 소리치지 마세요.

meanings.english: having the color like that of the sun or ripe lemons

examples.en: She wore a bright yellow dress to the party.
examples.ko: 그녀는 파티에 밝은 노란색 드레스를 입었다.

meanings.english: used to give an affirmative response or agreement

examples.en: Can I go to the movies with my friends? - Yes, you can.
examples.ko: 친구들과 영화 보러 갈 수 있어요? - 네, 갈 수 있어요.

meanings.english: on the day before today

examples.en: I met my friend for lunch yesterday.
examples.ko: 나는 어제 점심 때 친구를 만났어.

meanings.english: up to the present time; so far

examples.en: I haven't finished my homework yet.
examples.ko: 나는 아직 숙제를 끝내지 않았어.

meanings.english: to give way to pressure; produce or provide

examples.en: The farmer's fields yield a bountiful harvest every year.
examples.ko: 농부의 밭은 매년 풍부한 수확을 낳는다.

meanings.english: used to refer to the person or people being spoken or written to

examples.en: Can you help me with my homework?
examples.ko: 내 숙제를 도와줄 수 있니?

meanings.english: having lived or existed for only a short time

examples.en: The young boy played happily in the park.
examples.ko: 어린 소년이 공원에서 행복하게 놀았다.

meanings.english: an African wild horse with black-and-white stripes

examples.en: We saw a zebra at the zoo yesterday.
examples.ko: 어제 우리는 동물원에서 얼룩말을 봤어.

meanings.english: the numerical symbol 0

examples.en: The temperature outside is zero degrees Celsius.
examples.ko: 밖의 온도는 섭씨 영도야.

meanings.english: an area or region with distinct characteristics or purposes

examples.en: This area is a quiet zone, so please keep noise to a minimum.
examples.ko: 이 지역은 조용한 지대이니 소음을 최소한으로 유지해 주세요.

meanings.english: a place where live animals are kept for public viewing

examples.en: Let's visit the zoo this weekend to see the lions and tigers.
examples.ko: 이번 주말에 사자와 호랑이를 보기 위해 동물원에 가자.

meanings.english: used before singular countable nouns when the noun is not specific

examples.en: I need an apple.
examples.ko: 나는 사과가 필요해.

meanings.english: having a physical or mental condition that makes it difficult to do certain things

examples.en: She works with disabled children.
examples.ko: 그녀는 장애를 가진 아이들과 일해.

meanings.english: the deliberate termination of a human pregnancy

examples.en: She decided to have an abortion.
examples.ko: 그녀는 낙태하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: existing or available in large quantities; plentiful

examples.en: The market is abundant with fresh fruits.
examples.ko: 시장은 신선한 과일로 풍부하다.

meanings.english: a continuous pain in the head

examples.en: I have a terrible headache.
examples.ko: 나는 심한 두통이 있어.

meanings.english: existing in fact; real

examples.en: The actual cost was higher than expected.
examples.ko: 실제 비용은 예상보다 높았다.

meanings.english: to communicate or work together

examples.en: Students interact with each other in group projects.
examples.ko: 학생들은 그룹 프로젝트에서 서로 상호작용한다.

meanings.english: the process or activity of running a business, organization, etc.

examples.en: The administration of the school is very efficient.
examples.ko: 학교의 행정은 매우 효율적이다.

meanings.english: The act of allowing to enter; entrance granted by permission

examples.en: Admission to the museum is free on Sundays.
examples.ko: 박물관 입장은 일요일에 무료입니다.

meanings.english: An unfavorable situation that is not beneficial

examples.en: One disadvantage of living in the city is the noise.
examples.ko: 도시에서 살면서의 단점 중 하나는 소음입니다.

meanings.english: To promote or publicize a product, service, or event

examples.en: The company will advertise their new product on TV.
examples.ko: 회사는 새 제품을 TV에서 광고할 것입니다.

meanings.english: A feeling of liking or caring about someone or something

examples.en: She showed her affection for her pet by giving it a hug.
examples.ko: 그녀는 애완동물을 안아주며 애정을 표현했다.

meanings.english: Ready or likely to attack or confront

examples.en: The aggressive player scored a goal in the match.
examples.ko: 적극적인 선수가 경기에서 골을 넣었다.

meanings.english: To have a different opinion; to not be in harmony

examples.en: They disagree on which movie to watch tonight.
examples.ko: 그들은 오늘 밤 어떤 영화를 볼지에 대해 의견이 다르다.

meanings.english: A powered flying vehicle with fixed wings and a weight greater than that of the air it displaces

examples.en: We will travel by aeroplane to our vacation destination.
examples.ko: 휴가지로 비행기로 여행할 것입니다.

meanings.english: One of two or more available possibilities; offering a choice between two or more things

examples.en: Eating out is a good alternative to cooking at home.
examples.ko: 외식은 집에서 요리하는 것에 대한 좋은 대안이다.

meanings.english: having a strong desire to be successful or achieve something

examples.en: She is very ambitious and dreams of becoming a successful businesswoman.
examples.ko: 그녀는 매우 야심적이며 성공한 여사업가가 되는 꿈을 꾼다.

meanings.english: to examine something in detail in order to understand or explain it

examples.en: Scientists need to analyse the data carefully to draw accurate conclusions.
examples.ko: 과학자들은 정확한 결론을 도출하기 위해 데이터를 주의 깊게 분석해야 한다.

meanings.english: to vanish or cease to be visible

examples.en: The magician made the rabbit disappear in front of the audience's eyes.
examples.ko: 마술사는 관객들 눈앞에서 토끼를 사라지게 만들었다.

meanings.english: a person who applies for a job or position

examples.en: The company received many qualified applicants for the open position.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 열린 포지션에 많은 자격 있는 지원자들이 지원했다.

meanings.english: the art or practice of designing and constructing buildings

examples.en: The architecture of ancient Greek temples is admired for its beauty and symmetry.
examples.ko: 고대 그리스 신전의 건축은 그 아름다움과 대칭을 인정받고 있다.

meanings.english: made or produced by human beings rather than occurring naturally

examples.en: Many food products contain artificial flavors and colors to enhance taste and appearance.
examples.ko: 많은 식품 제품은 맛과 외관을 향상시키기 위해 인공 향료와 색소를 함유하고 있다.

meanings.english: a task or piece of work assigned to someone as part of their job or studies

examples.en: The teacher gave us a challenging assignment that required research and creativity.
examples.ko: 선생님은 우리에게 연구와 창의력이 필요한 도전적인 과제를 주었다.

meanings.english: a person who helps or aids someone in their work or duties

examples.en: She works as an assistant to the manager, helping with administrative tasks.
examples.ko: 그녀는 관리자의 보조로 일하며 행정 업무를 도와주고 있다.

meanings.english: able to be used or obtained; at someone's disposal

examples.en: There are still tickets available for the concert.
examples.ko: 콘서트를 위한 티켓이 아직 남아 있습니다.

meanings.english: having no knowledge of a situation or fact

examples.en: She was unaware of the changes happening around her.
examples.ko: 그녀는 주변에서 일어나고 있는 변화를 알지 못했습니다.

meanings.english: extremely bad or unpleasant

examples.en: The smell in the room was awful.
examples.ko: 방 안의 냄새가 정말 끔찍했다.

meanings.english: the way in which one acts or conducts oneself, especially toward others

examples.en: His behavior at the party was unacceptable.
examples.ko: 그의 파티에서의 행동은 받아들일 수 없었다.

meanings.english: the way in which one acts or conducts oneself, especially toward others

examples.en: Her behaviour in class is always polite.
examples.ko: 그녀의 수업 중 행동은 항상 예의바르다.

meanings.english: to represent or exemplify in concrete form

examples.en: The statue embodies the spirit of freedom.
examples.ko: 그 조각상은 자유의 정신을 구현하고 있다.

meanings.english: savagely violent or cruel

examples.en: The brutal attack left him with serious injuries.
examples.ko: 잔인한 공격으로 그는 심각한 부상을 입었다.

meanings.english: a small electronic device used for performing mathematical calculations

examples.en: She used a calculator to solve the math problem.
examples.ko: 그녀는 수학 문제를 풀기 위해 계산기를 사용했다.

meanings.english: relaxed and unconcerned

examples.en: He wore a casual outfit to the party.
examples.ko: 그는 파티에 캐주얼한 옷을 입었다.

meanings.english: a list of items

examples.en: She received a catalog of the new products.
examples.ko: 그녀는 새 제품 목록을 받았다.

meanings.english: relating to cause and effect

examples.en: There is a causal relationship between smoking and lung cancer.
examples.ko: 흡연과 폐암 사이에는 인과적인 관계가 있다.

meanings.english: to release or dismiss

examples.en: The hospital will discharge the patient tomorrow.
examples.ko: 병원은 환자를 내일 퇴원시킬 것이다.

meanings.english: a written order to pay a sum of money

examples.en: He wrote a cheque to pay for the groceries.
examples.ko: 그는 장보기를 위해 수표를 썼다.

meanings.english: of the highest quality or class

examples.en: The novel is considered a classic in English literature.
examples.ko: 그 소설은 영어 문학에서 고전으로 여겨진다.

meanings.english: to arrange into categories

examples.en: The library staff will classify the books by genre.
examples.ko: 도서관 직원들은 책을 장르별로 분류할 것이다.

meanings.english: to make clear or understandable

examples.en: Please clarify your instructions before we proceed.
examples.ko: 계속하기 전에 지시사항을 명확히 해주세요.

meanings.english: to make something known or reveal something that was previously hidden

examples.en: The company will disclose its financial results next week.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 다음 주에 자신의 재무 결과를 공개할 것이다.

meanings.english: to surround or close off on all sides

examples.en: Please enclose a copy of your ID with the application form.
examples.ko: 신청서에 신분증 사본을 첨부해 주세요.

meanings.english: the property possessed by an object of producing different sensations on the eye as a result of the way the object reflects or emits light

examples.en: She likes to wear bright colours in the summer.
examples.ko: 그녀는 여름에 밝은 색깔의 옷을 입는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: providing physical ease and relaxation

examples.en: The sofa in the living room is very comfortable.
examples.ko: 거실의 소파는 매우 편안하다.

meanings.english: an instruction, command, or duty given to a person or group of people

examples.en: The artist received a commission to paint a mural for the new building.
examples.ko: 작가는 새 건물을 위해 벽화를 그리는 수수료를 받았다.

meanings.english: the imparting or exchanging of information or news

examples.en: Good communication is essential for a successful team.
examples.ko: 좋은 의사소통은 성공적인 팀에게 필수적이다.

meanings.english: having the necessary ability, knowledge, or skill to do something successfully

examples.en: She is a competent pianist who can play various genres of music.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다양한 음악 장르를 연주할 수 있는 유능한 피아니스트이다.

meanings.english: the state or quality of being intricate or complicated

examples.en: The complexity of the math problem made it challenging for the students.
examples.ko: 수학 문제의 복잡성으로 인해 학생들에게 도전적이었다.

meanings.english: including all or nearly all elements or aspects of something

examples.en: She conducted a comprehensive study on the topic.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그 주제에 대해 포괄적인 연구를 진행했다.

meanings.english: an electronic device that can store, retrieve, and process data

examples.en: I use my computer to do homework.
examples.ko: 숙제를 하기 위해 컴퓨터를 사용해.

meanings.english: feeling or showing certainty about one's abilities or qualities

examples.en: She is confident that she will succeed in the competition.
examples.ko: 그녀는 그 경쟁에서 성공할 것이라고 자신 있어.

meanings.english: unchanging in achievement or effect over a period of time

examples.en: He has shown consistent improvement in his grades.
examples.ko: 그는 성적에서 일관된 향상을 보여주었다.

meanings.english: a set of fundamental principles or established precedents according to which a state or other organization is governed

examples.en: The country's constitution guarantees the rights of its citizens.
examples.ko: 그 나라의 헌법은 시민들의 권리를 보장한다.

meanings.english: the process or art of building something

examples.en: The construction of the new school building will begin next month.
examples.ko: 새 학교 건물의 건설이 다음 달에 시작될 것이다.

meanings.english: a person who purchases goods and services for personal use

examples.en: As a consumer, you have the right to return faulty products.
examples.ko: 소비자로서, 불량 제품을 반품할 권리가 있다.

meanings.english: the using up of a resource

examples.en: Reducing energy consumption is important for environmental sustainability.
examples.ko: 에너지 소비를 줄이는 것은 환경 지속가능성에 중요하다.

meanings.english: suited to one's comfort or ease; easy to use

examples.en: It's very convenient to have a supermarket next to our apartment.
examples.ko: 아파트 옆에 슈퍼마켓이 있는 것은 매우 편리해.

meanings.english: talk between two or more people; informal interchange of thoughts and feelings

examples.en: I had a great conversation with my friend over coffee.
examples.ko: 커피를 마시면서 친구와 좋은 대화를 나눴어.

meanings.english: a way in which something is usually done; a traditional or common style or method

examples.en: It's a convention to shake hands when you meet someone for the first time.
examples.ko: 처음 만나는 사람과 악수하는 것은 관례이다.

meanings.english: a small, flat, sweet baked food typically containing flour, sugar, and eggs

examples.en: I love to bake chocolate chip cookies with my mom.
examples.ko: 엄마랑 초콜릿칩 쿠키를 굽는 걸 좋아해.

meanings.english: a company or group of people authorized to act as a single entity

examples.en: The corporation announced a new partnership with a tech company.
examples.ko: 그 기업은 기술 회사와의 새로운 파트너십을 발표했다.

meanings.english: a deduction from the usual cost of something

examples.en: I got a discount on this shirt because it was on sale.
examples.ko: 이 셔츠는 세일 중이어서 할인 받았어.

meanings.english: a long flat-topped fixture in a store or bank across which business is conducted with customers

examples.en: You can pay for your items at the counter over there.
examples.ko: 저기 카운터에서 물건을 결제할 수 있어.

meanings.english: to cause someone to lose confidence or enthusiasm

examples.en: Don't let setbacks discourage you from pursuing your dreams.
examples.ko: 실패로 인해 네 꿈을 이루는 것을 포기하지 마.

meanings.english: To give someone support, confidence, or hope

examples.en: His parents always encourage him to do his best in school.
examples.ko: 그의 부모님은 항상 그에게 최선을 다하라고 격려합니다.

meanings.english: To find something for the first time

examples.en: Christopher Columbus discovered America in 1492.
examples.ko: 크리스토퍼 콜럼버스는 1492년에 미국을 발견했다.

meanings.english: Mentally deranged; insane

examples.en: She's acting crazy lately. I think she needs some rest.
examples.ko: 요즘 그녀가 미쳐가는 것 같아. 좀 쉬어야 할 것 같아.

meanings.english: A living being, especially an animal

examples.en: The forest is home to many different creatures, from birds to insects.
examples.ko: 그 숲에는 새부터 벌레까지 다양한 생물들이 살고 있다.

meanings.english: Impossible to believe; amazing

examples.en: The magician performed an incredible trick that left the audience in awe.
examples.ko: 그 마술사가 믿기 어려운 마술을 선보여 관객들을 경탄하게 했다.

meanings.english: A person who has committed a crime; relating to crime

examples.en: The criminal was arrested by the police for stealing from the store.
examples.ko: 그 범죄자는 상점에서 훔치는 것으로 경찰에게 체포되었다.

meanings.english: To express disapproval of someone or something

examples.en: It's important to be able to criticize constructively without hurting others' feelings.
examples.ko: 다른 사람의 감정을 상하게 하지 않으면서 건설적으로 비판할 수 있는 능력은 중요하다.

meanings.english: The act of expressing disapproval or finding fault

examples.en: Constructive criticism can help you improve your work.
examples.ko: 건설적인 비평은 당신의 작품을 개선하는 데 도움이 될 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: A strong desire to know or learn something

examples.en: Children often have a natural curiosity about the world around them.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 자연스럽게 주변 세계에 대한 호기심을 갖습니다.

meanings.english: To convert waste into reusable material

examples.en: It's important to recycle paper and plastic to protect the environment.
examples.ko: 환경을 보호하기 위해 종이와 플라스틱을 재활용하는 것이 중요합니다.

meanings.english: A person who rides a bicycle

examples.en: The cyclist enjoys riding through the countryside on weekends.
examples.ko: 그 자전거 타는 사람은 주말에 시골을 타며 즐깁니다.

meanings.english: Facts or information used for analysis or reference

examples.en: Scientists collect data to support their research findings.
examples.ko: 과학자들은 연구 결과를 뒷받침하기 위해 자료를 수집합니다.

meanings.english: A conclusion or resolution reached after consideration

examples.en: Making a decision can sometimes be challenging, but it's important to choose wisely.
examples.ko: 결정을 내리는 것은 때로는 어려울 수 있지만, 현명하게 선택하는 것이 중요합니다.

meanings.english: The variation of the form of a noun, pronoun, or adjective to express distinctions of case, gender, number, and tense

examples.en: In Latin, nouns have different declensions based on their endings.
examples.ko: 라틴어에서 명사는 어미에 따라 다른 굴절을 갖습니다.

meanings.english: A person or entity against whom an action is brought in a court of law

examples.en: The defendant pleaded not guilty during the trial.
examples.ko: 피고는 재판 중 유죄를 인정하지 않았습니다.

meanings.english: The action of defending from or resisting attack

examples.en: The castle's strong defence prevented the enemy from entering.
examples.ko: 성의 강력한 방어로 적이 들어오는 것을 막았다.

meanings.english: The act of leaving a place, especially at the start of a journey

examples.en: The departure of the train was delayed due to technical issues.
examples.ko: 기차의 출발이 기술적 문제로 지연되었다.

meanings.english: A division of a large organization such as a government, university, or business

examples.en: The marketing department is responsible for promoting the company's products.
examples.ko: 마케팅 부서는 회사 제품을 홍보하는 역할을 맡고 있다.

meanings.english: The state of relying on or being controlled by someone or something else

examples.en: Children have a natural dependence on their parents for care and support.
examples.ko: 어린이들은 부모님에게 돌봄과 지원에 대한 자연스러운 의존이 있다.

meanings.english: Not influenced or controlled by others; self-reliant

examples.en: She is an independent woman who doesn't rely on anyone for help.
examples.ko: 그녀는 아무도에게 의존하지 않는 독립적인 여성이다.

meanings.english: A spoken or written representation or account of a person, object, or event

examples.en: The book provides a vivid description of the protagonist's adventures.
examples.ko: 이 책은 주인공의 모험에 대한 생생한 설명을 제공한다.

meanings.english: The place to which someone or something is going or being sent

examples.en: The airport shuttle will take you to your final destination, the hotel.
examples.ko: 공항 셔틀이 여러분을 최종 목적지인 호텔로 데려다 줄 것입니다.

meanings.english: The action or process of causing so much damage to something that it no longer exists or cannot be repaired

examples.en: The earthquake resulted in the destruction of many buildings in the city.
examples.ko: 그 지진으로 인해 도시의 많은 건물이 파괴되었다.

meanings.english: a conversation between two or more people

examples.en: They had a meaningful dialog about their future plans.
examples.ko: 그들은 미래 계획에 대해 의미 있는 대화를 나눴다.

meanings.english: not the same as something or someone else

examples.en: Each person has a different perspective on the issue.
examples.ko: 각 사람은 그 문제에 대해 다른 시각을 갖고 있다.

meanings.english: covered or marked with dirt; not clean

examples.en: Please wash your hands if they are dirty.
examples.ko: 손이 더러우면 세탁해 주세요.

meanings.english: a flat, thin, round object

examples.en: He saved the file on a disk for easy access.
examples.ko: 그는 쉬운 접근을 위해 파일을 디스크에 저장했다.

meanings.english: more important, powerful, or successful than others

examples.en: She has a dominant presence in the business world.
examples.ko: 그녀는 비즈니스 세계에서 우세한 존재감을 갖고 있다.

meanings.english: a box-shaped storage compartment without a lid

examples.en: He kept his socks neatly organized in the top drawer.
examples.ko: 그는 양말을 깔끔하게 정리해서 윗 서랍에 보관했다.

meanings.english: a disorder of structure or function in a human, animal, or plant

examples.en: Preventive measures are important to control the spread of disease.
examples.ko: 질병 전파를 통제하기 위해 예방 조치가 중요하다.

meanings.english: not difficult; requiring little effort

examples.en: The test was easy because she studied hard.
examples.ko: 시험은 그녀가 열심히 공부했기 때문에 쉬웠다.

meanings.english: Having the desired result or effect

examples.en: Regular exercise is an effective way to stay healthy.
examples.ko: 규칙적인 운동은 건강을 유지하는 효과적인 방법이다.

meanings.english: Related to the first stages of education

examples.en: Elementary school students enjoy learning new things.
examples.ko: 초등학생들은 새로운 것을 배우는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: A platform or compartment that moves up and down in a building

examples.en: We took the elevator to the top floor of the building.
examples.ko: 우리는 건물의 최상층으로 엘리베이터를 탔다.

meanings.english: The process of coming into view or becoming known

examples.en: The emergence of new technologies has changed our lives.
examples.ko: 새로운 기술의 출현은 우리의 삶을 바꿨다.

meanings.english: The act of sending out or giving off

examples.en: The emission of harmful gases contributes to air pollution.
examples.ko: 유해 가스의 방출이 대기 오염에 기여한다.

meanings.english: The surroundings or conditions in which a person, animal, or plant lives or operates

examples.en: It's important to protect the environment for future generations.
examples.ko: 향후 세대를 위해 환경을 보호하는 것이 중요하다.

meanings.english: Tools or supplies needed for a specific purpose

examples.en: The firefighters wear protective equipment to stay safe.
examples.ko: 소방관들은 안전을 위해 보호장비를 착용한다.

meanings.english: An object used to remove pencil or pen marks

examples.en: I need an eraser to correct my mistake on the paper.
examples.ko: 종이 위의 실수를 고치기 위해 지우개가 필요하다.

meanings.english: A mistake or inaccuracy

examples.en: Making an error in a math calculation can lead to the wrong answer.
examples.ko: 수학 계산에서 실수를 하면 잘못된 답을 얻을 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: Particularly; more than usual

examples.en: I love all fruits, especially strawberries.
examples.ko: 나는 모든 과일을 좋아하지만 특히 딸기를 좋아합니다.

meanings.english: Absolutely necessary; extremely important

examples.en: Water is essential for human survival.
examples.ko: 물은 인간의 생존에 꼭 필요합니다.

meanings.english: Related to moral principles or values

examples.en: It is important to make ethical decisions in business.
examples.ko: 비즈니스에서 윤리적인 결정을 내리는 것이 중요합니다.

meanings.english: Finally; after a long time or a series of events

examples.en: If you keep practicing, you will eventually improve your skills.
examples.ko: 계속 연습하면 결국 실력이 향상될 것입니다.

meanings.english: Certain to happen; unavoidable

examples.en: Change is inevitable; we must learn to adapt.
examples.ko: 변화는 불가피하며, 우리는 적응해야 합니다.

meanings.english: A formal test of a person's knowledge or proficiency in a subject or skill

examples.en: Studying hard is important to do well on an examination.
examples.ko: 열심히 공부하는 것이 시험에서 잘 하기 위해 중요합니다.

meanings.english: A formal test of a person's knowledge or proficiency in a subject or skill

examples.en: I have an important exam tomorrow, so I need to study tonight.
examples.ko: 내일 중요한 시험이 있으니 오늘 밤에 공부해야 합니다.

meanings.english: extremely good; outstanding

examples.en: She did an excellent job on her project.
examples.ko: 그녀는 프로젝트를 훌륭하게 수행했다.

meanings.english: limited to a particular person, group, or area

examples.en: This club is exclusive to members only.
examples.ko: 이 클럽은 회원에게만 제한된다.

meanings.english: costing a lot of money

examples.en: That designer handbag is very expensive.
examples.ko: 저 디자이너 핸드백은 매우 비싸다.

meanings.english: based on facts; true

examples.en: The article provides factual information about the event.
examples.ko: 그 기사는 그 사건에 대한 사실적인 정보를 제공한다.

meanings.english: well-known; widely recognized

examples.en: The actor became famous after starring in that movie.
examples.ko: 그 배우는 그 영화에 출연한 후 유명해졌다.

meanings.english: resulting in death; deadly

examples.en: The doctor said the patient's condition was fatal.
examples.ko: 의사는 환자의 상태가 치명적이라고 말했다.

meanings.english: informal term for father

examples.en: My dad always helps me with my homework.
examples.ko: 우리 아빠는 항상 숙제를 도와준다.

meanings.english: affectionate term for father

examples.en: The little girl ran to her daddy for a hug.
examples.ko: 그 소녀는 포옹을 위해 아빠에게 달려갔다.

meanings.english: an act of kindness or support

examples.en: She did me a favour by helping me with my project.
examples.ko: 그녀는 나에게 나의 프로젝트를 도와줌으로써 친절을 베풀었다.

meanings.english: preferred above all others

examples.en: Pizza is my favourite food.
examples.ko: 피자는 내가 가장 좋아하는 음식이다.

meanings.english: a thread or filament from which a vegetable tissue, mineral substance, or textile is formed

examples.en: Cotton is a natural fibre used to make clothes.
examples.ko: 면은 옷을 만드는 데 사용되는 천연 섬유이다.

meanings.english: the distinctive taste of a food or drink

examples.en: Vanilla is a popular flavour for ice cream.
examples.ko: 바닐라는 아이스크림의 인기 있는 맛이다.

meanings.english: to ensure compliance with a rule or law

examples.en: The police enforce traffic laws to maintain road safety.
examples.ko: 경찰은 도로 안전을 유지하기 위해 교통법을 집행한다.

meanings.english: following rules or customs, often in an official way

examples.en: Wearing a suit is considered formal attire for a business meeting.
examples.ko: 정장을 입는 것은 비즈니스 미팅에 공식적인 복장으로 여겨진다.

meanings.english: the action of forming or process of being formed

examples.en: The formation of a rainbow occurs when sunlight is refracted by raindrops.
examples.ko: 무지개의 형성은 태양빛이 비방울에 의해 굴절될 때 발생한다.

meanings.english: casual, relaxed, not formal

examples.en: An informal gathering with friends is a great way to relax.
examples.ko: 친구들과 함께 하는 비공식적인 소모임은 편안해지는 좋은 방법이다.

meanings.english: the basis on which something is grounded

examples.en: The foundation of a strong building is essential for its stability.
