examples.ko: 튼튼한 건물의 기초는 안정을 위해 중요하다.

meanings.english: the state of being friends

examples.en: True friendship is built on trust and understanding.
examples.ko: 진정한 우정은 신뢰와 이해에 기반을 둔다.

meanings.english: extremely angry

examples.en: She was furious when she found out her phone was missing.
examples.ko: 그녀는 핸드폰이 없어진 것을 알고 열받았다.

meanings.english: a flammable liquid used as fuel for motor vehicles

examples.en: The car needs petrol to run smoothly.
examples.ko: 자동차는 원활히 움직이기 위해 휘발유가 필요하다.

meanings.english: relating to genes or heredity

examples.en: Genetic factors can influence a person's physical traits.
examples.ko: 유전적 요소는 사람의 신체적 특징에 영향을 줄 수 있다.

meanings.english: all of the people born and living at about the same time

examples.en: Each generation brings new ideas and perspectives to the world.
examples.ko: 각 세대는 세상에 새로운 아이디어와 시각을 가져다준다.

meanings.english: relating to the whole world; worldwide

examples.en: The company has a global presence with offices in many countries.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 많은 나라에 사무실을 두고 세계적으로 활동하고 있다.

meanings.english: items that are produced or manufactured for sale

examples.en: The store sells a variety of goods, from clothing to electronics.
examples.ko: 그 가게는 의류부터 전자제품까지 다양한 상품을 판매한다.

meanings.english: a farewell remark

examples.en: She waved goodbye as the train pulled away.
examples.ko: 기차가 떠나는 동안 그녀는 손을 흔들며 작별 인사를 했다.

meanings.english: the governing body of a nation, state, or community

examples.en: The government announced new policies to improve public health.
examples.ko: 정부는 공중보건을 개선하기 위한 새로운 정책을 발표했다.

meanings.english: proceeding in small stages or gradual steps

examples.en: She made gradual progress in learning the new language.
examples.ko: 그녀는 새로운 언어를 배우는 데 서서히 진전했다.

meanings.english: relating to visual art, especially involving drawing, engraving, or lettering

examples.en: The graphic design of the poster caught everyone's attention.
examples.ko: 포스터의 그래픽 디자인이 모두의 관심을 끌었다.

meanings.english: of a color intermediate between black and white

examples.en: The sky turned grey before the rain started.
examples.ko: 비가 시작되기 전에 하늘이 회색으로 변했다.

meanings.english: responsible for a crime or offense; feeling remorse or self-reproach

examples.en: The defendant looked guilty as the judge read the verdict.
examples.ko: 판사가 판결문을 읽는 동안 피고인은 유죄감을 느낀 듯했다.

meanings.english: a place for indoor sports and physical exercise

examples.en: She goes to the gym three times a week to work out.
examples.ko: 그녀는 일주일에 세 번 체육관에 가서 운동을 한다.

meanings.english: a place on the coast where ships may moor in shelter, especially one protected from rough water

examples.en: The sailors guided the ship into the harbour during the storm.
examples.ko: 선원들은 폭풍우 중에 배를 항구로 안내했다.

meanings.english: barely, scarcely

examples.en: She could hardly believe her eyes.
examples.ko: 그녀는 거의 믿을 수 없었다.

meanings.english: peaceful, in agreement

examples.en: The family lived in a harmonious atmosphere.
examples.ko: 가족은 조화로운 분위기에서 살았다.

meanings.english: in good health, well

examples.en: Eating fruits and vegetables is important for staying healthy.
examples.ko: 과일과 채소를 먹는 것은 건강을 유지하는 데 중요하다.

meanings.english: feeling a need to eat

examples.en: After playing outside all day, the children were very hungry.
examples.ko: 하루 종일 밖에서 놀고 난 후, 아이들은 매우 배고팠다.

meanings.english: recognize, distinguish

examples.en: Can you identify the person in this photograph?
examples.ko: 이 사진 속 사람을 알아볼 수 있나요?

meanings.english: false idea or belief

examples.en: The magician created the illusion of a disappearing act.
examples.ko: 마술사는 사라지는 행위의 환상을 만들었다.

meanings.english: significance, value

examples.en: The importance of education cannot be overstated.
examples.ko: 교육의 중요성은 과장될 수 없다.

meanings.english: significant, essential

examples.en: It is important to follow the rules.
examples.ko: 규칙을 따르는 것이 중요하다.

meanings.english: a conclusion reached on the basis of evidence and reasoning

examples.en: Based on the evidence presented, we can make the inference that the suspect is guilty.
examples.ko: 제시된 증거를 바탕으로 우리는 용의자가 유죄임을 추론할 수 있습니다.

meanings.english: to ask for information

examples.en: I need to enquire about the availability of the product before making a purchase.
examples.ko: 구매 전 제품의 가용성에 대해 조사해야 합니다.

meanings.english: an organization founded for a religious, educational, professional, or social purpose

examples.en: Harvard University is a prestigious educational institution in the United States.
examples.ko: 하버드 대학교는 미국의 명문 교육 기관입니다.

meanings.english: a practice or arrangement by which a company or government agency provides a guarantee of compensation for specified loss, damage, illness, or death in return for payment of a premium

examples.en: It is important to have insurance to protect yourself financially in case of unexpected events.
examples.ko: 예상치 못한 사건 발생 시 재정적으로 자신을 보호하기 위해 보험에 가입하는 것이 중요합니다.

meanings.english: relating to the ability to think and understand ideas at a high level

examples.en: She is known for her intellectual curiosity and love for learning new things.
examples.ko: 그녀는 지적 호기심과 새로운 것을 배우는 것을 사랑하는 것으로 유명합니다.

meanings.english: a thing intended; an aim or plan

examples.en: His intention was to study hard and get into a top university.
examples.ko: 그의 의도는 열심히 공부하고 최고의 대학에 진학하는 것이었습니다.

meanings.english: a person who invents or creates something, especially a device or process

examples.en: Thomas Edison is known as a prolific inventor with numerous patents to his name.
examples.ko: 토마스 에디슨은 수많은 특허를 보유한 다작 발명가로 알려져 있습니다.

meanings.english: to take pleasure in something

examples.en: I enjoy spending time with my friends on the weekends.
examples.ko: 주말에 친구들과 시간을 보내는 것을 즐깁니다.

meanings.english: work, especially physical work

examples.en: She laboured in the fields all day.
examples.ko: 그녀는 하루 종일 밭에서 일했다.

meanings.english: a room equipped for scientific experiments or research

examples.en: The scientists conducted their experiments in the lab.
examples.ko: 과학자들은 실험실에서 실험을 진행했다.

meanings.english: a sheet, quantity, or thickness of material covering a surface or in between other substances; to arrange in layers

examples.en: The cake had multiple layers of frosting.
examples.ko: 케이크에는 여러 겹의 크림이 있었다.

meanings.english: taking words in their usual or most basic sense without metaphor or allegory

examples.en: He followed her instructions to the literal meaning.
examples.ko: 그는 그녀의 지시를 말 그대로의 의미로 따랐다.

meanings.english: a permit from an authority to own or use something, do a particular thing, or carry on a trade

examples.en: You need a driving licence to operate a vehicle legally.
examples.ko: 차량을 합법적으로 운전하려면 운전 면허가 필요하다.

meanings.english: probable or expected to happen

examples.en: It is likely to rain tomorrow.
examples.ko: 내일 비가 올 가능성이 높다.

meanings.english: the greater number or part; more than half

examples.en: The majority of the students preferred the new school policy.
examples.ko: 학생들의 대다수가 새로운 학교 정책을 선호했다.

meanings.english: the study of numbers, quantities, shapes, and patterns

examples.en: She enjoys solving math problems.
examples.ko: 그녀는 수학 문제를 푸는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: The study of numbers, quantities, shapes, and patterns

examples.en: I enjoy studying maths because it challenges my problem-solving skills.
examples.ko: 나는 수학을 공부하는 것을 즐기는데, 그것이 나의 문제 해결 능력을 도전한다.

meanings.english: Substance out of which something is or can be made

examples.en: The artist used various materials like clay and wood to create her sculptures.
examples.ko: 작가는 그녀의 조각품을 만들기 위해 점토와 나무와 같은 다양한 재료를 사용했다.

meanings.english: Means of mass communication, such as newspapers, radio, television, and the internet

examples.en: The media plays a crucial role in shaping public opinion and disseminating information.
examples.ko: 미디어는 대중 의견 형성과 정보 전달에 중요한 역할을 한다.

meanings.english: The state of belonging to or being a part of a group or organization

examples.en: To access the exclusive benefits, you need to maintain your membership status.
examples.ko: 독점 혜택을 이용하려면 회원 자격을 유지해야 합니다.

meanings.english: A person who moves from one place to another, especially to find work or better living conditions

examples.en: The government provides support for migrant workers to help them integrate into the new society.
examples.ko: 정부는 이주 노동자들이 새로운 사회에 통합되도록 지원을 제공합니다.

meanings.english: A person who works in a mine, extracting coal, minerals, or precious stones

examples.en: My grandfather used to be a miner and spent his days underground digging for coal.
examples.ko: 제 할아버지는 예전에 광산에서 일하며 석탄을 캐는데 지하에서 하루를 보냈습니다.

meanings.english: Small amounts of water present in the air, soil, or a substance

examples.en: Plants need moisture to grow and thrive in their environment.
examples.ko: 식물은 환경에서 자라고 번성하기 위해 수분이 필요하다.

meanings.english: The shape resembling a half-circle that is illuminated on one side by the sun

examples.en: The sky was adorned with a beautiful half-moon shining brightly in the night.
examples.ko: 하늘은 밤에 밝게 빛나는 아름다운 반달로 장식되어 있었다.

meanings.english: a mother

examples.en: My mom cooks delicious meals for our family.
examples.ko: 우리 엄마는 맛있는 음식을 요리해요.

meanings.english: informal term for mother

examples.en: The little girl ran to her mommy for a hug.
examples.ko: 작은 소녀가 안아줄 엄마에게 달려갔다.

meanings.english: relating to or involving two or more countries

examples.en: The company has an international presence with offices in many countries.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 많은 나라에 사무실을 두고 국제적으로 활동하고 있다.

meanings.english: expressing denial or refusal

examples.en: He had a negative attitude towards the idea of change.
examples.ko: 그는 변화에 대한 아이디어에 부정적인 태도를 가졌다.

meanings.english: feeling or showing anxiety or worry

examples.en: She felt nervous before her first job interview.
examples.ko: 그녀는 첫 직장 면접 전에 긴장을 느꼈다.

meanings.english: conforming to a standard; usual, typical, or expected

examples.en: It is normal to feel tired after a long day of work.
examples.ko: 긴 하루 일한 후 피곤한 기분을 느끼는 것은 보통입니다.

meanings.english: a conception or belief about something

examples.en: She had a notion that hard work always pays off in the end.
examples.ko: 그녀는 노력은 항상 결국에 보람이 있다는 개념을 가지고 있었다.

meanings.english: a goal or purpose

examples.en: The main objective of the project is to increase customer satisfaction.
examples.ko: 프로젝트의 주요 목적은 고객 만족도를 높이는 것이다.

meanings.english: A person's job or profession.

examples.en: Teaching is her chosen occupation.
examples.ko: 가르치는 것이 그녀의 선택된 직업이다.

meanings.english: An event that happens.

examples.en: The occurrence of the earthquake shocked the residents.
examples.ko: 지진 발생으로 주민들이 충격을 받았다.

meanings.english: A person who holds a position of authority in an organization; authorized or approved.

examples.en: The official announcement will be made tomorrow.
examples.ko: 공식 발표는 내일 이루어질 것이다.

meanings.english: A set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something.

examples.en: Don't miss this golden opportunity to showcase your talent.
examples.ko: 당신의 재능을 선보일 황금 기회를 놓치지 마세요.

meanings.english: A choice or alternative that is available.

examples.en: You have the option to study abroad or pursue a career locally.
examples.ko: 해외 유학을 하거나 국내에서 경력을 쌓을 선택권이 있습니다.

meanings.english: A state of confusion or lack of order.

examples.en: The disorder in the classroom made it difficult to focus on studying.
examples.ko: 교실의 무질서로 공부에 집중하기 어려웠다.

meanings.english: To arrange or put things in order.

examples.en: Let's organize our study materials before the exam.
examples.ko: 시험 전에 우리의 공부 자료를 정리해 봅시다.

meanings.english: Related to living organisms or produced by organic methods.

examples.en: She prefers to buy organic fruits and vegetables for a healthier lifestyle.
examples.ko: 건강한 삶을 위해 유기농 과일과 채소를 구매하는 것을 선호합니다.

meanings.english: the determination of the relative position of something or someone

examples.en: The new student orientation helped me get familiar with the campus.
examples.ko: 새 학생 오리엔테이션은 나에게 캠퍼스에 익숙해지는 데 도움이 되었습니다.

meanings.english: present or existing from the beginning; first or earliest

examples.en: The artist's original painting was sold for a high price.
examples.ko: 작가의 원작은 높은 가격에 팔렸다.

meanings.english: to arrange or put things in order

examples.en: She needs to organise her schedule for the upcoming week.
examples.ko: 그녀는 다가오는 주의 일정을 정리해야 한다.

meanings.english: in, to, or from a foreign country, especially one across the sea

examples.en: My cousin is studying overseas in Australia.
examples.ko: 나의 사촌은 호주에서 해외 유학 중이다.

meanings.english: especially; more than usual or more than others

examples.en: I am particularly interested in learning about different cultures.
examples.ko: 나는 특히 다른 문화에 대해 배우는 것에 관심이 많다.

meanings.english: free from disturbance; tranquil

examples.en: The sound of the waves made the beach feel peaceful.
examples.ko: 파도 소리가 해변을 평화로운 곳으로 느끼게 했다.

meanings.english: the ability to see, hear, or become aware of something through the senses

examples.en: Our perception of beauty can vary from person to person.
examples.ko: 우리의 아름다움에 대한 지각은 사람마다 다를 수 있다.

meanings.english: the combination of characteristics or qualities that form an individual's distinctive character

examples.en: Her outgoing personality makes her popular among her classmates.
examples.ko: 그녀의 외향적인 성격은 동급생들 사이에서 인기가 많다.

meanings.english: A picture made using a camera

examples.en: I took a photo of my family at the beach.
examples.ko: 나는 해변에서 우리 가족을 찍었다.

meanings.english: To force something or someone to move from its usual place or position

examples.en: The earthquake displaced many families from their homes.
examples.ko: 지진으로 많은 가족들이 집을 떠나야 했다.

meanings.english: Enjoyable, pleasing, or agreeable

examples.en: The weather was pleasant, so we decided to have a picnic.
examples.ko: 날씨가 좋아서 우리는 소풍을 가기로 했다.

meanings.english: A feeling of happy satisfaction and enjoyment

examples.en: Reading a good book gives me great pleasure.
examples.ko: 좋은 책을 읽는 것은 나에게 큰 즐거움을 준다.

meanings.english: Relating to the North or South Pole

examples.en: Polar bears live in the Arctic region.
examples.ko: 북극곰은 북극 지역에 산다.

meanings.english: All the people living in a particular area, city, or country

examples.en: The population of Seoul is over 10 million.
examples.ko: 서울의 인구는 1,000만 명을 넘는다.

meanings.english: To get rid of something or deal with something in a particular way

examples.en: Please dispose of your trash in the designated bins.
examples.ko: 지정된 쓰레기통에 쓰레기를 버려주세요.

meanings.english: The place where someone or something is located or situated

examples.en: She adjusted her position to get a better view of the stage.
examples.ko: 그녀는 무대를 더 잘 볼 수 있도록 자리를 조정했다.

meanings.english: Characterized by the presence or influence of something rather than its absence.

examples.en: She has a positive attitude towards life.
examples.ko: 그녀는 인생에 긍정적인 태도를 갖고 있습니다.

meanings.english: A large printed picture or notice put on a wall or in a public place.

examples.en: The movie poster caught my attention.
examples.ko: 영화 포스터가 내 주목을 끌었습니다.

meanings.english: To perform or work at repeatedly so as to become proficient.

examples.en: You need to practise playing the piano every day.
examples.ko: 매일 피아노 연주를 연습해야 합니다.

meanings.english: Never done or known before.

examples.en: The company achieved unprecedented success in a short period of time.
examples.ko: 그 회사는 짧은 기간 내에 전례 없는 성공을 거뒀습니다.

meanings.english: The head of a country's government, usually in a republic.

examples.en: The president delivered a speech to the nation.
examples.ko: 대통령이 국민에게 연설을 했습니다.

meanings.english: Of chief importance; principal.

examples.en: Education is a primary concern for parents.
examples.ko: 교육은 부모들에게 주요 관심사입니다.

meanings.english: Almost certainly; as far as one knows or can tell.

examples.en: It will probably rain tomorrow.
examples.ko: 내일 아마 비가 올 것입니다.

meanings.english: An established or official way of doing something.

examples.en: Follow the correct procedure to complete the experiment.
examples.ko: 실험을 완료하기 위해 올바른 절차를 따르세요.

meanings.english: A planned series of events or activities

examples.en: I watched an interesting programme on TV last night.
examples.ko: 어젯밤 흥미로운 프로그램을 TV로 봤어.

meanings.english: Relating to or having the characteristics of a program

examples.en: The company adopted a programmatic approach to solve the issue.
examples.ko: 회사는 문제를 해결하기 위해 프로그램적인 방식을 채택했다.

meanings.english: The way in which a word is pronounced

examples.en: She practiced the pronunciation of difficult words.
examples.ko: 그녀는 어려운 단어들의 발음을 연습했다.

meanings.english: A person or company that prepares and issues books, journals, or music for sale

examples.en: The publisher released a new novel by a famous author.
examples.ko: 출판사가 유명 작가의 새 소설을 출간했다.

meanings.english: To meet the necessary requirements to be eligible for something

examples.en: She studied hard to qualify for the scholarship.
examples.ko: 그녀는 장학금 자격을 얻기 위해 열심히 공부했다.

meanings.english: Relating to race or different races of people

examples.en: The country has made progress in addressing racial discrimination.
examples.ko: 그 나라는 인종차별 문제에 대해 진전을 이루었다.

meanings.english: To become aware of something or to make something real

examples.en: He didn't realize how much he missed his family until he moved away.
examples.ko: 그는 이사를 가기 전에 가족을 얼마나 그리워했는지 깨달지 못했다.

meanings.english: Having sound judgment; fair and sensible

examples.en: It's reasonable to expect a raise after working hard all year.
examples.ko: 일년 내내 열심히 일한 후에 연봉 인상을 기대하는 것은 합리적이다.

meanings.english: The act or process of receiving or welcoming someone

examples.en: The hotel receptionist greeted us warmly when we arrived.
examples.ko: 우리가 도착했을 때 호텔 접수원이 우리를 따뜻하게 맞이했다.

meanings.english: An appliance or compartment that is artificially kept cool and used to store food and drink

examples.en: Don't forget to put the milk back in the refrigerator after you pour a glass.
examples.ko: 잔을 따라서 우유를 따르고 나서 냉장고에 다시 넣는 것을 잊지 마세요.

meanings.english: Considered in relation or in proportion to something else

examples.en: The price of the item is relative to its quality.
examples.ko: 그 물건의 가격은 그 품질에 비례한다.

meanings.english: The way in which two or more people or things are connected

examples.en: There is a close relation between diet and health.
examples.ko: 식습관과 건강 사이에는 밀접한 관계가 있다.

meanings.english: The way in which two or more people or things are connected, or the state of being connected

examples.en: Building a strong relationship requires trust and communication.
examples.ko: 튼튼한 관계를 구축하기 위해서는 신뢰와 소통이 필요하다.

meanings.english: A person who lives in a particular place

examples.en: The new resident of the apartment introduced herself to the neighbors.
examples.ko: 아파트의 새 거주자가 이웃들에게 자기 소개를 했다.

meanings.english: Belonging or relating separately to each of the several people or things

examples.en: Each student should return to their respective seats after the break.
examples.ko: 각 학생은 휴식 후에 각자의 자리로 돌아가야 한다.

meanings.english: deserving or inviting derision or mockery; absurd

examples.en: His outfit was so ridiculous that everyone burst out laughing.
examples.ko: 그의 옷차림은 너무 우스꽝스러웠기에 모두가 터져 웃었다.

meanings.english: to officially join a course, school, etc.

examples.en: Students need to enroll in the class before the semester begins.
examples.ko: 학생들은 학기가 시작되기 전에 수업에 등록해야 합니다.

meanings.english: a tough elastic polymeric substance made from the latex of a tropical plant or synthetically

examples.en: The eraser at the end of the pencil is made of rubber.
examples.ko: 연필 끝에 있는 지우개는 고무로 만들어졌다.

meanings.english: a currently circulating story or report of uncertain or doubtful truth

examples.en: There is a rumor going around that the school will be closed next week.
examples.ko: 학교가 다음 주에 폐쇄될 것이라는 소문이 돌고 있다.

meanings.english: the art of making two- or three-dimensional representative or abstract forms, especially by carving stone or wood or by casting metal or plaster

examples.en: The sculpture in the park was created by a famous artist.
examples.ko: 공원에 있는 조각은 유명한 예술가가 만들었습니다.

meanings.english: coming after, less important than, or resulting from someone or something else that is primary

examples.en: Learning a foreign language is a secondary skill that can be beneficial in many ways.
examples.ko: 외국어 학습은 여러 면에서 유익할 수 있는 차원적인 기술입니다.

meanings.english: a physical feeling or perception resulting from something that happens to or comes into contact with the body

examples.en: The cold water gave him a tingling sensation on his skin.
examples.ko: 차가운 물이 그의 피부에 촉감을 주었다.

meanings.english: Important or noticeable

examples.en: Her contribution to the project was significant.
examples.ko: 그녀의 프로젝트 기여는 중요했다.

meanings.english: The way things are at a certain point in time

examples.en: I am in a difficult situation right now.
examples.ko: 나는 지금 어려운 상황에 있다.

meanings.english: Different from what is usual or ordinary

examples.en: Today is a special day for us.
examples.ko: 오늘은 우리에게 특별한 날이다.

meanings.english: A person who is studying at a school or college

examples.en: She is a diligent student who always does her homework.
examples.ko: 그녀는 항상 숙제를 하는 성실한 학생이다.

meanings.english: Based on personal opinions, feelings, and attitudes

examples.en: Beauty is a subjective concept that varies from person to person.
examples.ko: 아름다움은 사람마다 다른 주관적 개념이다.

meanings.english: The act of giving something for consideration or judgment

examples.en: The deadline for submission of the report is tomorrow.
examples.ko: 보고서 제출 마감일은 내일입니다.

meanings.english: Large in size, value, or importance

examples.en: She received a substantial amount of money as a scholarship.
examples.ko: 그녀는 장학금으로 상당한 금액을 받았다.

meanings.english: Enough to meet the needs of a situation or a proposed end

examples.en: Studying for two hours should be sufficient for the exam.
examples.ko: 시험을 위해 두 시간 공부하는 것이 충분해야 한다.

meanings.english: A brief statement or account of the main points of something.

examples.en: Can you give me a summary of the book?
examples.ko: 책을 요약해 줄 수 있나요?

meanings.english: To make sure that something will happen or be the case.

examples.en: Please ensure that all doors are locked before leaving.
examples.ko: 나가기 전에 모든 문이 잠겼는지 확인해 주세요.

meanings.english: An error or fault resulting from imperfect judgment, carelessness, or insufficient knowledge.

examples.en: I made a mistake in my math homework.
examples.ko: 수학 숙제에서 실수를 했어.

meanings.english: A particular method or way of doing something, especially one that involves practical skills.

examples.en: She has mastered the technic of playing the piano.
examples.ko: 그녀는 피아노 연주의 기술을 숙달했다.

meanings.english: A person who uses unlawful violence and intimidation, especially against civilians, in the pursuit of political aims.

examples.en: The government is taking action against the terrorist group.
examples.ko: 정부가 테러리스트 그룹에 대해 조치를 취하고 있다.

meanings.english: A building or outdoor area where plays and other dramatic performances are given.

examples.en: We are going to watch a play at the theatre tonight.
examples.ko: 오늘 밤 극장에서 연극을 보러 갈 거야.

meanings.english: Neat and in good order.

examples.en: Please keep your room tidy.
examples.ko: 방을 깔끔하게 정리해 주세요.

meanings.english: In need of sleep or rest; weary.

examples.en: I feel tired after a long day at school.
examples.ko: 학교에서 하루 종일 보낸 후에는 피곤해.

meanings.english: to give someone the right to do or have something

examples.en: Winning the competition entitles you to a cash prize.
examples.ko: 대회에서 우승하면 현금 상금을 받을 자격이 생깁니다.

meanings.english: the act or process of moving people or goods from one place to another

examples.en: Public transportation in the city is convenient and affordable.
examples.ko: 도시의 대중교통은 편리하고 가격이 저렴합니다.

meanings.english: a formal examination of evidence in court by a judge and often a jury, to decide if someone is guilty of a crime

examples.en: The suspect will stand trial for the robbery next month.
examples.ko: 용의자는 다음 달에 강도 사건으로 재판을 받을 것입니다.

meanings.english: an organization of workers formed to protect their rights and interests

examples.en: The union negotiated better working conditions for the employees.
examples.ko: 조합은 직원들의 더 나은 근무 조건을 협상했습니다.

meanings.english: toward a higher place or position

examples.en: The temperature is expected to rise upwards of 30 degrees Celsius tomorrow.
examples.ko: 내일 기온은 섭씨 30도 이상 상승할 것으로 예상됩니다.

meanings.english: requiring immediate action or attention

examples.en: Please call me back as soon as possible; it's an urgent matter.
examples.ko: 가능한 빨리 전화주세요; 긴급한 문제입니다.

meanings.english: happening, done, or used most often

examples.en: I'll meet you at the usual place for lunch tomorrow.
examples.ko: 내일 점심에 평소처럼 보통의 장소에서 만나요.

meanings.english: to use something effectively for a particular purpose

examples.en: It's important to utilise your time wisely to achieve your goals.
examples.ko: 목표를 달성하기 위해 시간을 현명하게 활용하는 것이 중요합니다.

meanings.english: A period of time that a person spends away from home, school, or work usually for rest or recreation.

examples.en: I'm going on vacation to Hawaii next week.
examples.ko: 다음 주에 하와이로 휴가를 갑니다.

meanings.english: Relating to words.

examples.en: She gave a verbal warning to the students for being late.
examples.ko: 그녀는 학생들에게 늦어서 구두로 경고했다.

meanings.english: A formal assessment or examination of something with the possibility or intention of instituting change if necessary.

examples.en: The teacher asked the students to write a review of the book they read.
examples.ko: 선생님은 학생들에게 읽은 책에 대한 검토를 쓰라고 했다.

meanings.english: A formal meeting in which one or more persons question, consult, or evaluate another person.

examples.en: She has an interview for a job at the company tomorrow.
examples.ko: 내일 그녀는 그 회사에서 일자리 면접을 본다.

meanings.english: Characterized by or involving physical strength, effort, or energy.

examples.en: She does a vigorous workout at the gym every morning.
examples.ko: 그녀는 매일 아침 체육관에서 활발한 운동을 한다.

meanings.english: Existing or occurring on computers or on the internet.

examples.en: They attended a virtual conference online due to the pandemic.
examples.ko: 그들은 전염병으로 인해 온라인 가상 회의에 참석했다.
